original: BhP_05.01.001/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.01.001/1 priyavrato bhāgavatāatmārāmaḥ kathaṃ mune
BhP_05.01.001/2 gṛhe 'ramata yan-mūlaḥ karma-bandhaḥ parābhavaḥ
analyzed: gṛhe ramata yad mūlaḥ karma bandhaḥ parābhavaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.002/1 na nūnaṃ mukta-saṅgānāṃ tādṛśānāṃ dvijarṣabha
analyzed: na nūnam mukta saṅgānām tādṛśānām dvijarṣabha

original: BhP_05.01.002/2 gṛheṣv abhiniveśo 'yaṃ puṃsāṃ bhavitum arhati
analyzed: gṛheṣu abhiniveśaḥ yam puṃsām bhavitum arhati

original: BhP_05.01.003/1 mahatāṃ khalu viprarṣe uttamaśloka-pādayoḥ
analyzed: mahatām khalu viprarṣe uttama śloka pādayoḥ

original: BhP_05.01.003/2 chāyā-nirvṛta-cittānāṃ na kuṭumbe spṛhā-matiḥ
analyzed: chāyā nirvṛta cittānām na kuṭumbe spṛhā matiḥ

original: BhP_05.01.004/1 saṃśayo 'yaṃ mahān brahman dārāgāra-sutādiṣu
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ yam mahān brahman dāra āgāra suta ādiṣu

original: BhP_05.01.004/2 saktasya yat siddhir abhūt kṛṣṇe ca matir acyutā
analyzed: saktasya yat siddhiḥ abhūt kṛṣṇe ca matiḥ acyutā

original: BhP_05.01.005/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.01.005 /1 bāḍham uktaṃ bhagavata uttamaślokasya śrīmac-caraṇāravinda-makaranda-rasa
āveśita-cetaso bhāgavata-paramahaṃsa-dayita-kathāṃ kiñcid antarāya-vihatāṃ svāṃ śivatamāṃ
analyzed: āveśita cetasaḥ bhāgavata paramahaṃsa dayita kathām kiñcid antarāya vihatām svām śivatamām

original: padavīṃ na prāyeṇa hinvanti
analyzed: padavīm na prāyeṇa hinvanti

original: BhP_05.01.006 /1 yarhi vāva ha rājan sa rāja-putraḥ priyavrataḥ parama-bhāgavato
analyzed: yarhi vāva ha rājan sa rāja putraḥ priyavrataḥ parama bhāgavataḥ

original: nāradasya caraṇopasevayāñjasāvagata-paramārtha-satattvo brahma-satreṇa dīkṣiṣyamāṇo
analyzed: nāradasya caraṇa upasevayā añjasā avagata parama artha sa tattvaḥ brahma satreṇa dīkṣiṣyamāṇaḥ

original: 'vani-tala-paripālanāyāmnāta-pravara-guṇa-gaṇaikānta-bhājanatayā sva-pitropāmantrito
analyzed: vani tala paripālanāya āmnāta pravara guṇa gaṇa ekānta bhājana tayā sva pitrā upāmantritaḥ

original: bhagavati vāsudeva evāvyavadhāna-samādhi-yogena samāveśita-sakala-kāraka-kriyā-kalāpo
analyzed: bhagavati vāsudeve eva avyavadhāna samādhi yogena samāveśita sakala kāraka kriyā kalāpaḥ

original: naivābhyanandad yadyapi tad apratyāmnātavyaṃ tad-adhikaraṇa ātmano 'nyasmād asato
analyzed: na eva abhyanandat yadi api tat a pratyāmnātavyam tad adhikaraṇe ātmanaḥ

original: 'pi parābhavam anvīkṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: pi parābhavam anvīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.007 /1 atha ha bhagavān ādi-deva etasya guṇa-visargasya paribṛṃhaṇānudhyāna-vyavasita-sakala-jagad-abhiprāya
analyzed: atha ha bhagavān ādidevaḥ etasya guṇa visargasya

original: ātma-yonir akhila-nigama-nija-gaṇa-pariveṣṭitaḥ sva-bhavanād avatatāra
analyzed: ātmayoniḥ akhila nigama nija gaṇa pariveṣṭitaḥ sva bhavanāt avatatāra

original: BhP_05.01.008 /1 sa tatra tatra gagana-tala uḍu-patir iva vimānāvalibhir anupatham
analyzed: sa tatra tatra gagana tale uḍupatiḥ iva vimāna āvalibhiḥ anupatham

original: amara-parivṛḍhair abhipūjyamānaḥ pathi pathi ca varūthaśaḥ siddha-gandharva-sādhya-cāraṇa-muni-gaṇair
analyzed: amara parivṛḍhaiḥ abhipūjyamānaḥ pathi pathi ca varūthaśas siddha gandharva sādhya cāraṇa muni gaṇaiḥ

original: upagīyamāno gandha-mādana-droṇīm avabhāsayann upasasarpa
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ gandhamādana droṇīm avabhāsayan upasasarpa

original: BhP_05.01.009/1 tatra ha vā enaṃ devarṣir haṃsa-yānena pitaraṃ bhagavantaṃ hiraṇya-garbham upalabhamānaḥ sahasaivotthāyārhaṇena saha pitā-putrābhyām  #
analyzed: tatra ha vai enam devarṣiḥ haṃsa yānena pitaram bhagavantam hiraṇyagarbham upalabhamānaḥ sahasā eva utthāya arhaṇena saha pitā putrābhyām

original: avahitāñjalir upatasthe
analyzed: avahita añjaliḥ upatasthe

original: BhP_05.01.010/1 bhagavān api bhārata tad-upanītārhaṇaḥ sūkta-vākenātitarām udita-guṇa-gaṇāvatāra-sujayaḥ priyavratam ādi-puruṣas taṃ sadaya-hāsāvaloka  #
analyzed: bhagavān api bhārata tad upanīta arhaṇaḥ sūktavākena atitarām udita guṇa gaṇa avatāra su jayaḥ priyavratam ādipuruṣaḥ tam sadaya hāsa avaloka

original: iti hovāca
analyzed: iti ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.01.011/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_05.01.011/1 nibodha tātedam ṛtaṃ bravīmi māsūyituṃ devam arhasy aprameyam
analyzed: nibodha tāta idam ṛtam bravīmi mā asūyitum devam arhasi aprameyam

original: BhP_05.01.011/2 vayaṃ bhavas te tata eṣa maharṣir vahāma sarve vivaśā yasya diṣṭam
analyzed: vayam bhavaḥ te tatas eṣa mahā ṛṣiḥ vahāma sarve vivaśāḥ yasya diṣṭam

original: BhP_05.01.012/1 na tasya kaścit tapasā vidyayā vā na yoga-vīryeṇa manīṣayā vā
analyzed: na tasya kaścid tapasā vidyayā vā na yoga vīryeṇa manīṣayā vā

original: BhP_05.01.012/2 naivārtha-dharmaiḥ parataḥ svato vā kṛtaṃ vihantuṃ tanu-bhṛd vibhūyāt
analyzed: na eva artha dharmaiḥ paratas svatas vā kṛtam vihantum tanubhṛt vibhūyāt

original: BhP_05.01.013/1 bhavāya nāśāya ca karma kartuṃ śokāya mohāya sadā bhayāya
analyzed: bhavāya nāśāya ca karma kartum śokāya mohāya sadā bhayāya

original: BhP_05.01.013/2 sukhāya duḥkhāya ca deha-yogam avyakta-diṣṭaṃ janatāṅga dhatte
analyzed: sukhāya duḥkhāya ca deha yogam avyakta diṣṭam janatā aṅga dhatte

original: BhP_05.01.014/1 yad-vāci tantyāṃ guṇa-karma-dāmabhiḥ sudustarair vatsa vayaṃ suyojitāḥ
analyzed: yad vāci tantyām guṇa karma dāmabhiḥ su dustaraiḥ vatsa vayam su yojitāḥ

original: BhP_05.01.014/2 sarve vahāmo balim īśvarāya protā nasīva dvi-pade catuṣ-padaḥ
analyzed: sarve vahāmaḥ balim īśvarāya protāḥ nasi iva dvipade catuṣpadaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.015/1 īśābhisṛṣṭaṃ hy avarundhmahe 'ṅga duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vā guṇa-karma-saṅgāt
analyzed: īśa abhisṛṣṭam hi avarundhmahe ṅga duḥkham sukham vā guṇa karma saṅgāt

original: BhP_05.01.015/2 āsthāya tat tad yad ayuṅkta nāthaś cakṣuṣmatāndhā iva nīyamānāḥ
analyzed: āsthāya tat tat yat ayuṅkta nāthaḥ cakṣuṣmatā andhāḥ iva nīyamānāḥ

original: BhP_05.01.016/1 mukto 'pi tāvad bibhṛyāt sva-deham ārabdham aśnann abhimāna-śūnyaḥ
analyzed: muktaḥ pi tāvat bibhṛyāt sva deham ārabdham aśnan abhimāna śūnyaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.016/2 yathānubhūtaṃ pratiyāta-nidraḥ kiṃ tv anya-dehāya guṇān na vṛṅkte
analyzed: yathā anubhūtam pratiyāta nidraḥ kim tu anya dehāya guṇān na vṛṅkte

original: BhP_05.01.017/1 bhayaṃ pramattasya vaneṣv api syād yataḥ sa āste saha-ṣaṭ-sapatnaḥ
analyzed: bhayam pramattasya vaneṣu api syāt yatas saḥ āste saha ṣaṣ sapatnaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.017/2 jitendriyasyātma-rater budhasya gṛhāśramaḥ kiṃ nu karoty avadyam
analyzed: jita indriyasya ātma rateḥ budhasya gṛhāśramaḥ kim nu karoti avadyam

original: BhP_05.01.018/1 yaḥ ṣaṭ sapatnān vijigīṣamāṇo gṛheṣu nirviśya yateta pūrvam
analyzed: yaḥ ṣaṭ sapatnān vijigīṣamāṇaḥ gṛheṣu nirviśya yateta pūrvam

original: BhP_05.01.018/2 atyeti durgāśrita ūrjitārīn kṣīṇeṣu kāmaṃ vicared vipaścit
analyzed: atyeti durga āśritaḥ ūrjita arīn kṣīṇeṣu kāmam vicaret vipaścit

original: BhP_05.01.019/1 tvaṃ tv abja-nābhāṅghri-saroja-kośa- durgāśrito nirjita-ṣaṭ-sapatnaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu abjanābha aṅghri saroja kośa durga āśritaḥ nirjita ṣaṣ sapatnaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.019/2 bhuṅkṣveha bhogān puruṣātidiṣṭān vimukta-saṅgaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhajasva
analyzed: bhuṅkṣva iha bhogān puruṣa atidiṣṭān vimukta saṅgaḥ prakṛtim bhajasva

original: BhP_05.01.020/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.01.020/1 iti samabhihito mahā-bhāgavato bhagavatas tri-bhuvana-guror anuśāsanam ātmano laghutayāvanata-śirodharo bāḍham iti sabahu-mānam
analyzed: iti samabhihitaḥ mahā bhāgavataḥ bhagavataḥ tribhuvana guroḥ anuśāsanam ātmanaḥ laghu tayā avanata śirodharaḥ bāḍham iti sa bahu mānam

original: BhP_05.01.021 /1 bhagavān api manunā yathāvad upakalpitāpacitiḥ priyavrata-nāradayor
analyzed: bhagavān api manunā yathāvat upakalpita apacitiḥ priyavrata nāradayoḥ

original: aviṣamam abhisamīkṣamāṇayor ātmasam avasthānam avāṅ-manasaṃ kṣayam avyavahṛtaṃ pravartayann agamat
analyzed: aviṣamam abhisamīkṣamāṇayoḥ ātma sam avasthānam a vāc manasam kṣayam avyavahṛtam pravartayan agamat

original: BhP_05.01.022 /1 manur api pareṇaivaṃ pratisandhita-manorathaḥ surarṣi-varānumatenātmajam
analyzed: manuḥ api pareṇa evam pratisandhita manorathaḥ sura ṛṣi vara anumatena ātmajam

original: akhila-dharā-maṇḍala-sthiti-guptaya āsthāpya svayam ati-viṣama-viṣaya-viṣa-jalāśayāśāyā upararāma
analyzed: akhila dharā maṇḍala sthiti guptaye āsthāpya svayam ati viṣama viṣaya viṣa jalāśaya āśāyāḥ upararāma

original: BhP_05.01.023 /1 iti ha vāva sa jagatī-patir īśvarecchayādhiniveśita-karmādhikāro
analyzed: iti ha vāva sa jagatīpatiḥ īśvara icchayā adhiniveśita karma adhikāraḥ

original: 'khila-jagad-bandha-dhvaṃsana-parānubhāvasya bhagavata ādi-puruṣasyāṅghri-yugalānavarata-dhyānānubhāvena
analyzed: khila jagat bandha dhvaṃsana para anubhāvasya bhagavataḥ ādipuruṣasya aṅghri yugala anavarata dhyāna anubhāvena

original: parirandhita-kaṣāyāśayo 'vadāto 'pi māna-vardhano mahatāṃ mahītalam anuśaśāsa
analyzed: parirandhita kaṣāya āśayaḥ vadātaḥ pi māna vardhanaḥ mahatām mahī talam anuśaśāsa

original: BhP_05.01.024 /1 atha ca duhitaraṃ prajāpater viśvakarmaṇa upayeme barhiṣmatīṃ nāma
analyzed: atha ca duhitaram prajāpateḥ viśvakarmaṇaḥ upayeme barhiṣmatīm nāma

original: tasyām u ha vāva ātmajān ātma-samāna-śīla-guṇa-karma-rūpa-vīryodārān daśa bhāvayām
analyzed: tasyām u ha vāva ātma jān ātma samāna śīla guṇa karma rūpa vīrya udārān daśa

original: babhūva kanyāṃ ca yavīyasīm ūrjasvatīṃ nāma
analyzed: babhūva kanyām ca yavīyasīm ūrjasvatīm nāma

original: BhP_05.01.025/1 āgnīdhredhmajihva-yajñabāhu-mahāvīra-hiraṇyareto-ghṛtapṛṣṭha-savana-medhātithi-vītihotra-kavaya iti sarva evāgni-nāmānaḥ
analyzed: āgnīdhra idhma jihva yajñabāhu mahāvīra hiraṇyaretaḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭha savana medha atithi vītihotra kavayaḥ iti sarve eva agni nāmānaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.026/1 eteṣāṃ kavir mahāvīraḥ savana iti traya āsann ūrdhva-retasas ta ātma-vidyāyām arbha-bhāvād ārabhya kṛta-paricayāḥ pāramahaṃsyam  #
analyzed: eteṣām kaviḥ mahāvīraḥ savane iti trayaḥ āsan ūrdhvaretasaḥ te ātma vidyāyām arbha bhāvāt ārabhya kṛta paricayāḥ pāramahaṃsyam

original: evāśramam abhajan
analyzed: eva āśramam abhajan

original: BhP_05.01.027 /1 tasminn u ha vā upaśama-śīlāḥ paramarṣayaḥ sakala-jīva-nikāyāvāsasya
analyzed: tasmin u ha vai upaśama śīlāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ sakala jīvanikāya āvāsasya

original: bhagavato vāsudevasya bhītānāṃ śaraṇa-bhūtasya śrīmac-caraṇāravindāvirata-smaraṇāvigalita-parama-bhakti-yogānu-bhāvena
analyzed: bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya bhītānām śaraṇa bhūtasya śrīmat caraṇa aravinda a virata smaraṇa a vigalita parama bhakti yoga anubhāvena

original: paribhāvitāntar-hṛdayādhigate bhagavati sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūte pratyag-ātmany
analyzed: paribhāvita antar hṛdaya adhigate bhagavati sarveṣām bhūtānām ātma bhūte pratyagātmani

original: evātmanas tādātmyam aviśeṣeṇa samīyuḥ
analyzed: eva ātmanaḥ tādātmyam aviśeṣeṇa samīyuḥ

original: BhP_05.01.028/1 anyasyām api jāyāyāṃ trayaḥ putrā āsann uttamas tāmaso raivata iti manvantarādhipatayaḥ
analyzed: anyasyām api jāyāyām trayaḥ putrāḥ āsan uttamaḥ tāmasaḥ raivataḥ iti manvantara adhipatayaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.029 /1 evam upaśamāyaneṣu sva-tanayeṣv atha jagatī-patir jagatīm arbudāny
analyzed: evam upaśama ayaneṣu sva tanayeṣu atha jagatīpatiḥ jagatīm arbudāni

original: ekādaśa parivatsarāṇām avyāhatākhila-puruṣa-kāra-sāra-sambhṛta-dor-daṇḍa-yugalāpīḍita-maurvī-guṇa-stanita-viramita-dharma-pratipakṣo
analyzed: ekādaśa parivatsarāṇām avyāhata akhila puruṣakāra sāra sambhṛta dos daṇḍa yugala āpīḍita maurvī guṇa stanita viramita dharma pratipakṣaḥ

original: barhiṣmatyāś cānudinam edhamāna-pramoda-prasaraṇa-yauṣiṇya-vrīḍā-pramuṣita-hāsāvaloka-rucira-kṣvely-ādibhiḥ
analyzed: barhiṣmatyāḥ ca anudinam edhamāna pramoda prasaraṇa yauṣiṇya vrīḍā pramuṣita hāsa avaloka ruci rakṣū elyā ādibhiḥ

original: parābhūyamāna-viveka ivānavabudhyamāna iva mahāmanā bubhuje
analyzed: parābhūyamāna vivekaḥ iva an avabudhyamānaḥ iva mahāmanāḥ bubhuje

original: BhP_05.01.030 /1 yāvad avabhāsayati sura-girim anuparikrāman bhagavān ādityo vasudhā-talam
analyzed: yāvat avabhāsayati suragirim anuparikrāman bhagavān ādityaḥ vasudhā talam

original: ardhenaiva pratapaty ardhenāvacchādayati tadā hi bhagavad-upāsanopacitāti-puruṣa-prabhāvas
analyzed: ardhena eva pratapati ardhena avacchādayati tadā hi bhagavat upāsana upacita ati puruṣa prabhāvaḥ

original: tad anabhinandan samajavena rathena jyotirmayena rajanīm api dinaṃ kariṣyāmīti sapta-kṛt
analyzed: tat an abhinandan sama javena rathena jyotiḥ mayena rajanīm api dinam kariṣyāmi iti sapta kṛt

original: vastaraṇim anuparyakrāmad dvitīya iva pataṅgaḥ
analyzed: vastaraṇim anuparyakrāmat dvitīyaḥ iva pataṅgaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.031/1 ye vā u ha tad-ratha-caraṇa-nemi-kṛta-parikhātās te sapta sindhava āsan yata eva kṛtāḥ sapta bhuvo dvīpāḥ
analyzed: ye vai u ha tad ratha caraṇa nemi kṛta parikhātāḥ te sapta sindhavaḥ āsan yatas eva kṛtāḥ sapta bhuvaḥ dvīpāḥ

original: BhP_05.01.032/1 jambū-plakṣa-śālmali-kuśa-krauñca-śāka-puṣkara-saṃjñās teṣāṃ parimāṇaṃ pūrvasmāt pūrvasmād uttara uttaro yathā-saṅkhyaṃ dvi-guṇa-mānena  #
analyzed: jambu plakṣa śālmali kuśa krauñca śāka puṣkara saṃjñāḥ teṣām parimāṇam pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt uttaraḥ uttaraḥ yathāsaṅkhyam dviguṇa mānena

original: bahiḥ samantata upakḷptāḥ
analyzed: bahis samantataḥ upakḷptāḥ

original: BhP_05.01.033/1 duhitaraṃ corjasvatīṃ nāmośanase prāyacchad yasyām āsīd devayānī nāma kāvya-sutā
analyzed: duhitaram ca ūrjasvatīm nāma uśanase prāyacchat yasyām āsīt devayānī nāma kāvya sutā

original: BhP_05.01.034/1 naivaṃ-vidhaḥ puruṣa-kāra urukramasya
analyzed: na evaṃvidhaḥ puruṣakāraḥ urukramasya

original: BhP_05.01.034/2 puṃsāṃ tad-aṅghri-rajasā jita-ṣaḍ-guṇānām
analyzed: puṃsām tad aṅghri rajasā jita ṣaḍguṇānām

original: BhP_05.01.034/3 citraṃ vidūra-vigataḥ sakṛd ādadīta
analyzed: citram vidūra vigataḥ sakṛt ādadīta

original: BhP_05.01.034/4 yan-nāmadheyam adhunā sa jahāti bandham
analyzed: yad nāmadheyam adhunā sa jahāti bandham

original: BhP_05.01.035/1 sa evam aparimita-bala-parākrama ekadā tu devarṣi-caraṇānuśayanānu-patita-guṇa-visarga-saṃsargeṇānirvṛtam ivātmānaṃ manyamāna  #
analyzed: saḥ evam aparimita bala parākramaḥ ekadā tu devarṣi caraṇa anuśayana anupatita guṇa visarga saṃsargeṇa anirvṛtam iva ātmānam manyamāna

original: ātma-nirveda idam āha
analyzed: ātma nirvedaḥ idam āha

original: BhP_05.01.036 /1 aho asādhv anuṣṭhitaṃ yad abhiniveśito 'ham indriyair avidyā-racita-viṣama-viṣayāndha-kūpe
analyzed: aho asādhu anuṣṭhitam yat abhiniveśitaḥ ham indriyaiḥ avidyā racita viṣama viṣaya andhakūpe

original: tad alam alam amuṣyā vanitāyā vinoda-mṛgaṃ māṃ dhig dhig iti garhayāṃ cakāra
analyzed: tat alam alam amuṣyāḥ vanitāyāḥ vinoda mṛgam mām dhik dhik iti garhayām cakāra

original: BhP_05.01.037 /1 para-devatā-prasādādhigatātma-pratyavamarśenānupravṛttebhyaḥ putrebhya
analyzed: para devatā prasāda adhigata ātma pratyavamarśeṇa anupravṛttebhyaḥ

original: imāṃ yathā-dāyaṃ vibhajya bhukta-bhogāṃ ca mahiṣīṃ mṛtakam iva saha mahā-vibhūtim
analyzed: imām yathā ādāyam vibhajya bhukta bhogām ca mahiṣīm mṛtakam iva saha mahā vibhūtim

original: apahāya svayaṃ nihita-nirvedo hṛdi gṛhīta-hari-vihārānubhāvo bhagavato nāradasya
analyzed: apahāya svayam nihita nirvedaḥ hṛdi gṛhīta hari vihāra anubhāvaḥ bhagavataḥ nāradasya

original: padavīṃ punar evānusasāra
analyzed: padavīm punar eva anusasāra

original: BhP_05.01.038/0 tasya ha vā ete ślokāḥ
analyzed: tasya ha vai ete ślokāḥ

original: BhP_05.01.038/1 priyavrata-kṛtaṃ karma ko nu kuryād vineśvaram
analyzed: priyavrata kṛtam karma kaḥ nu kuryāt vinā īśvaram

original: BhP_05.01.038/2 yo nemi-nimnair akaroc chāyāṃ ghnan sapta vāridhīn
analyzed: yaḥ nemi nimnaiḥ akarot chāyām ghnan sapta vāridhīn

original: BhP_05.01.039/1 bhū-saṃsthānaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sarid-giri-vanādibhiḥ
analyzed: bhū saṃsthānam kṛtam yena sarit giri vana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_05.01.039/2 sīmā ca bhūta-nirvṛtyai dvīpe dvīpe vibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: sīmā ca bhūta nirvṛtyai dvīpe dvīpe vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.040/1 bhaumaṃ divyaṃ mānuṣaṃ ca mahitvaṃ karma-yogajam
analyzed: bhaumam divyam mānuṣam ca mahi tvam karma yoga jam

original: BhP_05.01.040/2 yaś cakre nirayaupamyaṃ puruṣānujana-priyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ cakre niraya aupamyam puruṣa anujana priyaḥ

original: BhP_05.01.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.02.001/1 evaṃ pitari sampravṛtte tad-anuśāsane vartamāna āgnīdhro jambūdvīpaukasaḥ prajā aurasavad dharmāvekṣamāṇaḥ paryagopāyat
analyzed: evam pitari sampravṛtte tad anuśāsane vartamāne āgnīdhraḥ jambūdvīpa okasaḥ prajāḥ aurasa vat dharma avekṣamāṇaḥ paryagopāyat

original: BhP_05.02.002/1 sa ca kadācit pitṛloka-kāmaḥ sura-vara-vanitākrīḍācala-droṇyāṃ bhagavantaṃ viśva-sṛjāṃ patim ābhṛta-paricaryopakaraṇa ātma  #
analyzed: sa ca kadācid pitṛ loka kāmaḥ sura vara vanitā krīḍā acala droṇyām bhagavantam viśvasṛjām patim ābhṛta paricaryā upakaraṇaḥ

original: ikāgryeṇa tapasvy ārādhayāṃ babhūva
analyzed: ikāgryeṇa tapasvī ārādhayām babhūva

original: BhP_05.02.003/1 tad upalabhya bhagavān ādi-puruṣaḥ sadasi gāyantīṃ pūrvacittiṃ nāmāpsarasam abhiyāpayām āsa
analyzed: tat upalabhya bhagavān ādipuruṣaḥ sadasi gāyantīm pūrvacittim nāma apsarasam abhiyāpayām āsa

original: BhP_05.02.004 /1 sā ca tad-āśramopavanam ati-ramaṇīyaṃ vividha-nibiḍa-viṭapi-viṭapa-nikara-saṃśliṣṭa-puraṭa-latārūḍha-sthala-vihaṅgama-mithunaiḥ
analyzed: sā ca tad āśrama upavanam ati ramaṇīyam vividha nibiḍa viṭapi viṭapa nikara saṃśliṣṭa puraṭa latā ārūḍha sthala vihaṃgama mithunaiḥ

original: procyamāna-śrutibhiḥ pratibodhyamāna-salila-kukkuṭa-kāraṇḍava-kalahaṃsādibhir vicitram
analyzed: procyamāna śrutibhiḥ pratibodhyamāna salila kukkuṭa kāraṇḍava kalahaṃsa ādibhiḥ vicitram

original: upakūjitāmala-jalāśaya-kamalākaram upababhrāma
analyzed: upakūjita amala jalāśaya kamala ākaram upababhrāma

original: BhP_05.02.005 /1 tasyāḥ sulalita-gamana-pada-vinyāsa-gati-vilāsāyāś cānupadaṃ khaṇa-khaṇāyamāna-rucira-caraṇābharaṇa-svanam
analyzed: tasyāḥ su lalita gamana pada vinyāsa gati vilāsāyāḥ ca anupadam khaṇakhaṇāyamāna rucira caraṇa ābharaṇa svanam

original: upākarṇya naradeva-kumāraḥ samādhi-yogenāmīlita-nayana-nalina-mukula-yugalam īṣad vikacayya vyacaṣṭa
analyzed: upākarṇya naradeva kumāraḥ samādhi yogena āmīlita nayana nalina mukula yugalam īṣat vikacayya vyacaṣṭa

original: BhP_05.02.006 /1 tām evāvidūre madhukarīm iva sumanasa upajighrantīṃ divija-manuja-mano-nayanāhlāda-dughair
analyzed: tām eva avidūre madhukarīm iva sumanasaḥ upajighrantīm divija manuja manaḥ nayana āhlāda dughaiḥ

original: gati-vihāra-vrīḍā-vinayāvaloka-susvarākṣarāvayavair manasi nṛṇāṃ kusumāyudhasya vidadhatīṃ
analyzed: gati vihāra vrīḍā vinaya avaloka su svara akṣara avayavaiḥ manasi nṛṇām kusumāyudhasya vidadhatīm

original: vivaraṃ nija-mukha-vigalitāmṛtāsava-sahāsa-bhāṣaṇāmoda-madāndha-madhukara-nikaroparodhena
analyzed: vivaram nija mukha vigalita amṛta āsava sa hāsa bhāṣaṇa āmoda mada andha madhukara nikara uparodhena

original: druta-pada-vinyāsena valgu-spandana-stana-kalaśa-kabara-bhāra-raśanāṃ devīṃ tad-avalokanena
analyzed: druta pada vinyāsena valgu spandana stana kalaśa kabara bhāra raśanām devīm tad avalokanena

original: vivṛtāvasarasya bhagavato makara-dhvajasya vaśam upanīto jaḍavad iti hovāca
analyzed: vivṛta avasarasya bhagavataḥ makaradhvajasya vaśam upanītaḥ jaḍa vat iti ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.02.007/1 kā tvaṃ cikīrṣasi ca kiṃ muni-varya śaile
analyzed: kā tvam cikīrṣasi ca kim muni varya śaile

original: BhP_05.02.007/2 māyāsi kāpi bhagavat-para-devatāyāḥ
analyzed: māyā asi kā api bhagavat para devatāyāḥ

original: BhP_05.02.007/3 vijye bibharṣi dhanuṣī suhṛd-ātmano 'rthe
analyzed: vijye bibharṣi dhanuṣī suhṛd ātmanaḥ rthe

original: BhP_05.02.007/4 kiṃ vā mṛgān mṛgayase vipine pramattān
analyzed: kim vā mṛgān mṛgayase vipine pramattān

original: BhP_05.02.008/1 bāṇāv imau bhagavataḥ śata-patra-patrau
analyzed: bāṇau imau bhagavataḥ śata patra patrau

original: BhP_05.02.008/2 śāntāv apuṅkha-rucirāv ati-tigma-dantau
analyzed: śāntau a puṅkha rucirau a ti tigma dantau

original: BhP_05.02.008/3 kasmai yuyuṅkṣasi vane vicaran na vidmaḥ
analyzed: kasmai yuyuṅkṣasi vane vicaran na vidmaḥ

original: BhP_05.02.008/4 kṣemāya no jaḍa-dhiyāṃ tava vikramo 'stu
analyzed: kṣemāya naḥ jaḍa dhiyām tava vikramaḥ stu

original: BhP_05.02.009/1 śiṣyā ime bhagavataḥ paritaḥ paṭhanti
analyzed: śiṣyāḥ ime bhagavataḥ paritas paṭhanti

original: BhP_05.02.009/2 gāyanti sāma sarahasyam ajasram īśam
analyzed: gāyanti sāma sa rahasyam ajasram īśam

original: BhP_05.02.009/3 yuṣmac-chikhā-vilulitāḥ sumano 'bhivṛṣṭīḥ
analyzed: yuṣmad śikhā vilulitāḥ sumanaḥ abhivṛṣṭīḥ

original: BhP_05.02.009/4 sarve bhajanty ṛṣi-gaṇā iva veda-śākhāḥ
analyzed: sarve bhajanti ṛṣi gaṇāḥ iva veda śākhāḥ

original: BhP_05.02.010/1 vācaṃ paraṃ caraṇa-pañjara-tittirīṇāṃ
analyzed: vācam param caraṇa pañjara tittirīṇām

original: BhP_05.02.010/2 brahmann arūpa-mukharāṃ śṛṇavāma tubhyam
analyzed: brahman arūpa mukharām śṛṇavāma tubhyam

original: BhP_05.02.010/3 labdhā kadamba-rucir aṅka-viṭaṅka-bimbe
analyzed: labdhā kadamba ruciḥ aṅka viṭaṅka bimbe

original: BhP_05.02.010/4 yasyām alāta-paridhiḥ kva ca valkalaṃ te
analyzed: yasyām alāta paridhiḥ kva ca valkalam te

original: BhP_05.02.011/1 kiṃ sambhṛtaṃ rucirayor dvija śṛṅgayos te
analyzed: kim sambhṛtam rucirayoḥ dvija śṛṅgayoḥ te

original: BhP_05.02.011/2 madhye kṛśo vahasi yatra dṛśiḥ śritā me
analyzed: madhye kṛśaḥ vahasi yatra dṛśiḥ śritā me

original: BhP_05.02.011/3 paṅko 'ruṇaḥ surabhir ātma-viṣāṇa īdṛg
analyzed: paṅkaḥ ruṇaḥ surabhiḥ ātma viṣāṇaḥ īdṛś

original: BhP_05.02.011/4 yenāśramaṃ subhaga me surabhī-karoṣi
analyzed: yena āśramam subhaga me surabhīkaroṣi

original: BhP_05.02.012/1 lokaṃ pradarśaya suhṛttama tāvakaṃ me
analyzed: lokam pradarśaya suhṛttama tāvakam me

original: BhP_05.02.012/2 yatratya ittham urasāvayavāv apūrvau
analyzed: yatratyaḥ ittham urasā avayavau apūrvau

original: BhP_05.02.012/3 asmad-vidhasya mana-unnayanau bibharti
analyzed: asmadvidhasya manaunnayanau bibharti

original: BhP_05.02.012/4 bahv adbhutaṃ sarasa-rāsa-sudhādi vaktre
analyzed: bahu adbhutam sarasa rāsa sudhā ādi vaktre

original: BhP_05.02.013/1 kā vātma-vṛttir adanād dhavir aṅga vāti
analyzed: kā vā ātma vṛttiḥ adanāt haviḥ aṅga vāti

original: BhP_05.02.013/2 viṣṇoḥ kalāsy animiṣonmakarau ca karṇau
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ kalā asi animiṣa unmakarau ca karṇau

original: BhP_05.02.013/3 udvigna-mīna-yugalaṃ dvija-paṅkti-śocir
analyzed: udvigna mīna yugalam dvija paṅkti śociḥ

original: BhP_05.02.013/4 āsanna-bhṛṅga-nikaraṃ sara in mukhaṃ te
analyzed: āsanna bhṛṅga nikaram saraḥ id mukham te

original: BhP_05.02.014/1 yo 'sau tvayā kara-saroja-hataḥ pataṅgo
analyzed: yaḥ sau tvayā kara saroja hataḥ pataṅgo

original: BhP_05.02.014/2 dikṣu bhraman bhramata ejayate 'kṣiṇī me
analyzed: dikṣu bhraman bhramate ejayate kṣiṇī me

original: BhP_05.02.014/3 muktaṃ na te smarasi vakra-jaṭā-varūthaṃ
analyzed: muktam na te smarasi vakra jaṭā varūtham

original: BhP_05.02.014/4 kaṣṭo 'nilo harati lampaṭa eṣa nīvīm
analyzed: kaṣṭaḥ nilaḥ harati lampaṭaḥ eṣa nīvīm

original: BhP_05.02.015/1 rūpaṃ tapodhana tapaś caratāṃ tapoghnaṃ
analyzed: rūpam tapodhana tapaḥ caratām tapaḥ ghnam

original: BhP_05.02.015/2 hy etat tu kena tapasā bhavatopalabdham
analyzed: hi etat tu kena tapasā bhavatā upalabdham

original: BhP_05.02.015/3 cartuṃ tapo 'rhasi mayā saha mitra mahyaṃ
analyzed: cartum tapaḥ rhasi mayā saha mitra mahyam

original: BhP_05.02.015/4 kiṃ vā prasīdati sa vai bhava-bhāvano me
analyzed: kim vā prasīdati sa vai bhava bhāvanaḥ me

original: BhP_05.02.016/1 na tvāṃ tyajāmi dayitaṃ dvija-deva-dattaṃ
analyzed: na tvām tyajāmi dayitam dvijadevadattam

original: BhP_05.02.016/2 yasmin mano dṛg api no na viyāti lagnam
analyzed: yasmin manaḥ dṛś api naḥ na viyāti lagnam

original: BhP_05.02.016/3 māṃ cāru-śṛṅgy arhasi netum anuvrataṃ te
analyzed: mām cāru śṛṅgi arhasi netum anuvratam te

original: BhP_05.02.016/4 cittaṃ yataḥ pratisarantu śivāḥ sacivyaḥ
analyzed: cittam yatas pratisarantu śivāḥ sacivyaḥ

original: BhP_05.02.017/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.02.017/1 iti lalanānunayāti-viśārado grāmya-vaidagdhyayā paribhāṣayā tāṃ vibudha-vadhūṃ vibudha-matir adhisabhājayām āsa
analyzed: iti lalanā anunaya ati viśāradaḥ grāmya vaidagdhyayā paribhāṣayā tām vibudha vadhūm vibudha matiḥ adhisabhājayām āsa

original: BhP_05.02.018 /1 sā ca tatas tasya vīra-yūtha-pater buddhi-śīla-rūpa-vayaḥ-śriyaudāryeṇa
analyzed: sā ca tatas tasya vīra yūtha pateḥ buddhi śīla rūpa vayaḥ śriyā audāryeṇa

original: parākṣipta-manās tena sahāyutāyuta-parivatsaropalakṣaṇaṃ kālaṃ jambūdvīpa-patinā
analyzed: parākṣipta manāḥ tena saha ayuta ayuta parivatsara upalakṣaṇam kālam jambūdvīpa patinā

original: bhauma-svarga-bhogān bubhuje
analyzed: bhauma svarga bhogān bubhuje

original: BhP_05.02.019/1 tasyām u ha vā ātmajān sa rāja-vara āgnīdhro nābhi-kimpuruṣa-harivarṣelāvṛta-ramyaka-hiraṇmaya-kuru-bhadrāśva-ketumāla-saṃjñān  #
analyzed: tasyām u ha vai ātmajān sa rāja varaḥ āgnīdhraḥ nābhi kimpuruṣa harivarṣa ilāvṛta ramyaka hiraṇmaya kuru bhadrāśva ketumāla saṃjñān

original: nava putrān ajanayat
analyzed: nava putrān ajanayat

original: BhP_05.02.020/1 sā sūtvātha sutān navānuvatsaraṃ gṛha evāpahāya pūrvacittir bhūya evājaṃ devam upatasthe
analyzed: sā sūtvā atha sutān nava anuvatsaram gṛhe eva apahāya pūrvacittiḥ bhūyas eva ajam devam upatasthe

original: BhP_05.02.021/1 āgnīdhra-sutās te mātur anugrahād autpattikenaiva saṃhanana-balopetāḥ pitrā vibhaktā ātma-tulya-nāmāni yathā-bhāgaṃ jambūdvīpa-varṣāṇi
analyzed: āgnīdhra sutāḥ te mātuḥ anugrahāt autpattikena eva saṃhanana bala upetāḥ pitrā vibhaktāḥ ātma tulya nāmāni yathābhāgam jambūdvīpa varṣāṇi

original: BhP_05.02.022/1 āgnīdhro rājātṛptaḥ kāmānām apsarasam evānudinam adhi-manyamānas tasyāḥ salokatāṃ śrutibhir avārundha yatra pitaro mādayante
analyzed: āgnīdhraḥ rājā atṛptaḥ kāmānām apsarasam eva anudinam adhimanyamānaḥ tasyāḥ salokatām śrutibhiḥ avārundha yatra pitaraḥ mādayante

original: BhP_05.02.023/1 samparete pitari nava bhrātaro meru-duhit-r merudevīṃ pratirūpām ugradaṃṣṭrīṃ latāṃ ramyāṃ śyāmāṃ nārīṃ bhadrāṃ devavītim iti  #
analyzed: samparete pitari nava bhrātaraḥ meruduhitr merudevīm pratirūpām ugradaṃṣṭrīm latām ramyām śyāmām nārīm bhadrām deva vītim iti

original: saṃjñā navodavahan
analyzed: saṃjñāḥ nava udavahan

original: BhP_05.03.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.03.001/1 nābhir apatya-kāmo 'prajayā merudevyā bhagavantaṃ yajña-puruṣam avahitātmāyajata
analyzed: nābhiḥ apatya kāmaḥ prajayā merudevyā bhagavantam yajñapuruṣam avahita ātmā ayajata

original: BhP_05.03.002 /1 tasya ha vāva śraddhayā viśuddha-bhāvena yajataḥ pravargyeṣu pracaratsu
analyzed: tasya ha vāva śraddhayā viśuddha bhāvena yajataḥ pravargyeṣu pracaratsu

original: dravya-deśa-kāla-mantrartvig-dakṣiṇā-vidhāna-yogopapattyā duradhigamo 'pi bhagavān
analyzed: dravya deśa kāla mantra ṛtvij dakṣiṇā vidhāna yoga upapattyā duradhigamaḥ pi bhagavān

original: bhāgavata-vātsalyatayā supratīka ātmānam aparājitaṃ nija-janābhipretārtha-vidhitsayā
analyzed: bhāgavata vātsalya tayā supratīkaḥ ātmānam aparājitam nija jana abhipreta artha vidhitsayā

original: gṛhīta-hṛdayo hṛdayaṅgamaṃ mano-nayanānandanāvayavābhirāmam āviścakāra
analyzed: gṛhīta hṛdayaḥ hṛdayaṅgamam manaḥ nayana ānandana avayava abhirāmam āviścakāra

original: BhP_05.03.003 /1 atha ha tam āviṣkṛta-bhuja-yugala-dvayaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣa-viśeṣaṃ
analyzed: atha ha tam āviṣkṛta bhuja yugala dvayam hiraṇmayam puruṣa viśeṣam

original: kapiśa-kauśeyāmbara-dharam urasi vilasac-chrīvatsa-lalāmaṃ daravara-vanaruha-vana-mālācchūry-amṛta-maṇi-gadādibhir
analyzed: kapiśa kauśeya ambara dharam urasi vilasat śrīvatsa lalāmam dara vara vanaruha vana mālā cūrī amṛta maṇi gada ādibhiḥ

original: upalakṣitaṃ sphuṭa-kiraṇa-pravara-mukuṭa-kuṇḍala-kaṭaka-kaṭi-sūtra-hāra-keyūra-nūpurādy-aṅga-bhūṣaṇa-vibhūṣitam
analyzed: upalakṣitam sphuṭa kiraṇa pravara mukuṭa kuṇḍala kaṭaka kaṭisūtra hāra keyūra nūpura ādi aṅga bhūṣaṇa vibhūṣitam

original: ṛtvik-sadasya-gṛha-patayo 'dhanā ivottama-dhanam upalabhya sabahu-mānam arhaṇenāvanata-śīrṣāṇa upatasthuḥ
analyzed: ṛtvij sadasya gṛhapatayaḥ dhanā iva uttama dhanam upalabhya sa bahu mānam arhaṇena avanata śīrṣāṇaḥ upatasthuḥ

original: BhP_05.03.004/0 ṛtvija ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_05.03.004 /1 arhasi muhur arhattamārhaṇam asmākam anupathānāṃ namo nama ity etāvat
analyzed: arhasi muhur arhattama arhaṇam asmākam anupathānām namaḥ namaḥ iti etāvat

original: sad-upaśikṣitaṃ ko 'rhati pumān prakṛti-guṇa-vyatikara-matir anīśa īśvarasya parasya
analyzed: sat upaśikṣitam kaḥ rhati pumān prakṛti guṇa vyatikara matiḥ anīśaḥ īśvarasya parasya

original: prakṛti-puruṣayor arvāktanābhir nāma-rūpākṛtibhī rūpa-nirūpaṇam sakala-jana-nikāya-vṛjina-nirasana-śivatama-pravara-guṇa-gaṇaika-deśa-kathanād
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣayoḥ arvāktanābhiḥ nāma rūpa ākṛtibhiḥ rūpa nirūpaṇam sakala jana nikāya vṛjina nirasana śivatama pravara guṇa gaṇa ekadeśa kathanāt

original: BhP_05.03.005/1 parijanānurāga-viracita-śabala-saṃśabda-salila-sita-kisalaya-tulasikā-dūrvāṅkurair api sambhṛtayā saparyayā kila parama parituṣyasi
analyzed: parijana anurāga viracita śabala saṃśabda salila sita kisalaya tulasikā dūrvā aṅkuraiḥ api sambhṛtayā saparyayā kila parama parituṣyasi

original: BhP_05.03.006/1 athānayāpi na bhavata ijyayoru-bhāra-bharayā samucitam artham ihopalabhāmahe
analyzed: atha anayā api na bhavataḥ ijyayā uru bhāra bharayā samucitam artham iha upalabhāmahe

original: BhP_05.03.007/1 ātmana evānusavanam añjasāvyatirekeṇa bobhūyamānāśeṣa-puruṣārtha-svarūpasya kintu nāthāśiṣa āśāsānānām etad abhisaṃrādhana-mātraṃ  #
analyzed: ātmanaḥ eva anusavanam añjasā a vyatirekeṇa bobhūyamāna aśeṣa puruṣa artha svarūpasya kintu nātha āśiṣaḥ āśāsānānām etat abhisaṃrādhana mātram

original: bhavitum arhati
analyzed: bhavitum arhati

original: BhP_05.03.008 /1 tad yathā bāliśānāṃ svayam ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ param aviduṣāṃ parama-parama-puruṣa
analyzed: tat yathā bāliśānām svayam ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ param aviduṣām parama parama puruṣa

original: prakarṣa-karuṇayā sva-mahimānaṃ cāpavargākhyam upakalpayiṣyan svayaṃ nāpacita evetaravad ihopalakṣitaḥ
analyzed: prakarṣa karuṇayā sva mahimānam ca apavarga ākhyam upakalpayiṣyan svayam na apacitaḥ evā itara vat iha upalakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_05.03.009/1 athāyam eva varo hy arhattama yarhi barhiṣi rājarṣer varadarṣabho bhavān nija-puruṣekṣaṇa-viṣaya āsīt
analyzed: atha ayam eva varaḥ hi arhattama yarhi barhiṣi rājarṣeḥ vara da ṛṣabhaḥ bhavān nija puruṣa īkṣaṇa viṣayaḥ āsīt

original: BhP_05.03.010/1 asaṅga-niśita-jñānānala-vidhūtāśeṣa-malānāṃ bhavat-svabhāvānām ātmārāmāṇāṃ munīnām anavarata-pariguṇita-guṇa-gaṇa parama-maṅgalāyana-guṇa-gaṇa-kathano
analyzed: asaṅga niśita jñāna anala vidhūta aśeṣa malānām bhavat svabhāvānām ātma ārāmāṇām munīnām anavarata pariguṇita guṇa gaṇa parama maṅgalāyana guṇa gaṇa kathanaḥ

original: BhP_05.03.011 /1 atha kathañcit skhalana-kṣut-patana-jṛmbhaṇa-duravasthānādiṣu vivaśānāṃ
analyzed: atha kathañcid skhalana kṣudh patana jṛmbhaṇa duravasthāna ādiṣu vivaśānām

original: naḥ smaraṇāya jvara-maraṇa-daśāyām api sakala-kaśmala-nirasanāni tava guṇa-kṛta-nāmadheyāni
analyzed: naḥ smaraṇāya jvara maraṇa daśāyām api sakala kaśmala nirasanāni tava guṇa kṛta nāmadheyāni

original: vacana-gocarāṇi bhavantu
analyzed: vacana gocarāṇi bhavantu

original: BhP_05.03.012 /1 kiñcāyaṃ rājarṣir apatya-kāmaḥ prajāṃ bhavādṛśīm āśāsāna īśvaram
analyzed: kiñca ayam rājarṣiḥ apatya kāmaḥ prajām bhavādṛśīm āśāsānaḥ īśvaram

original: āśiṣāṃ svargāpavargayor api bhavantam upadhāvati prajāyām artha-pratyayo dhanadam
analyzed: āśiṣām svarga apavargayoḥ api bhavantam upadhāvati prajāyām artha pratyayaḥ dhana dam

original: ivādhanaḥ phalīkaraṇam
analyzed: iva adhanaḥ phalīkaraṇam

original: BhP_05.03.013/1 ko vā iha te 'parājito 'parājitayā māyayānavasita-padavyānāvṛta-matir viṣaya-viṣa-rayānāvṛta-prakṛtir anupāsita-mahac-caraṇaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vai iha te parājito parājitayā māyayā anavasita padavyā an āvṛta matiḥ viṣaya viṣarayā an āvṛta prakṛtiḥ an upāsita mahat caraṇaḥ

original: BhP_05.03.014/1 yad u ha vāva tava punar adabhra-kartar iha samāhūtas tatrārtha-dhiyāṃ mandānāṃ nas tad yad deva-helanaṃ deva-devārhasi sāmyena  #
analyzed: yat u ha vāva tava punar adabhra kartar iha samāhūtaḥ tatra artha dhiyām mandānām naḥ tat yat deva helanam devadeva arhasi sāmyena

original: sarvān prativoḍhum aviduṣām
analyzed: sarvān prativoḍhum a viduṣām

original: BhP_05.03.015/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.03.015/1 iti nigadenābhiṣṭūyamāno bhagavān animiṣarṣabho varṣa-dharābhivāditābhivandita-caraṇaḥ sadayam idam āha
analyzed: iti nigadena abhiṣṭūyamānaḥ bhagavān animiṣa ṛṣabhaḥ varṣadhara abhivādita abhivandita caraṇaḥ sa dayam idam āha

original: BhP_05.03.016/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_05.03.016 /1 aho batāham ṛṣayo bhavadbhir avitatha-gīrbhir varam asulabham abhiyācito
analyzed: aho bata aham ṛṣayaḥ bhavadbhiḥ avitatha gīrbhiḥ varam a sulabham

original: yad amuṣyātmajo mayā sadṛśo bhūyād iti mamāham evābhirūpaḥ kaivalyād athāpi brahma-vādo
analyzed: yat amuṣya ātmajaḥ mayā sadṛśaḥ bhūyāt iti mama aham eva abhirūpaḥ kaivalyāt atha api

original: na mṛṣā bhavitum arhati mamaiva hi mukhaṃ yad dvija-deva-kulam
analyzed: na mṛṣā bhavitum arhati mama eva hi mukham yat dvija devakulam

original: BhP_05.03.017/1 tata āgnīdhrīye 'ṃśa-kalayāvatariṣyāmy ātma-tulyam anupalabhamānaḥ
analyzed: tatas āgnīdhrīye ṃśakalayā avatariṣyāmi ātma tulyam an upalabhamānaḥ

original: BhP_05.03.018/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.03.018/1 iti niśāmayantyā merudevyāḥ patim abhidhāyāntardadhe bhagavān
analyzed: iti niśāmayantyā merudevyāḥ patim abhidhāya antardadhe bhagavān

original: BhP_05.04.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.04.001 /1 atha ha tam utpattyaivābhivyajyamāna-bhagaval-lakṣaṇaṃ sāmyopaśama-vairāgyaiśvarya-mahā-vibhūtibhir
analyzed: atha ha tam utpattyā eva abhivyajyamāna bhagavat lakṣaṇam sāmya upaśama vairāgya aiśvarya mahā vibhūtibhiḥ

original: anudinam edhamānānubhāvaṃ prakṛtayaḥ prajā brāhmaṇā devatāś cāvani-tala-samavanāyātitarāṃ jagṛdhuḥ
analyzed: anudinam edhamāna anubhāvam prakṛtayaḥ prajāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ devatāḥ ca avani tala samavanāya atitarām jagṛdhuḥ

original: BhP_05.04.002/1 tasya ha vā itthaṃ varṣmaṇā varīyasā bṛhac-chlokena caujasā balena śriyā yaśasā vīrya-śauryābhyāṃ ca pitā ṛṣabha itīdaṃ nāma
analyzed: tasya ha vai ittham varṣmaṇā varīyasā bṛhacchlokena ca ojasā balena śriyā yaśasā vīrya śauryābhyām ca pitā ṛṣabhaḥ iti idam nāma

original: BhP_05.04.003/1 yasya hīndraḥ spardhamāno bhagavān varṣe na vavarṣa tad avadhārya bhagavān ṛṣabhadevo yogeśvaraḥ prahasyātma-yogamāyayā sva-varṣam  #
analyzed: yasya hi indraḥ spardhamānaḥ bhagavān varṣe na vavarṣa tat avadhārya bhagavān ṛṣabhadevaḥ yoga īśvaraḥ prahasya ātma yoga māyayā sva varṣam

original: ajanābhaṃ nāmābhyavarṣat
analyzed: ajanābham nāma abhyavarṣat

original: BhP_05.04.004 /1 nābhis tu yathābhilaṣitaṃ suprajastvam avarudhyāti-pramoda-bhara-vihvalo
analyzed: nābhiḥ tu yathā abhilaṣitam suprajas tvam avarudhya ati pramoda bhara vihvalaḥ

original: gadgadākṣarayā girā svairaṃ gṛhīta-naraloka-sadharmaṃ bhagavantaṃ purāṇa-puruṣaṃ
analyzed: gadgada akṣarayā girā svairam gṛhīta nara loka sadharmam bhagavantam purāṇapuruṣam

original: māyā-vilasita-matir vatsa tāteti sānurāgam upalālayan parāṃ nirvṛtim upagataḥ
analyzed: māyā vilasita matiḥ vatsa tāta iti sa anurāgam upalālayan parām nirvṛtim upagataḥ

original: BhP_05.04.005 /1 viditānurāgam āpaura-prakṛti jana-pado rājā nābhir ātmajaṃ samaya-setu-rakṣāyām
analyzed: vidita anurāgam ā paura prakṛti janapadaḥ rājā nābhiḥ ātmajam samaya setu rakṣāyām

original: abhiṣicya brāhmaṇeṣūpanidhāya saha merudevyā viśālāyāṃ prasanna-nipuṇena tapasā samādhi-yogena
analyzed: abhiṣicya brāhmaṇeṣu upanidhāya saha merudevyāḥ viśālāyām prasanna nipuṇena tapasā samādhi yogena

original: nara-nārāyaṇākhyaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam upāsīnaḥ kālena tan-mahimānam avāpa
analyzed: nara nārāyaṇa ākhyam bhagavantam vāsudevam upāsīnaḥ kālena tad mahimānam avāpa

original: BhP_05.04.006/0 yasya ha pāṇḍaveya ślokāv udāharanti----
analyzed: yasya ha pāṇḍaveya ślokau udāharanti

original: BhP_05.04.006/1 ko nu tat karma rājarṣer nābher anv ācaret pumān
analyzed: kaḥ nu tat karma rājarṣeḥ nābheḥ anu ācaret pumān

original: BhP_05.04.006/2 apatyatām agād yasya hariḥ śuddhena karmaṇā
analyzed: apatya tām agāt yasya hariḥ śuddhena karmaṇā

original: BhP_05.04.007/1 brahmaṇyo 'nyaḥ kuto nābher viprā maṅgala-pūjitāḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ nyaḥ kutas nābheḥ viprāḥ maṅgala pūjitāḥ

original: BhP_05.04.007/2 yasya barhiṣi yajñeśaṃ darśayām āsur ojasā
analyzed: yasya barhiṣi yajñeśam darśayām āsuḥ ojasā

original: BhP_05.04.008 /1 atha ha bhagavān ṛṣabhadevaḥ sva-varṣaṃ karma-kṣetram anumanyamānaḥ
analyzed: atha ha bhagavān ṛṣabhadevaḥ sva varṣam karma kṣetram anumanyamānaḥ

original: pradarśita-gurukula-vāso labdha-varair gurubhir anujñāto gṛhamedhināṃ dharmān anuśikṣamāṇo
analyzed: pradarśita guru kula vāsaḥ labdha varaiḥ gurubhiḥ anujñātaḥ gṛhamedhinām dharmān anuśikṣamāṇaḥ

original: jayantyām indra-dattāyām ubhaya-lakṣaṇaṃ karma samāmnāyāmnātam abhiyuñjann ātmajānām
analyzed: jayantyām indradattāyām ubhaya lakṣaṇam karma samāmnāya āmnātam abhiyuñjan ātmajānām

original: ātma-samānānāṃ śataṃ janayām āsa
analyzed: ātma samānānām śatam āsa

original: BhP_05.04.009/1 yeṣāṃ khalu mahā-yogī bharato jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha-guṇa āsīd yenedaṃ varṣaṃ bhāratam iti vyapadiśanti
analyzed: yeṣām khalu mahā yogī bharataḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha guṇaḥ āsīt yena idam varṣam bhāratam iti vyapadiśanti

original: BhP_05.04.010/1 tam anu kuśāvarta ilāvarto brahmāvarto malayaḥ ketur bhadrasena indraspṛg vidarbhaḥ kīkaṭa iti nava navati pradhānāḥ
analyzed: tam anu kuśāvartaḥ ilāvartaḥ brahmāvartaḥ malayaḥ ketuḥ bhadrasenaḥ indraspṛś vidarbhaḥ kīkaṭaḥ iti nava navati pradhānāḥ

original: BhP_05.04.011/1 kavir havir antarikṣaḥ prabuddhaḥ pippalāyanaḥ
analyzed: kaviḥ haviḥ antarikṣaḥ prabuddhaḥ pippalāyanaḥ

original: BhP_05.04.011/2 āvirhotro 'tha drumilaś camasaḥ karabhājanaḥ
analyzed: āvirhotraḥ tha drumilaḥ camasaḥ karabhājanaḥ

original: BhP_05.04.012/1 iti bhāgavata-dharma-darśanā nava mahā-bhāgavatās teṣāṃ sucaritaṃ bhagavan-mahimopabṛṃhitaṃ vasudeva-nārada-saṃvādam upaśamāyanam  #
analyzed: iti bhāgavata dharma darśanāḥ nava mahā bhāgavatāḥ teṣām su caritam bhagavat mahima upabṛṃhitam vasudeva nārada saṃvādam upaśama ayanam

original: upariṣṭād varṇayiṣyāmaḥ
analyzed: upariṣṭāt varṇayiṣyāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.04.013/1 yavīyāṃsa ekāśītir jāyanteyāḥ pitur ādeśakarā mahā-śālīnā mahā-śrotriyā yajña-śīlāḥ karma-viśuddhā brāhmaṇā babhūvuḥ
analyzed: yavīyāṃsaḥ ekāśītiḥ jāyanteyāḥ pituḥ ādeśa karāḥ mahā śālīnāḥ mahā śrotriyāḥ yajña śīlāḥ karma viśuddhāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: BhP_05.04.014 /1 bhagavān ṛṣabha-saṃjña ātma-tantraḥ svayaṃ nitya-nivṛttānartha-paramparaḥ
kevalānandānubhava īśvara eva viparītavat karmāṇy ārabhamāṇaḥ kālenānugataṃ dharmam
analyzed: kevala ānanda anubhavaḥ īśvaraḥ eva viparīta vat karmāṇi ārabhamāṇaḥ kālena anugatam dharmam

original: ācaraṇenopaśikṣayann atad-vidāṃ sama upaśānto maitraḥ kāruṇiko dharmārtha-yaśaḥ-prajānandāmṛtāvarodhena
analyzed: ācaraṇena upaśikṣayan a tad vidām samaḥ upaśāntaḥ maitraḥ kāruṇikaḥ dharma artha yaśaḥ prajā ānanda amṛta avarodhena

original: gṛheṣu lokaṃ niyamayat
analyzed: gṛheṣu lokam niyamayat

original: BhP_05.04.015/1 yad yac chīrṣaṇyācaritaṃ tat tad anuvartate lokaḥ
analyzed: yat yat śīrṣaṇya ācaritam tat tat anuvartate lokaḥ

original: BhP_05.04.016/1 yadyapi sva-viditaṃ sakala-dharmaṃ brāhmaṃ guhyaṃ brāhmaṇair darśita-mārgeṇa sāmādibhir upāyair janatām anuśaśāsa
analyzed: yadi api sva viditam sakala dharmam brāhmam guhyam brāhmaṇaiḥ darśita mārgeṇa sāma ādibhiḥ upāyaiḥ janatām anuśaśāsa

original: BhP_05.04.017/1 dravya-deśa-kāla-vayaḥ-śraddhartvig-vividhoddeśopacitaiḥ sarvair api kratubhir yathopadeśaṃ śata-kṛtva iyāja
analyzed: dravya deśa kāla vayaḥ śraddhā ṛtvij vividha uddeśa upacitaiḥ sarvaiḥ api kratubhiḥ yathopadeśam śata kṛtvas iyāja

original: BhP_05.04.018 /1 bhagavatarṣabheṇa parirakṣyamāṇa etasmin varṣe na kaścana puruṣo
analyzed: bhagavatā ṛṣabheṇa parirakṣyamāṇe etasmin varṣe na kaścana

original: vāñchaty avidyamānam ivātmano 'nyasmāt kathañcana kimapi karhicid avekṣate bhartary
analyzed: vāñchati a vidyamānam iva ātmanaḥ nyasmāt kathañcana kim api karhicit avekṣate bhartari

original: anusavanaṃ vijṛmbhita-snehātiśayam antareṇa
analyzed: anusavanam vijṛmbhita sneha atiśayam antareṇa

original: BhP_05.04.019 /1 sa kadācid aṭamāno bhagavān ṛṣabho brahmāvarta-gato brahmarṣi-pravara-sabhāyāṃ
analyzed: sa kadācid aṭamānaḥ bhagavān ṛṣabhaḥ brahmāvarta gataḥ brahmarṣi pravara sabhāyām

original: prajānāṃ niśāmayantīnām ātmajān avahitātmanaḥ praśraya-praṇaya-bhara-suyantritān
analyzed: prajānām niśāmayantīnām ātmajān avahita ātmanaḥ praśraya praṇaya bhara su yantritān

original: apy upaśikṣayann iti hovāca
analyzed: api upaśikṣayan iti ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.05.001/0 ṛṣabha uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣabhaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.05.001/1 nāyaṃ deho deha-bhājāṃ nṛloke kaṣṭān kāmān arhate viḍ-bhujāṃ ye
analyzed: na ayam dehaḥ dehabhājām nṛ loke kaṣṭān kāmān arhate viḍbhujām ye

original: BhP_05.05.001/2 tapo divyaṃ putrakā yena sattvaṃ śuddhyed yasmād brahma-saukhyaṃ tv anantam
analyzed: tapaḥ divyam putrakāḥ yena sattvam śuddhyā id yasmāt brahma saukhyam tu anantam

original: BhP_05.05.002/1 mahat-sevāṃ dvāram āhur vimuktes tamo-dvāraṃ yoṣitāṃ saṅgi-saṅgam
analyzed: mahat sevām dvāram āhuḥ vimukteḥ tamaḥ dvāram yoṣitām saṅgi saṅgam

original: BhP_05.05.002/2 mahāntas te sama-cittāḥ praśāntā vimanyavaḥ suhṛdaḥ sādhavo ye
analyzed: mahāntaḥ te sama cittāḥ praśāntāḥ vimanyavaḥ suhṛdaḥ sādhavaḥ ye

original: BhP_05.05.003/1 ye vā mayīśe kṛta-sauhṛdārthā janeṣu dehambhara-vārtikeṣu
analyzed: ye vā mayi īśe kṛta sauhṛda arthāḥ janeṣu dehambhara vārtikeṣu

original: BhP_05.05.003/2 gṛheṣu jāyātmaja-rātimatsu na prīti-yuktā yāvad-arthāś ca loke
analyzed: gṛheṣu jāyā ātmaja rātimatsu na prīti yuktāḥ yāvadarthāḥ ca loke

original: BhP_05.05.004/1 nūnaṃ pramattaḥ kurute vikarma yad indriya-prītaya āpṛṇoti
analyzed: nūnam pramattaḥ kurute vikarma yat indriya prītaye āpṛṇoti

original: BhP_05.05.004/2 na sādhu manye yata ātmano 'yam asann api kleśada āsa dehaḥ
analyzed: na sādhu manye yatas ātmanaḥ yam asān api kleśa daḥ āsa dehaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.005/1 parābhavas tāvad abodha-jāto yāvan na jijñāsata ātma-tattvam
analyzed: parābhavaḥ tāvat a bodha jātaḥ yāvat na jijñāsate ātma tattvam

original: BhP_05.05.005/2 yāvat kriyās tāvad idaṃ mano vai karmātmakaṃ yena śarīra-bandhaḥ
analyzed: yāvat kriyāḥ tāvat idam manaḥ vai karma ātmakam yena śarīra bandhaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.006/1 evaṃ manaḥ karma-vaśaṃ prayuṅkte avidyayātmany upadhīyamāne
analyzed: evam manaḥ karma vaśam prayuṅkte avidyayā ātmani upadhīyamāne

original: BhP_05.05.006/2 prītir na yāvan mayi vāsudeve na mucyate deha-yogena tāvat
analyzed: prītiḥ na yāvat mayi vāsudeve na mucyate deha yogena tāvat

original: BhP_05.05.007/1 yadā na paśyaty ayathā guṇehāṃ svārthe pramattaḥ sahasā vipaścit
analyzed: yadā na paśyati ayathā guṇa īhām sva arthe pramattaḥ sahasā vipaścit

original: BhP_05.05.007/2 gata-smṛtir vindati tatra tāpān āsādya maithunyam agāram ajñaḥ
analyzed: gata smṛtiḥ vindati tatra tāpān āsādya maithunyam agāram ajñaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.008/1 puṃsaḥ striyā mithunī-bhāvam etaṃ tayor mitho hṛdaya-granthim āhuḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ striyāḥ mithunībhāvam etam tayoḥ mithas hṛdaya granthim āhuḥ

original: BhP_05.05.008/2 ato gṛha-kṣetra-sutāpta-vittair janasya moho 'yam ahaṃ mameti
analyzed: atas gṛha kṣetra suta āpta vittaiḥ janasya mohaḥ yam aham mama iti

original: BhP_05.05.009/1 yadā mano-hṛdaya-granthir asya karmānubaddho dṛḍha āślatheta
analyzed: yadā manaḥ hṛdaya granthiḥ asya karma anubaddhaḥ dṛḍhaḥ āślatheta

original: BhP_05.05.009/2 tadā janaḥ samparivartate 'smād muktaḥ paraṃ yāty atihāya hetum
analyzed: tadā janaḥ samparivartate smāt muktaḥ param yāti atihāya hetum

original: BhP_05.05.010/1 haṃse gurau mayi bhaktyānuvṛtyā vitṛṣṇayā dvandva-titikṣayā ca
analyzed: haṃse gurau mayi bhaktyā anuvṛtyā vitṛṣṇayā dvandva titikṣayā ca

original: BhP_05.05.010/2 sarvatra jantor vyasanāvagatyā jijñāsayā tapasehā-nivṛttyā
analyzed: sarvatra jantoḥ vyasana avagatyā jijñāsayā tapasā iha anivṛttyā

original: BhP_05.05.011/1 mat-karmabhir mat-kathayā ca nityaṃ mad-deva-saṅgād guṇa-kīrtanān me
analyzed: mad karmabhiḥ mad kathayā ca nityam mad deva saṅgāt guṇa kīrtanāt me

original: BhP_05.05.011/2 nirvaira-sāmyopaśamena putrā jihāsayā deha-gehātma-buddheḥ
analyzed: nirvaira sāmya upaśamena putrāḥ jihāsayā deha geha ātma buddheḥ

original: BhP_05.05.012/1 adhyātma-yogena vivikta-sevayā prāṇendriyātmābhijayena sadhryak
analyzed: adhyātma yogena vivikta sevayā prāṇa indriya ātma abhijayena

original: BhP_05.05.012/2 sac-chraddhayā brahmacaryeṇa śaśvad asampramādena yamena vācām
analyzed: sat śraddhayā brahmacaryeṇa śaśvat a sampramādena yamena vācām

original: BhP_05.05.013/1 sarvatra mad-bhāva-vicakṣaṇena jñānena vijñāna-virājitena
analyzed: sarvatra mad bhāva vicakṣaṇena jñānena vijñāna virājitena

original: BhP_05.05.013/2 yogena dhṛty-udyama-sattva-yukto liṅgaṃ vyapohet kuśalo 'ham-ākhyam
analyzed: yogena dhṛti udyama sattva yuktaḥ liṅgam vyapohet kuśalaḥ hama ākhyam

original: BhP_05.05.014/1 karmāśayaṃ hṛdaya-granthi-bandham avidyayāsāditam apramattaḥ
analyzed: karma āśayam hṛdaya granthi bandham avidyayā āsāditam apramattaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.014/2 anena yogena yathopadeśaṃ samyag vyapohyoparameta yogāt
analyzed: anena yogena yathopadeśam samyak vyapohya uparameta yogāt

original: BhP_05.05.015/1 putrāṃś ca śiṣyāṃś ca nṛpo gurur vā mal-loka-kāmo mad-anugrahārthaḥ
analyzed: putrān ca śiṣyān ca nṛpaḥ guruḥ vā mad loka kāmaḥ mad anugraha arthaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.015/2 itthaṃ vimanyur anuśiṣyād ataj-jñān na yojayet karmasu karma-mūḍhān
analyzed: ittham vimanyuḥ anuśiṣyāt atajjñān na yojayet karmasu karma mūḍhān

original: BhP_05.05.015/3 kaṃ yojayan manujo 'rthaṃ labheta nipātayan naṣṭa-dṛśaṃ hi garte
analyzed: kam yojayan manujaḥ ṛtham labheta nipātayan naṣṭa dṛśam hi garte

original: BhP_05.05.016/1 lokaḥ svayaṃ śreyasi naṣṭa-dṛṣṭir yo 'rthān samīheta nikāma-kāmaḥ
analyzed: lokaḥ svayam śreyasi naṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ yaḥ rthān samīheta nikāma kāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.016/2 anyonya-vairaḥ sukha-leśa-hetor ananta-duḥkhaṃ ca na veda mūḍhaḥ
analyzed: anyonya vairaḥ sukha leśa hetoḥ ananta duḥkham ca na veda mūḍhaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.017/1 kas taṃ svayaṃ tad-abhijño vipaścid avidyāyām antare vartamānam
analyzed: kaḥ tam svayam tad abhijñaḥ vipaścit avidyāyām antare vartamānam

original: BhP_05.05.017/2 dṛṣṭvā punas taṃ saghṛṇaḥ kubuddhiṃ prayojayed utpathagaṃ yathāndham
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā punar tam sa ghṛṇaḥ ku buddhim prayojayet utpatha gam yathā andham

original: BhP_05.05.018/1 gurur na sa syāt sva-jano na sa syāt pitā na sa syāj jananī na sā syāt
analyzed: guruḥ na sa syāt sva janaḥ na sa syāt pitā na sa syāt jananī na sā syāt

original: BhP_05.05.018/2 daivaṃ na tat syān na patiś ca sa syān na mocayed yaḥ samupeta-mṛtyum
analyzed: daivam na tat syāt na patiḥ ca sa syāt na mocayet yaḥ samupeta mṛtyum

original: BhP_05.05.019/1 idaṃ śarīraṃ mama durvibhāvyaṃ sattvaṃ hi me hṛdayaṃ yatra dharmaḥ
analyzed: idam śarīram mama durvibhāvyam sattvam hi me hṛdayam yatra dharmaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.019/2 pṛṣṭhe kṛto me yad adharma ārād ato hi mām ṛṣabhaṃ prāhur āryāḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe kṛtaḥ me yat adharmaḥ ārāt atas hi mām ṛṣabham prāhuḥ āryāḥ

original: BhP_05.05.020/1 tasmād bhavanto hṛdayena jātāḥ sarve mahīyāṃsam amuṃ sanābham
analyzed: tasmāt bhavantaḥ hṛdayena jātāḥ sarve mahīyāṃsam amum sanābham

original: BhP_05.05.020/2 akliṣṭa-buddhyā bharataṃ bhajadhvaṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ tad bharaṇaṃ prajānām
analyzed: a kliṣṭa buddhyāḥ bharatam bhajadhvam śuśrūṣaṇam tat bharaṇam prajānām

original: BhP_05.05.021/1 bhūteṣu vīrudbhya uduttamā ye sarīsṛpās teṣu sabodha-niṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: bhūteṣu vīrudbhyaḥ ud uttamāḥ ye sarīsṛpāḥ teṣu sabodha niṣṭhāḥ

original: BhP_05.05.021/2 tato manuṣyāḥ pramathās tato 'pi gandharva-siddhā vibudhānugā ye
analyzed: tatas manuṣyāḥ pramathāḥ gandharva siddhāḥ vibudha anugāḥ ye

original: BhP_05.05.022/1 devāsurebhyo maghavat-pradhānā dakṣādayo brahma-sutās tu teṣām
analyzed: deva asurebhyaḥ maghavat pradhānāḥ dakṣa ādayaḥ brahma sutāḥ tu teṣām

original: BhP_05.05.022/2 bhavaḥ paraḥ so 'tha viriñca-vīryaḥ sa mat-paro 'haṃ dvija-deva-devaḥ
analyzed: bhavaḥ paraḥ viriñcavīryaḥ sa mad paraḥ ham dvijadevadevaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.023/1 na brāhmaṇais tulaye bhūtam anyat paśyāmi viprāḥ kim ataḥ paraṃ tu
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaiḥ tulaye bhūtam anyat paśyāmi viprāḥ kim atas param tu

original: BhP_05.05.023/2 yasmin nṛbhiḥ prahutaṃ śraddhayāham aśnāmi kāmaṃ na tathāgni-hotre
analyzed: yasmin nṛbhiḥ prahutam śraddhayā aham aśnāmi kāmam na tathā agnihotre

original: BhP_05.05.024/1 dhṛtā tanūr uśatī me purāṇī yeneha sattvaṃ paramaṃ pavitram
analyzed: dhṛtā tanūḥ uśatī me purāṇī yena iha sattvam paramam pavitram

original: BhP_05.05.024/2 śamo damaḥ satyam anugrahaś ca tapas titikṣānubhavaś ca yatra
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ satyam anugrahaḥ ca tapaḥ titikṣā anubhavaḥ ca yatra

original: BhP_05.05.025/1 matto 'py anantāt parataḥ parasmāt svargāpavargādhipater na kiñcit
analyzed: mattaḥ pi anantāt paratas parasmāt svarga apavarga adhipateḥ na kiñcid

original: BhP_05.05.025/2 yeṣāṃ kim u syād itareṇa teṣām akiñcanānāṃ mayi bhakti-bhājām
analyzed: yeṣām kim u syāt itareṇa teṣām akiñcanānām mayi bhakti bhājām

original: BhP_05.05.026/1 sarvāṇi mad-dhiṣṇyatayā bhavadbhiś carāṇi bhūtāni sutā dhruvāṇi
analyzed: sarvāṇi mad dhiṣṇya tayā bhavadbhiḥ carāṇi bhūtāni sutāḥ dhruvāṇi

original: BhP_05.05.026/2 sambhāvitavyāni pade pade vo vivikta-dṛgbhis tad u hārhaṇaṃ me
analyzed: sambhāvitavyāni pade pade vaḥ vivikta dṛgbhiḥ tat u ha arhaṇam me

original: BhP_05.05.027/1 mano-vaco-dṛk-karaṇehitasya sākṣāt-kṛtaṃ me paribarhaṇaṃ hi
analyzed: manaḥ vacaḥ dṛkkaraṇa īhitasya sākṣāt kṛtam me paribarhaṇam hi

original: BhP_05.05.027/2 vinā pumān yena mahā-vimohāt kṛtānta-pāśān na vimoktum īśet
analyzed: vinā pumān yena mahā vimohāt kṛtānta pāśān na vimoktum īśet

original: BhP_05.05.028/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.05.028 /1 evam anuśāsyātmajān svayam anuśiṣṭān api lokānuśāsanārthaṃ mahānubhāvaḥ
analyzed: evam anuśāsya ātmajān svayam anuśiṣṭān api loka anuśāsana artham mahā anubhāvaḥ

original: parama-suhṛd bhagavān ṛṣabhāpadeśa upaśama-śīlānām uparata-karmaṇāṃ mahā-munīnāṃ
analyzed: parama suhṛd bhagavān ṛṣabha apadeśaḥ upaśama śīlānām uparata karmaṇām mahā munīnām

original: bhakti-jñāna-vairāgya-lakṣaṇaṃ pāramahaṃsya-dharmam upaśikṣamāṇaḥ sva-tanaya-śata-jyeṣṭhaṃ
analyzed: bhakti jñāna vairāgya lakṣaṇam pāramahaṃsya dharmam upaśikṣamāṇaḥ sva tanaya śata jyeṣṭham

original: parama-bhāgavataṃ bhagavaj-jana-parāyaṇaṃ bharataṃ dharaṇi-pālanāyābhiṣicya svayaṃ
analyzed: parama bhāgavatam bhagavat jana parāyaṇam bharatam dharaṇi pālanāya abhiṣicya svayam

original: bhavana evorvarita-śarīra-mātra-parigraha unmatta iva gagana-paridhānaḥ prakīrṇa-keśa
analyzed: bhavane eva urvarita śarīra mātra parigrahaḥ unmattaḥ iva gagana paridhānaḥ prakīrṇa keśa

original: ātmany āropitāhavanīyo brahmāvartāt pravavrāja
analyzed: ātmani āropita āhavanīyaḥ brahmāvartāt pravavrāja

original: BhP_05.05.029/1 jaḍāndha-mūka-badhira-piśāconmādakavad-avadhūta-veṣo 'bhibhāṣyamāṇo 'pi janānāṃ gṛhīta-mauna-vratas tūṣṇīṃ babhūva
analyzed: jaḍa andha mūka badhira piśāca unmādaka vat avadhūta veṣaḥ abhibhāṣyamāṇaḥ pi janānām gṛhīta mauna vrataḥ tūṣṇīm babhūva

original: BhP_05.05.030 /1 tatra tatra pura-grāmākara-kheṭa-vāṭa-kharvaṭa-śibira-vraja-ghoṣa-sārtha-giri-vanāśramādiṣv
analyzed: tatra tatra pura grāma ākara kheṭa vāṭa kharvaṭa śibira vraja ghoṣa sārtha giri vana āśrama ādiṣu

original: anupatham avanicarāpasadaiḥ paribhūyamāno makṣikābhir iva vana-gajas tarjana-tāḍanāvamehana-ṣṭhīvana-grāva-śakṛd-rajaḥ-prakṣepa-pūti-vāta-duruktais
analyzed: anupatham avanicara apasadaiḥ paribhūyamānaḥ makṣikābhiḥ iva vana gajaḥ tarjana tāḍana avamehana ṣṭhīvana grāva śakṛt rajaḥ prakṣepa pūti vāta duruktaiḥ

original: tad avigaṇayann evāsat-saṃsthāna etasmin dehopalakṣaṇe sad-apadeśa ubhayānubhava-svarūpeṇa
analyzed: tat a vigaṇayan eva asat saṃsthāne etasmin deha upalakṣaṇe sat apadeśaḥ ubhaya anubhava sva rūpeṇa

original: sva-mahimāvasthānenāsamāropitāhaṃ-mamābhimānatvād avikhaṇḍita-manāḥ pṛthivīm eka-caraḥ paribabhrāma
analyzed: sva mahima avasthānena a samāropita aham mama abhimāna tvāt a vikhaṇḍita manāḥ pṛthivīm ekacaraḥ paribabhrāma

original: BhP_05.05.031 /1 ati-sukumāra-kara-caraṇoraḥ-sthala-vipula-bāhv-aṃsa-gala-vadanādy-avayava-vinyāsaḥ
prakṛti-sundara-svabhāva-hāsa-sumukho nava-nalina-dalāyamāna-śiśira-tārāruṇāyata-nayana-ruciraḥ
analyzed: prakṛti sundara svabhāva hāsa su mukhaḥ nava nalina dalāyamāna śiśira tārā aruṇa āyata nayana ruciraḥ

original: sadṛśa-subhaga-kapola-karṇa-kaṇṭha-nāso vigūḍha-smita-vadana-mahotsavena pura-vanitānāṃ
analyzed: sadṛśa subhaga kapola karṇa kaṇṭha nāsaḥ vigūḍha smita vadana mahā utsavena pura vanitānām

original: manasi kusuma-śarāsanam upadadhānaḥ parāg-avalambamāna-kuṭila-jaṭila-kapiśa-keśa-bhūri-bhāro
analyzed: manasi kusuma śarāsanam upadadhānaḥ parāc avalambamāna kuṭila jaṭila kapiśa keśa bhūri bhāraḥ

original: 'vadhūta-malina-nija-śarīreṇa graha-gṛhīta ivādṛśyata
analyzed: vadhūta malina nija śarīreṇa graha gṛhītaḥ iva adṛśyata

original: BhP_05.05.032 /1 yarhi vāva sa bhagavān lokam imaṃ yogasyāddhā pratīpam ivācakṣāṇas
analyzed: yarhi vāva sa bhagavān lokam imam yogasya addhā pratīpam iva ācakṣāṇaḥ

original: tat-pratikriyā-karma bībhatsitam iti vratam ājagaram-āsthitaḥ śayāna evāśnāti pibati
analyzed: tad pratikriyā karma bībhatsitam iti vratam ājagaram āsthitaḥ śayānaḥ eva aśnāti pibati

original: khādaty avamehati hadati sma ceṣṭamāna uccarita ādigdhoddeśaḥ
analyzed: khādati avamehati hadati sma ceṣṭamānaḥ uccaritaḥ ādigdha uddeśaḥ

original: BhP_05.05.033/1 tasya ha yaḥ purīṣa-surabhi-saugandhya-vāyus taṃ deśaṃ daśa-yojanaṃ samantāt surabhiṃ cakāra
analyzed: tasya ha yaḥ purīṣa surabhi saugandhya vāyuḥ tam deśam daśa yojanam samantāt surabhim cakāra

original: BhP_05.05.034/1 evaṃ go-mṛga-kāka-caryayā vrajaṃs tiṣṭhann āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ kāka-mṛga-go-caritaḥ pibati khādaty avamehati sma
analyzed: evam go mṛga kāka caryayā vrajan tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ kāka mṛga gocaritaḥ pibati khādati avamehati sma

original: BhP_05.05.035 /1 iti nānā-yoga-caryācaraṇo bhagavān kaivalya-patir ṛṣabho 'virata-parama-mahānandānubhava
ātmani sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūte bhagavati vāsudeva ātmano 'vyavadhānānanta-rodara-bhāvena
analyzed: ātmani sarveṣām bhūtānām ātma bhūte bhagavati vāsudeve ātmanaḥ vyavadhāna anantara udara bhāvena

original: siddha-samastārtha-paripūrṇo yogaiśvaryāṇi vaihāyasa-mano-javāntardhāna-parakāya-praveśa-dūra-grahaṇādīni
analyzed: siddha samasta artha paripūrṇaḥ yoga aiśvaryāṇi vaihāyasa manojava antardhāna parakāya praveśa dūra grahaṇa ādīni

original: yadṛcchayopagatāni nāñjasā nṛpa hṛdayenābhyanandat
analyzed: yadṛcchayā upagatāni na añjasā nṛpa hṛdayena abhyanandat

original: BhP_05.06.001/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.06.001/1 na nūnaṃ bhagava ātmārāmāṇāṃ yoga-samīrita-jñānāvabharjita-karma-bījānām aiśvaryāṇi punaḥ kleśadāni bhavitum arhanti yadṛc-chayopagatāni
analyzed: na nūnam bhagavaḥ ātma ārāmāṇām yoga samīrita jñāna avabharjita karma bījānām aiśvaryāṇi punar kleśa dāni bhavitum arhanti yadṛcchayā upagatāni

original: BhP_05.06.002/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.06.002/1 satyam uktaṃ kintv iha vā eke na manaso 'ddhā viśrambham anavasthānasya śaṭha-kirāta iva saṅgacchante
analyzed: satyam uktam kintu iha vā eke na manasaḥ ddhā viśrambham anavasthānasya śaṭha kirātaḥ iva saṅgacchante

original: BhP_05.06.003/0 tathā coktam
analyzed: tathā ca uktam

original: BhP_05.06.003/1 na kuryāt karhicit sakhyaṃ manasi hy anavasthite
analyzed: na kuryāt karhicit sakhyam manasi hi anavasthite

original: BhP_05.06.003/2 yad-viśrambhāc cirāc cīrṇaṃ caskanda tapa aiśvaram
analyzed: yad viśrambhāt cirāt cīrṇam caskanda tapaḥ aiśvaram

original: BhP_05.06.004/1 nityaṃ dadāti kāmasya cchidraṃ tam anu ye 'rayaḥ
analyzed: nityam dadāti kāmasya chidram tam anu ye rayaḥ

original: BhP_05.06.004/2 yoginaḥ kṛta-maitrasya patyur jāyeva puṃścalī
analyzed: yoginaḥ kṛta maitrasya patyuḥ jāyā iva puṃścalī

original: BhP_05.06.005/1 kāmo manyur mado lobhaḥ śoka-moha-bhayādayaḥ
analyzed: kāmaḥ manyuḥ madaḥ lobhaḥ śoka moha bhaya ādayaḥ

original: BhP_05.06.005/2 karma-bandhaś ca yan-mūlaḥ svīkuryāt ko nu tad budhaḥ
analyzed: karma bandhaḥ ca yad mūlaḥ svīkuryāt kaḥ nu tat budhaḥ

original: BhP_05.06.006 /1 athaivam akhila-loka-pāla-lalāmo 'pi vilakṣaṇair jaḍavad avadhūta-veṣa-bhāṣā-caritair
analyzed: athā evam vilakṣaṇaiḥ jaḍa vat avadhūta veṣa bhāṣā caritaiḥ

original: avilakṣita-bhagavat-prabhāvo yogināṃ sāmparāya-vidhim anuśikṣayan sva-kalevaraṃ jihāsur
analyzed: a vilakṣita bhagavat prabhāvaḥ yoginām sāmparāya vidhim anuśikṣayan sva kalevaram jihāsuḥ

original: ātmany ātmānam asaṃvyavahitam anarthāntara-bhāvenānvīkṣamāṇa uparatānuvṛttir upararāma
analyzed: ātmani ātmānam asaṃvyavahitam anartha antara bhāvena anvīkṣamāṇaḥ uparata anuvṛttiḥ upararāma

original: BhP_05.06.007 /1 tasya ha vā evaṃ mukta-liṅgasya bhagavata ṛṣabhasya yogamāyā-vāsanayā
analyzed: tasya ha vai evam mukta liṅgasya bhagavataḥ ṛṣabhasya yoga māyā vāsanayā

original: deha imāṃ jagatīm abhimānābhāsena saṅkramamāṇaḥ koṅka-veṅka-kuṭakān dakṣiṇa-karṇāṭakān
analyzed: dehaḥ imām jagatīm abhimāna ābhāsena saṅkramamāṇaḥ koṅka veṅka kuṭakān dakṣiṇa karṇāṭakān

original: deśān yadṛcchayopagataḥ kuṭakācalopavana āsya kṛtāśma-kavala unmāda iva mukta-mūrdhajo
analyzed: deśān yadṛcchayā upagataḥ kuṭaka acala upavane āsya kṛta aśma kavalaḥ unmādaḥ iva mukta mūrdhajaḥ

original: 'saṃvīta eva vicacāra
analyzed: saṃvītaḥ eva vicacāra

original: BhP_05.06.008/1 atha samīra-vega-vidhūta-veṇu-vikarṣaṇa-jātogra-dāvānalas tad vanam ālelihānaḥ saha tena dadāha
analyzed: atha samīra vega vidhūta veṇu vikarṣaṇa jāta ugra dāva analaḥ tat vanam ālelihānaḥ saha tena dadāha

original: BhP_05.06.009 /1 yasya kilānucaritam upākarṇya koṅka-veṅka-kuṭakānāṃ rājārhan-nāmopaśikṣya
analyzed: yasya kila anucaritam upākarṇya koṅka veṅka kuṭakānām rājā arhat nāma upaśikṣya

original: kalāv adharma utkṛṣyamāṇe bhavitavyena vimohitaḥ sva-dharma-patham akuto-bhayam apahāya
analyzed: kalau adharme utkṛṣyamāṇe bhavitavyena vimohitaḥ svadharma patham akutobhayam apahāya

original: kupatha-pākhaṇḍam asamañjasaṃ nija-manīṣayā mandaḥ sampravartayiṣyate
analyzed: kupatha pākhaṇḍam asamañjasam nija manīṣayā mandaḥ sampravartayiṣyate

original: BhP_05.06.010 /1 yena ha vāva kalau manujāpasadā deva-māyā-mohitāḥ sva-vidhi-niyoga-śauca-cāritra-vihīnā
analyzed: yena ha vāva kalau manuja apasadāḥ deva māyā mohitāḥ sva vidhi niyoga śauca cāritra vihīnā

original: deva-helanāny apavratāni nija-nijecchayā gṛhṇānā asnānānācamanāśauca-keśolluñcanādīni
analyzed: deva helanāni apavratāni nija nija icchayā gṛhṇānāḥ a snāna an ācamana āśauca keśa ulluñcana ādīni

original: kalinādharma-bahulenopahata-dhiyo brahma-brāhmaṇa-yajña-puruṣa-loka-vidūṣakāḥ prāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: kalinā adharma bahulena upahata dhiyaḥ brahma brāhmaṇa yajña puruṣa loka vidūṣakāḥ prāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti

original: BhP_05.06.011/1 te ca hy arvāktanayā nija-loka-yātrayāndha-paramparayāśvastās tamasy andhe svayam eva prapatiṣyanti
analyzed: te ca hi arvāk tanayāḥ nija lokayātrayā andha paramparayā āśvastāḥ tamasi andhe svayam eva prapatiṣyanti

original: BhP_05.06.012/1 ayam avatāro rajasopapluta-kaivalyopaśikṣaṇārthaḥ
analyzed: ayam avatāraḥ rajasā upapluta kaivalya upaśikṣaṇa arthaḥ

original: BhP_05.06.013/0 tasyānuguṇān ślokān gāyanti----
analyzed: tasya anuguṇān ślokān gāyanti

original: BhP_05.06.013/1 aho bhuvaḥ sapta-samudravatyā dvīpeṣu varṣeṣv adhipuṇyam etat
analyzed: aho bhuvaḥ sapta samudravatyāḥ dvīpeṣu varṣeṣu adhipuṇyam etat

original: BhP_05.06.013/2 gāyanti yatratya-janā murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇy avatāravanti
analyzed: gāyanti yatratya janāḥ murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇi avatāravanti

original: BhP_05.06.014/1 aho nu vaṃśo yaśasāvadātaḥ praiyavrato yatra pumān purāṇaḥ
analyzed: aho nu vaṃśaḥ yaśasā avadātaḥ praiyavrataḥ yatra pumān purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_05.06.014/2 kṛtāvatāraḥ puruṣaḥ sa ādyaś cacāra dharmaṃ yad akarma-hetum
analyzed: kṛta avatāraḥ puruṣaḥ saḥ ādyaḥ cacāra dharmam yat akarma hetum

original: BhP_05.06.015/1 ko nv asya kāṣṭhām aparo 'nugacchen mano-rathenāpy abhavasya yogī
analyzed: kaḥ nu asya kāṣṭhām aparaḥ nugacchet manorathena api abhavasya yogī

original: BhP_05.06.015/2 yo yoga-māyāḥ spṛhayaty udastā hy asattayā yena kṛta-prayatnāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yoga māyāḥ spṛhayati udastāḥ hi asat tayā yena kṛta prayatnāḥ

original: BhP_05.06.016 /1 iti ha sma sakala-veda-loka-deva-brāhmaṇa-gavāṃ parama-guror bhagavata
analyzed: iti ha sma sakala veda loka deva brāhmaṇa gavām parama guroḥ bhagavata

original: ṛṣabhākhyasya viśuddhācaritam īritaṃ puṃsāṃ samasta-duścaritābhiharaṇaṃ parama-mahā-maṅgalāyanam
analyzed: ṛṣabha ākhyasya viśuddha ācaritam īritam puṃsām samasta duścarita abhiharaṇam parama mahā maṅgalāyanam

original: idam anuśraddhayopacitayānuśṛṇoty āśrāvayati vāvahito bhagavati tasmin vāsudeva ekāntato
analyzed: idam anuśraddhayā upacitayā anuśṛṇoti āśrāvayati vā avahitaḥ bhagavati tasmin vāsudeve

original: bhaktir anayor api samanuvartate
analyzed: bhaktiḥ anayoḥ api samanuvartate

original: BhP_05.06.017 /1 yasyām eva kavaya ātmānam avirataṃ vividha-vṛjina-saṃsāra-paritāpopatapyamānam
analyzed: yasyām eva kavayaḥ ātmānam aviratam vividha vṛjina saṃsāra paritāpa upatapyamānam

original: anusavanaṃ snāpayantas tayaiva parayā nirvṛtyā hy apavargam ātyantikaṃ parama-puruṣārtham
analyzed: anusavanam snāpayantaḥ tayā eva parayā nirvṛtyā hi apavargam ātyantikam parama puruṣa artham

original: api svayam āsāditaṃ no evādriyante bhagavadīyatvenaiva parisamāpta-sarvārthāḥ
analyzed: api svayam āsāditam no eva ādriyante bhagavadīya tvena eva parisamāpta sarva arthāḥ

original: BhP_05.06.018/1 rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
analyzed: rājan patiḥ guruḥ alam bhavatām yadūnām

original: BhP_05.06.018/2 daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ
analyzed: daivam priyaḥ kula patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaraḥ vaḥ

original: BhP_05.06.018/3 astv evam aṅga bhagavān bhajatāṃ mukundo
analyzed: astu evam aṅga bhagavān bhajatām mukundo

original: BhP_05.06.018/4 muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam
analyzed: muktim dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti yogam

original: BhP_05.06.019/1 nityānubhūta-nija-lābha-nivṛtta-tṛṣṇaḥ
BhP_05.06.019/2 śreyasy atad-racanayā cira-supta-buddheḥ
analyzed: śreyasi a tad racanayā cira supta buddheḥ

original: BhP_05.06.019/3 lokasya yaḥ karuṇayābhayam ātma-lokam
analyzed: lokasya yaḥ karuṇayā abhayam ātma lokam

original: BhP_05.06.019/4 ākhyān namo bhagavate ṛṣabhāya tasmai
analyzed: ākhyāt namaḥ bhagavate ṛṣabhāya tasmai

original: BhP_05.07.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.07.001/1 bharatas tu mahā-bhāgavato yadā bhagavatāvani-tala-paripālanāya sañcintitas tad-anuśāsana-paraḥ pañcajanīṃ viśvarūpa-duhitaram
analyzed: bharataḥ tu mahā bhāgavataḥ yadā bhagavatā avani tala paripālanāya sañcintitaḥ tad anuśāsana paraḥ pañcajanīm viśvarūpa duhitaram

original: BhP_05.07.002/1 tasyām u ha vā ātmajān kārtsnyenānurūpān ātmanaḥ pañca janayām āsa bhūtādir iva bhūta-sūkṣmāṇi sumatiṃ rāṣṭrabhṛtaṃ sudarśanam  #
analyzed: tasyām u ha vai ātmajān kārtsnyena anurūpān ātmanaḥ pañca janayām āsa bhūtādiḥ iva bhūta sūkṣmāṇi sumatim rāṣṭrabhṛtam sudarśanam  /

original: āvaraṇaṃ dhūmraketum iti
analyzed: āvaraṇam dhūmraketum iti

original: BhP_05.07.003/1 ajanābhaṃ nāmaitad varṣaṃ bhāratam iti yata ārabhya vyapadiśanti
analyzed: ajanābham nāma etat varṣam bhāratam iti yatas ārabhya vyapadiśanti

original: BhP_05.07.004/1 sa bahuvin mahī-patiḥ pitṛ-pitāmahavad uru-vatsalatayā sve sve karmaṇi vartamānāḥ prajāḥ sva-dharmam anuvartamānaḥ paryapālayat
analyzed: sa bahuvid mahīpatiḥ pitṛ pitāmaha vat uru vatsala tayā sve sve karmaṇi vartamānāḥ prajāḥ svadharmam anuvartamānaḥ paryapālayat

original: BhP_05.07.005 /1 īje ca bhagavantaṃ yajña-kratu-rūpaṃ kratubhir uccāvacaiḥ śraddhayāhṛtāgnihotra-darśa-pūrṇamāsa-cāturmāsya-paśu-somānāṃ
analyzed: īje ca bhagavantam yajña kratu rūpam kratubhiḥ uccāvacaiḥ śraddhayā āhṛta agnihotra darśa pūrṇamāsa cāturmāsya paśu somānām

original: prakṛti-vikṛtibhir anusavanaṃ cāturhotra-vidhinā
analyzed: prakṛti vikṛtibhiḥ anusavanam cāturhotra vidhinā

original: BhP_05.07.006 /1 sampracaratsu nānā-yāgeṣu viracitāṅga-kriyeṣv apūrvaṃ yat tat kriyā-phalaṃ
analyzed: sampracaratsu nānā yāgeṣu viracita aṅga kriyeṣu apūrvam yat tat kriyā phalam

original: dharmākhyaṃ pare brahmaṇi yajña-puruṣe sarva-devatā-liṅgānāṃ mantrāṇām artha-niyāma-katayā
analyzed: dharma ākhyam pare brahmaṇi yajñapuruṣe sarva devatā liṅgānām mantrāṇām artha niyāmaka tayā

original: sākṣāt-kartari para-devatāyāṃ bhagavati vāsudeva eva bhāvayamāna ātma-naipuṇya-mṛdita-kaṣāyo
analyzed: sākṣātkartari para devatāyām bhagavati vāsudeve eva bhāvayamānaḥ ātma naipuṇya mṛdita kaṣāyaḥ

original: haviḥṣv adhvaryubhir gṛhyamāṇeṣu sa yajamāno yajña-bhājo devāṃs tān puruṣāvayaveṣv abhyadhyāyat
analyzed: haviḥṣu adhvaryubhiḥ gṛhyamāṇeṣu sa yajamānaḥ yajña bhājaḥ devān tān puruṣa avayaveṣu abhyadhyāyat

original: BhP_05.07.007 /1 evaṃ karma-viśuddhyā viśuddha-sattvasyāntar-hṛdayākāśa-śarīre brahmaṇi
analyzed: evam karma viśuddhyā viśuddha sattvasya antar hṛdaya ākāśa śarīre brahmaṇi

original: bhagavati vāsudeve mahā-puruṣa-rūpopalakṣaṇe śrīvatsa-kaustubha-vana-mālāri-dara-gadādibhir
analyzed: bhagavati vāsudeve mahāpuruṣa rūpa upalakṣaṇe śrīvatsa kaustubha vanamāla aridara gada ādibhiḥ

original: upalakṣite nija-puruṣa-hṛl-likhitenātmani puruṣa-rūpeṇa virocamāna uccaistarāṃ bhaktir
analyzed: upalakṣite nija puruṣa hṛllikhitena ātmani puruṣa rūpeṇa virocamāne uccaistarām bhaktiḥ

original: anudinam edhamāna-rayājāyata
analyzed: anudinam edhamāna rayā ajāyata

original: BhP_05.07.008 /1 evaṃ varṣāyuta-sahasra-paryantāvasita-karma-nirvāṇāvasaro 'dhibhujyamānaṃ
analyzed: evam

original: sva-tanayebhyo rikthaṃ pitṛ-paitāmahaṃ yathā-dāyaṃ vibhajya svayaṃ sakala-sampan-niketāt
analyzed: sva tanayebhyaḥ riktham pitṛpaitāmaham yathā dāyam vibhajya svayam sakala sampad niketāt

original: sva-niketāt pulahāśramaṃ pravavrāja
analyzed: sva niketāt pulaha āśramam pravavrāja

original: BhP_05.07.009/1 yatra ha vāva bhagavān harir adyāpi tatratyānāṃ nija-janānāṃ vātsalyena sannidhāpyata icchā-rūpeṇa
analyzed: yatra ha vāva bhagavān hariḥ adya api tatratyānām nija janānām vātsalyena sannidhāpyate icchā rūpeṇa

original: BhP_05.07.010/1 yatrāśrama-padāny ubhayato nābhibhir dṛṣac-cakraiś cakra-nadī nāma sarit-pravarā sarvataḥ pavitrī-karoti
analyzed: yatra āśrama padāni ubhayatas nābhibhiḥ dṛṣad cakraiḥ cakranadī nāma sarit pravarā sarvatas pavitrīkaroti

original: BhP_05.07.011 /1 tasmin vāva kila sa ekalaḥ pulahāśramopavane vividha-kusuma-kisalaya-tulasikāmbubhiḥ
analyzed: tasmin vāva kila saḥ ekalaḥ pulaha āśrama upavane vividha kusuma kisalaya tulasikā ambuṣu

original: kanda-mūla-phalopahāraiś ca samīhamāno bhagavata ārādhanaṃ vivikta uparata-viṣayābhilāṣa
analyzed: kanda mūla phala upahāraiḥ ca samīhamānaḥ bhagavataḥ ārādhanam viviktaḥ uparata viṣaya abhilāṣa

original: upabhṛtopaśamaḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim avāpa
analyzed: upabhṛta upaśamaḥ parām nirvṛtim avāpa

original: BhP_05.07.012 /1 tayettham avirata-puruṣa-paricaryayā bhagavati pravardhamānā-nurāga-bhara-druta-hṛdaya-śaithilyaḥ
analyzed: tayā ittham avirata puruṣa paricaryayā bhagavati pravardhamāna anurāga bhara druta hṛdaya śaithilyaḥ

original: praharṣa-vegenātmany udbhidyamāna-roma-pulaka-kulaka autkaṇṭhya-pravṛtta-praṇaya-bāṣpa-niruddhāvaloka-nayana
analyzed: praharṣa vegena ātmani udbhidyamāna roma pulaka kulaka autkaṇṭhya pravṛtta praṇaya bāṣpa niruddha avaloka nayana

original: evaṃ nija-ramaṇāruṇa-caraṇāravindānudhyāna-paricita-bhakti-yogena paripluta-paramāhlāda-gambhīra-hṛdaya-hradāvagāḍha-dhiṣaṇas
analyzed: evam nija ramaṇa aruṇa caraṇa aravinda anudhyāna paricita bhakti yogena paripluta parama āhlāda gambhīra hṛdaya hrada avagāḍha dhiṣaṇaḥ

original: tām api kriyamāṇāṃ bhagavat-saparyāṃ na sasmāra
analyzed: tām api kriyamāṇām bhagavat saparyām na sasmāra

original: BhP_05.07.013 /1 itthaṃ dhṛta-bhagavad-vrata aiṇeyājina-vāsasānusavanābhiṣekārdra-kapiśa-kuṭila-jaṭā-kalāpena
analyzed: ittham dhṛta bhagavat vrataḥ aiṇeya ajina vāsa sānu savana abhiṣeka ārdra kapiśa kuṭila jaṭā kalāpena

original: ca virocamānaḥ sūryarcā bhagavantaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣam ujjihāne sūrya-maṇḍale 'bhyupatiṣṭhann etad u hovāca
analyzed: ca virocamānaḥ sūrya ṛcā bhagavantam hiraṇmayam puruṣam ujjihāne sūrya maṇḍale bhyupatiṣṭhan etat u ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.07.014/1 paro-rajaḥ savitur jāta-vedo devasya bhargo manasedaṃ jajāna
analyzed: parorajaḥ savituḥ jātavedaḥ devasya bhargaḥ manasā idam jajāna

original: BhP_05.07.014/2 suretasādaḥ punar āviśya caṣṭe haṃsaṃ gṛdhrāṇaṃ nṛṣad-riṅgirām imaḥ
analyzed: suretasādaḥ punar āviśya caṣṭe haṃsam gṛdhrāṇam nṛṣadriṅgirām imaḥ

original: BhP_05.08.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.08.001/1 ekadā tu mahā-nadyāṃ kṛtābhiṣeka-naiyamikāvaśyako brahmākṣaram abhigṛṇāno muhūrta-trayam udakānta upaviveśa
analyzed: ekadā tu mahā nadyām kṛta abhiṣeka naiyamika āvaśyakaḥ brahma akṣaram abhigṛṇānaḥ muhūrta trayam udaka ante upaviveśa

original: BhP_05.08.002/1 tatra tadā rājan hariṇī pipāsayā jalāśayābhyāśam ekaivopajagāma
analyzed: tatra tadā rājan hariṇī pipāsayā jalāśaya abhyāśam ekā evā upajagāma

original: BhP_05.08.003/1 tayā pepīyamāna udake tāvad evāvidūreṇa nadato mṛga-pater unnādo loka-bhayaṅkara udapatat
analyzed: tayā pepīyamāne udake tāvat eva avidūreṇa nadataḥ mṛgapateḥ unnādaḥ loka bhayaṅkaraḥ udapatat

original: BhP_05.08.004/1 tam upaśrutya sā mṛga-vadhūḥ prakṛti-viklavā cakita-nirīkṣaṇā sutarām api hari-bhayābhiniveśa-vyagra-hṛdayā pāriplava-dṛṣṭir  #
analyzed: tam upaśrutya sā mṛga vadhūḥ prakṛti viklavā cakita nirīkṣaṇā sutarām api hari bhaya abhiniveśa vyagra hṛdayā pāriplava dṛṣṭiḥ

original: agata-tṛṣā bhayāt sahasaivoccakrāma
analyzed: a gata tṛṣā bhayāt sahasā eva uccakrāma

original: BhP_05.08.005/1 tasyā utpatantyā antarvatnyā uru-bhayāvagalito yoni-nirgato garbhaḥ srotasi nipapāta
analyzed: tasyāḥ utpatantyāḥ antarvatnyāḥ uru bhaya avagalitaḥ yoni nirgataḥ garbhaḥ srotasi nipapāta

original: BhP_05.08.006/1 tat-prasavotsarpaṇa-bhaya-khedāturā sva-gaṇena viyujyamānā kasyāñcid daryāṃ kṛṣṇa-sārasatī nipapātātha ca mamāra
analyzed: tad prasava utsarpaṇa bhaya kheda āturā sva gaṇena viyujyamānā kasyāñcid daryām kṛṣṇasārasatī nipapāta atha ca mamāra

original: BhP_05.08.007/1 taṃ tv eṇa-kuṇakaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ srotasānūhyamānam abhivīkṣyāpaviddhaṃ bandhur ivānukampayā rājarṣir bharata ādāya mṛta-mātaram ity  #
analyzed: tam tu eṇa kuṇakam kṛpaṇam srotasā anūhyamānam abhivīkṣya apaviddham bandhuḥ iva anukampayā rāja ṛṣiḥ bharataḥ ādāya mṛta mātaram iti

original: āśrama-padam anayat
analyzed: āśrama padam anayat

original: BhP_05.08.008 /1 tasya ha vā eṇa-kuṇaka uccair etasmin kṛta-nijābhimānasyāhar-ahas
analyzed: tasya ha vā eṇa kuṇake uccais etasmin kṛta nija abhimānasya aharahar

original: tat-poṣaṇa-pālana-lālana-prīṇanānudhyānenātma-niyamāḥ saha-yamāḥ puruṣa-paricaryādaya
analyzed: tad poṣaṇa pālana lālana prīṇana anudhyānena ātma niyamāḥ saha yamāḥ puruṣa paricaryā ādayaḥ

original: ekaikaśaḥ katipayenāhar-gaṇena viyujyamānāḥ kila sarva evodavasan
analyzed: ekaikaśas katipayena ahargaṇena viyujyamānāḥ kila sarve eva udavasan

original: BhP_05.08.009 /1 aho batāyaṃ hariṇa-kuṇakaḥ kṛpaṇa īśvara-ratha-caraṇa-paribhramaṇa-rayeṇa
analyzed: aho bata ayam hariṇa kuṇakaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ īśvara ratha caraṇa paribhramaṇa rayeṇa

original: sva-gaṇa-suhṛd-bandhubhyaḥ parivarjitaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca mopasādito mām eva mātā-pitarau
analyzed: sva gaṇa suhṛd bandhubhyaḥ parivarjitaḥ śaraṇam ca mā upasāditaḥ mām eva mātā pitarau

original: bhrātṛ-jñātīn yauthikāṃś caivopeyāya nānyaṃ kañcana veda mayy ati-visrabdhaś cāta
analyzed: bhrātṛ jñātīn yauthikān ca eva upeyāya na anyam kañcana veda mayi ati visrabdhaḥ ca atas

original: eva mayā mat-parāyaṇasya poṣaṇa-pālana-prīṇana-lālanam anasūyunānuṣṭheyaṃ śaraṇyopekṣā-doṣa-viduṣā
analyzed: eva mayā mad parāyaṇasya poṣaṇa pālana prīṇana lālanam anasūyunā anuṣṭheyam śaraṇya upekṣā doṣa viduṣā

original: BhP_05.08.010/1 nūnaṃ hy āryāḥ sādhava upaśama-śīlāḥ kṛpaṇa-suhṛda evaṃ-vidhārthe svārthān api gurutarān upekṣante
analyzed: nūnam hi āryāḥ sādhavaḥ upaśama śīlāḥ kṛpaṇa suhṛdaḥ evaṃvidha arthe sva arthān api gurutarān upekṣante

original: BhP_05.08.011/1 iti kṛtānuṣaṅga āsana-śayanāṭana-snānāśanādiṣu saha mṛga-jahunā snehānubaddha-hṛdaya āsīt
analyzed: iti kṛta anuṣaṅgaḥ āsana śayana aṭana snāna aśana ādiṣu saha mṛgajahunā sneha anubaddha hṛdayaḥ āsīt

original: BhP_05.08.012/1 kuśa-kusuma-samit-palāśa-phala-mūlodakāny āhariṣyamāṇo vṛkasālā-vṛkādibhyo bhayam āśaṃsamāno yadā saha hariṇa-kuṇakena vanaṃ
analyzed: kuśa kusuma samidh palāśa phala mūla udakāni āhariṣyamāṇaḥ vṛka sālāvṛka ādibhyaḥ bhayam āśaṃsamānaḥ yadā saha hariṇa kuṇakena vanam

original: BhP_05.08.013/1 pathiṣu ca mugdha-bhāvena tatra tatra viṣakta-mati-praṇaya-bhara-hṛdayaḥ kārpaṇyāt skandhenodvahati evam utsaṅga urasi cādhāyopalālayan  #
analyzed: pathiṣu ca mugdha bhāvena tatra tatra viṣakta mati praṇaya bhara hṛdayaḥ kārpaṇyāt skandhena udvahati evam utsaṅge urasi ca ādhāya upalālayan

original: mudaṃ paramām avāpa
analyzed: mudam paramām avāpa

original: BhP_05.08.014 /1 kriyāyāṃ nirvartyamānāyām antarāle 'py utthāyotthāya yadainam abhicakṣīta
analyzed: kriyāyām nirvartyamānāyām antarāle pi utthāya utthāya yadā enam abhicakṣīta

original: tarhi vāva sa varṣa-patiḥ prakṛti-sthena manasā tasmā āśiṣa āśāste svasti stād vatsa te sarvata iti
analyzed: tarhi vāva sa varṣapatiḥ prakṛti sthena manasā tasmai āśiṣaḥ āśāste svasti stād vatsa te sarvatas iti

original: BhP_05.08.015 /1 anyadā bhṛśam udvigna-manā naṣṭa-draviṇa iva kṛpaṇaḥ sakaruṇam ati-tarṣeṇa
analyzed: anyadā bhṛśam udvigna manāḥ naṣṭa draviṇaḥ iva kṛpaṇaḥ sa karuṇam ati tarṣeṇa

original: hariṇa-kuṇaka-viraha-vihvala-hṛdaya-santāpas tam evānuśocan kila kaśmalaṃ mahad abhirambhita iti hovāca
analyzed: hariṇa kuṇaka viraha vihvala hṛdaya santāpaḥ tam eva anuśocan kila kaśmalam mahat abhirambhitaḥ iti ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.08.016 /1 api bata sa vai kṛpaṇa eṇa-bālako mṛta-hariṇī-suto 'ho mamānāryasya
analyzed: api bata sa vai kṛpaṇaḥ eṇa bālakaḥ mṛta hariṇī sutaḥ ho mama anāryasya

original: śaṭha-kirāta-mater akṛta-sukṛtasya kṛta-visrambha ātma-pratyayena tad avigaṇayan sujana ivāgamiṣyati
analyzed: śaṭha kirāta mateḥ a kṛta sukṛtasya kṛta visrambhaḥ ātma pratyayena tat a vigaṇayan su janaḥ iva āgamiṣyati

original: BhP_05.08.017/1 api kṣemeṇāsminn āśramopavane śaṣpāṇi carantaṃ deva-guptaṃ drakṣyāmi
analyzed: api kṣemeṇa asmin āśrama upavane śaṣpāṇi carantam devaguptam drakṣyāmi

original: BhP_05.08.018/1 api ca na vṛkaḥ sālā-vṛko 'nyatamo vā naika-cara eka-caro vā bhakṣayati
analyzed: api ca na vṛkaḥ sālāvṛkaḥ nyatamaḥ vā na ekacaraḥ ekacaraḥ vā bhakṣayati

original: BhP_05.08.019/1 nimlocati ha bhagavān sakala-jagat-kṣemodayas trayy-ātmādyāpi mama na mṛga-vadhū-nyāsa āgacchati
analyzed: nimlocati ha bhagavān sakala jagat kṣema udayaḥ trayī ātmā adya api mama na mṛga vadhū nyāsaḥ āgacchati

original: BhP_05.08.020/1 api svid akṛta-sukṛtam āgatya māṃ sukhayiṣyati hariṇa-rāja-kumāro vividha-rucira-darśanīya-nija-mṛga-dāraka-vinodair asantoṣaṃ  #
analyzed: api svid a kṛta sukṛtam āgatya mām sukhayiṣyati hariṇa rāja kumāraḥ vividha rucira darśanīya nija mṛga dāraka vinodaiḥ a santoṣam

original: svānām apanudan
analyzed: svānām apanudan

original: BhP_05.08.021/1 kṣvelikāyāṃ māṃ mṛṣā-samādhināmīlita-dṛśaṃ prema-saṃrambheṇa cakita-cakita āgatya pṛṣad-aparuṣa-viṣāṇāgreṇa luṭhati
analyzed: kṣvelikāyām mām mṛṣā samādhinā āmīlita dṛśam prema saṃrambheṇa cakita cakitaḥ āgatya pṛṣada paruṣa viṣāṇa agreṇa luṭhati

original: BhP_05.08.022/1 āsādita-haviṣi barhiṣi dūṣite mayopālabdho bhīta-bhītaḥ sapady uparata-rāsa ṛṣi-kumāravad avahita-karaṇa-kalāpa āste
analyzed: āsādita haviṣi barhiṣi dūṣite mayā upālabdhaḥ bhīta bhītaḥ sapadi uparata rāsaḥ ṛṣi kumāra vat avahita karaṇa kalāpaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.08.023 /1 kiṃ vā are ācaritaṃ tapas tapasvinyānayā yad iyam avaniḥ savinaya-kṛṣṇa-sāra-tanaya-tanutara-subhaga-śivatamākhara-khura-pada-paṅktibhir
analyzed: kim vai are ācaritam tapaḥ tapasvinyā anayā yat iyam avaniḥ sa vinaya kṛṣṇa sāra tanaya tanutara subhaga śiva tama ākhara khura pada paṅktibhiḥ

original: draviṇa-vidhurāturasya kṛpaṇasya mama draviṇa-padavīṃ sūcayanty ātmānaṃ ca sarvataḥ
analyzed: draviṇa vidhura āturasya kṛpaṇasya mama draviṇa padavīm sūcayanti ātmānam ca sarvatas

original: kṛta-kautukaṃ dvijānāṃ svargāpavarga-kāmānāṃ deva-yajanaṃ karoti
analyzed: kṛta kautukam dvijānām svarga apavarga kāmānām devayajanam karoti

original: BhP_05.08.024/1 api svid asau bhagavān uḍu-patir enaṃ mṛga-pati-bhayān mṛta-mātaraṃ mṛga-bālakaṃ svāśrama-paribhraṣṭam anukampayā kṛpaṇa-jana-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: api svid asau bhagavān uḍupatiḥ enam mṛgapati bhayāt mṛta mātaram mṛga bālakam sva āśrama paribhraṣṭam anukampayā kṛpaṇa jana vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_05.08.025 /1 kiṃ vātmaja-viśleṣa-jvara-dava-dahana-śikhābhir upatapyamāna-hṛdaya-sthala-nalinīkaṃ
analyzed: kim vā ātmaja viśleṣa jvara dava dahana śikhābhiḥ upatapyamāna hṛdaya sthala nalinīkam

original: mām upasṛta-mṛgī-tanayaṃ śiśira-śāntānurāga-guṇita-nija-vadana-salilāmṛtamaya-gabhastibhiḥ svadhayatīti ca
analyzed: mām upasṛta mṛgī tanayam śiśira śānta anurāga guṇita nija vadana salila amṛta maya gabhastibhiḥ svadhayati iti ca

original: BhP_05.08.026 /1 evam aghaṭamāna-manorathākula-hṛdayo mṛga-dārakābhāsena svārabdha-karmaṇā
analyzed: evam a ghaṭamāna manoratha ākula hṛdayaḥ mṛgadāraka ābhāsena su ārabdha karmaṇā

original: yogārambhaṇato vibhraṃśitaḥ sa yoga-tāpaso bhagavad-ārādhana-lakṣaṇāc ca katham itarathā
analyzed: yoga ārambhaṇataḥ vibhraṃśitaḥ sa yoga tāpasaḥ bhagavat ārādhana lakṣaṇāt ca katham itarathā

original: jāty-antara eṇa-kuṇaka āsaṅgaḥ sākṣān niḥśreyasa-pratipakṣatayā prāk-parityakta-dustyaja-hṛdayābhijātasya
analyzed: jāti antare eṇakuṇakaḥ āsaṅgaḥ sākṣāt niḥśreyasa pratipakṣa tayā prāc parityakta dustyaja hṛdaya abhijātasya

original: tasyaivam antarāya-vihata-yogārambhaṇasya rājarṣer bharatasya tāvan mṛgārbhaka-poṣaṇa-pālana-prīṇana-lālanānuṣaṅgeṇāvigaṇayata
analyzed: tasya evam antarāya vihata yoga ārambhaṇasya rājarṣeḥ bharatasya tāvat mṛga arbhaka poṣaṇa pālana prīṇana lālana anuṣaṅgeṇa avigaṇayata

original: ātmānam ahir ivākhu-bilaṃ duratikramaḥ kālaḥ karāla-rabhasa āpadyata
analyzed: ātmānam ahiḥ iva ākhu bilam duratikramaḥ kālaḥ karāla rabhasaḥ āpadyata

original: BhP_05.08.027 /1 tadānīm api pārśva-vartinam ātmajam ivānuśocantam abhivīkṣamāṇo
analyzed: tadānīm api pārśva vartinam ātmajam iva anuśocantam abhivīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: mṛga evābhiniveśita-manā visṛjya lokam imaṃ saha mṛgeṇa kalevaraṃ mṛtam anu na mṛta-janmānusmṛtir
analyzed: mṛgaḥ eva abhiniveśita manāḥ visṛjya lokam imam saha mṛgeṇa kalevaram mṛtam anu na mṛta janma anusmṛtiḥ

original: itaravan mṛga-śarīram avāpa
analyzed: itaravat mṛga śarīram avāpa

original: BhP_05.08.028/1 tatrāpi ha vā ātmano mṛgatva-kāraṇaṃ bhagavad-ārādhana-samīhānubhāvenānusmṛtya bhṛśam anutapyamāna āha
analyzed: tatra api ha vā ātmanaḥ mṛga tva kāraṇam bhagavat ārādhana samīhā anubhāvena anusmṛtya bhṛśam anutapyamānaḥ āha

original: BhP_05.08.029 /1 aho kaṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭo 'ham ātmavatām anupathād yad-vimukta-samasta-saṅgasya
analyzed: aho kaṣṭam bhraṣṭaḥ ham ātmavatām anupathāt yat vimukta samasta saṅgasya

original: vivikta-puṇyāraṇya-śaraṇasyātmavata ātmani sarveṣām ātmanāṃ bhagavati vāsudeve tad-anuśravaṇa-manana-saṅkīrtanārādhanānusmaraṇābhiyogenāśūnya-sakala-yāmena
