analyzed: vivikta puṇya araṇya śaraṇasya ātmavataḥ ātmani sarveṣām ātmanām bhagavati vāsudeve tad anuśravaṇa manana saṅkīrtana ārādhana anusmaraṇa abhiyogena a śūnya sakala yāmena

original: kālena samāveśitaṃ samāhitaṃ kārtsnyena manas tat tu punar mamābudhasyārān mṛga-sutam anu parisusrāva
analyzed: kālena samāveśitam samāhitam kārtsnyena manaḥ tat tu punar mama abudhasya ārāt mṛgasutam anu parisusrāva

original: BhP_05.08.030/1 ity evaṃ nigūḍha-nirvedo visṛjya mṛgīṃ mātaraṃ punar bhagavat-kṣetram upaśama-śīla-muni-gaṇa-dayitaṃ śālagrāmaṃ pulastya-pulahāśramaṃ  #
analyzed: iti evam nigūḍha nirvedaḥ visṛjya mṛgīm mātaram punar bhagavat kṣetram upaśama śīla muni gaṇa dayitam śālagrāmam pulastya pulaha āśramam

original: kālañjarāt pratyājagāma
analyzed: kālañjarāt pratyājagāma

original: BhP_05.08.031 /1 tasminn api kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaḥ saṅgāc ca bhṛśam udvigna ātma-sahacaraḥ
analyzed: tasmin api kālam pratīkṣamāṇaḥ saṅgāt ca bhṛśam udvignaḥ ātma sahacaraḥ

original: śuṣka-parṇa-tṛṇa-vīrudhā vartamāno mṛgatva-nimittāvasānam eva gaṇayan mṛga-śarīraṃ
analyzed: śuṣka parṇa tṛṇa vīrudhā vartamānaḥ mṛga tva nimitta avasānam eva gaṇayan mṛga śarīram

original: tīrthodaka-klinnam ut-sasarja
analyzed: tīrtha udaka klinnam utsasarja

original: BhP_05.09.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.09.001 /1 atha kasyacid dvija-varasyāṅgiraḥ-pravarasya
analyzed: atha kasyacid dvijavarasya aṅgiraḥ pravarasya

original: śama-dama-tapaḥ-svādhyāyādhyayana-tyāga-santoṣa-titikṣā-praśraya-vidyānasūyātma-jñānānanda-yuktasyātma-sadṛśa-śruta-śīlācāra-rūpaudārya-guṇā
analyzed: śama dama tapaḥ svādhyāya adhyayana tyāga santoṣa titikṣā praśraya vidyā anasūyā ātma jñāna ānanda yuktasya ātma sadṛśa śruta śīla ācāra rūpa audārya guṇāḥ

original: nava sodaryā aṅgajā babhūvur mithunaṃ ca yavīyasyāṃ bhāryāyām yas tu tatra pumāṃs
analyzed: nava sodaryāḥ aṅga jāḥ babhūvuḥ mithunam ca yavīyasyām bhāryāyām yaḥ tu tatra pumān

original: taṃ parama-bhāgavataṃ rājarṣi-pravaraṃ bharatam utsṛṣṭa-mṛga-śarīraṃ carama-śarīreṇa
analyzed: tam parama bhāgavatam rājarṣi pravaram bharatam utsṛṣṭa mṛga śarīram carama śarīreṇa

original: vipratvaṃ gatam āhuḥ
analyzed: vipra tvam gatam āhuḥ

original: BhP_05.09.002 /1 tatrāpi svajana-saṅgāc ca bhṛśam udvijamāno bhagavataḥ karma-bandha-vidhvaṃsana-śravaṇa-smaraṇa-guṇa-vivaraṇa-caraṇāravinda-yugalaṃ
analyzed: tatra api sva jana saṅgāt ca bhṛśam udvijamānaḥ bhagavataḥ karma bandha vidhvaṃsana śravaṇa smaraṇa guṇa vivaraṇa caraṇa aravinda yugalam

original: manasā vidadhad ātmanaḥ pratighātam āśaṅkamāno bhagavad-anugraheṇānusmṛta-sva-pūrva-janmāvalir
analyzed: manasā vidadhat ātmanaḥ pratighātam āśaṅkamānaḥ bhagavat anugraheṇa anusmṛta sva pūrva janma āvaliḥ

original: ātmānam unmatta-jaḍāndha-badhira-svarūpeṇa darśayām āsa lokasya
analyzed: ātmānam unmatta jaḍa andha badhira sva rūpeṇa darśayām āsa lokasya

original: BhP_05.09.003 /1 tasyāpi ha vā ātmajasya vipraḥ putra-snehānubaddha-manā āsamāvartanāt
analyzed: tasya api ha vā ātmajasya vipraḥ putra sneha anubaddha manāḥ ā samāvartanāt

original: saṃskārān yathopadeśaṃ vidadhāna upanītasya ca punaḥ śaucācamanādīn karma-niyamān
analyzed: saṃskārān yathopadeśam vidadhānaḥ upanītasya ca punar śauca ācamana ādīn karma niyamān

original: anabhipretān api samaśikṣayad anuśiṣṭena hi bhāvyaṃ pituḥ putreṇeti
analyzed: anabhipretān api samaśikṣayat anuśiṣṭena hi bhāvyam pituḥ putreṇa iti

original: BhP_05.09.004 /1 sa cāpi tad u ha pitṛ-sannidhāv evāsadhrīcīnam iva sma karoti chandāṃsy
analyzed: sa ca api tat u ha pitṛ sannidhau eva a sadhrīcīnam iva sma karoti chandāṃsi

original: adhyāpayiṣyan saha vyāhṛtibhiḥ sapraṇava-śiras tripadīṃ sāvitrīṃ graiṣma-vāsantikān
analyzed: adhyāpayiṣyan saha vyāhṛtibhiḥ sa praṇava śiraḥ tripadīm sāvitrīm graiṣma vāsantikān

original: māsān adhīyānam apy asamaveta-rūpaṃ grāhayām āsa
analyzed: māsān adhīyānam api asamaveta rūpam grāhayām āsa

original: BhP_05.09.005 /1 evaṃ sva-tanuja ātmany anurāgāveśita-cittaḥ śaucādhyayana-vrata-niyama-gurv-anala-śuśrūṣaṇādy-aupakurvāṇaka-karmāṇy
analyzed: evam sva tanuje ātmani anurāga āveśita cittaḥ śauca adhyayana vrata niyama guru anala śuśrūṣaṇa ādi aupakurvāṇaka karmāṇi

original: anabhiyuktāny api samanuśiṣṭena bhāvyam ity asad-āgrahaḥ putram anuśāsya svayaṃ tāvad
analyzed: anabhiyuktāni api samanuśiṣṭena bhāvyam iti asat āgrahaḥ putram anuśāsya svayam tāvat

original: anadhigata-manorathaḥ kālenāpramattena svayaṃ gṛha eva pramatta upasaṃhṛtaḥ
analyzed: an adhigata manorathaḥ kālena apramattena svayam gṛhe eva pramattaḥ upasaṃhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_05.09.006/1 atha yavīyasī dvija-satī sva-garbha-jātaṃ mithunaṃ sapatnyā upanyasya svayam anusaṃsthayā patilokam agāt
analyzed: atha yavīyasī dvijasatī sva garbha jātam mithunam sapatnyā upanyasya svayam anusaṃsthayā pati lokam agāt

original: BhP_05.09.007/1 pitary uparate bhrātara enam atat-prabhāva-vidas trayyāṃ vidyāyām eva paryavasita-matayo na para-vidyāyāṃ jaḍa-matir iti bhrātur  #
analyzed: pitari uparate bhrātaraḥ enam a tad prabhāva vidaḥ trayyām vidyāyām eva paryavasita matayaḥ na para vidyāyām jaḍa matiḥ iti bhrātuḥ

original: anuśāsana-nirbandhān nyavṛtsanta
analyzed: anuśāsana nirbandhāt nyavṛtsanta

original: BhP_05.09.008 /1 sa ca prākṛtair dvipada-paśubhir unmatta-jaḍa-badhira-mūkety abhibhāṣyamāṇo
analyzed: sa ca prākṛtaiḥ dvipada paśubhiḥ unmatta jaḍa badhira mūka iti abhibhāṣyamāṇaḥ

original: yadā tad-anurūpāṇi prabhāṣate karmāṇi ca kāryamāṇaḥ parecchayā karoti viṣṭito vetanato
analyzed: yadā tad anurūpāṇi prabhāṣate karmāṇi ca kāryamāṇaḥ para icchayā karoti viṣṭitaḥ

original: vā yācñyā yadṛcchayā vopasāditam alpaṃ bahu mṛṣṭaṃ kadannaṃ vābhyavaharati paraṃ
analyzed: vā yācñyā yadṛcchayā vā upasāditam alpam bahu mṛṣṭam kadannam vā abhyavaharati param

original: nendriya-prīti-nimittam nitya-nivṛtta-nimitta-sva-siddha-viśuddhānubhavānanda-svātma-lābhādhigamaḥ
analyzed: na indriya prīti nimittam nitya nivṛtta nimitta sva siddha viśuddha anubhava ānanda sva ātma lābha adhigamaḥ

original: sukha-duḥkhayor dvandva-nimittayor asambhāvita-dehābhimānaḥ
analyzed: sukha duḥkhayoḥ dvandva nimittayoḥ asambhāvita deha abhimānaḥ

original: BhP_05.09.010 /1 śītoṣṇa-vāta-varṣeṣu vṛṣa ivānāvṛtāṅgaḥ pīnaḥ saṃhananāṅgaḥ sthaṇḍila-saṃveśanānunmardanāmajjana-rajasā
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa vāta varṣeṣu vṛṣaḥ iva anāvṛta aṅgaḥ pīnaḥ saṃhanana aṅgaḥ sthaṇḍila saṃveśana an unmardana āmajjana rajasā

original: mahāmaṇir ivānabhivyakta-brahma-varcasaḥ kupaṭāvṛta-kaṭir upavītenoru-maṣiṇā dvijātir
analyzed: mahā maṇiḥ iva an abhivyakta brahmavarcasaḥ ku paṭa āvṛta kaṭiḥ upavītena ūru maṣiṇā dvijātiḥ

original: iti brahma-bandhur iti saṃjñayātaj-jñajanāvamato vicacāra
analyzed: iti brahmabandhuḥ iti saṃjñayā a tajjña jana avamataḥ vicacāra

original: BhP_05.09.011 /1 yadā tu parata āhāraṃ karma-vetanata īhamānaḥ sva-bhrātṛbhir api
analyzed: yadā tu paratas āhāram karma vetanāt īhamānaḥ sva bhrātṛbhiḥ api

original: kedāra-karmaṇi nirūpitas tad api karoti kintu na samaṃ viṣamaṃ nyūnam adhikam iti
analyzed: kedāra karmaṇi nirūpitaḥ tat api karoti kintu na samam viṣamam nyūnam adhikam iti

original: veda kaṇa-piṇyāka-phalī-karaṇa-kulmāṣa-sthālīpurīṣādīny apy amṛtavad abhyavaharati
analyzed: veda kaṇa piṇyāka phalīkaraṇa kulmāṣa sthālī purīṣa ādīni api amṛta vat abhyavaharati

original: BhP_05.09.012/1 atha kadācit kaścid vṛṣala-patir bhadra-kālyai puruṣa-paśum ālabhatāpatya-kāmaḥ
analyzed: atha kadācid kaścid vṛṣala patiḥ bhadrakālyai puruṣa paśum ālabhata apatya kāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.09.013 /1 tasya ha daiva-muktasya paśoḥ padavīṃ tad-anucarāḥ paridhāvanto
analyzed: tasya ha daiva muktasya paśoḥ padavīm tad anucarāḥ

original: niśi niśītha-samaye tamasāvṛtāyām anadhigata-paśava ākasmikena vidhinā kedārān vīrāsanena
analyzed: niśi niśītha samaye tamasā āvṛtāyām anadhigata paśavaḥ ākasmikena vidhinā kedārān vīrāsanena

original: mṛga-varāhādibhyaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇam aṅgiraḥ-pravara-sutam apaśyan
analyzed: mṛga varāha ādibhyaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇam aṅgiraḥ pravara sutam apaśyan

original: BhP_05.09.014/1 atha ta enam anavadya-lakṣaṇam avamṛśya bhartṛ-karma-niṣpattiṃ manyamānā baddhvā raśanayā caṇḍikā-gṛham upaninyur mudā vikasit
analyzed: atha te enam anavadya lakṣaṇam avamṛśya bhartṛ karma niṣpattim manyamānāḥ baddhvā raśanayā caṇḍikā gṛham upaninyuḥ mudā vikasit

original: BhP_05.09.015 /1 atha paṇayas taṃ sva-vidhinābhiṣicyāhatena vāsasācchādya bhūṣaṇālepa-srak-tilakādibhir
analyzed: atha paṇayaḥ tam sva vidhinā abhiṣicya ahatena vāsasā ācchādya bhūṣaṇa ālepa sraj tilaka ādibhiḥ

original: upaskṛtaṃ bhuktavantaṃ dhūpa-dīpa-mālya-lāja-kisalayāṅkura-phalopahāropetayā vaiśasa-saṃsthayā
analyzed: upaskṛtam bhuktavantam dhūpa dīpa mālya lāja kisalaya aṅkura phala upahāra upetayā vaiśasa saṃsthayā

original: mahatā gīta-stuti-mṛdaṅga-paṇava-ghoṣeṇa ca puruṣa-paśuṃ bhadra-kālyāḥ purata upaveśayām āsuḥ
analyzed: mahatā gīta stuti mṛdaṅga paṇava ghoṣeṇa ca puruṣa paśum bhadrakālyāḥ puratas upaveśayām āsuḥ

original: BhP_05.09.016/1 atha vṛṣala-rāja-paṇiḥ puruṣa-paśor asṛg-āsavena devīṃ bhadra-kālīṃ yakṣyamāṇas tad-abhimantritam asim ati-karāla-niśitam upādade
analyzed: atha vṛṣala rāja paṇiḥ puruṣa paśoḥ asṛj āsavena devīm bhadrakālīm yakṣyamāṇaḥ tad abhimantritam asim ati karāla niśitam upādade

original: BhP_05.09.017 /1 iti teṣāṃ vṛṣalānāṃ rajas-tamaḥ-prakṛtīnāṃ dhana-mada-raja-utsikta-manasāṃ
analyzed: iti teṣām vṛṣalānām rajaḥ tamaḥ prakṛtīnām dhana mada raja utsikta manasām

original: bhagavat-kalā-vīra-kulaṃ kadarthī-kṛtyotpathena svairaṃ viharatāṃ hiṃsā-vihārāṇāṃ
analyzed: bhagavat kalā vīra kulam kadarthīkṛtya utpathena svairam viharatām hiṃsā vihārāṇām

original: karmāti-dāruṇaṃ yad brahma-bhūtasya sākṣād brahmarṣi-sutasya nirvairasya sarva-bhūta-suhṛdaḥ
analyzed: karma ati dāruṇam yat brahma bhūtasya sākṣāt brahmarṣi sutasya nirvairasya sarva bhūta suhṛdaḥ

original: sūnāyām apy ananumatam ālambhanaṃ tad upalabhya brahma-tejasāti-durviṣaheṇa dandahyamānena
analyzed: sūnāyām api an anumatam ālambhanam tat upalabhya brahma tejasā ati durviṣaheṇa dandahyamānena

original: vapuṣā sahasoccacāṭa saiva devī bhadra-kālī
analyzed: vapuṣā sahasā uccacāṭa sā eva devī bhadrakālī

original: BhP_05.09.018 /1 bhṛśam amarṣa-roṣāveśa-rabhasa-vilasita-bhru-kuṭi-viṭapa-kuṭila-daṃṣṭrāruṇekṣaṇāṭopāti-bhayānaka-vadanā
analyzed: bhṛśam amarṣa roṣa āveśa rabhasa vilasita bhrukuṭi viṭapa kuṭila daṃṣṭra aruṇa īkṣaṇa āṭopa ati bhayānaka vadanā

original: hantu-kāmevedaṃ mahāṭṭa-hāsam ati-saṃrambheṇa vimuñcantī tata utpatya pāpīyasāṃ duṣṭānāṃ
analyzed: hantu kāmā iva idam mahā aṭṭahāsam ati saṃrambheṇa vimuñcantī tatas utpatya pāpīyasām duṣṭānām

original: tenaivāsinā vivṛkṇa-śīrṣṇāṃ galāt sravantam asṛg-āsavam atyuṣṇaṃ saha gaṇena nipīyāti-pāna-mada-vihvaloccaistarāṃ
analyzed: tena eva asinā vivṛkṇa śīrṣṇām galāt sravantam asṛj āsavam ati uṣṇam saha gaṇena nipīya atipāna mada vihvalā uccaistarām

original: sva-pārṣadaiḥ saha jagau nanarta ca vijahāra ca śiraḥ-kanduka-līlayā
analyzed: sva pārṣadaiḥ saha jagau nanarta ca vijahāra ca śiraḥ kanduka līlayā

original: BhP_05.09.019/1 evam eva khalu mahad-abhicārāti-kramaḥ kārtsnyenātmane phalati
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahat abhicāra atikramaḥ kārtsnyena ātmane phalati

original: BhP_05.09.020 /1 na vā etad viṣṇudatta mahad-adbhutaṃ yad asambhramaḥ sva-śiraś-chedana
analyzed: na vā etat viṣṇudatta mahat adbhutam yat asambhramaḥ sva śiraḥ chedana

original: āpatite 'pi vimukta-dehādy-ātma-bhāva-sudṛḍha-hṛdaya-granthīnāṃ sarva-sattva-suhṛd-ātmanāṃ
analyzed: āpatite pi vimukta deha ādi ātmabhāva su dṛḍha hṛdaya granthīnām sarva sattva suhṛd ātmanām

original: nirvairāṇāṃ sākṣād bhagavatānimiṣāri-varāyudhenāpramattena tais tair bhāvaiḥ parirakṣyamāṇānāṃ
analyzed: nirvairāṇām sākṣāt bhagavatā animiṣa ari vara āyudhena apramattena taiḥ taiḥ bhāvaiḥ parirakṣyamāṇānām

original: tat-pāda-mūlam akutaścid-bhayam upasṛtānāṃ bhāgavata-paramahaṃsānām
analyzed: tad pāda mūlam akutaścidbhayam upasṛtānām bhāgavata paramahaṃsānām

original: BhP_05.10.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.10.001 /1 atha sindhu-sauvīra-pate rahūgaṇasya vrajata ikṣumatyās taṭe tat-kula-patinā
analyzed: atha sindhusauvīra pate rahūgaṇasya vrajataḥ ikṣumatyāḥ taṭe tad kula patinā

original: śibikā-vāha-puruṣānveṣaṇa-samaye daivenopasāditaḥ sa dvija-vara upalabdha eṣa pīvā
analyzed: śibikā vāha puruṣa anveṣaṇa samaye daivena upasāditaḥ sa dvijavaraḥ upalabdhaḥ eṣa pīvā

original: yuvā saṃhananāṅgo go-kharavad dhuraṃ voḍhum alam iti pūrva-viṣṭi-gṛhītaiḥ saha gṛhītaḥ
analyzed: yuvā saṃhanana aṅgaḥ go khara vat dhuram voḍhum alam iti pūrva viṣṭi gṛhītaiḥ saha gṛhītaḥ

original: prasabham atad-arha uvāha śibikāṃ sa mahānubhāvaḥ
analyzed: prasabham a tad arhaḥ uvāha śibikām sa mahā anubhāvaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.002 /1 yadā hi dvija-varasyeṣu-mātrāvalokānugater na samāhitā puruṣa-gatis
analyzed: yadā hi dvijavarasya iṣu mātra avaloka anugateḥ na samāhitā puruṣa gatiḥ

original: tadā viṣama-gatāṃ sva-śibikāṃ rahūgaṇa upadhārya puruṣān adhivahata āha he voḍhāraḥ
analyzed: tadā viṣama gatām sva śibikām rahū gaṇaḥ upadhārya puruṣān adhivahataḥ āha he voḍhāraḥ

original: sādhv atikramata kim iti viṣamam uhyate yānam iti
analyzed: sādhu atikramata kim iti viṣamam uhyate yānam iti

original: BhP_05.10.003/1 atha ta īśvara-vacaḥ sopālambham upākarṇyopāya-turīyāc chaṅkita-manasas taṃ vijñāpayāṃ babhūvuḥ
analyzed: atha te īśvara vacaḥ sa upālambham upākarṇya upāya turīyāt śaṅkita manasaḥ tam babhūvuḥ

original: BhP_05.10.004/1 na vayaṃ nara-deva pramattā bhavan-niyamānupathāḥ sādhv eva vahāmaḥ ayam adhunaiva niyukto 'pi na drutaṃ vrajati nānena saha  #
analyzed: na vayam naradeva pramattāḥ bhavat niyama anupathāḥ sādhu eva vahāmaḥ ayam adhunā eva niyuktaḥ na drutam vrajati na anena saha

original: voḍhum u ha vayaṃ pārayāma iti
analyzed: voḍhum u ha vayam pārayāmaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.10.005 /1 sāṃsargiko doṣa eva nūnam ekasyāpi sarveṣāṃ sāṃsargikāṇāṃ bhavitum
analyzed: sāṃsargikaḥ doṣaḥ eva nūnam ekasya api sarveṣām sāṃsargikāṇām bhavitum

original: arhatīti niścitya niśamya kṛpaṇa-vaco rājā rahūgaṇa upāsita-vṛddho 'pi nisargeṇa
analyzed: arhati iti niścitya niśamya kṛpaṇa vacaḥ rājā rahūgaṇaḥ upāsita vṛddhaḥ pi nisargeṇa

original: balāt kṛta īṣad-utthita-manyur avispaṣṭa-brahma-tejasaṃ jāta-vedasam iva rajasāvṛta-matir āha
analyzed: balāt kṛtaḥ īṣat utthita manyuḥ avispaṣṭa brahma tejasam jātavedasam iva rajasā āvṛta matiḥ āha

original: BhP_05.10.006 /1 aho kaṣṭaṃ bhrātar vyaktam uru-pariśrānto dīrgham adhvānam eka eva
analyzed: aho kaṣṭam bhrātar vyaktam uru pariśrāntaḥ dīrgham adhvānam ekaḥ eva

original: ūhivān suciraṃ nāti-pīvā na saṃhananāṅgo jarasā copadruto bhavān sakhe no evāpara
analyzed: ūhivān su ciram na ati pīvāḥ na saṃhanana aṅgaḥ jarasā ca upadrutaḥ bhavān sakhe no eva apara

original: ete saṅghaṭṭina iti bahu-vipralabdho 'py avidyayā racita-dravya-guṇa-karmāśaya-sva-carama-kalevare
analyzed: ete saṅghaṭṭinaḥ iti bahu vipralabdhaḥ pi avidyayā racita dravya guṇa karma āśaya sva carama kalevare

original: 'vastuni saṃsthāna-viśeṣe 'haṃ mamety anadhyāropita-mithyā-pratyayo brahma-bhūtas
analyzed: vastuni saṃsthāna viśeṣe ham mama iti an adhyāropita mithyā pratyayaḥ brahma bhūtaḥ

original: tūṣṇīṃ śibikāṃ pūrvavad uvāha
analyzed: tūṣṇīm śibikām pūrvavat uvāha

original: BhP_05.10.007 /1 atha punaḥ sva-śibikāyāṃ viṣama-gatāyāṃ prakupita uvāca rahūgaṇaḥ
analyzed: atha punar sva śibikāyām viṣama gatāyām prakupitaḥ uvāca rahū gaṇaḥ

original: kim idam are tvaṃ jīvan-mṛto māṃ kadarthī-kṛtya bhartṛ-śāsanam aticarasi pramattasya
analyzed: kim idam are tvam jīvanmṛtaḥ mām kadarthīkṛtya bhartṛ śāsanam aticarasi pramattasya

original: ca te karomi cikitsāṃ daṇḍa-pāṇir iva janatāyā yathā prakṛtiṃ svāṃ bhajiṣyasa iti
analyzed: ca te karomi cikitsām daṇḍa pāṇiḥ iva janatāyāḥ yathā prakṛtim svām bhajiṣyase iti

original: BhP_05.10.008 /1 evaṃ bahv abaddham api bhāṣamāṇaṃ nara-devābhimānaṃ rajasā tamasānuviddhena
analyzed: evam bahu abaddham api bhāṣamāṇam naradeva abhimānam rajasā tamasā anuviddhena

original: madena tiraskṛtāśeṣa-bhagavat-priya-niketaṃ paṇḍita-māninaṃ sa bhagavān brāhmaṇo
analyzed: madena tiraskṛta aśeṣa bhagavat priya niketam paṇḍita māninam sa bhagavān brāhmaṇaḥ

original: brahma-bhūta-sarva-bhūta-suhṛd-ātmā yogeśvara-caryāyāṃ nāti-vyutpanna-matiṃ smayamāna
analyzed: brahma bhūta sarva bhūta suhṛd ātmā yoga īśvara caryāyām na ati vyutpanna matim smayamāna

original: iva vigata-smaya idam āha
analyzed: iva vigata smayaḥ idam āha

original: BhP_05.10.009/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.10.009/1 tvayoditaṃ vyaktam avipralabdhaṃ bhartuḥ sa me syād yadi vīra bhāraḥ
analyzed: tvayā uditam vyaktam avipralabdham bhartuḥ sa me syāt yadi vīra bhāraḥ

original: BhP_05.10.009/2 gantur yadi syād adhigamyam adhvā pīveti rāśau na vidāṃ pravādaḥ
analyzed: gantuḥ yadi syāt adhigamyam adhvā pīvā iti rāśau na vidām pravādaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.010/1 sthaulyaṃ kārśyaṃ vyādhaya ādhayaś ca kṣut tṛḍ bhayaṃ kalir icchā jarā ca
analyzed: sthaulyam kārśyam vyādhayaḥ ādhayaḥ ca kṣudh tṛṣ bhayam kaliḥ icchā jarā ca

original: BhP_05.10.010/2 nidrā ratir manyur ahaṃ madaḥ śuco dehena jātasya hi me na santi
analyzed: nidrā ratiḥ manyuḥ aham madaḥ śucaḥ dehena jātasya hi me na santi

original: BhP_05.10.011/1 jīvan-mṛtatvaṃ niyamena rājan ādyantavad yad vikṛtasya dṛṣṭam
analyzed: jīvanmṛtatvam niyamena rājan ādi anta vat yat vikṛtasya dṛṣṭam

original: BhP_05.10.011/2 sva-svāmya-bhāvo dhruva īḍya yatra tarhy ucyate 'sau vidhikṛtya-yogaḥ
analyzed: sva svāmi abhāvaḥ dhruvaḥ yatra tarhi ucyate sau vidhi kṛtya yogaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.012/1 viśeṣa-buddher vivaraṃ manāk ca paśyāma yan na vyavahārato 'nyat
analyzed: viśeṣa buddheḥ vivaram manāk ca paśyāma yat na vyavahārataḥ

original: BhP_05.10.012/2 ka īśvaras tatra kim īśitavyaṃ tathāpi rājan karavāma kiṃ te
analyzed: kaḥ īśvaraḥ tatra kim īśitavyam tathā api rājan karavāma kim te

original: BhP_05.10.013/1 unmatta-matta-jaḍavat sva-saṃsthāṃ gatasya me vīra cikitsitena
analyzed: unmatta matta jaḍa vat sva saṃsthām gatasya me vīra cikitsitena

original: BhP_05.10.013/2 arthaḥ kiyān bhavatā śikṣitena stabdha-pramattasya ca piṣṭapeṣaḥ
analyzed: arthaḥ kiyān bhavatā śikṣitena stabdha pramattasya ca piṣṭa peṣaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.10.014/1 etāvad anuvāda-paribhāṣayā pratyudīrya muni-vara upaśama-śīla uparatānātmya-nimitta upabhogena karmārabdhaṃ vyapanayan rāja-yānam  #
analyzed: etāvat anuvāda paribhāṣayā pratyudīrya muni varaḥ upaśama śīlaḥ uparata anātmya nimittaḥ upabhogena karma ārabdham vyapanayan rāja yānam

original: api tathovāha
analyzed: api tathā uvāha

original: BhP_05.10.015 /1 sa cāpi pāṇḍaveya sindhu-sauvīra-patis tattva-jijñāsāyāṃ samyak-śraddhayādhikṛtādhikāras
analyzed: sa ca api pāṇḍaveya sindhusauvīra patiḥ tattva jijñāsāyām samyak śraddhayā adhikṛta adhikāraḥ

original: tad dhṛdaya-granthi-mocanaṃ dvija-vaca āśrutya bahu-yoga-grantha-sammataṃ tvarayāvaruhya
analyzed: tat hṛdaya granthi mocanam dvija vacaḥ āśrutya bahu yoga grantha sammatam tvarayā avaruhya

original: śirasā pāda-mūlam upasṛtaḥ kṣamāpayan vigata-nṛpa-deva-smaya uvāca
analyzed: śirasā pāda mūlam upasṛtaḥ kṣamāpayan vigata nṛpa deva smayaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.10.016/1 kas tvaṃ nigūḍhaś carasi dvijānāṃ bibharṣi sūtraṃ katamo 'vadhūtaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ tvam nigūḍhaḥ carasi dvijānām bibharṣi sūtram katamaḥ vadhūtaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.016/2 kasyāsi kutratya ihāpi kasmāt kṣemāya naś ced asi nota śuklaḥ
analyzed: kasya asi kutratyaḥ iha api kasmāt kṣemāya naḥ ced asi na uta śuklaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.017/1 nāhaṃ viśaṅke sura-rāja-vajrān na tryakṣa-śūlān na yamasya daṇḍāt
analyzed: na aham viśaṅke surarāja vajrāt na tryakṣa śūlāt na yamasya daṇḍāt

original: BhP_05.10.017/2 nāgny-arka-somānila-vittapāstrāc chaṅke bhṛśaṃ brahma-kulāvamānāt
analyzed: na agni arka soma anila vittapa astrāt śaṅke bhṛśam brahma kula avamānāt

original: BhP_05.10.018/1 tad brūhy asaṅgo jaḍavan nigūḍha- vijñāna-vīryo vicarasy apāraḥ
analyzed: tat brūhi asaṅgaḥ jaḍa vat nigūḍha vijñāna vīryaḥ vicarasi apāraḥ

original: BhP_05.10.018/2 vacāṃsi yoga-grathitāni sādho na naḥ kṣamante manasāpi bhettum
analyzed: vacāṃsi yoga grathitāni sādho na naḥ kṣamante manasā api bhettum

original: BhP_05.10.019/1 ahaṃ ca yogeśvaram ātma-tattva- vidāṃ munīnāṃ paramaṃ guruṃ vai
analyzed: aham ca yogeśvaram ātma tattva vidām munīnām paramam gurum vai

original: BhP_05.10.019/2 praṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ kim ihāraṇaṃ tat sākṣād dhariṃ jñāna-kalāvatīrṇam
analyzed: praṣṭum pravṛttaḥ kim iha araṇam tat sākṣāt harim jñāna kalā avatīrṇam

original: BhP_05.10.020/1 sa vai bhavā loka-nirīkṣaṇārtham avyakta-liṅgo vicaraty api svit
analyzed: sa vai bhavā loka nirīkṣaṇa artham avyakta liṅgaḥ vicarati api svid

original: BhP_05.10.020/2 yogeśvarāṇāṃ gatim andha-buddhiḥ kathaṃ vicakṣīta gṛhānubandhaḥ
analyzed: yoga īśvarāṇām gatim andha buddhiḥ katham vicakṣīta gṛha anubandhaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.021/1 dṛṣṭaḥ śramaḥ karmata ātmano vai bhartur gantur bhavataś cānumanye
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ śramaḥ karmataḥ ātmanaḥ vai bhartuḥ gantuḥ bhavataḥ ca anumanye

original: BhP_05.10.021/2 yathāsatodānayanādy-abhāvāt samūla iṣṭo vyavahāra-mārgaḥ
analyzed: yathā asataḥ udānayana ādi abhāvāt sa mūlaḥ iṣṭaḥ vyavahāra mārgaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.022/1 sthāly-agni-tāpāt payaso 'bhitāpas tat-tāpatas taṇḍula-garbha-randhiḥ
analyzed: sthālī agni tāpāt payasaḥ tad tāpataḥ taṇḍula garbha randhiḥ

original: BhP_05.10.022/2 dehendriyāsvāśaya-sannikarṣāt tat-saṃsṛtiḥ puruṣasyānurodhāt
BhP_05.10.023/1 śāstābhigoptā nṛpatiḥ prajānāṃ yaḥ kiṅkaro vai na pinaṣṭi piṣṭam
analyzed: śāstā abhigoptā nṛpatiḥ prajānām yaḥ kiṅkaraḥ vai na pinaṣṭi piṣṭam

original: BhP_05.10.023/2 sva-dharmam ārādhanam acyutasya yad īhamāno vijahāty aghaugham
analyzed: svadharmam ārādhanam acyutasya yat īhamānaḥ vijahāti agha ogham

original: BhP_05.10.024/1 tan me bhavān nara-devābhimāna- madena tucchīkṛta-sattamasya
analyzed: tat me bhavān naradeva abhimāna madena tucchīkṛta sattamasya

original: BhP_05.10.024/2 kṛṣīṣṭa maitrī-dṛśam ārta-bandho yathā tare sad-avadhyānam aṃhaḥ
analyzed: ārta bandho yathā tare sat avadhyānam aṃhaḥ

original: BhP_05.10.025/1 na vikriyā viśva-suhṛt-sakhasya sāmyena vītābhimates tavāpi
analyzed: na vikriyā viśva suhṛd sakhasya sāmyena vīta abhimateḥ tava api

original: BhP_05.10.025/2 mahad-vimānāt sva-kṛtād dhi mādṛṅ naṅkṣyaty adūrād api śūlapāṇiḥ
analyzed: mahat vimānāt sva kṛtāt dhi mādṛś naṅkṣyati adūrāt api śūlapāṇiḥ

original: BhP_05.11.001/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.11.001/1 akovidaḥ kovida-vāda-vādān vadasy atho nāti-vidāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: a kovidaḥ kovida vāda vādān vadasi atho na ati vidām variṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.001/2 na sūrayo hi vyavahāram enaṃ tattvāvamarśena sahāmananti
analyzed: na sūrayaḥ hi vyavahāram enam tattva avamarśena saha āmananti

original: BhP_05.11.002/1 tathaiva rājann uru-gārhamedha- vitāna-vidyoru-vijṛmbhiteṣu
analyzed: tathā eva rājan urugārhamedha vitāna vidyā uru vijṛmbhiteṣu

original: BhP_05.11.002/2 na veda-vādeṣu hi tattva-vādaḥ prāyeṇa śuddho nu cakāsti sādhuḥ
analyzed: na veda vādeṣu hi tattva vādaḥ prāyeṇa śuddhaḥ nu cakāsti sādhuḥ

original: BhP_05.11.003/1 na tasya tattva-grahaṇāya sākṣād varīyasīr api vācaḥ samāsan
analyzed: na tasya tattva grahaṇāya sākṣāt varīyasīḥ api vācaḥ samāsan

original: BhP_05.11.003/2 svapne niruktyā gṛhamedhi-saukhyaṃ na yasya heyānumitaṃ svayaṃ syāt
analyzed: svapne niruktyā gṛhamedhi saukhyam na yasya heya anumitam svayam syāt

original: BhP_05.11.004/1 yāvan mano rajasā pūruṣasya sattvena vā tamasā vānuruddham
analyzed: yāvat manaḥ rajasā pūruṣasya sattvena vā tamasā vā anuruddham

original: BhP_05.11.004/2 cetobhir ākūtibhir ātanoti niraṅkuśaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaraṃ vā
analyzed: cetobhiḥ ākūtibhiḥ ātanoti niraṅkuśam kuśalam ca itaram vā

original: BhP_05.11.005/1 sa vāsanātmā viṣayoparakto guṇa-pravāho vikṛtaḥ ṣoḍaśātmā
analyzed: sa vāsanā ātmā viṣaya uparaktaḥ guṇa pravāhaḥ vikṛtaḥ ṣoḍaśa ātmā

original: BhP_05.11.005/2 bibhrat pṛthaṅ-nāmabhi rūpa-bhedam antar-bahiṣṭvaṃ ca purais tanoti
analyzed: bibhrat pṛthak nāmabhiḥ rūpa bhedam antar bahis tvam ca puraiḥ tanoti

original: BhP_05.11.006/1 duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ca tīvraṃ kālopapannaṃ phalam āvyanakti
analyzed: duḥkham sukham vyatiriktam ca tīvram kāla upapannam phalam āvyanakti

original: BhP_05.11.006/2 āliṅgya māyā-racitāntarātmā sva-dehinaṃ saṃsṛti-cakra-kūṭaḥ
analyzed: āliṅgya māyā racita antarātmā sva dehinam saṃsṛti cakra kūṭaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.007/1 tāvān ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ sadāviḥ kṣetrajña-sākṣyo bhavati sthūla-sūkṣmaḥ
analyzed: tāvān ayam vyavahāraḥ sadā āvis kṣetrajña sākṣyaḥ bhavati sthūla sūkṣmaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.007/2 tasmān mano liṅgam ado vadanti guṇāguṇatvasya parāvarasya
analyzed: tasmāt manaḥ liṅgam adaḥ vadanti guṇa aguṇa tvasya parāvarasya

original: BhP_05.11.008/1 guṇānuraktaṃ vyasanāya jantoḥ kṣemāya nairguṇyam atho manaḥ syāt
analyzed: guṇa anuraktam vyasanāya jantoḥ kṣemāya nairguṇyam atho manaḥ syāt

original: BhP_05.11.008/2 yathā pradīpo ghṛta-vartim aśnan śikhāḥ sadhūmā bhajati hy anyadā svam
analyzed: yathā pradīpaḥ ghṛta vartim aśnan śikhāḥ sa dhūmāḥ bhajati hi anyadā svam

original: BhP_05.11.008/3 padaṃ tathā guṇa-karmānubaddhaṃ vṛttīr manaḥ śrayate 'nyatra tattvam
analyzed: padam tathā guṇa karma anubaddham vṛttīḥ manaḥ śrayate nyatra tattvam

original: BhP_05.11.009/1 ekādaśāsan manaso hi vṛttaya ākūtayaḥ pañca dhiyo 'bhimānaḥ
analyzed: ekādaśa āsan manasaḥ hi vṛttayaḥ ākūtayaḥ pañca dhiyaḥ bhimānaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.009/2 mātrāṇi karmāṇi puraṃ ca tāsāṃ vadanti haikādaśa vīra bhūmīḥ
analyzed: mātrāṇi karmāṇi puram ca tāsām vadanti ha ekādaśa vīra bhūmīḥ

original: BhP_05.11.010/1 gandhākṛti-sparśa-rasa-śravāṃsi visarga-raty-arty-abhijalpa-śilpāḥ
analyzed: gandha ākṛti sparśa rasa śravāṃsi visarga rati arti abhijalpa śilpāḥ

original: BhP_05.11.010/2 ekādaśaṃ svīkaraṇaṃ mameti śayyām ahaṃ dvādaśam eka āhuḥ
analyzed: ekādaśam svīkaraṇam mama iti śayyām aham dvādaśam eke āhuḥ

original: BhP_05.11.011/1 dravya-svabhāvāśaya-karma-kālair ekādaśāmī manaso vikārāḥ
analyzed: dravya svabhāva āśaya karma kālaiḥ ekādaśā amī manasaḥ vikārāḥ

original: BhP_05.11.011/2 sahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaś ca kṣetrajñato na mitho na svataḥ syuḥ
analyzed: sahasraśas śataśas koṭiśas ca kṣetrajñataḥ na mithas na svatas syuḥ

original: BhP_05.11.012/1 kṣetrajña etā manaso vibhūtīr jīvasya māyā-racitasya nityāḥ
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ etāḥ manasaḥ vibhūtīḥ jīvasya māyā racitasya nityāḥ

original: BhP_05.11.012/2 āvirhitāḥ kvāpi tirohitāś ca śuddho vicaṣṭe hy aviśuddha-kartuḥ
analyzed: āvis hitāḥ kvāpi tirohitāḥ ca śuddhaḥ vicaṣṭe hi a viśuddha kartuḥ

original: BhP_05.11.013/1 kṣetrajña ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ sākṣāt svayaṃ jyotir ajaḥ pareśaḥ
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ sākṣāt svayam jyotiḥ ajaḥ para īśaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.013/2 nārāyaṇo bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sva-māyayātmany avadhīyamānaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sva māyayā ātmani avadhīyamānaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.014/1 yathānilaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamānām ātma-svarūpeṇa niviṣṭa īśet
analyzed: yathā anilaḥ sthāvara jaṅgamānām ātma sva rūpeṇa niviṣṭaḥ īśet

original: BhP_05.11.014/2 evaṃ paro bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kṣetrajña ātmedam anupraviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: evam paraḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ ātmā idam anupraviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.015/1 na yāvad etāṃ tanu-bhṛn narendra vidhūya māyāṃ vayunodayena
analyzed: na yāvat etām tanubhṛt narendra vidhūya māyām vayunā udayena

original: BhP_05.11.015/2 vimukta-saṅgo jita-ṣaṭ-sapatno vedātma-tattvaṃ bhramatīha tāvat
analyzed: vimukta saṅgaḥ jita ṣaṣ sapatnaḥ veda ātma tattvam bhramati iha tāvat

original: BhP_05.11.016/1 na yāvad etan mana ātma-liṅgaṃ saṃsāra-tāpāvapanaṃ janasya
analyzed: na yāvat etat manaḥ ātma liṅgam saṃsāra tāpa āvapanam janasya

original: BhP_05.11.016/2 yac choka-mohāmaya-rāga-lobha- vairānubandhaṃ mamatāṃ vidhatte
analyzed: yat śoka moha āmaya rāga lobha vaira anubandham mamatām vidhatte

original: BhP_05.11.017/1 bhrātṛvyam enaṃ tad adabhra-vīryam upekṣayādhyedhitam apramattaḥ
analyzed: bhrātṛvyam enam tat adabhra vīryam upekṣayā adhyedhitam apramattaḥ

original: BhP_05.11.017/2 guror hareś caraṇopāsanāstro jahi vyalīkaṃ svayam ātma-moṣam
analyzed: guroḥ hareḥ caraṇa upāsana astraḥ jahi vyalīkam svayam ātma moṣam

original: BhP_05.12.001/0 rahūgaṇa uvāca
analyzed: rahūgaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.12.001/1 namo namaḥ kāraṇa-vigrahāya svarūpa-tucchīkṛta-vigrahāya
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ kāraṇa vigrahāya sva rūpa tucchīkṛta vigrahāya

original: BhP_05.12.001/2 namo 'vadhūta dvija-bandhu-liṅga- nigūḍha-nityānubhavāya tubhyam
analyzed: namaḥ vadhūta dvija bandhu liṅga nigūḍha nitya anubhavāya tubhyam

original: BhP_05.12.002/1 jvarāmayārtasya yathāgadaṃ sat nidāgha-dagdhasya yathā himāmbhaḥ
analyzed: jvara āmaya ārtasya yathā agadam sat nidāgha dagdhasya yathā hima ambhaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.002/2 kudeha-mānāhi-vidaṣṭa-dṛṣṭeḥ brahman vacas te 'mṛtam auṣadhaṃ me
analyzed: ku deha māna ahi vidaṣṭa dṛṣṭeḥ brahman vacaḥ te mṛtam auṣadham me

original: BhP_05.12.003/1 tasmād bhavantaṃ mama saṃśayārthaṃ prakṣyāmi paścād adhunā subodham
analyzed: tasmāt bhavantam mama saṃśaya artham prakṣyāmi paścāt adhunā su bodham

original: BhP_05.12.003/2 adhyātma-yoga-grathitaṃ tavoktam ākhyāhi kautūhala-cetaso me
analyzed: adhyātma yoga grathitam tava uktam ākhyāhi kautūhala cetasaḥ me

original: BhP_05.12.004/1 yad āha yogeśvara dṛśyamānaṃ kriyā-phalaṃ sad-vyavahāra-mūlam
analyzed: yat āha yogeśvara dṛśyamānam kriyā phalam sat vyavahāra mūlam

original: BhP_05.12.004/2 na hy añjasā tattva-vimarśanāya bhavān amuṣmin bhramate mano me
analyzed: na hi añjasā tattva vimarśanāya bhavān amuṣmin bhramate manaḥ me

original: BhP_05.12.005/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.12.005/1 ayaṃ jano nāma calan pṛthivyāṃ yaḥ pārthivaḥ pārthiva kasya hetoḥ
analyzed: ayam janaḥ nāma calan pṛthivyām yaḥ pārthivaḥ pārthiva kasya hetoḥ

original: BhP_05.12.005/2 tasyāpi cāṅghryor adhi gulpha-jaṅghā- jānūru-madhyora-śirodharāṃsāḥ
analyzed: tasya api ca aṅghryoḥ adhi gulpha jaṅghāḥ jānu ūru madhya ura śirodharā aṃsāḥ

original: BhP_05.12.006/1 aṃse 'dhi dārvī śibikā ca yasyāṃ sauvīra-rājety apadeśa āste
analyzed: aṃse dhi dārvī śibikā ca yasyām sauvīra rājā iti apadeśaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.12.006/2 yasmin bhavān rūḍha-nijābhimāno rājāsmi sindhuṣv iti durmadāndhaḥ
analyzed: yasmin bhavān rūḍha nija abhimānaḥ rājā asmi sindhuṣu iti durmada andhaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.007/1 śocyān imāṃs tvam adhikaṣṭa-dīnān viṣṭyā nigṛhṇan niranugraho 'si
analyzed: śocyān imān tvam adhi kaṣṭa dīnān viṣṭyā nigṛhṇan si

original: BhP_05.12.007/2 janasya goptāsmi vikatthamāno na śobhase vṛddha-sabhāsu dhṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: janasya goptā asmi vikatthamānaḥ na śobhase vṛddha sabhāsu dhṛṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.008/1 yadā kṣitāv eva carācarasya vidāma niṣṭhāṃ prabhavaṃ ca nityam
analyzed: yadā kṣitau eva carācarasya vidāma niṣṭhām prabhavam ca nityam

original: BhP_05.12.008/2 tan nāmato 'nyad vyavahāra-mūlaṃ nirūpyatāṃ sat-kriyayānumeyam
analyzed: tat nāmataḥ vyavahāra mūlam nirūpyatām satkriyayā anumeyam

original: BhP_05.12.009/1 evaṃ niruktaṃ kṣiti-śabda-vṛttam asan nidhānāt paramāṇavo ye
analyzed: evam niruktam kṣiti śabda vṛttam asat nidhānāt paramāṇavaḥ ye

original: BhP_05.12.009/2 avidyayā manasā kalpitās te yeṣāṃ samūhena kṛto viśeṣaḥ
analyzed: avidyayā manasā kalpitāḥ te yeṣām samūhena kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.010/1 evaṃ kṛśaṃ sthūlam aṇur bṛhad yad asac ca saj jīvam ajīvam anyat
analyzed: evam kṛśam sthūlam aṇuḥ bṛhat yat asat ca sat jīvam ajīvam anyat

original: BhP_05.12.010/2 dravya-svabhāvāśaya-kāla-karma- nāmnājayāvehi kṛtaṃ dvitīyam
analyzed: dravya svabhāva āśaya kāla karma kṛtam dvitīyam

original: BhP_05.12.011/1 jñānaṃ viśuddhaṃ paramārtham ekam anantaraṃ tv abahir brahma satyam
analyzed: jñānam viśuddham parama artham ekam anantaram tu abahir brahma satyam

original: BhP_05.12.011/2 pratyak praśāntaṃ bhagavac-chabda-saṃjñaṃ yad vāsudevaṃ kavayo vadanti
analyzed: pratyak praśāntam bhagavat śabda saṃjñam yat vāsudevam kavayaḥ vadanti

original: BhP_05.12.012/1 rahūgaṇaitat tapasā na yāti na cejyayā nirvapaṇād gṛhād vā
analyzed: rahūgaṇa etat tapasā na yāti na ca ijyayā nirvapaṇāt gṛhāt vā

original: BhP_05.12.012/2 na cchandasā naiva jalāgni-sūryair vinā mahat-pāda-rajo-'bhiṣekam
analyzed: na chandasā nā eva jala agni sūryaiḥ vinā mahat pāda rajaḥ abhiṣekam

original: BhP_05.12.013/1 yatrottamaśloka-guṇānuvādaḥ prastūyate grāmya-kathā-vighātaḥ
BhP_05.12.013/2 niṣevyamāṇo 'nudinaṃ mumukṣor matiṃ satīṃ yacchati vāsudeve
analyzed: niṣevyamāṇaḥ nu dinam mumukṣoḥ matim satīm yacchati vāsudeve

original: BhP_05.12.014/1 ahaṃ purā bharato nāma rājā vimukta-dṛṣṭa-śruta-saṅga-bandhaḥ
analyzed: aham purā bharataḥ nāma rājā vimukta dṛṣṭa śruta saṅga bandhaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.014/2 ārādhanaṃ bhagavata īhamāno mṛgo 'bhavaṃ mṛga-saṅgād dhatārthaḥ
analyzed: ārādhanam bhagavataḥ īhamānaḥ mṛgaḥ bhavam mṛga saṅgāt hata arthaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.015/1 sā māṃ smṛtir mṛga-dehe 'pi vīra kṛṣṇārcana-prabhavā no jahāti
analyzed: sā mām smṛtiḥ mṛga dehe vīra kṛṣṇa arcana prabhavā no jahāti

original: BhP_05.12.015/2 atho ahaṃ jana-saṅgād asaṅgo viśaṅkamāno 'vivṛtaś carāmi
analyzed: atha u aham jana saṅgāt a saṅgaḥ viśaṅkamānaḥ vivṛtaḥ carāmi

original: BhP_05.12.016/1 tasmān naro 'saṅga-susaṅga-jāta- jñānāsinehaiva vivṛkṇa-mohaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt saṅga su saṅga jāta jñāna asinā iha eva vivṛkṇa mohaḥ

original: BhP_05.12.016/2 hariṃ tad-īhā-kathana-śrutābhyāṃ labdha-smṛtir yāty atipāram adhvanaḥ
analyzed: harim tad īhā kathana śrutābhyām labdha smṛtiḥ yāti atipāram adhvanaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.001/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.13.001/1 duratyaye 'dhvany ajayā niveśito rajas-tamaḥ-sattva-vibhakta-karmadṛk
analyzed: duratyaye dhvani ajayā niveśitaḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ sattva vibhakta karma dṛś

original: BhP_05.13.001/2 sa eṣa sārtho 'rtha-paraḥ paribhraman bhavāṭavīṃ yāti na śarma vindati
analyzed: saḥ eṣa sārthaḥ rtha paraḥ paribhraman bhava aṭavīm yāti na śarma vindati

original: BhP_05.13.002/1 yasyām ime ṣaṇ nara-deva dasyavaḥ sārthaṃ vilumpanti kunāyakaṃ balāt
analyzed: yasyām ime ṣaṭ naradeva dasyavaḥ sārtham vilumpanti ku nāyakam balāt

original: BhP_05.13.002/2 gomāyavo yatra haranti sārthikaṃ pramattam āviśya yathoraṇaṃ vṛkāḥ
analyzed: gomāyavaḥ yatra haranti sārthikam pramattam āviśya yathā uraṇam vṛkāḥ

original: BhP_05.13.003/1 prabhūta-vīrut-tṛṇa-gulma-gahvare kaṭhora-daṃśair maśakair upadrutaḥ
analyzed: prabhūta vīrudh tṛṇa gulma gahvare kaṭhora daṃśaiḥ maśakaiḥ upadrutaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.003/2 kvacit tu gandharva-puraṃ prapaśyati kvacit kvacic cāśu-rayolmuka-graham
analyzed: kvacid tu gandharva puram prapaśyati kvacid kvacid ca āśurayā ulmuka graham

original: BhP_05.13.004/1 nivāsa-toya-draviṇātma-buddhis tatas tato dhāvati bho aṭavyām
analyzed: nivāsa toya draviṇa ātma buddhiḥ tatas tatas dhāvati bho aṭavyām

original: BhP_05.13.004/2 kvacic ca vātyotthita-pāṃsu-dhūmrā diśo na jānāti rajas-valākṣaḥ
analyzed: kvacid ca vātyā utthita pāṃsu dhūmrāḥ diśaḥ na jānāti rajasvalā akṣaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.005/1 adṛśya-jhillī-svana-karṇa-śūla ulūka-vāgbhir vyathitāntarātmā
analyzed: adṛśya jhillī svana karṇa śūlaḥ ulūka vāgbhiḥ vyathita antarātmā

original: BhP_05.13.005/2 apuṇya-vṛkṣān śrayate kṣudhārdito marīci-toyāny abhidhāvati kvacit
analyzed: apuṇya vṛkṣān śrayate kṣudhā arditaḥ marīci toyāni abhidhāvati kvacid

original: BhP_05.13.006/1 kvacid vitoyāḥ sarito 'bhiyāti parasparaṃ cālaṣate nirandhaḥ
analyzed: kvacid vitoyāḥ saritaḥ bhiyāti parasparam ca ālaṣate nirandhaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.006/2 āsādya dāvaṃ kvacid agni-tapto nirvidyate kva ca yakṣair hṛtāsuḥ
analyzed: āsādya dāvam kvacid agni taptaḥ nirvidyate kva ca yakṣaiḥ hṛta asuḥ

original: BhP_05.13.007/1 śūrair hṛta-svaḥ kva ca nirviṇṇa-cetāḥ śocan vimuhyann upayāti kaśmalam
analyzed: śūraiḥ hṛta svaḥ kva ca nirviṇṇa cetāḥ śocan vimuhyan upayāti kaśmalam

original: BhP_05.13.007/2 kvacic ca gandharva-puraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pramodate nirvṛtavan muhūrtam
analyzed: kvacid ca gandharva puram praviṣṭaḥ pramodate nirvṛta vat muhūrtam

original: BhP_05.13.008/1 calan kvacit kaṇṭaka-śarkarāṅghrir nagārurukṣur vimanā ivāste
analyzed: calan kvacid kaṇṭaka śarkarā aṅghriḥ naga ārurukṣuḥ vimanāḥ iva āste

original: BhP_05.13.008/2 pade pade 'bhyantara-vahninārditaḥ kauṭumbikaḥ krudhyati vai janāya
analyzed: pade pade bhyantara vahninā arditaḥ kauṭumbikaḥ krudhyati vai janāya

original: BhP_05.13.009/1 kvacin nigīrṇo 'jagarāhinā jano nāvaiti kiñcid vipine 'paviddhaḥ
analyzed: kvacid nigīrṇaḥ jagara ahinā janaḥ na avaiti kiñcid vipine

original: BhP_05.13.009/2 daṣṭaḥ sma śete kva ca danda-śūkair andho 'ndha-kūpe patitas tamisre
analyzed: daṣṭaḥ sma śete kva ca dandaśūkaiḥ andhaḥ ndhakūpe patitaḥ tamisre

original: BhP_05.13.010/1 karhi sma cit kṣudra-rasān vicinvaṃs tan-makṣikābhir vyathito vimānaḥ
analyzed: karhi sma cit kṣudra rasān vicinvan tad makṣikābhiḥ vyathitaḥ vimānaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.010/2 tatrāti-kṛcchrāt pratilabdhamāno balād vilumpanty atha taṃ tato 'nye
analyzed: tatra atikṛcchrāt pratilabdha mānaḥ balāt vilumpanti atha tam tatas nye

original: BhP_05.13.011/1 kvacic ca śītātapa-vāta-varṣa- pratikriyāṃ kartum anīśa āste
analyzed: kvacid ca śīta ātapa vāta varṣa pratikriyām kartum anīśaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.13.011/2 kvacin mitho vipaṇan yac ca kiñcid vidveṣam ṛcchaty uta vitta-śāṭhyāt
analyzed: kvacid mithas vipaṇan yat ca kiñcid vidveṣam ṛcchati uta vitta śāṭhyāt

original: BhP_05.13.012/1 kvacit kvacit kṣīṇa-dhanas tu tasmin śayyāsana-sthāna-vihāra-hīnaḥ
analyzed: kvacid kvacid kṣīṇa dhanaḥ tu tasmin śayyā āsana sthāna vihāra hīnaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.012/2 yācan parād apratilabdha-kāmaḥ pārakya-dṛṣṭir labhate 'vamānam
analyzed: yācan parāt a pratilabdha kāmaḥ pārakya dṛṣṭiḥ labhate vamānam

original: BhP_05.13.013/1 anyonya-vitta-vyatiṣaṅga-vṛddha- vairānubandho vivahan mithaś ca
analyzed: anyonya vitta vyatiṣaṅga vṛddha vaira anubandhaḥ vivahan mithas ca

original: BhP_05.13.013/2 adhvany amuṣminn uru-kṛcchra-vitta- bādhopasargair viharan vipannaḥ
analyzed: adhvani amuṣmin uru kṛcchra vitta bādhā upasargaiḥ viharan vipannaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.014/1 tāṃs tān vipannān sa hi tatra tatra vihāya jātaṃ parigṛhya sārthaḥ
analyzed: tān tān vipannān sa hi tatra tatra vihāya jātam parigṛhya sārthaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.014/2 āvartate 'dyāpi na kaścid atra vīrādhvanaḥ pāram upaiti yogam
analyzed: āvartate dyā api na kaścid atra vīrādhvanaḥ pāram upaiti yogam

original: BhP_05.13.015/1 manasvino nirjita-dig-gajendrā mameti sarve bhuvi baddha-vairāḥ
analyzed: manasvinaḥ nirjita diggaja indrāḥ mama iti sarve bhuvi baddhavairāḥ

original: BhP_05.13.015/2 mṛdhe śayīran na tu tad vrajanti yan nyasta-daṇḍo gata-vairo 'bhiyāti
analyzed: mṛdhe śayīran na tu tat vrajanti yat nyasta daṇḍaḥ gata vairaḥ bhiyāti

original: BhP_05.13.016/1 prasajjati kvāpi latā-bhujāśrayas tad-āśrayāvyakta-pada-dvija-spṛhaḥ
analyzed: prasajjati kvāpi latā bhuja āśrayaḥ tad āśraya avyakta pada dvija spṛhaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.016/2 kvacit kadācid dhari-cakratas trasan sakhyaṃ vidhatte baka-kaṅka-gṛdhraiḥ
analyzed: kvacid kadācid hari cakrataḥ trasan sakhyam vidhatte baka kaṅka gṛdhraiḥ

original: BhP_05.13.017/1 tair vañcito haṃsa-kulaṃ samāviśann arocayan śīlam upaiti vānarān
analyzed: taiḥ vañcitaḥ haṃsa kulam samāviśan a rocayan śīlam upaiti vānarān

original: BhP_05.13.017/2 taj-jāti-rāsena sunirvṛtendriyaḥ parasparodvīkṣaṇa-vismṛtāvadhiḥ
analyzed: tad jāti rāsena su nirvṛta indriyaḥ paraspara udvīkṣaṇa vismṛta avadhiḥ

original: BhP_05.13.018/1 drumeṣu raṃsyan suta-dāra-vatsalo vyavāya-dīno vivaśaḥ sva-bandhane
analyzed: drumeṣu raṃsyan suta dāra vatsalaḥ vyavāya dīnaḥ vivaśaḥ sva bandhane

original: BhP_05.13.018/2 kvacit pramādād giri-kandare patan vallīṃ gṛhītvā gaja-bhīta āsthitaḥ
analyzed: kvacid pramādāt giri kandare patan vallīm gṛhītvā gaja bhītaḥ āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.019/1 ataḥ kathañcit sa vimukta āpadaḥ punaś ca sārthaṃ praviśaty arindama
analyzed: atas kathañcid sa vimuktaḥ āpadaḥ punar ca sārtham praviśati arindama

original: BhP_05.13.019/2 adhvany amuṣminn ajayā niveśito bhramañ jano 'dyāpi na veda kaścana
analyzed: adhvani amuṣmin ajayā niveśitaḥ bhramam janaḥ dyā api na veda kaścana

original: BhP_05.13.020/1 rahūgaṇa tvam api hy adhvano 'sya sannyasta-daṇḍaḥ kṛta-bhūta-maitraḥ
analyzed: rahūgaṇa tvam api hi adhvanaḥ sya san nyasta daṇḍaḥ kṛta bhūta maitraḥ

original: BhP_05.13.020/2 asaj-jitātmā hari-sevayā śitaṃ jñānāsim ādāya tarāti-pāram
analyzed: asat jita ātmā hari sevayā śitam jñāna asim ādāya tara ati pāram

original: BhP_05.13.021/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.13.021/1 aho nṛ-janmākhila-janma-śobhanaṃ kiṃ janmabhis tv aparair apy amuṣmin
analyzed: aho nṛ janma akhila janma śobhanam kim janmabhiḥ tu aparaiḥ api amuṣmin

original: BhP_05.13.021/2 na yad dhṛṣīkeśa-yaśaḥ-kṛtātmanāṃ mahātmanāṃ vaḥ pracuraḥ samāgamaḥ
analyzed: na yat hṛṣīkeśa yaśaḥ kṛtātmanām mahātmanām vaḥ pracuraḥ samāgamaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.022/1 na hy adbhutaṃ tvac-caraṇābja-reṇubhir hatāṃhaso bhaktir adhokṣaje 'malā
analyzed: na hi adbhutam tvad caraṇa abja reṇubhiḥ hata aṃhasaḥ bhaktiḥ adhokṣaje malā

original: BhP_05.13.022/2 mauhūrtikād yasya samāgamāc ca me dustarka-mūlo 'pahato 'vivekaḥ
analyzed: mauhūrtikāt yasya samāgamāt ca me dustarka mūlaḥ upahataḥ vivekaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.023/1 namo mahadbhyo 'stu namaḥ śiśubhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āvaṭubhyaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ mahadbhyaḥ stu namaḥ śiśubhyaḥ namaḥ yuvabhyaḥ namaḥ āvaṭubhyaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.023/2 ye brāhmaṇā gām avadhūta-liṅgāś caranti tebhyaḥ śivam astu rājñām
analyzed: ye brāhmaṇāḥ gām avadhūta liṅgāḥ caranti tebhyaḥ śivam astu rājñām

original: BhP_05.13.024/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.13.024 /1 ity evam uttarā-mātaḥ sa vai brahmarṣi-sutaḥ sindhu-pataya ātma-satattvaṃ
analyzed: iti evam sa vai brahmarṣi sutaḥ sindhupataye ātma sa tattvam

original: vigaṇayataḥ parānubhāvaḥ parama-kāruṇikatayopadiśya rahūgaṇena sakaruṇam abhivandita-caraṇa
analyzed: vigaṇayataḥ para anubhāvaḥ parama kāruṇika tayā upadiśya rahū gaṇena sa karuṇam abhivandita caraṇa

original: āpūrṇārṇava iva nibhṛta-karaṇormy-āśayo dharaṇim imāṃ vicacāra
analyzed: āpūrṇa arṇavaḥ iva nibhṛta karaṇa ūrmi āśayaḥ dharaṇim imām vicacāra

original: BhP_05.13.025/1 sauvīra-patir api sujana-samavagata-paramātma-satattva ātmany avidyādhyāropitāṃ ca dehātma-matiṃ visasarja evaṃ hi nṛpa bhagavad-āśritāśritānubhāvaḥ
analyzed: sauvīra patiḥ api su jana samavagata paramātma sa tattvaḥ ātmani avidyā adhyāropitām ca deha ātma matim visasarja evam hi nṛpa bhagavat āśrita āśrita anubhāvaḥ

original: BhP_05.13.026/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.13.026 /1 yo ha vā iha bahu-vidā mahā-bhāgavata tvayābhihitaḥ parokṣeṇa vacasā
analyzed: yaḥ ha vā iha bahu vidā mahā bhāgavata tvayā abhihitaḥ parokṣeṇa vacasā

original: jīva-loka-bhavādhvā sa hy ārya-manīṣayā kalpita-viṣayonāñjasāvyutpanna-loka-samadhigamaḥ
analyzed: jīvaloka bhava adhvā sa hi ārya manīṣayā kalpita viṣayaḥ na añjasā avyutpanna loka samadhigamaḥ

original: atha tad evaitad duravagamaṃ samavetānukalpena nirdiśyatām iti
analyzed: atha tat eva etat duravagamam samaveta anukalpena nirdiśyatām iti

original: BhP_05.14.001/0 sa hovāca
analyzed: sa ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.14.001 /1 sa eṣa dehātma-mānināṃ sattvādi-guṇa-viśeṣa-vikalpita-kuśalāku-śala-samavahāra-vinirmita-vividha-dehāvalibhir
analyzed: saḥ eṣa deha ātma māninām sattva ādi guṇa viśeṣa vikalpita kuśala akuśala samavahāra vinirmita vividha deha āvalibhiḥ

original: viyoga-saṃyogādy-anādi-saṃsārānubhavasya dvāra-bhūtena ṣaḍ-indriya-vargeṇa tasmin
analyzed: viyoga saṃyoga ādi anādi saṃsāra anubhavasya dvāra bhūtena ṣaṣ indriya vargeṇa tasmin

original: durgādhvavad asugame 'dhvany āpatita īśvarasya bhagavato viṣṇor vaśa-vartinyā māyayā
analyzed: durga adhva vat asugame dhvani āpatite īśvarasya bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ vaśa vartinyā māyayā

original: jīva-loko 'yaṃ yathā vaṇik-sārtho 'rtha-paraḥ sva-deha-niṣpādita-karmānubhavaḥ śmaśānavad
analyzed: jīva lokaḥ yam yathā vaṇij sārthaḥ rtha paraḥ sva deha niṣpādita karma anubhavaḥ śmaśāna vat

original: aśivatamāyāṃ saṃsārāṭavyāṃ gato nādyāpi viphala-bahu-pratiyogehas tat-tāpopaśamanīṃ
analyzed: aśivatamāyām saṃsāra aṭavyām gataḥ na adya api viphala bahu pratiyoga īhaḥ tad tāpa upaśamanīm

original: hari-guru-caraṇāravinda-madhukarānupadavīm avarundhe
analyzed: hari guru caraṇa aravinda madhukara anu padavīm avarundhe

original: BhP_05.14.002 /1 yasyām u ha vā ete ṣaḍ-indriya-nāmānaḥ karmaṇā dasyava eva te tad
analyzed: yasyām u ha vai ete ṣaṣ indriya nāmānaḥ karmaṇā dasyavaḥ eva te tat

original: yathā puruṣasya dhanaṃ yat kiñcid dharmaupayikaṃ bahu-kṛcchrādhigataṃ sākṣāt parama-puruṣārādhana-lakṣaṇo
analyzed: yathā puruṣasya dhanam yat kiñcid dharma aupayikam bahu kṛcchra adhigatam sākṣāt paramapuruṣa ārādhana lakṣaṇaḥ

original: yo 'sau dharmas taṃ tu sāmparāya udāharanti tad-dharmyaṃ dhanaṃ darśana-sparśana-śravaṇāsvādanāvaghrāṇa-saṅkalpa-vyavasāya-gṛha-grāmyopabhogena
analyzed: yaḥ sau dharmaḥ tam tu sāmparāye udāharanti tat dharmyam dhanam darśana sparśana śravaṇa āsvādana avaghrāṇa saṅkalpa vyavasāya gṛha grāmya upabhogena

original: kunāthasyājitātmano yathā sārthasya vilum-panti
analyzed: ku nāthasya ajita ātmanaḥ yathā sārthasya vilumpanti

original: BhP_05.14.003/1 atha ca yatra kauṭumbikā dārāpatyādayo nāmnā karmaṇā vṛka-sṛgālā evānicchato 'pi kadaryasya kuṭumbina uraṇakavat saṃrakṣyamāṇaṃ  #
analyzed: atha ca yatra kauṭumbikāḥ dāra apatya ādayaḥ nāmnā karmaṇā vṛka sṛgālāḥ kadaryasya kuṭumbinaḥ uraṇaka vat saṃrakṣyamāṇam

original: miṣato 'pi haranti
analyzed: miṣataḥ pi haranti

original: BhP_05.14.004 /1 yathā hy anuvatsaraṃ kṛṣyamāṇam apy adagdha-bījaṃ kṣetraṃ punar
analyzed: yathā hi anuvatsaram kṛṣyamāṇam api adagdha bījam kṣetram punar

original: evāvapana-kāle gulma-tṛṇa-vīrudbhir gahvaram iva bhavaty evam eva gṛhāśramaḥ karma-kṣetraṃ
analyzed: eva āvapana kāle gulma tṛṇa vīrudbhiḥ gahvaram iva bhavati evam eva gṛhāśramaḥ karma kṣetram

original: yasmin na hi karmāṇy utsīdanti yad ayaṃ kāma-karaṇḍa eṣa āvasathaḥ
analyzed: yasmin na hi karmāṇi utsīdanti yat ayam kāma karaṇḍaḥ eṣaḥ āvasathaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.005 /1 tatra gato daṃśa-maśaka-samāpasadair manujaiḥ śalabha-śakunta-taskara-mūṣakādibhir
analyzed: tatra gataḥ daṃśa maśaka sama apasadaiḥ manujaiḥ śalabha śakunta taskara mūṣaka ādibhiḥ

original: uparudhyamāna-bahiḥ-prāṇaḥ kvacit parivartamāno 'sminn adhvany avidyā-kāma-karmabhir
analyzed: uparudhyamāna bahis prāṇaḥ kvacid parivartamānaḥ smin adhvani avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ

original: uparakta-manasānupapannārthaṃ nara-lokaṃ gandharva-nagaram upapannam iti mithyā-dṛṣṭir anupaśyati
analyzed: uparakta manasā anupapanna artham nara lokam gandharvanagaram upapannam iti mithyā dṛṣṭiḥ anupaśyati

original: BhP_05.14.006/1 tatra ca kvacid ātapodaka-nibhān viṣayān upadhāvati pāna-bhojana-vyavāyādi-vyasana-lolupaḥ
analyzed: tatra ca kvacid ātapa udaka nibhān viṣayān upadhāvati pāna bhojana vyavāya ādi vyasana lolupaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.007/1 kvacic cāśeṣa-doṣa-niṣadanaṃ purīṣa-viśeṣaṃ tad-varṇa-guṇa-nirmita-matiḥ suvarṇam upāditsaty agni-kāma-kātara ivolmuka-piśācam
analyzed: kvacid ca aśeṣa doṣa niṣadanam purīṣa viśeṣam tad varṇa guṇa nirmita matiḥ suvarṇam upāditsati agni kāma kātaraḥ iva ulmuka piśācam

original: BhP_05.14.008/1 atha kadācin nivāsa-pānīya-draviṇādy-anekātmopajīvanābhiniveśa etasyāṃ saṃsārāṭavyām itas tataḥ paridhāvati
analyzed: atha kadācid nivāsa pānīya draviṇa ādi aneka ātma upajīvana abhiniveśaḥ etasyām saṃsāra aṭavyām itas tatas paridhāvati

original: BhP_05.14.009/1 kvacic ca vātyaupamyayā pramadayāroham āropitas tat-kāla-rajasā rajanī-bhūta ivāsādhu-maryādo rajas-valākṣo 'pi dig-devatā  #
analyzed: kvacid ca vā ati aupamyayā pramadayā āroham āropitaḥ tad kāla rajasā rajanībhūtaḥ iva asādhu maryādaḥ digdevatā

original: atirajas-vala-matir na vijānāti
analyzed: ati rajasvala matiḥ na vijānāti

original: BhP_05.14.010/1 kvacit sakṛd avagata-viṣaya-vaitathyaḥ svayaṃ parābhidhyānena vibhraṃśita-smṛtis tayaiva marīci-toya-prāyāṃs tān evābhidhāvati
analyzed: kvacid sakṛt avagata viṣaya vaitathyaḥ svayam para abhidhyānena vibhraṃśita smṛtiḥ tayā eva marīci toya prāyān tān eva abhidhāvati

original: BhP_05.14.011/1 kvacid ulūka-jhillī-svanavad ati-paruṣa-rabhasāṭopaṃ pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā ripu-rāja-kula-nirbhartsitenāti-vyathita-karṇa-mūla-hṛdayaḥ
analyzed: kvacid ulūka jhillī svana vat ati paruṣa rabhasa āṭopam pratyakṣam parokṣam vā ripu rāja kula nirbhartsitena ati vyathita karṇa mūla hṛdayaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.012/1 sa yadā dugdha-pūrva-sukṛtas tadā kāraskara-kākatuṇḍādy-apuṇya-druma-latā-viṣoda-pānavad ubhayārtha-śūnya-draviṇān jīvan-mṛtān  #
analyzed: sa yadā dugdha pūrva sukṛtaḥ tadā kāraskara kākatuṇḍa ādya puṇya druma latā viṣa udapāna vat ubhaya artha śūnya draviṇān jīvanmṛtān

original: svayaṃ jīvan-mriyamāṇa upadhāvati
analyzed: svayam jīvan mriyamāṇaḥ upadhāvati

original: BhP_05.14.013/1 ekadāsat-prasaṅgān nikṛta-matir vyudaka-srotaḥ-skhalanavad ubhayato 'pi duḥkhadaṃ pākhaṇḍam abhiyāti
analyzed: ekadā asat prasaṅgāt nikṛta matiḥ vyudaka srotaḥ skhalana vat ubhayatas duḥkha dam pākhaṇḍam abhiyāti

original: BhP_05.14.014/1 yadā tu para-bādhayāndha ātmane nopanamati tadā hi pitṛ-putra-barhiṣmataḥ pitṛ-putrān vā sa khalu bhakṣayati
analyzed: yadā tu para bādhayā andhaḥ ātmane na upanamati tadā hi pitṛ putra barhiṣmataḥ pitṛ putrān vā sa khalu bhakṣayati

original: BhP_05.14.015/1 kvacid āsādya gṛhaṃ dāvavat priyārtha-vidhuram asukhodarkaṃ śokāgninā dahyamāno bhṛśaṃ nirvedam upagacchati
analyzed: kvacid āsādya gṛham dāva vat priya artha vidhuram asukha udarkam śoka agninā dahyamānaḥ bhṛśam nirvedam upagacchati

original: BhP_05.14.016/1 kvacit kāla-viṣa-mita-rāja-kula-rakṣasāpahṛta-priyatama-dhanāsuḥ pramṛtaka iva vigata-jīva-lakṣaṇa āste
analyzed: kvacid kāla viṣamita rāja kula rakṣasā apahṛta priyatama dhana asuḥ pramṛtakaḥ iva vigata jīva lakṣaṇaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.14.017/1 kadācin manorathopagata-pitṛ-pitāmahādy asat sad iti svapna-nirvṛti-lakṣaṇam anubhavati
analyzed: kadācid manoratha upagata pitṛ pitāmaha ādi asat sat iti svapna nirvṛti lakṣaṇam anubhavati

original: BhP_05.14.018/1 kvacid gṛhāśrama-karma-codanāti-bhara-girim ārurukṣamāṇo loka-vyasana-karṣita-manāḥ kaṇṭaka-śarkarā-kṣetraṃ praviśann iva sīdati
analyzed: kvacid gṛha āśrama karma codana ati bhara girim ārurukṣamāṇaḥ loka vyasana karṣita manāḥ kaṇṭaka śarkarā kṣetram praviśan iva sīdati

original: BhP_05.14.019/1 kvacic ca duḥsahena kāyābhyantara-vahninā gṛhīta-sāraḥ sva-kuṭumbāya krudhyati
analyzed: kvacid ca duḥsahena kāya abhyantara vahninā gṛhīta sāraḥ sva kuṭumbāya krudhyati

original: BhP_05.14.020/1 sa eva punar nidrājagara-gṛhīto 'ndhe tamasi magnaḥ śūnyāraṇya iva śete nānyat-kiñcana veda śava ivāpaviddhaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva punar nidrā jagara gṛhītaḥ ndhe tamasi magnaḥ śūnya araṇye iva śete na anyat kiñcana veda śavaḥ iva apaviddhaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.021/1 kadācid bhagna-māna-daṃṣṭro durjana-danda-śūkair alabdha-nidrā-kṣaṇo vyathita-hṛdayenānukṣīyamāṇa-vijñāno 'ndha-kūpe 'ndhavat
analyzed: kadācid bhagna māna daṃṣṭraḥ durjana dandaśūkaiḥ alabdha nidrā kṣaṇaḥ vyathita hṛdayena anukṣīyamāṇa vijñānaḥ ndhakūpe

original: BhP_05.14.022/1 karhi sma cit kāma-madhu-lavān vicinvan yadā para-dāra-para-drav-yāṇy avarundhāno rājñā svāmibhir vā nihataḥ pataty apāre niraye
analyzed: karhi sma cit kāma madhu lavān vicinvan yadā para dāra para dravyāṇi avarundhānaḥ rājñā svāmibhiḥ vā nihataḥ patati apāre niraye

original: BhP_05.14.023/1 atha ca tasmād ubhayathāpi hi karmāsminn ātmanaḥ saṃsārāvapanam udāharanti
analyzed: atha ca tasmāt ubhayathā api hi karma asmin ātmanaḥ saṃsāra āvapanam udāharanti

original: BhP_05.14.024/1 muktas tato yadi bandhād devadatta upācchinatti tasmād api viṣṇumitra ity anavasthitiḥ
analyzed: muktaḥ tatas yadi bandhāt devadattaḥ upācchinatti tasmāt api viṣṇumitraḥ iti anavasthitiḥ

original: BhP_05.14.025/1 kvacic ca śīta-vātādy-anekādhidaivika-bhautikātmīyānāṃ daśānāṃ pratinivāraṇe 'kalpo duranta-cintayā viṣaṇṇa āste
analyzed: kvacid ca śīta vāta ādi aneka ādhidaivika bhautika ātmīyānām daśānām pratinivāraṇe kalpaḥ duranta cintayā viṣaṇṇaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.14.026/1 kvacin mitho vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam anyebhyo vā kākiṇikā-mātram apy apaharan yat kiñcid vā vidveṣam eti vitta-śāṭhyāt
analyzed: kvacid mithas vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam anyebhyaḥ vā kākiṇikā mātram api apaharan yat kiñcid vā vidveṣam eti vitta śāṭhyāt

original: BhP_05.14.027 /1 adhvany amuṣminn ima upasargās tathā sukha-duḥkha-rāga-dveṣa-bhayābhimāna-pramādonmāda-śoka-moha-lobha-mātsaryerṣyāva-māna-kṣut-pipāsādhi-vyādhi-janma-jarā-maraṇādayaḥ
analyzed: adhvani amuṣmin ime upasargāḥ tathā sukha duḥkha rāga dveṣa bhaya abhimāna pramāda unmāda śoka moha lobha mātsarya īrṣyā avamāna kṣudh pipāsā ādhi vyādhi janma jarā maraṇa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.028 /1 kvāpi deva-māyayā striyā bhuja-latopagūḍhaḥ praskanna-viveka-vijñāno
analyzed: kvāpi deva māyayā striyā bhuja latā upagūḍhaḥ praskanna viveka vijñānaḥ

original: yad-vihāra-gṛhārambhākula-hṛdayas tad-āśrayāvasakta-suta-duhitṛ-kalatra-bhāṣitāvaloka-viceṣṭitāpahṛta-hṛdaya
analyzed: yad vihāra gṛha ārambha ākula hṛdayaḥ tad āśraya avasakta suta duhitṛ kalatra bhāṣita avaloka viceṣṭita apahṛta hṛdaya

original: ātmānam ajitātmāpāre 'ndhe tamasi prahiṇoti
analyzed: ātmānam ajita ātma apāre ndhe tamasi prahiṇoti

original: BhP_05.14.029 /1 kadācid īśvarasya bhagavato viṣṇoś cakrāt paramāṇv-ādi-dvi-parārdhāpavarga-kālopalakṣaṇāt
analyzed: kadācid īśvarasya bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ cakrāt paramāṇu ādi dvi parārdha apavarga kāla upalakṣaṇāt

original: parivartitena vayasā raṃhasā harata ābrahma-tṛṇa-stambādīnāṃ bhūtānām animiṣato miṣatāṃ
analyzed: parivartitena vayasā raṃhasā harataḥ ā brahmatṛṇa stamba ādīnām bhūtānām a nimiṣataḥ miṣatām

original: vitrasta-hṛdayas tam eveśvaraṃ kāla-cakra-nijāyudhaṃ sākṣād bhagavantaṃ yajña-puruṣam
analyzed: vitrasta hṛdayaḥ tam eva īśvaram kālacakra nija āyudham sākṣāt bhagavantam yajñapuruṣam

original: anādṛtya pākhaṇḍa-devatāḥ kaṅka-gṛdhra-baka-vaṭa-prāyā ārya-samaya-parihṛtāḥ sāṅketyenābhidhatte
analyzed: an ādṛtya pākhaṇḍa devatāḥ kaṅka gṛdhra baka vaṭa prāyāḥ ārya samaya parihṛtāḥ sāṅketyena abhidhatte

original: BhP_05.14.030 /1 yadā pākhaṇḍibhir ātma-vañcitais tair uru vañcito brahma-kulaṃ samāvasaṃs
analyzed: yadā pākhaṇḍibhiḥ ātma vañcitaiḥ taiḥ uru vañcitaḥ brahma kulam samāvasan

original: teṣāṃ śīlam upanayanādi-śrauta-smārta-karmānuṣṭhā-nena bhagavato yajña-puruṣasyārādhanam
analyzed: teṣām śīlam upanayana ādi śrauta smārta karma anuṣṭhānena bhagavataḥ yajñapuruṣasya ārādhanam

original: eva tad arocayan śūdra-kulaṃ bhajate nigamācāre 'śuddhito yasya mithunī-bhāvaḥ kuṭumba-bharaṇaṃ yathā vānara-jāteḥ
analyzed: eva tat arocayan śūdra kulam bhajate nigama ācāre śuddhitaḥ yasya mithunībhāvaḥ kuṭumba bharaṇam yathā vānara jāteḥ

original: BhP_05.14.031/1 tatrāpi niravarodhaḥ svaireṇa viharann ati-kṛpaṇa-buddhir anyonya-mukha-nirīkṣaṇādinā grāmya-karmaṇaiva vismṛta-kālāvadhiḥ
analyzed: tatra api niravarodhaḥ svaireṇa viharan ati kṛpaṇa buddhiḥ anyonya mukha nirīkṣaṇa ādinā grāmya karmaṇā eva vismṛta kāla avadhiḥ

original: BhP_05.14.032/1 kvacid drumavad aihikārtheṣu gṛheṣu raṃsyan yathā vānaraḥ suta-dāra-vatsalo vyavāya-kṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: kvacid druma vat aihika artheṣu gṛheṣu raṃsyan yathā vānaraḥ suta dāra vatsalaḥ vyavāya kṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.033/1 evam adhvany avarundhāno mṛtyu-gaja-bhayāt tamasi giri-kandara-prāye
analyzed: evam adhvani avarundhānaḥ mṛtyu gaja bhayāt tamasi giri kandara prāye

original: BhP_05.14.034/1 kvacic chīta-vātādy-aneka-daivika-bhautikātmīyānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ pratinivāraṇe 'kalpo duranta-viṣaya-viṣaṇṇa āste
analyzed: kvacid śīta vāta ādi aneka daivika bhautika ātmīyānām duḥkhānām pratinivāraṇe kalpaḥ duranta viṣaya viṣaṇṇaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.14.035/1 kvacin mitho vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam upayāti vitta-śāṭhyena
analyzed: kvacid mithas vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam upayāti vitta śāṭhyena

original: BhP_05.14.036/1 kvacit kṣīṇa-dhanaḥ śayyāsanāśanādy-upabhoga-vihīno yāvad apratilabdha-manorathopagatādāne 'vasita-matis tatas tato 'vamānādīni  #
analyzed: kvacid kṣīṇa dhanaḥ śayyā āsana aśana ādi upabhoga vihīnaḥ yāvat a pratilabdha manoratha upagata ādāne vasita matiḥ tatas tatas vamāna ādīni

original: janād abhilabhate
analyzed: janāt abhilabhate

original: BhP_05.14.037/1 evaṃ vitta-vyatiṣaṅga-vivṛddha-vairānubandho 'pi pūrva-vāsanayā mitha udvahaty athāpavahati
analyzed: evam pūrva vāsanayā mithas udvahati atha apavahati

original: BhP_05.14.038 /1 etasmin saṃsārādhvani nānā-kleśopasarga-bādhita āpanna-vipanno yatra
analyzed: etasmin saṃsāra adhvani nānā kleśa upasarga bādhitaḥ āpanna vipannaḥ yatra

original: yas tam u ha vāvetaras tatra visṛjya jātaṃ jātam upādāya śocan muhyan bibhyad-vivadan
analyzed: yaḥ tam u ha vāva itaraḥ tatra visṛjya jātam jātam upādāya śocan muhyan bibhyat vivadan

original: krandan saṃhṛṣyan gāyan nahyamānaḥ sādhu-varjito naivāvartate 'dyāpi yata ārabdha
analyzed: krandan saṃhṛṣyan gāyan nahyamānaḥ sādhu varjitaḥ na eva āvartate dyā api yatas ārabdha

original: eṣa nara-loka-sārtho yam adhvanaḥ pāram upadiśanti
analyzed: eṣa nara loka sārthaḥ yam adhvanaḥ pāram upadiśanti

original: BhP_05.14.039/1 yad idaṃ yogānuśāsanaṃ na vā etad avarundhate yan nyasta-daṇḍā munaya upaśama-śīlā uparatātmānaḥ samavagacchanti
analyzed: yat idam yoga anuśāsanam na vai etat avarundhate yat nyasta daṇḍāḥ munayaḥ upaśama śīlāḥ uparata ātmānaḥ samavagacchanti

original: BhP_05.14.040/1 yad api dig-ibha-jayino yajvino ye vai rājarṣayaḥ kiṃ tu paraṃ mṛdhe śayīrann asyām eva mameyam iti kṛta-vairānubandhāyāṃ visṛjya  #
analyzed: yat api digibha jayinaḥ yajvinaḥ ye vai rājarṣayaḥ kim tu param mṛdhe śayīran asyām eva mama iyam iti kṛta vaira anubandhāyām visṛjya

original: svayam upasaṃhṛtāḥ
analyzed: svayam upasaṃhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_05.14.041/1 karma-vallīm avalambya tata āpadaḥ kathañcin narakād vimuktaḥ punar apy evaṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamāno nara-loka-sārtham upayāti  #
analyzed: karma vallīm avalambya tatas āpadaḥ kathañcid narakāt vimuktaḥ punar api evam saṃsāra adhvani vartamānaḥ nara loka sārtham upayāti  /

original: evam upari gato 'pi
analyzed: evam upari gataḥ pi

original: BhP_05.14.042/0 tasyedam upagāyanti----
analyzed: tasya idam upagāyanti

original: BhP_05.14.042/1 ārṣabhasyeha rājarṣer manasāpi mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: ārṣabhasya iha rājarṣeḥ manasā api mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.042/2 nānuvartmārhati nṛpo makṣikeva garutmataḥ
analyzed: na anuvartma arhati nṛpaḥ makṣikā iva garutmataḥ

original: BhP_05.14.043/1 yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dustyajān dāra sutān suhṛd rājyam hṛdispṛśaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.043/2 jahau yuvaiva malavad uttamaśloka-lālasaḥ
analyzed: jahau yuvā eva malavat uttamaśloka lālasaḥ

original: BhP_05.14.044/1 yo dustyajān kṣiti-suta-svajanārtha-dārān
analyzed: yaḥ dustyajān kṣiti suta sva jana artha dārān

original: BhP_05.14.044/2 prārthyāṃ śriyaṃ sura-varaiḥ sadayāvalokām
analyzed: prārthyām śriyam sura varaiḥ sa dayā avalokām

original: BhP_05.14.044/3 naicchan nṛpas tad-ucitaṃ mahatāṃ madhudviṭ-
analyzed: na aicchat nṛpaḥ tat ucitam mahatām madhudviṣ

original: BhP_05.14.044/4 sevānurakta-manasām abhavo 'pi phalguḥ
analyzed: sevā anurakta manasām phalguḥ

original: BhP_05.14.045/1 yajñāya dharma-pataye vidhi-naipuṇāya
analyzed: yajñāya dharma pataye vidhi naipuṇāya

original: BhP_05.14.045/2 yogāya sāṅkhya-śirase prakṛtīśvarāya
analyzed: yogāya sāṅkhya śirase prakṛti īśvarāya

original: BhP_05.14.045/3 nārāyaṇāya haraye nama ity udāraṃ
analyzed: nārāyaṇāya haraye namaḥ iti udāram

original: BhP_05.14.045/4 hāsyan mṛgatvam api yaḥ samudājahāra
analyzed: hāsyan mṛga tvam api yaḥ samudājahāra

original: BhP_05.14.046 /1 ya idaṃ bhāgavata-sabhājitāvadāta-guṇa-karmaṇo rājarṣer bharatasyānucaritaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ idam bhāgavata sabhājita avadāta guṇa karmaṇaḥ rājarṣeḥ bharatasya anucaritam

original: svasty-ayanam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ svargyāpavargyaṃ vānuśṛṇoty ākhyāsyaty abhinandati
analyzed: svastyayanam āyuṣyam dhanyam yaśasyam svargya apavargyam vā anuśṛṇoti ākhyāsyati abhinandati

original: ca sarvā evāśiṣa ātmana āśāste na kāñcana parata iti
analyzed: ca sarvāḥ eva āśiṣaḥ ātmane āśāste na kāñcana paratas iti

original: BhP_05.15.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.15.001 /1 bharatasyātmajaḥ sumatir nāmābhihito yam u ha vāva kecit pākhaṇḍina
analyzed: bharatasya ātmajaḥ sumatiḥ nāma abhihitaḥ yam u ha vāva kecid pākhaṇḍina

original: ṛṣabha-padavīm anuvartamānaṃ cānāryā aveda-samāmnātāṃ devatāṃ sva-manīṣayā pāpīyasyā kalau kalpayiṣyanti
analyzed: ṛṣabha padavīm anuvartamānam ca anāryāḥ a veda samāmnātām devatām sva manīṣayā pāpīyasyā kalau kalpayiṣyanti

original: BhP_05.15.002/1 tasmād vṛddhasenāyāṃ devatājin-nāma putro 'bhavat
analyzed: tasmāt vṛddhasenāyām devatājit nāma putraḥ bhavat

original: BhP_05.15.003/1 athāsuryāṃ tat-tanayo devadyumnas tato dhenumatyāṃ sutaḥ parameṣṭhī tasya suvarcalāyāṃ pratīha upajātaḥ
analyzed: atha asuryām tad tanayaḥ devadyumnaḥ tatas dhenumatyām sutaḥ parameṣṭhī tasya suvarcalāyām pratīhaḥ upajātaḥ

original: BhP_05.15.004/1 ya ātma-vidyām ākhyāya svayaṃ saṃśuddho mahā-puruṣam anusasmāra
analyzed: yaḥ ātma vidyām ākhyāya svayam saṃśuddhaḥ mahāpuruṣam anusasmāra

original: BhP_05.15.005/1 pratīhāt suvarcalāyāṃ pratihartrādayas traya āsann ijyā-kovidāḥ sūnavaḥ pratihartuḥ stutyām aja-bhūmānāv ajaniṣātām
analyzed: pratīhāt suvarcalāyām pratihartṛ ādayaḥ trayaḥ āsan ijyā kovidāḥ sūnavaḥ pratihartuḥ stutyām ajabhūmānau ajaniṣātām

original: BhP_05.15.006 /1 bhūmna ṛṣikulyāyām udgīthas tataḥ prastāvo devakulyāyāṃ prastāvān
analyzed: bhūmnaḥ ṛṣikulyāyām udgīthaḥ tatas prastāvaḥ devakulyāyām prastāvān

original: niyutsāyāṃ hṛdayaja āsīd vibhur vibho ratyāṃ ca pṛthuṣeṇas tasmān nakta ākūtyāṃ jajñe
analyzed: niyutsāyām hṛdaya jaḥ āsīt vibhuḥ vibhoḥ ratyām ca pṛthuṣeṇaḥ tasmāt nakte ākūtyām jajñe

original: naktād druti-putro gayo rājarṣi-pravara udāra-śravā ajāyata sākṣād bhagavato viṣṇor
analyzed: naktāt druti putraḥ gayaḥ rājarṣi pravaraḥ udāra śravāḥ ajāyata sākṣāt bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ

original: jagad-rirakṣiṣayā gṛhīta-sattvasya kalātmavattvādi-lakṣaṇena mahā-puruṣatāṃ prāptaḥ
analyzed: jagat rirakṣiṣayā gṛhīta sattvasya kalā ātmavat tva ādi lakṣaṇena mahāpuruṣa tām prāptaḥ

original: BhP_05.15.007 /1 sa vai sva-dharmeṇa prajā-pālana-poṣaṇa-prīṇanopalālanānuśāsana-lakṣaṇenejyādinā
analyzed: sa vai svadharmeṇa prajā pālana poṣaṇa prīṇana upalālana anuśāsana lakṣaṇena ijyā ādinā

original: ca bhagavati mahā-puruṣe parāvare brahmaṇi sarvātmanārpita-paramārtha-lakṣaṇena brahmavic-caraṇānusevayāpādita-bhagavad-bhakti-yogena
analyzed: ca bhagavati mahāpuruṣe parāvare brahmaṇi sarvātmanā arpita paramārtha lakṣaṇena brahma vid caraṇa anusevayā āpādita bhagavat bhakti yogena

original: cābhīkṣṇaśaḥ paribhāvitāti-śuddha-matir uparatānātmya ātmani svayam upalabhyamāna-brahmātmānubhavo
analyzed: ca abhīkṣṇaśas paribhāvita ati śuddha matiḥ uparata anātmye ātmani svayam upalabhyamāna brahma ātma anubhavaḥ

original: 'pi nirabhimāna evāvanim ajūgupat
analyzed: pi nirabhimānaḥ eva avanim ajūgupat

original: BhP_05.15.008/1 tasyemāṃ gāthāṃ pāṇḍaveya purāvida upagāyanti
analyzed: tasya imām gāthām pāṇḍaveya purāvidaḥ upagāyanti

original: BhP_05.15.009/1 gayaṃ nṛpaḥ kaḥ pratiyāti karmabhir yajvābhimānī bahuvid dharma-goptā
analyzed: gayam nṛpaḥ kaḥ pratiyāti karmabhiḥ yajvā abhimānī bahu vid dharma goptā

original: BhP_05.15.009/2 samāgata-śrīḥ sadasas-patiḥ satāṃ sat-sevako 'nyo bhagavat-kalām ṛte
analyzed: samāgata śrīḥ sadasaspatiḥ satām sat sevakaḥ nyaḥ bhagavat kalām ṛte

original: BhP_05.15.010/1 yam abhyaṣiñcan parayā mudā satīḥ satyāśiṣo dakṣa-kanyāḥ saridbhiḥ
analyzed: yam abhyaṣiñcan parayā mudā satīḥ satya āśiṣaḥ dakṣa kanyāḥ saridbhiḥ

original: BhP_05.15.010/2 yasya prajānāṃ duduhe dharāśiṣo nirāśiṣo guṇa-vatsa-snutodhāḥ
analyzed: yasya prajānām duduhe dharā āśiṣaḥ niḥ āśiṣaḥ guṇavat sasnuta udhāḥ

original: BhP_05.15.011/1 chandāṃsy akāmasya ca yasya kāmān dudūhur ājahrur atho baliṃ nṛpāḥ
analyzed: chandāṃsi akāmasya ca yasya kāmān dudūhuḥ ājahruḥ atho balim nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_05.15.011/2 pratyañcitā yudhi dharmeṇa viprā yadāśiṣāṃ ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ paretya
analyzed: pratyañcitāḥ yudhi dharmeṇa viprāḥ yad āśiṣām ṣaṣṭham aṃśam paretya

original: BhP_05.15.012/1 yasyādhvare bhagavān adhvarātmā maghoni mādyaty uru-soma-pīthe
analyzed: yasya adhvare bhagavān adhvara ātmā maghoni mādyati uru soma pīthe

original: BhP_05.15.012/2 śraddhā-viśuddhācala-bhakti-yoga- samarpitejyā-phalam ājahāra
analyzed: śraddhā viśuddha acala bhakti yoga samarpita ijyā phalam ājahāra

original: BhP_05.15.013/1 yat-prīṇanād barhiṣi deva-tiryaṅ- manuṣya-vīrut-tṛṇam āviriñcāt
analyzed: yad prīṇanāt barhiṣi deva tiryak manuṣya vīrudh tṛṇam ā viriñcāt

original: BhP_05.15.013/2 prīyeta sadyaḥ sa ha viśva-jīvaḥ prītaḥ svayaṃ prītim agād gayasya
analyzed: prīyeta sadyas sa ha viśvajīvaḥ prītaḥ svayam prītim agāt gayasya

original: BhP_05.15.014 /1 gayād gayantyāṃ citrarathaḥ sugatir avarodhana iti trayaḥ putrā
analyzed: gayāt gayantyām citrarathaḥ sugatiḥ avarodhanaḥ iti trayaḥ putrā

original: babhūvuś citrarathād ūrṇāyāṃ samrāḍ ajaniṣṭa tata utkalāyāṃ marīcir marīcer bindumatyāṃ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ citrarathāt ūrṇāyām samrāj ajaniṣṭa tatas utkalāyām marīciḥ marīceḥ bindumatyām

original: bindum ānudapadyata tasmāt saraghāyāṃ madhur nāmābhavan madhoḥ sumanasi vīravratas
analyzed: bindum ānudapadyata tasmāt saraghāyām madhuḥ nāma abhavat madhoḥ sumanasi vīravrataḥ

original: tato bhojāyāṃ manthu-pramanthū jajñāte manthoḥ satyāyāṃ bhauvanas tato dūṣaṇāyāṃ
analyzed: tatas bhojāyām manthu pramanthū jajñāte manthoḥ satyāyām bhauvanaḥ tatas dūṣaṇāyām

original: tvaṣṭājaniṣṭa tvaṣṭur virocanāyāṃ virajo virajasya śatajit-pravaraṃ putra-śataṃ kanyā
analyzed: tvaṣṭā ajaniṣṭa tvaṣṭuḥ virocanāyām virajaḥ virajasya śatajit pravaram putra śatam kanyā

original: ca viṣūcyāṃ kila jātam
analyzed: ca viṣūcyām kila jātam

original: BhP_05.15.015/0 tatrāyaṃ ślokaḥ
analyzed: tatra ayam ślokaḥ

original: BhP_05.15.015/1 praiyavrataṃ vaṃśam imaṃ virajaś caramodbhavaḥ
analyzed: praiyavratam vaṃśam imam virajaḥ carama udbhavaḥ

original: BhP_05.15.015/2 akarod aty-alaṃ kīrtyā viṣṇuḥ sura-gaṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: akarot atyalam kīrtyā viṣṇuḥ sura gaṇam yathā

original: BhP_05.16.001/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.16.001/1 uktas tvayā bhū-maṇḍalāyāma-viśeṣo yāvad ādityas tapati yatra cāsau jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaiś candramā vā saha dṛśyate
analyzed: uktaḥ tvayā bhū maṇḍala āyāma viśeṣaḥ yāvat ādityaḥ tapati yatra ca asau jyotiṣām gaṇaiḥ candramāḥ vā saha dṛśyate

original: BhP_05.16.002 /1 tatrāpi priyavrata-ratha-caraṇa-parikhātaiḥ saptabhiḥ sapta sindhava
analyzed: tatra api priyavrata ratha caraṇa parikhātaiḥ saptabhiḥ sapta sindhava

original: upakḷptā yata etasyāḥ sapta-dvīpa-viśeṣa-vikalpas tvayā bhagavan khalu sūcita etad
analyzed: upakḷptā yatas etasyāḥ sapta dvīpa viśeṣa vikalpaḥ tvayā bhagavan khalu sūcitaḥ etat

original: evākhilam ahaṃ mānato lakṣaṇataś ca sarvaṃ vi-jijñāsāmi
analyzed: eva akhilam aham mānataḥ lakṣaṇataḥ ca sarvam vijijñāsāmi

original: BhP_05.16.003 /1 bhagavato guṇamaye sthūla-rūpa āveśitaṃ mano hy aguṇe 'pi sūkṣmatama
analyzed: bhagavataḥ guṇa maye sthūla rūpe āveśitam manaḥ hi aguṇe sūkṣmatama

original: ātma-jyotiṣi pare brahmaṇi bhagavati vāsudevākhye kṣamam āveśituṃ tad u haitad guro
analyzed: ātma jyotiṣi pare brahmaṇi bhagavati vāsudeva ākhye kṣamam āveśitum tat u ha etat guro

original: 'rhasy anuvarṇayitum iti
analyzed: rhasi anuvarṇayitum iti

original: BhP_05.16.004/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.16.004 /1 na vai mahārāja bhagavato māyā-guṇa-vibhūteḥ kāṣṭhāṃ manasā vacasā
analyzed: na vai mahā rāja bhagavataḥ māyā guṇa vibhūteḥ kāṣṭhām manasā vacasā

original: vādhigantum alaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi puruṣas tasmāt prādhān-yenaiva bhū-golaka-viśeṣaṃ
analyzed: vā adhigantum alam vibudha āyuṣā api puruṣaḥ tasmāt prādhānyena eva bhū golaka viśeṣam

original: nāma-rūpa-māna-lakṣaṇato vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
analyzed: nāma rūpa māna lakṣaṇataḥ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.16.005/1 yo vāyaṃ dvīpaḥ kuvalaya-kamala-kośābhyantara-kośo niyuta-yojana-viśālaḥ samavartulo yathā puṣkara-patram
analyzed: yaḥ vā ayam dvīpaḥ kuvalaya kamala kośa abhyantara kośaḥ niyuta yojana viśālaḥ sama vartulaḥ yathā puṣkara patram

original: BhP_05.16.006/1 yasmin nava varṣāṇi nava-yojana-sahasrāyāmāny aṣṭabhir maryādā-giribhiḥ suvibhaktāni bhavanti
analyzed: yasmin nava varṣāṇi nava yojana sahasra āyāmāni aṣṭabhiḥ maryādā giribhiḥ su vibhaktāni bhavanti

original: BhP_05.16.007 /1 eṣāṃ madhye ilāvṛtaṃ nāmābhyantara-varṣaṃ yasya nābhyām avasthitaḥ
analyzed: eṣām madhye ilāvṛtam nāma abhyantara varṣam yasya nābhyām avasthitaḥ

original: sarvataḥ sauvarṇaḥ kula-giri-rājo merur dvīpāyāma-samunnāhaḥ karṇikā-bhūtaḥ kuvalaya-kamalasya
analyzed: sarvatas sauvarṇaḥ kulagiri rājaḥ meruḥ dvīpa āyāma samunnāhaḥ karṇikā bhūtaḥ kuvalaya kamalasya

original: mūrdhani dvā-triṃśat sahasra-yojana-vitato mūle ṣoḍaśa-sahasraṃ tāvat āntar-bhūmyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: mūrdhani dvātriṃśat sahasra yojana vitataḥ mūle ṣoḍaśa sahasram tāvat ā antar bhūmyām praviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_05.16.008 /1 uttarottareṇelāvṛtaṃ nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavān iti trayo ramyaka-hiraṇmaya-kurūṇāṃ
analyzed: uttarottareṇa ilāvṛtam nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavān iti trayaḥ ramyaka hiraṇmaya kurūṇām

original: varṣāṇāṃ maryādā-girayaḥ prāg-āyatā ubhayataḥ kṣārodāvadhayo dvi-sahasra-pṛthava
analyzed: varṣāṇām maryādā girayaḥ prāc āyatāḥ ubhayatas kṣāra uda avadhayaḥ

original: ekaikaśaḥ pūrvasmāt pūrvasmād uttara uttaro daśāṃśādhikāṃśena dairghya eva hrasanti
analyzed: ekaikaśas pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt uttaraḥ uttaraḥ daśa aṃśa adhika aṃśena dairghye eva hrasanti

original: BhP_05.16.009/1 evaṃ dakṣiṇenelāvṛtaṃ niṣadho hemakūṭo himālaya iti prāg-āyatā yathā nīlādayo 'yuta-yojanotsedhā hari-varṣa-kimpuruṣa-bhāratānāṃ
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇena ilāvṛtam niṣadhaḥ hemakūṭaḥ himālayaḥ iti prāc āyatāḥ yathā nīla ādayaḥ yuta yojana utsedhāḥ hari varṣa kimpuruṣa bhāratānām

original: BhP_05.16.010/1 tathaivelāvṛtam apareṇa pūrveṇa ca mālyavad-gandhamādanāv ānīla-niṣadhāyatau dvi-sahasraṃ paprathatuḥ ketumāla-bhadrāśvayoḥ  #
analyzed: tathā eva ilāvṛtam apareṇa pūrveṇa ca mālyavat gandhamādanau ā nīla niṣadha āyatau dvi sahasram paprathatuḥ ketumāla bhadrāśvayoḥ

original: sīmānaṃ vidadhāte
analyzed: sīmānam vidadhāte

original: BhP_05.16.011/1 mandaro merumandaraḥ supārśvaḥ kumuda ity ayuta-yojana-vistāronnāhā meroś catur-diśam avaṣṭambha-giraya upakḷptāḥ
analyzed: mandaraḥ merumandaraḥ supārśvaḥ kumudaḥ iti ayuta yojana vistāra unnāhāḥ meroḥ caturdiśam avaṣṭambha girayaḥ upakḷptāḥ

original: BhP_05.16.012/1 caturṣv eteṣu cūta-jambū-kadamba-nyagrodhāś catvāraḥ pādapa-pravarāḥ parvata-ketava ivādhi-sahasra-yojanonnāhās tāvad viṭapa-vitatayaḥ
analyzed: caturṣu eteṣu cūta jambu kadamba nyagrodhāḥ catvāraḥ pādapa pravarāḥ parvata ketavaḥ iva ādhi sahasra yojana unnāhāḥ tāvat viṭapa vitatayaḥ

original: BhP_05.16.013/1 hradāś catvāraḥ payo-madhv-ikṣurasa-mṛṣṭa-jalā yad-upasparśina upadeva-gaṇā yogaiśvaryāṇi svābhāvikāni bharatarṣabha dhārayanti
analyzed: hradāḥ catvāraḥ payaḥ madhu ikṣu rasa mṛṣṭa jalāḥ yad upasparśinaḥ upadeva gaṇāḥ yoga aiśvaryāṇi svābhāvikāni bharata ṛṣabha dhārayanti

original: BhP_05.16.014/1 devodyānāni ca bhavanti catvāri nandanaṃ caitrarathaṃ vaibhrājakaṃ sarvatobhadram iti
analyzed: deva udyānāni ca bhavanti catvāri nandanam caitraratham vaibhrājakam sarvatobhadram iti

original: BhP_05.16.015/1 yeṣv amara-parivṛḍhāḥ saha sura-lalanā-lalāma-yūtha-pataya upadeva-gaṇair upagīyamāna-mahimānaḥ kila viharanti
analyzed: yeṣu amara parivṛḍhāḥ saha sura lalanā lalāma yūtha patayaḥ upadeva gaṇaiḥ upagīyamāna mahimānaḥ kila viharanti

original: BhP_05.16.016/1 mandarotsaṅga ekādaśa-śata-yojanottuṅga-devacūta-śiraso giri-śikhara-sthūlāni phalāny amṛta-kalpāni patanti
analyzed: mandara utsaṅge ekādaśa śata yojana uttuṅga deva cūta śirasaḥ giri śikhara sthūlāni phalāni amṛta kalpāni patanti

original: BhP_05.16.017/1 teṣāṃ viśīryamāṇānām ati-madhura-surabhi-sugandhi-bahulāruṇa-rasodenāruṇodā nāma nadī mandara-giri-śikharān nipatantī pūr-veṇelāvṛtam
analyzed: teṣām viśīryamāṇānām ati madhura surabhi sugandhi bahula aruṇa rasa udena aruṇodā nāma nadī mandara giri śikharāt nipatantī pūrveṇa ilāvṛtam

original: BhP_05.16.018/1 yad-upajoṣaṇād bhavānyā anucarīṇāṃ puṇya-jana-vadhūnām avayava-sparśa-sugandha-vāto daśa-yojanaṃ samantād anuvāsayati
analyzed: yad upajoṣaṇāt bhavānyāḥ anucarīṇām puṇyajana vadhūnām avayava sparśa sugandha vātaḥ daśa yojanam samantāt anuvāsayati

original: BhP_05.16.019 /1 evaṃ jambū-phalānām atyucca-nipāta-viśīrṇānām anasthi-prāyāṇām ibha-kāya-nibhānāṃ
analyzed: evam jambu phalānām atyucca nipāta viśīrṇānām anasthi prāyāṇām ibha kāya nibhānām

original: rasena jambū nāma nadī meru-mandara-śikharād ayuta-yojanād avani-tale nipatantī dakṣiṇenātmānaṃ
analyzed: rasena jambū nāma nadī meru mandara śikharāt ayuta yojanāt avani tale nipatantī dakṣiṇena ātmānam

original: yāvad ilāvṛtam upasyandayati
analyzed: yāvat ilāvṛtam upasyandayati

original: BhP_05.16.020/1 tāvad ubhayor api rodhasor yā mṛttikā tad-rasenānuvidhyamānā vāyv-arka-saṃyoga-vipākena sadāmara-lokābharaṇaṃ jāmbū-nadaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: tāvat ubhayoḥ api rodhasoḥ yā mṛttikā tad rasena anuvidhyamānā vāyu arka saṃyoga vipākena sadā amara loka ābharaṇam jāmbūnadam nāma

original: suvarṇaṃ bhavati
analyzed: suvarṇam bhavati

original: BhP_05.16.021/1 yad u ha vāva vibudhādayaḥ saha yuvatibhir mukuṭa-kaṭaka-kaṭi-sūtrādy-ābharaṇa-rūpeṇa khalu dhārayanti
analyzed: yat u ha vāva vibudha ādayaḥ saha yuvatibhiḥ mukuṭa kaṭaka kaṭi sūtra ādi ābharaṇa rūpeṇa khalu dhārayanti

original: BhP_05.16.022 /1 yas tu mahā-kadambaḥ supārśva-nirūḍho yās tasya koṭarebhyo viniḥsṛtāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu mahā kadambaḥ supārśva nirūḍhaḥ yāḥ tasya koṭarebhyaḥ viniḥsṛtāḥ

original: pañcāyāma-pariṇāhāḥ pañca madhu-dhārāḥ supārśva-śikharāt patantyo 'pareṇātmānam ilāvṛtam anumodayanti
analyzed: pañca āyāma pariṇāhāḥ pañca madhu dhārāḥ supārśva śikharāt patantyaḥ u pareṇa ātmānam ilāvṛtam anumodayanti

original: BhP_05.16.023/1 yā hy upayuñjānānāṃ mukha-nirvāsito vāyuḥ samantāc chata-yojanam anuvāsayati
analyzed: yāḥ hi upayuñjānānām mukha nirvāsitaḥ vāyuḥ samantāt śata yojanam anuvāsayati

original: BhP_05.16.024 /1 evaṃ kumuda-nirūḍho yaḥ śatavalśo nāma vaṭas tasya skandhebhyo nīcīnāḥ
analyzed: evam kumudanirūḍhaḥ yaḥ śatavalśaḥ nāma vaṭaḥ tasya skandhebhyaḥ nīcīnāḥ

original: payo-dadhi-madhu-ghṛta-guḍānnādy-ambara-śayyāsanābharaṇādayaḥ sarva eva kāma-dughā
analyzed: payaḥ dadhi madhu ghṛta guḍa annādya ambara śayyā āsana ābharaṇa ādayaḥ sarve eva kāmadughā

original: nadāḥ kumudāgrāt patantas tam uttareṇelāvṛtam upayojayanti
analyzed: nadāḥ kumuda agrāt patantaḥ tam uttareṇa ilāvṛtam upayojayanti

original: BhP_05.16.025 /1 yān upajuṣāṇānāṃ na kadācid api prajānāṃ valī-palita-klama-sveda-daurgandhya-jarāmaya-mṛtyu-śītoṣṇa-vaivarṇyopasargādayas
analyzed: yān upajuṣāṇānām na kadācid api prajānām valī palita klama sveda daurgandhya jarā āmaya mṛtyu śīta uṣṇa vaivarṇya upasarga ādayaḥ

original: tāpa-viśeṣā bhavanti yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ niratiśayam eva
analyzed: tāpa viśeṣāḥ bhavanti yāvat jīvam sukham niratiśayam eva

original: BhP_05.16.026 /1 kuraṅga-kurara-kusumbha-vaikaṅka-trikūṭa-śiśira-pataṅga-rucaka-niṣadha-śinīvāsa-kapila-śaṅkha-vaidūrya-jārudhi-haṃsa-ṛṣabha-nāga-kālañjara-nāradādayo
analyzed: kuraṅga kurara kusumbha vaikaṅka trikūṭa śiśirapataṅga rucaka niṣadha śinīvāsa kapila śaṅkha vaidūrya jārudhi haṃsa ṛṣabha nāga kālañjara nārada ādayaḥ

original: viṃśati-girayo meroḥ karṇikāyā iva kesara-bhūtā mūla-deśe parita upakḷptāḥ
analyzed: viṃśati girayaḥ meroḥ karṇikāyāḥ iva kesara bhūtāḥ mūla deśe paritas upakḷptāḥ

original: BhP_05.16.027 /1 jaṭhara-devakūṭau meruṃ pūrveṇāṣṭādaśa-yojana-sahasram udagāyatau
analyzed: jaṭhara devakūṭau merum pūrveṇa aṣṭādaśa yojana sahasram udak āyatau

original: dvi-sahasraṃ pṛthu-tuṅgau bhavataḥ evam apareṇa pavana-pāriyātrau dakṣiṇena kailāsa-karavīrau
analyzed: dvi sahasram pṛthu tuṅgau bhavataḥ evam apareṇa pavana pāriyātrau dakṣiṇena kailāsa karavīrau

original: prāg-āyatāv evam uttaratas triśṛṅga-makarāv aṣṭabhir etaiḥ parisṛto 'gnir iva paritaś
analyzed: prāc āyatau evam uttaratas triśṛṅga makarau aṣṭabhiḥ etaiḥ parisṛtaḥ gniḥ iva paritas

original: cakāsti kāñcana-giriḥ
analyzed: cakāsti kāñcana giriḥ

original: BhP_05.16.028/1 meror mūrdhani bhagavata ātma-yoner madhyata upakḷptāṃ purīm ayuta-yojana-sāhasrīṃ sama-caturasrāṃ śātakaumbhīṃ vadanti
analyzed: meroḥ mūrdhani bhagavataḥ ātmayoneḥ madhyataḥ upakḷptām purīm ayuta yojana sāhasrīm sama catur asrām śātakaumbhīm vadanti

original: BhP_05.16.029/1 tām anuparito loka-pālānām aṣṭānāṃ yathā-diśaṃ yathā-rūpaṃ turīya-mānena puro 'ṣṭāv upakḷptāḥ
analyzed: tām anuparitas lokapālānām aṣṭānām yathādiśam yathārūpam turīyamānena puras u ṣṭau upakḷptāḥ

original: BhP_05.17.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.17.001 /1 tatra bhagavataḥ sākṣād yajña-liṅgasya viṣṇor vikramato vāma-pādāṅguṣṭha-nakha-nirbhinnordhvāṇḍa-kaṭāha-vivareṇāntaḥ-praviṣṭā
analyzed: tatra bhagavataḥ sākṣāt yajña liṅgasya viṣṇoḥ vikramataḥ vāma pāda aṅguṣṭha nakha nirbhinna ūrdhva aṇḍa kaṭāha vivareṇa antar praviṣṭā

original: yā bāhya-jala-dhārā tac-caraṇa-paṅkajāvanejanāruṇa-kiñjalkoparañjitākhila-jagad-agha-malāpahopasparśanāmalā
analyzed: yā bāhya jala dhārā tad caraṇa paṅkaja avanejana aruṇa kiñjalka uparañjita akhila jagat agha mala apaha upasparśana amalā

original: sākṣād bhagavat-padīty anupalakṣita-vaco 'bhidhīyamānāti-mahatā kālena yuga-sahasropalakṣaṇena
analyzed: sākṣāt bhagavatpadī iti anupalakṣita vacaḥ bhidhīyamānā ati mahatā kālena yuga sahasra upalakṣaṇena

original: divo mūrdhany avatatāra yat tad viṣṇu-padam āhuḥ
analyzed: divaḥ mūrdhani avatatāra yat tat viṣṇu padam āhuḥ

original: BhP_05.17.002 /1 yatra ha vāva vīra-vrata auttānapādiḥ parama-bhāgavato 'smat-kula-devatā-caraṇāravindodakam
analyzed: yatra ha vāva vīravrataḥ auttānapādiḥ smad kula devatā caraṇa aravinda udakam

original: iti yām anusavanam utkṛṣyamāṇa-bhagavad-bhakti-yogena dṛḍhaṃ klidyamānāntar-hṛdaya
analyzed: iti yām anusavanam utkṛṣyamāṇa bhagavat bhakti yogena dṛḍham klidyamāna antar hṛdaya

original: autkaṇṭhya-vivaśāmīlita-locana-yugala-kuḍmala-vigalitāmala-bāṣpa-kalayābhivyajyamāna-roma-pulaka-kulako
analyzed: autkaṇṭhya vivaśa āmīlita locana yugala kuḍmala vigalita amala bāṣpa kalayā abhivyajyamāna roma pulaka kulakaḥ

original: 'dhunāpi paramādareṇa śirasā bibharti
analyzed: dhunā api parama ādareṇa śirasā bibharti

original: BhP_05.17.003 /1 tataḥ sapta ṛṣayas tat prabhāvābhijñā yāṃ nanu tapasa ātyantikī
analyzed: tatas sapta ṛṣayaḥ tat prabhāva abhijñā yām nanu tapasaḥ ātyantikī

original: siddhir etāvatī bhagavati sarvātmani vāsudeve 'nuparata-bhakti-yoga-lābhenaivopekṣitānyārthātma-gatayo
analyzed: siddhiḥ etāvatī bhagavati sarvātmani vāsudeve

original: muktim ivāgatāṃ mumukṣava iva sabahu-mānam adyāpi jaṭā-jūṭair udvahanti
analyzed: muktim iva āgatām mumukṣavaḥ iva sa bahu mānam adyā api jaṭā jūṭaiḥ udvahanti

original: BhP_05.17.004/1 tato 'neka-sahasra-koṭi-vimānānīka-saṅkula-deva-yānenāvatar-antīndu maṇḍalam āvārya brahma-sadane nipatati
analyzed: tatas neka sahasra koṭi vimāna anīka saṅkula deva yānena avataranti indu maṇḍalam āvārya brahma sadane nipatati

original: BhP_05.17.005/1 tatra caturdhā bhidyamānā caturbhir nāmabhiś catur-diśam abhispandantī nada-nadī-patim evābhiniviśati sītālakanandā cakṣur
analyzed: tatra caturdhā bhidyamānā caturbhiḥ nāmabhiḥ caturdiśam abhispandantī nadanadīpatim eva abhiniviśati sītā alakanandā cakṣuḥ

original: BhP_05.17.006 /1 sītā tu brahma-sadanāt kesarācalādi-giri-śikharebhyo 'dho 'dhaḥ
analyzed: sītā tu brahma sadanāt kesara acala ādi giri śikharebhyaḥ dhaḥ dhaḥ

original: prasravantī gandhamādana-mūrdhasu patitvāntareṇa bhadrāśva-varṣaṃ prācyāṃ diśi kṣāra-samudram abhipraviśati
