analyzed: prasravantī gandhamādana mūrdhasu patitvā antareṇa bhadrāśva varṣam prācyām diśi kṣāra samudram abhipraviśati

original: BhP_05.17.007/1 evaṃ mālyavac-chikharān niṣpatantī tato 'nuparata-vegā ketumālam abhi cakṣuḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi sarit-patiṃ praviśati
analyzed: evam mālyavat śikharāt niṣpatantī tatas nu parata vegā ketumālam abhi cakṣuḥ pratīcyām diśi saritpatim praviśati

original: BhP_05.17.008 /1 bhadrā cottarato meru-śiraso nipatitā giri-śikharād giri-śikharam
analyzed: bhadrā ca uttaratas meru śirasaḥ nipatitā giri śikharāt giri śikharam

original: atihāya śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgād avasyandamānā uttarāṃs tu kurūn abhita udīcyāṃ diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati
analyzed: atihāya śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgāt avasyandamānāḥ uttarān tu kurūn abhitas udīcyām diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati

original: BhP_05.17.009 /1 tathaivālakanandā dakṣiṇena brahma-sadanād bahūni giri-kūṭāny atikramya
analyzed: tathā eva alakanandā dakṣiṇena brahmasadanāt bahūni giri kūṭāni atikramya

original: hemakūṭād dhaimakūṭāny ati-rabhasatara-raṃhasā luṭhayantī bhāratam abhivarṣaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ
analyzed: hemakūṭāt dhaimakūṭāni ati rabhasa tara raṃhasā luṭhayantī bhāratam abhi varṣam dakṣiṇasyām

original: diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati yasyāṃ snānārthaṃ cāgacchataḥ puṃsaḥ pade pade 'śvamedha-rājasūyādīnāṃ
analyzed: diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati yasyām snāna artham ca āgacchataḥ puṃsaḥ pade pade śvamedha rājasūya ādīnām

original: phalaṃ na durlabham iti
analyzed: phalam na durlabham iti

original: BhP_05.17.010/1 anye ca nadā nadyaś ca varṣe varṣe santi bahuśo merv-ādi-giri-duhitaraḥ śataśaḥ
analyzed: anye ca nadāḥ nadyaḥ ca varṣe varṣe santi bahuśas meru ādi giri duhitaraḥ śataśas

original: BhP_05.17.011/1 tatrāpi bhāratam eva varṣaṃ karma-kṣetram anyāny aṣṭa varṣāṇi svargiṇāṃ puṇya-śeṣopabhoga-sthānāni bhaumāni svarga-padāni vyapadiśanti
analyzed: tatra api bhāratam eva varṣam karma kṣetram anyāni aṣṭa varṣāṇi svargiṇām puṇya śeṣa upabhoga sthānāni bhaumāni svarga padāni vyapadiśanti

original: BhP_05.17.012 /1 eṣu puruṣāṇām ayuta-puruṣāyur-varṣāṇāṃ deva-kalpānāṃ nāgāyuta-prāṇānāṃ
analyzed: eṣu puruṣāṇām ayuta puruṣa āyuḥ varṣāṇām deva kalpānām nāga ayuta prāṇānām

original: vajra-saṃhanana-bala-vayo-moda-pramudita-mahā-saurata-mithuna-vyavāyāpavarga-varṣa-dhṛtaika-garbha-kalatrāṇāṃ
analyzed: vajra saṃhanana bala vayaḥ moda pramudita mahā saurata mithuna vyavāya apavarga varṣa dhṛta eka garbha kalatrāṇām

original: tatra tu tretā-yuga-samaḥ kālo vartate
analyzed: tatra tu tretā yuga samaḥ kālaḥ vartate

original: BhP_05.17.013 /1 yatra ha deva-patayaḥ svaiḥ svair gaṇa-nāyakair vihita-mahārhaṇāḥ
analyzed: yatra ha devapatayaḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ gaṇanāyakaiḥ vihita mahā arhaṇāḥ

original: sarvartu-kusuma-stabaka-phala-kisalaya-śriyānamyamāna-viṭapa-latā-viṭapibhir upaśumbhamāna-rucira-kānanāśramāyatana-varṣa-giri-droṇīṣu
analyzed: sarva ṛtu kusuma stabaka phala kisalaya śriyā ānamyamāna viṭapa latā viṭapibhiḥ upaśumbhamāna rucira kānana āśrama āyatana varṣa giri droṇīṣu

original: tathā cāmala-jalāśayeṣu vikaca-vividha-nava-vanaruhāmoda-mudita-rāja-haṃsa-jala-kukkuṭa-kāraṇḍava-sārasa-cakravākādibhir
analyzed: tathā ca amala jalāśayeṣu vikaca vividha nava vanaruha āmoda mudita rājahaṃsa jala kukkuṭa kāraṇḍava sārasa cakravāka ādibhiḥ

original: madhukara-nikarākṛtibhir upakūjiteṣu jala-krīḍādibhir vicitra-vinodaiḥ sulalita-sura-sundarīṇāṃ
analyzed: madhukara nikara ākṛtibhiḥ upakūjiteṣu jala krīḍā ādibhiḥ vicitra vinodaiḥ su lalita sura sundarīṇām

original: kāma-kalila-vilāsa-hāsa-līlāvalokākṛṣṭa-mano-dṛṣṭayaḥ svairaṃ viharanti
analyzed: kāma kalila vilāsa hāsa līlā avaloka ākṛṣṭa manaḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ svairam viharanti

original: BhP_05.17.014/1 navasv api varṣeṣu bhagavān nārāyaṇo mahā-puruṣaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ tad-anugrahāyātma-tattva-vyūhenātmanādyāpi sannidhīyate
analyzed: navasu api varṣeṣu bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ mahāpuruṣaḥ puruṣāṇām tad anugrahāya ātma tattva vyūhena ātmanā adya api sannidhīyate

original: BhP_05.17.015/1 ilāvṛte tu bhagavān bhava eka eva pumān na hy anyas tatrāparo nirviśati bhavānyāḥ śāpa-nimitta-jño yat-pravekṣyataḥ strī-bhāvas  #
analyzed: ilāvṛte tu bhagavān bhavaḥ ekaḥ eva pumān na hi anyaḥ tatra aparaḥ nirviśati bhavānyāḥ śāpa nimitta jñaḥ yat pravekṣyataḥ strī bhāvaḥ

original: tat paścād vakṣyāmi
analyzed: tat paścāt vakṣyāmi

original: BhP_05.17.016 /1 bhavānīnāthaiḥ strī-gaṇārbuda-sahasrair avarudhyamāno bhagavataś
analyzed: bhavānī nāthaiḥ strī gaṇa arbuda sahasraiḥ avarudhyamānaḥ bhagavataḥ

original: caturmūrter mahā-puruṣasya turīyāṃ tāmasīṃ mūrtiṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṃjñām
analyzed: caturmūrteḥ mahāpuruṣasya turīyām tāmasīm mūrtim prakṛtim ātmanaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa saṃjñām

original: ātma-samādhi-rūpeṇa sannidhāpyaitad abhigṛṇan bhava upadhāvati
analyzed: ātma samādhi rūpeṇa sannidhāpya etat abhigṛṇan bhavaḥ upadhāvati

original: BhP_05.17.017/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_05.17.017/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya sarva-guṇa-saṅkhyānāyānantāyāvyaktāya nama iti
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya sarva guṇa saṅkhyānāya anantāya avyaktāya namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.17.017/1 bhaje bhajanyāraṇa-pāda-paṅkajaṃ bhagasya kṛtsnasya paraṃ parāyaṇam
analyzed: bhaje bhajani āraṇa pāda paṅkajam bhagasya kṛtsnasya param parāyaṇam

original: BhP_05.17.017/2 bhakteṣv alaṃ bhāvita-bhūta-bhāvanaṃ bhavāpahaṃ tvā bhava-bhāvam īśvaram
analyzed: bhakteṣu alam bhāvita bhūta bhāvanam bhava apaham tvā bhava bhāvam īśvaram

original: BhP_05.17.018/1 na yasya māyā-guṇa-citta-vṛttibhir nirīkṣato hy aṇv api dṛṣṭir ajyate
analyzed: na yasya māyā guṇa cittavṛttibhiḥ nirīkṣataḥ hi aṇu api dṛṣṭiḥ ajyate

original: BhP_05.17.018/2 īśe yathā no 'jita-manyu-raṃhasāṃ kas taṃ na manyeta jigīṣur ātmanaḥ
analyzed: īśe yathā naḥ jita manyu raṃhasām kaḥ tam na manyeta jigīṣuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_05.17.019/1 asad-dṛśo yaḥ pratibhāti māyayā kṣībeva madhv-āsava-tāmra-locanaḥ
analyzed: asat dṛśaḥ yaḥ pratibhāti māyayā kṣībā iva madhvāsava tāmra locanaḥ

original: BhP_05.17.019/2 na nāga-vadhvo 'rhaṇa īśire hriyā yat-pādayoḥ sparśana-dharṣitendriyāḥ
analyzed: na nāga vadhvaḥ rhaṇe īśire hriyāḥ yad pādayoḥ sparśana dharṣita indriyāḥ

original: BhP_05.17.020/1 yam āhur asya sthiti-janma-saṃyamaṃ tribhir vihīnaṃ yam anantam ṛṣayaḥ
analyzed: yam āhuḥ asya sthiti janma saṃyamam tribhiḥ vihīnam yam anantam ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_05.17.020/2 na veda siddhārtham iva kvacit sthitaṃ bhū-maṇḍalaṃ mūrdha-sahasra-dhāmasu
analyzed: na veda siddhārtham iva kvacid sthitam bhū maṇḍalam mūrdha sahasra dhāmasu

original: BhP_05.17.021/1 yasyādya āsīd guṇa-vigraho mahān vijñāna-dhiṣṇyo bhagavān ajaḥ kila
analyzed: yasya ādyaḥ āsīt guṇa vigrahaḥ mahān vijñāna dhiṣṇyaḥ bhagavān ajaḥ kila

original: BhP_05.17.021/2 yat-sambhavo 'haṃ tri-vṛtā sva-tejasā vaikārikaṃ tāmasam aindriyaṃ sṛje
analyzed: yad sambhavaḥ ham trivṛtā sva tejasā vaikārikam tāmasam aindriyam sṛje

original: BhP_05.17.022/1 ete vayaṃ yasya vaśe mahātmanaḥ sthitāḥ śakuntā iva sūtra-yantritāḥ
analyzed: ete vayam yasya vaśe mahātmanaḥ sthitāḥ śakuntāḥ iva sūtra yantritāḥ

original: BhP_05.17.022/2 mahān ahaṃ vaikṛta-tāmasendriyāḥ sṛjāma sarve yad-anugrahād idam
analyzed: mahān aham vaikṛta tāmasa indriyāḥ sṛjāma sarve yad anugrahāt idam

original: BhP_05.17.023/1 yan-nirmitāṃ karhy api karma-parvaṇīṃ māyāṃ jano 'yaṃ guṇa-sarga-mohitaḥ
analyzed: yad nirmitām karhi api karma parvaṇīm māyām janaḥ yam guṇa sarga mohitaḥ

original: BhP_05.17.023/2 na veda nistāraṇa-yogam añjasā tasmai namas te vilayodayātmane
analyzed: na veda nistāraṇa yogam añjasā tasmai namaḥ te vilaya udaya ātmane

original: BhP_05.18.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.18.001 /1 tathā ca bhadraśravā nāma dharma-sutas tat-kula-patayaḥ puruṣā bhadrāśva-varṣe
analyzed: tathā ca bhadraśravāḥ nāma dharmasutaḥ tad kula patayaḥ puruṣāḥ bhadrāśva varṣe

original: sākṣād bhagavato vāsudevasya priyāṃ tanuṃ dharmamayīṃ hayaśīrṣābhidhānāṃ parameṇa
analyzed: sākṣāt bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya priyām tanum dharma mayīm hayaśīrṣa abhidhānām parameṇa

original: samādhinā sannidhāpyedam abhigṛṇanta upadhāvanti
analyzed: samādhinā sannidhāpya idam abhigṛṇantaḥ upadhāvanti

original: BhP_05.18.002/0 bhadraśravasa ūcuḥ
analyzed: bhadraśravasaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_05.18.002/1 oṃ namo bhagavate dharmāyātma-viśodhanāya nama iti
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate dharmāya ātma viśodhanāya namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.18.003/1 aho vicitraṃ bhagavad-viceṣṭitaṃ ghnantaṃ jano 'yaṃ hi miṣan na paśyati
analyzed: aho vicitram bhagavat viceṣṭitam ghnantam janaḥ yam hi miṣan na paśyati

original: BhP_05.18.003/2 dhyāyann asad yarhi vikarma sevituṃ nirhṛtya putraṃ pitaraṃ jijīviṣati
analyzed: dhyāyan asat yarhi vikarma sevitum nirhṛtya putram pitaram jijīviṣati

original: BhP_05.18.004/1 vadanti viśvaṃ kavayaḥ sma naśvaraṃ paśyanti cādhyātmavido vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: vadanti viśvam kavayaḥ sma naśvaram paśyanti ca adhyātma vidaḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.004/2 tathāpi muhyanti tavāja māyayā suvismitaṃ kṛtyam ajaṃ nato 'smi tam
analyzed: tathā api muhyanti tava aja māyayā su vismitam kṛtyam ajam nataḥ smi tam

original: BhP_05.18.005/1 viśvodbhava-sthāna-nirodha-karma te hy akartur aṅgīkṛtam apy apāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: viśva udbhava sthāna nirodha karma te hi akartuḥ aṅgīkṛtam api apāvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.005/2 yuktaṃ na citraṃ tvayi kārya-kāraṇe sarvātmani vyatirikte ca vastutaḥ
analyzed: yuktam na citram tvayi kārya kāraṇe sarva ātmani vyatirikte ca vastutas

original: BhP_05.18.006/1 vedān yugānte tamasā tiraskṛtān rasātalād yo nṛ-turaṅga-vigrahaḥ
analyzed: vedān yuga ante tamasā tiraskṛtān rasātalāt yaḥ nṛ turaṅga vigrahaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.006/2 pratyādade vai kavaye 'bhiyācate tasmai namas te 'vitathehitāya iti
analyzed: pratyādade vai kavaye bhiyācate tasmai namaḥ te vitatha īhitāya iti

original: BhP_05.18.007 /1 hari-varṣe cāpi bhagavān nara-hari-rūpeṇāste tad-rūpa-grahaṇa-nimittam
uttaratrābhidhāsye tad dayitaṃ rūpaṃ mahā-puruṣa-guṇa-bhājano mahā-bhāgavato daitya-dānava-kula-tīrthīkaraṇa-śīlā-caritaḥ
analyzed: uttaratra abhidhāsye tat dayitam rūpam mahāpuruṣa guṇa bhājanaḥ mahā bhāgavataḥ daitya dānava kula tīrthīkaraṇa śīla ācaritaḥ

original: prahlādo 'vyavadhānānanya-bhakti-yogena saha tad-varṣa-puruṣair upāste idaṃ codāharati
analyzed: prahlādaḥ vyavadhāna ananya bhakti yogena saha tad varṣa puruṣaiḥ upāste idam ca udāharati

original: BhP_05.18.008 /1 oṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namas tejas-tejase āvir-āvirbhava
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavante narasiṃhāya namaḥ tejaḥ tejase āvis āvirbhava

original: vajra-nakha vajra-daṃṣṭra karmāśayān randhaya randhaya tamo grasa grasa oṃ svāhā
analyzed: vajranakha vajradaṃṣṭra karma āśayān randhaya randhaya tamaḥ grasa grasa om svāhā

original: abhayam abhayam ātmani bhūyiṣṭhā oṃ kṣraum
analyzed: abhayam abhayam ātmani bhūyiṣṭhāḥ om kṣraum

original: BhP_05.18.009/1 svasty astu viśvasya khalaḥ prasīdatāṃ dhyāyantu bhūtāni śivaṃ mitho dhiyā
analyzed: svasti astu viśvasya khalaḥ prasīdatām dhyāyantu bhūtāni śivam mithas dhiyā

original: BhP_05.18.009/2 manaś ca bhadraṃ bhajatād adhokṣaje āveśyatāṃ no matir apy ahaitukī
analyzed: manaḥ ca bhadram bhajatāt adhokṣaje āveśyatām naḥ matiḥ api ahaitukī

original: BhP_05.18.010/1 māgāra-dārātmaja-vitta-bandhuṣu saṅgo yadi syād bhagavat-priyeṣu naḥ
analyzed: mā āgāra dāra ātmaja vitta bandhuṣu saṅgaḥ yadi syāt bhagavat priyeṣu naḥ

original: BhP_05.18.010/2 yaḥ prāṇa-vṛttyā parituṣṭa ātmavān siddhyaty adūrān na tathendriya-priyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇa vṛttyā parituṣṭaḥ ātmavān siddhi ati adūrāt na tathā indriya priyaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.011/1 yat-saṅga-labdhaṃ nija-vīrya-vaibhavaṃ tīrthaṃ muhuḥ saṃspṛśatāṃ hi mānasam
analyzed: yat saṅga labdham nija vīrya vaibhavam tīrtham muhur saṃspṛśatām hi mānasam

original: BhP_05.18.011/2 haraty ajo 'ntaḥ śrutibhir gato 'ṅgajaṃ ko vai na seveta mukunda-vikramam
analyzed: harati ajaḥ ntar śrutibhiḥ gataḥ ṅgajam kaḥ vai na seveta mukunda vikramam

original: BhP_05.18.012/1 yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiñcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate surāḥ
analyzed: yasya asti bhaktiḥ bhagavati akiñcanā sarvaiḥ guṇaiḥ tatra samāsate surāḥ

original: BhP_05.18.012/2 harāv abhaktasya kuto mahad-guṇā manorathenāsati dhāvato bahiḥ
analyzed: harau abhaktasya kutas mahat guṇāḥ manorathena asati dhāvataḥ bahis

original: BhP_05.18.013/1 harir hi sākṣād bhagavān śarīriṇām ātmā jhaṣāṇām iva toyam īpsitam
analyzed: hariḥ hi sākṣāt bhagavān śarīriṇām ātmā jhaṣāṇām iva toyam īpsitam

original: BhP_05.18.013/2 hitvā mahāṃs taṃ yadi sajjate gṛhe tadā mahattvaṃ vayasā dampatīnām
analyzed: hitvā mahān tam yadi sajjate gṛhe tadā mahat tvam vayasā dampatīnām

original: BhP_05.18.014/1 tasmād rajo-rāga-viṣāda-manyu- māna-spṛhā-bhayadainyādhimūlam
analyzed: tasmāt rajaḥ rāga viṣāda manyu māna spṛhā bhaya dainya ādhi mūlam

original: BhP_05.18.014/2 hitvā gṛhaṃ saṃsṛti-cakravālaṃ nṛsiṃha-pādaṃ bhajatākutobhayam iti
analyzed: hitvā gṛham saṃsṛti cakravālam nṛsiṃha pādam bhajata akutobhayam iti

original: BhP_05.18.015 /1 ketumāle 'pi bhagavān kāmadeva-svarūpeṇa lakṣmyāḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: ketumāle pi bhagavān kāmadeva sva rūpeṇa lakṣmyāḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: prajāpater duhit-ṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ tad-varṣa-patīnāṃ puruṣāyuṣāho-rātra-parisaṅkhyānānāṃ
analyzed: prajāpateḥ duhitṇām putrāṇām tad varṣa patīnām puruṣa āyuṣa ahar rātra parisaṅkhyānānām

original: yāsāṃ garbhā mahā-puruṣa-mahāstra-tejasodvejita-manasāṃ vidhvastā vyasavaḥ saṃvatsarānte vinipatanti
analyzed: yāsām garbhāḥ mahāpuruṣa mahā astra tejasā udvejita manasām vidhvastāḥ vyasavaḥ saṃvatsara ante vinipatanti

original: BhP_05.18.016 /1 atīva sulalita-gati-vilāsa-vilasita-rucira-hāsa-leśāvaloka-līlayā
analyzed: atīva su lalita gati vilāsa vilasita rucira hāsa leśa avaloka līlayā

original: kiñcid-uttambhita-sundara-bhrū-maṇḍala-subhaga-vadanāravinda-śriyā ramāṃ ramayann indriyāṇi ramayate
analyzed: kiñcid uttambhita sundara bhrū maṇḍala subhaga vadana aravinda śriyā ramām ramayan indriyāṇi ramayate

original: BhP_05.18.017/1 tad bhagavato māyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ parama-samādhi-yogena ramā devī saṃvatsarasya rātriṣu prajāpater duhitṛbhir upetāhaḥsu ca tad-bhartṛbhir  #
analyzed: tat bhagavataḥ māyā mayam rūpam parama samādhi yogena ramā devī saṃvatsarasya rātriṣu prajāpateḥ duhitṛbhiḥ upetā ahaḥsu ca tad bhartṛbhiḥ

original: upāste idaṃ codāharati
analyzed: upāste idam ca udāharati

original: BhP_05.18.018 /1 oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ oṃ namo bhagavate hṛṣīkeśāya sarva-guṇa-viśeṣair
analyzed: om       om namaḥ bhagavante hṛṣīkeśāya sarva guṇa viśeṣaiḥ

original: vilakṣitātmane ākūtīnāṃ cittīnāṃ cetasāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ cādhipataye ṣoḍaśa-kalāya cchando-mayāyānna-mayāyāmṛta-mayāya
analyzed: vilakṣita ātmane ākūtīnām cittīnām cetasām viśeṣāṇām ca adhipataye ṣoḍaśa kalāya chandaḥ mayāya anna mayāya amṛta mayāya

original: sarva-mayāya sahase ojase balāya kāntāya kāmāya namas te ubhayatra bhūyāt
analyzed: sarva mayāya sahase ojase balāya kāntāya kāmāya namaḥ te ubhayatra bhūyāt

original: BhP_05.18.019/1 striyo vratais tvā hṛṣīkeśvaraṃ svato hy ārādhya loke patim āśāsate 'nyam
analyzed: striyaḥ vrataiḥ tvā hṛṣīkeśvaram svatas hi ārādhya loke patim āśāsate

original: BhP_05.18.019/2 tāsāṃ na te vai paripānty apatyaṃ priyaṃ dhanāyūṃṣi yato 'sva-tantrāḥ
analyzed: tāsām na te vai paripānti apatyam priyam dhana āyūṃṣi yatas svatantrāḥ

original: BhP_05.18.020/1 sa vai patiḥ syād akutobhayaḥ svayaṃ samantataḥ pāti bhayāturaṃ janam
analyzed: sa vai patiḥ syāt akutobhayaḥ svayam samantataḥ pāti bhaya āturam janam

original: BhP_05.18.020/2 sa eka evetarathā mitho bhayaṃ naivātmalābhād adhi manyate param
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ evā itarathā mithas bhayam na evā ātmalābhāt adhi manyate param

original: BhP_05.18.021/1 yā tasya te pāda-saroruhārhaṇaṃ nikāmayet sākhila-kāma-lampaṭā
analyzed: yā tasya te pāda saroruha arhaṇam nikāmayet sā akhila kāma lampaṭā

original: BhP_05.18.021/2 tad eva rāsīpsitam īpsito 'rcito yad-bhagna-yācñā bhagavan pratapyate
analyzed: tat eva rāsi īpsitam īpsitaḥ rcitaḥ yat bhagna yācñā bhagavan pratapyate

original: BhP_05.18.022/1 mat-prāptaye 'jeśa-surāsurādayas tapyanta ugraṃ tapa aindriye dhiyaḥ
analyzed: mad prāptaye jeśa sura asura ādayaḥ tapyante ugram tapaḥ aindriye dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.022/2 ṛte bhavat-pāda-parāyaṇān na māṃ vindanty ahaṃ tvad-dhṛdayā yato 'jita
analyzed: ṛte bhavat pāda parāyaṇāt na mām vindanti aham tvad hṛdayāḥ yatas jita

original: BhP_05.18.023/1 sa tvaṃ mamāpy acyuta śīrṣṇi vanditaṃ karāmbujaṃ yat tvad-adhāyi sātvatām
analyzed: sa tvam mama api acyuta śīrṣṇi vanditam kara ambujam yat sātvatām

original: BhP_05.18.023/2 bibharṣi māṃ lakṣma vareṇya māyayā ka īśvarasyehitam ūhituṃ vibhur iti
analyzed: bibharṣi mām lakṣma vareṇya māyayā kaḥ īśvarasya īhitam ūhitum vibhuḥ iti

original: BhP_05.18.024/1 ramyake ca bhagavataḥ priyatamaṃ mātsyam avatāra-rūpaṃ tad-varṣa-puruṣasya manoḥ prāk-pradarśitaṃ sa idānīm api mahatā bhakti-yogenārādhayatīdaṃ
analyzed: ramyake ca bhagavataḥ priyatamam mātsyam avatāra rūpam tat varṣa puruṣasya manoḥ prāk pradarśitam saḥ idānīm api mahatā bhakti yogena ārādhayati idam

original: BhP_05.18.025/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mukhyatamāya namaḥ sattvāya prāṇāyaujase sahase balāya mahā-matsyāya nama iti
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate mukhyatamāya namaḥ sattvāya prāṇāya ojase sahase balāya mahā matsyāya namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.18.026/1 antar bahiś cākhila-loka-pālakair adṛṣṭa-rūpo vicarasy uru-svanaḥ
analyzed: antar bahis ca akhila lokapālakaiḥ adṛṣṭa rūpaḥ vicarasi uru svanaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.026/2 sa īśvaras tvaṃ ya idaṃ vaśe 'nayan nāmnā yathā dārumayīṃ naraḥ striyam
analyzed: saḥ īśvaraḥ tvam yaḥ idam vaśe nayan nāmnā yathā dāru mayīm naraḥ striyam

original: BhP_05.18.027/1 yaṃ loka-pālāḥ kila matsara-jvarā hitvā yatanto 'pi pṛthak sametya ca
analyzed: yam lokapālāḥ kila matsara jvarāḥ hitvā pi pṛthak sametya ca

original: BhP_05.18.027/2 pātuṃ na śekur dvi-padaś catuṣ-padaḥ sarīsṛpaṃ sthāṇu yad atra dṛśyate
analyzed: pātum na śekuḥ dvipadaḥ catuṣpadaḥ sarīsṛpam sthāṇu yat atra dṛśyate

original: BhP_05.18.028/1 bhavān yugāntārṇava ūrmi-mālini kṣoṇīm imām oṣadhi-vīrudhāṃ nidhim
analyzed: bhavān yugānta arṇavaḥ ūrmimālini kṣoṇīm imām oṣadhi vīrudhām nidhim

original: BhP_05.18.028/2 mayā sahoru kramate 'ja ojasā tasmai jagat-prāṇa-gaṇātmane nama iti
analyzed: mayā saha uru kramate jaḥ ojasā tasmai jagat prāṇa gaṇa ātmane namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.18.029/1 hiraṇmaye 'pi bhagavān nivasati kūrma-tanuṃ bibhrāṇas tasya tat priyatamāṃ tanum aryamā saha varṣa-puruṣaiḥ pitṛ-gaṇādhipatir  #
analyzed: hiraṇmaye pi bhagavān nivasati kūrma tanum bibhrāṇaḥ tasya tat priyatamām tanum aryamā saha varṣa puruṣaiḥ pitṛ gaṇa adhipatiḥ

original: upadhāvati mantram imaṃ cānujapati
analyzed: upadhāvati mantram imam ca anujapati

original: BhP_05.18.030/1 oṃ namo bhagavate akūpārāya sarva-sattva-guṇa-viśeṣaṇāyānu-palakṣita-sthānāya namo varṣmaṇe namo bhūmne namo namo 'vasthānāya  #
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate akūpārāya sarva sattva guṇa viśeṣaṇāya anupalakṣita sthānāya namaḥ varṣmaṇe namaḥ bhūmne namaḥ namaḥ va sthānāya

original: namas te
analyzed: namaḥ te

original: BhP_05.18.031/1 yad-rūpam etan nija-māyayārpitam artha-svarūpaṃ bahu-rūpa-rūpitam
analyzed: yad rūpam etat nija māyayā arpitam artha svarūpam bahu rūpa rūpitam

original: BhP_05.18.031/2 saṅkhyā na yasyāsty ayathopalambhanāt tasmai namas te 'vyapadeśa-rūpiṇe
analyzed: saṅkhyā na yasya asti ayathā upalambhanāt tasmai namaḥ te vyapadeśa rūpiṇe

original: BhP_05.18.032/1 jarāyujaṃ svedajam aṇḍajodbhidaṃ carācaraṃ devarṣi-pitṛ-bhūtam aindriyam
analyzed: jarāyu jam sveda jam aṇḍa ja udbhidam cara acaram deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtam aindriyam

original: BhP_05.18.032/2 dyauḥ khaṃ kṣitiḥ śaila-sarit-samudra- dvīpa-graharkṣety abhidheya ekaḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ kham kṣitiḥ śaila sarit samudra dvīpa graha ṛkṣa iti abhidheyaḥ ekaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.033/1 yasminn asaṅkhyeya-viśeṣa-nāma- rūpākṛtau kavibhiḥ kalpiteyam
analyzed: yasmin asaṅkhyeya viśeṣa nāma rūpa ākṛtau kavibhiḥ kalpitā iyam

original: BhP_05.18.033/2 saṅkhyā yayā tattva-dṛśāpanīyate tasmai namaḥ sāṅkhya-nidarśanāya te iti
analyzed: saṅkhyā yayā tattva dṛśā apanīyate tasmai namaḥ sāṅkhya nidarśanāya te iti

original: BhP_05.18.034 /1 uttareṣu ca kuruṣu bhagavān yajña-puruṣaḥ kṛta-varāha-rūpa āste
analyzed: uttareṣu ca kuruṣu bhagavān yajñapuruṣaḥ kṛtavarāha rūpaḥ āste

original: taṃ tu devī haiṣā bhūḥ saha kurubhir askhalita-bhakti-yogenopadhāvati imāṃ ca paramām
analyzed: tam tu devī ha eṣā bhūḥ saha kurubhiḥ askhalita bhakti yogena upadhāvati imām ca paramām

original: upaniṣadam āvartayati
analyzed: upaniṣadam āvartayati

original: BhP_05.18.035/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mantra-tattva-liṅgāya yajña-kratave mahā-dhvarāvayavāya mahā-puruṣāya namaḥ karma-śuklāya tri-yugāya namas
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate mantra tattva liṅgāya yajña kratave mahā adhvara avayavāya mahāpuruṣāya namaḥ karma śuklāya tri yugāya namaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.036/1 yasya svarūpaṃ kavayo vipaścito guṇeṣu dāruṣv iva jāta-vedasam
analyzed: yasya sva rūpam kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ guṇeṣu dāruṣu iva jātavedasam

original: BhP_05.18.036/2 mathnanti mathnā manasā didṛkṣavo gūḍhaṃ kriyārthair nama īritātmane
analyzed: mathnanti manasā didṛkṣavaḥ gūḍham kriyā arthaiḥ namaḥ īrita ātmane

original: BhP_05.18.037/1 dravya-kriyā-hetv-ayaneśa-kartṛbhir māyā-guṇair vastu-nirīkṣitātmane
analyzed: dravya kriyā hetu ayana īśa kartṛbhiḥ māyā guṇaiḥ vastu nirīkṣita ātmane

original: BhP_05.18.037/2 anvīkṣayāṅgātiśayātma-buddhibhir nirasta-māyākṛtaye namo namaḥ
analyzed: anvīkṣayā aṅga atiśaya ātma buddhibhiḥ nirasta māyā kṛtaye namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_05.18.038/1 karoti viśva-sthiti-saṃyamodayaṃ yasyepsitaṃ nepsitam īkṣitur guṇaiḥ
analyzed: karoti viśva sthiti saṃyama udayam yasya īpsitam na īpsitam īkṣituḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_05.18.038/2 māyā yathāyo bhramate tad-āśrayaṃ grāvṇo namas te guṇa-karma-sākṣiṇe
analyzed: māyā yathā ayaḥ bhramate tad āśrayam grāvṇaḥ namaḥ te guṇa karma sākṣiṇe

original: BhP_05.18.039/1 pramathya daityaṃ prativāraṇaṃ mṛdhe yo māṃ rasāyā jagad-ādi-sūkaraḥ
analyzed: pramathya daityam prativāraṇam mṛdhe yaḥ mām rasāyāḥ jagat ādi sūkaraḥ

original: BhP_05.18.039/2 kṛtvāgra-daṃṣṭre niragād udanvataḥ krīḍann ivebhaḥ praṇatāsmi taṃ vibhum iti
analyzed: kṛtvā agra daṃṣṭre niragāt udanvataḥ krīḍan iva ibhaḥ praṇatā asmi tam vibhum iti

original: BhP_05.19.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.19.001 /1 kimpuruṣe varṣe bhagavantam ādi-puruṣaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaṃ sītābhirāmaṃ
analyzed: kimpuruṣe varṣe bhagavantam ādipuruṣam lakṣmaṇa agrajam sītā abhirāmam

original: rāmaṃ tac-caraṇa-sannikarṣābhirataḥ parama-bhāgavato hanumān saha kimpuruṣair avirata-bhaktir upāste
analyzed: rāmam tad caraṇa sannikarṣa abhirataḥ parama bhāgavataḥ hanumān saha kimpuruṣaiḥ avirata bhaktiḥ upāste

original: BhP_05.19.002/1 ārṣṭiṣeṇena saha gandharvair anugīyamānāṃ parama-kalyāṇīṃ bhartṛ-bhagavat-kathāṃ samupaśṛṇoti svayaṃ cedaṃ gāyati
analyzed: ārṣṭiṣeṇena saha gandharvaiḥ anugīyamānām parama kalyāṇīm bhartṛ bhagavat kathām samupaśṛṇoti svayam ca idam gāyati

original: BhP_05.19.003 /1 oṃ namo bhagavate uttamaślokāya nama ārya-lakṣaṇa-śīla-vratāya nama
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavante uttamaślokāya namaḥ ārya lakṣaṇa śīla vratāya

original: upaśikṣitātmana upāsita-lokāya namaḥ sādhu-vāda-nikaṣaṇāya namo brahmaṇya-devāya
analyzed: upaśikṣita ātmane upāsita lokāya namaḥ sādhuvāda nikaṣaṇāya namaḥ brahmaṇyadevāya

original: mahā-puruṣāya mahā-rājāya nama iti
analyzed: mahāpuruṣāya mahārājāya namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.19.004/1 yat tad viśuddhānubhava-mātram ekaṃ sva-tejasā dhvasta-guṇa-vyavastham
analyzed: yat tat viśuddha anubhava mātram ekam sva tejasā dhvasta guṇa vyavastham

original: BhP_05.19.004/2 pratyak praśāntaṃ sudhiyopalambhanaṃ hy anāma-rūpaṃ nirahaṃ prapadye
analyzed: pratyak praśāntam su dhiyā upalambhanam hi a nāma rūpam niḥ aham prapadye

original: BhP_05.19.005/1 martyāvatāras tv iha martya-śikṣaṇaṃ rakṣo-vadhāyaiva na kevalaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: tu iha            eva na

original: BhP_05.19.005/2 kuto 'nyathā syād ramataḥ sva ātmanaḥ sītā-kṛtāni vyasanānīśvarasya
analyzed: kutas nyathā syāt ramataḥ sve ātmanaḥ sītā kṛtāni vyasanāni īśvarasya

original: BhP_05.19.006/1 na vai sa ātmātmavatāṃ suhṛttamaḥ saktas tri-lokyāṃ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ
analyzed: na vai saḥ ātmā ātmavatām suhṛttamaḥ saktaḥ trilokyām bhagavān vāsudevaḥ

original: BhP_05.19.006/2 na strī-kṛtaṃ kaśmalam aśnuvīta na lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi vihātum arhati
analyzed: na strī kṛtam kaśmalam aśnuvīta na lakṣmaṇam ca api vihātum arhati

original: BhP_05.19.007/1 na janma nūnaṃ mahato na saubhagaṃ na vāṅ na buddhir nākṛtis toṣa-hetuḥ
analyzed: na janma nūnam mahataḥ na saubhagam na vāc na buddhiḥ na ākṛtiḥ toṣa hetuḥ

original: BhP_05.19.007/2 tair yad visṛṣṭān api no vanaukasaś cakāra sakhye bata lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ yat visṛṣṭān api naḥ vanaukasaḥ cakāra sakhye bata lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ

original: BhP_05.19.008/1 suro 'suro vāpy atha vānaro naraḥ sarvātmanā yaḥ sukṛtajñam uttamam
analyzed: suro suraḥ vā api atha vānaraḥ naraḥ sarva ātmanā yaḥ sukṛta jñam uttamam

original: BhP_05.19.008/2 bhajeta rāmaṃ manujākṛtiṃ hariṃ ya uttarān anayat kosalān divam iti
analyzed: bhajeta rāmam manuja ākṛtim harim yaḥ uttarān anayat kosalān divam iti

original: BhP_05.19.009 /1 bhārate 'pi varṣe bhagavān nara-nārāyaṇākhya ākalpāntam upacita-dharma-jñāna-vairāgyaiśvaryopaśamoparamātmopalambhanam
analyzed: bhārate pi varṣe bhagavān naranārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ ā kalpa antam upacita dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya upaśama uparama ātma upalambhanam

original: anugrahāyātmavatām anukampayā tapo 'vyakta-gatiś carati
analyzed: anugrahāya ātmavatām anukampayā tapaḥ vyakta gatiḥ carati

original: BhP_05.19.010 /1 taṃ bhagavān nārado varṇāśramavatībhir bhāratībhiḥ prajābhir bhagavat-proktābhyāṃ
analyzed: tam bhagavān nāradaḥ varṇa āśramavatībhiḥ bhāratībhiḥ prajābhiḥ bhagavat proktābhyām

original: sāṅkhya-yogābhyāṃ bhagavad-anubhāvopavarṇanaṃ sāvarṇer upadekṣyamāṇaḥ parama-bhakti-bhāvenopasarati idaṃ cābhigṛṇāti
analyzed: sāṅkhya yogābhyām bhagavat anubhāva upavarṇanam sāvarṇeḥ upadekṣyamāṇaḥ parama bhakti bhāvena upasarati idam ca abhigṛṇāti

original: BhP_05.19.011/1 oṃ namo bhagavate upaśama-śīlāyoparatānātmyāya namo 'kiñcana-vittāya ṛṣi-ṛṣabhāya nara-nārāyaṇāya paramahaṃsa-parama-gurave  #
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate upaśama śīlāya uparata anātmyāya namaḥ kiñcana vittāya ṛṣi ṛṣabhāya nara nārāyaṇāya paramahaṃsa parama gurave

original: ātmārāmādhipataye namo nama iti
analyzed: ātma ārāma adhipataye namaḥ namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.19.012/0 gāyati cedam
analyzed: gāyati ca idam

original: BhP_05.19.012/1 kartāsya sargādiṣu yo na badhyate na hanyate deha-gato 'pi daihikaiḥ
analyzed: kartā asya sarga ādiṣu yaḥ na badhyate na hanyate deha gataḥ api daihikaiḥ

original: BhP_05.19.012/2 draṣṭur na dṛg yasya guṇair vidūṣyate tasmai namo 'sakta-vivikta-sākṣiṇe
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ na   yasya guṇaiḥ vidūṣyate tasmai sakta vivikta sākṣiṇe

original: BhP_05.19.013/1 idaṃ hi yogeśvara yoga-naipuṇaṃ hiraṇyagarbho bhagavāñ jagāda yat
analyzed: idam hi yogeśvara yoga naipuṇam hiraṇyagarbhaḥ bhagavām jagāda yat

original: BhP_05.19.013/2 yad anta-kāle tvayi nirguṇe mano bhaktyā dadhītojjhita-duṣkalevaraḥ
analyzed: yat antakāle tvayi nirguṇe manaḥ bhaktyā dadhīta ujjhita duṣkalevaraḥ

original: BhP_05.19.014/1 yathaihikāmuṣmika-kāma-lampaṭaḥ suteṣu dāreṣu dhaneṣu cintayan
analyzed: yathā aihika āmuṣmika kāma lampaṭaḥ suteṣu dāreṣu dhaneṣu cintayan

original: BhP_05.19.014/2 śaṅketa vidvān kukalevarātyayād yas tasya yatnaḥ śrama eva kevalam
analyzed: śaṅketa vidvān ku kalevara atyayāt yaḥ tasya yatnaḥ śramaḥ eva kevalam

original: BhP_05.19.015/1 tan naḥ prabho tvaṃ kukalevarārpitāṃ tvan-māyayāhaṃ-mamatām adhokṣaja
analyzed: tat naḥ prabho tvam ku kalevara arpitām tvad māyayā ahaṃmamatām adhokṣaja

original: BhP_05.19.015/2 bhindyāma yenāśu vayaṃ sudurbhidāṃ vidhehi yogaṃ tvayi naḥ svabhāvam iti
analyzed: bhindyāma yena āśu vayam su durbhidām vidhehi yogam tvayi naḥ svabhāvam iti

original: BhP_05.19.016 /1 bhārate 'py asmin varṣe saric-chailāḥ santi bahavo malayo maṅgala-prastho
analyzed: bhārate pi asmin varṣe sarit śailāḥ santi bahavaḥ malayaḥ

original: mainākas trikūṭa ṛṣabhaḥ kūṭakaḥ kollakaḥ sahyo devagirir ṛṣyamūkaḥ śrī-śailo veṅkaṭo
analyzed: mainākaḥ trikūṭaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ kūṭakaḥ kollakaḥ sahyaḥ devagiriḥ ṛṣyamūkaḥ śrīśailaḥ veṅkaṭaḥ

original: mahendro vāridhāro vindhyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣagiriḥ pāriyātro droṇaś citrakūṭo govardhano
analyzed: mahendraḥ vāridhāraḥ vindhyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣa giriḥ pāriyātraḥ droṇaḥ citrakūṭaḥ govardhanaḥ

original: raivatakaḥ kakubho nīlo gokāmukha indrakīlaḥ kāmagirir iti cānye ca śata-sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: raivatakaḥ kakubhaḥ nīlaḥ gokāmukhaḥ indrakīlaḥ kāmagiriḥ iti ca anye ca śata sahasraśas

original: śailās teṣāṃ nitamba-prabhavā nadā nadyaś ca santy asaṅkhyātāḥ
analyzed: śailāḥ teṣām nitamba prabhavāḥ nadāḥ nadyaḥ ca santi asaṅkhyātāḥ

original: BhP_05.19.017/1 etāsām apo bhāratyaḥ prajā nāmabhir eva punantīnām ātmanā copaspṛśanti
analyzed: etāsām apaḥ bhāratyaḥ prajāḥ nāmabhiḥ eva punantīnām ātmanā ca upaspṛśanti

original: BhP_05.19.018 /1 candravasā tāmraparṇī avaṭodā kṛtamālā vaihāyasī kāverī veṇī payasvinī
śarkarāvartā tuṅgabhadrā kṛṣṇāveṇyā bhīmarathī godāvarī nirvindhyā payoṣṇī tāpī revā
surasā narmadā carmaṇvatī sindhur andhaḥ śoṇaś ca nadau mahānadī vedasmṛtir ṛṣikulyā
analyzed: surasā narmadā carmaṇvatī sindhuḥ andhaḥ śoṇaḥ ca nadau mahā nadī vedasmṛtiḥ ṛṣikulyā

original: trisāmā kauśikī mandākinī yamunā sarasvatī dṛṣadvatī gomatī sarayū rodhasvatī saptavatī
analyzed: trisāmā kauśikī mandākinī yamunā sarasvatī dṛṣadvatī gomatī sarayū rodhasvatī saptavatī

original: suṣomā śatadrūś candrabhāgā marudvṛdhā vitastā asiknī viśveti mahā-nadyaḥ
analyzed: suṣomā śatadrūḥ candrabhāgā marudvṛdhā vitastā asiknī viśvā iti mahā nadyaḥ

original: BhP_05.19.019 /1 asminn eva varṣe puruṣair labdha-janmabhiḥ śukla-lohita-kṛṣṇa-varṇena
analyzed: asmin eva varṣe puruṣaiḥ labdha janmabhiḥ śukla lohita kṛṣṇa varṇena

original: svārabdhena karmaṇā divya-mānuṣa-nāraka-gatayo bahvya ātmana ānupūrvyeṇa sarvā hy
analyzed: su ārabdhena karmaṇā divya mānuṣa nāraka gatayaḥ bahvyaḥ ātmanaḥ ānupūrvyeṇa sarvāḥ hi

original: eva sarveṣāṃ vidhīyante yathā-varṇa-vidhānam apavargaś cāpi bhavati
analyzed: eva sarveṣām vidhīyante yathā varṇa vidhānam apavargaḥ ca api bhavati

original: BhP_05.19.020 /1 yo 'sau bhagavati sarva-bhūtātmany anātmye 'nirukte 'nilayane paramātmani
analyzed: bhagavati sarva bhūta ātmani anātmye nirukte nilayane paramātmani

original: vāsudeve 'nanya-nimitta-bhakti-yoga-lakṣaṇo nānā-gati-nimittāvidyā-granthi-randhana-dvāreṇa
analyzed: vāsudeve nānā gati nimitta avidyā granthi randhana dvāreṇa

original: yadā hi mahā-puruṣa-puruṣa-prasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: yadā hi mahā puruṣa puruṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_05.19.021/0 etad eva hi devā gāyanti
analyzed: etat eva hi devāḥ gāyanti

original: BhP_05.19.021/1 aho amīṣāṃ kim akāri śobhanaṃ prasanna eṣāṃ svid uta svayaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: aho amīṣām kim akāri śobhanam prasannaḥ eṣām svid uta svayam hariḥ

original: BhP_05.19.021/2 yair janma labdhaṃ nṛṣu bhāratājire mukunda-sevaupayikaṃ spṛhā hi naḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ janma labdham nṛṣu bhārata ajire mukunda sevā aupayikam spṛhā hi naḥ

original: BhP_05.19.022/1 kiṃ duṣkarair naḥ kratubhis tapo-vratair dānādibhir vā dyujayena phalgunā
analyzed: kim duṣkaraiḥ naḥ kratubhiḥ tapaḥ vrataiḥ dāna ādibhiḥ vā dyu jayena phalgunā

original: BhP_05.19.022/2 na yatra nārāyaṇa-pāda-paṅkaja- smṛtiḥ pramuṣṭātiśayendriyotsavāt
analyzed: na yatra nārāyaṇa pāda paṅkaja smṛtiḥ pramuṣṭa atiśaya indriya utsavāt

original: BhP_05.19.023/1 kalpāyuṣāṃ sthānajayāt punar-bhavāt kṣaṇāyuṣāṃ bhārata-bhūjayo varam
analyzed: kalpa āyuṣām sthāna jayāt punarbhavāt kṣaṇa āyuṣām bhārata bhū jayaḥ varam

original: BhP_05.19.023/2 kṣaṇena martyena kṛtaṃ manasvinaḥ sannyasya saṃyānty abhayaṃ padaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇena martyena kṛtam manasvinaḥ sannyasya saṃyānti abhayam padam hareḥ

original: BhP_05.19.024/1 na yatra vaikuṇṭha-kathā-sudhāpagā na sādhavo bhāgavatās tadāśrayāḥ
analyzed: na yatra vaikuṇṭha kathā sudhā āpagā na sādhavaḥ bhāgavatāḥ tad āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_05.19.024/2 na yatra yajñeśa-makhā mahotsavāḥ sureśa-loko 'pi na vai sa sevyatām
analyzed: na yatra yajñeśa makhāḥ mahā utsavāḥ na vai sa sevyatām

original: BhP_05.19.025/1 prāptā nṛ-jātiṃ tv iha ye ca jantavo jñāna-kriyā-dravya-kalāpa-sambhṛtām
analyzed: prāptāḥ nṛ jātim tu iha ye ca jantavaḥ jñāna kriyā dravya kalāpa sambhṛtām

original: BhP_05.19.025/2 na vai yaterann apunar-bhavāya te bhūyo vanaukā iva yānti bandhanam
analyzed: na vai yateran apunarbhavāya te bhūyas vanaukāḥ iva yānti bandhanam

original: BhP_05.19.026/1 yaiḥ śraddhayā barhiṣi bhāgaśo havir niruptam iṣṭaṃ vidhi-mantra-vastutaḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ śraddhayā barhiṣi bhāgaśas haviḥ niruptam iṣṭam vidhi mantra vastutaḥ

original: BhP_05.19.026/2 ekaḥ pṛthaṅ-nāmabhir āhuto mudā gṛhṇāti pūrṇaḥ svayam āśiṣāṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ pṛthak nāmabhiḥ āhutaḥ mudā gṛhṇāti pūrṇaḥ svayam āśiṣām prabhuḥ

original: BhP_05.19.027/1 satyaṃ diśaty arthitam arthito nṛṇāṃ naivārthado yat punar arthitā yataḥ
analyzed: satyam diśati arthitam arthitaḥ nṛṇām na eva artha daḥ yat punar arthitā yatas

original: BhP_05.19.027/2 svayaṃ vidhatte bhajatām anicchatām icchāpidhānaṃ nija-pāda-pallavam
analyzed: svayam vidhatte bhajatām an icchatām icchā apidhānam nija pāda pallavam

original: BhP_05.19.028/1 yady atra naḥ svarga-sukhāvaśeṣitaṃ sviṣṭasya sūktasya kṛtasya śobhanam
analyzed: yadi atra naḥ svarga sukha avaśeṣitam su iṣṭasya sūktasya kṛtasya śobhanam

original: BhP_05.19.028/2 tenājanābhe smṛtimaj janma naḥ syād varṣe harir yad-bhajatāṃ śaṃ tanoti
analyzed: tena aja nābhe smṛtimat janma naḥ syāt varṣe hariḥ yat bhajatām śam tanoti

original: BhP_05.19.029/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.19.029/1 jambūdvīpasya ca rājann upadvīpān aṣṭau haika upadiśanti sagarātmajair aśvānveṣaṇa imāṃ mahīṃ parito nikhanadbhir upakalpitān
analyzed: jambūdvīpasya ca rājan upadvīpān aṣṭau ha eke upadiśanti sagara ātmajaiḥ aśva anveṣaṇe imām mahīm paritas nikhanadbhiḥ upakalpitān

original: BhP_05.19.030/1 tad yathā svarṇaprasthaś candraśukla āvartano ramaṇako mandarahariṇaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ siṃhalo laṅketi
analyzed: tat yathā svarṇaprasthaḥ candraśuklaḥ āvartanaḥ ramaṇakaḥ mandarahariṇaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ siṃhalaḥ laṅkā iti

original: BhP_05.19.031/1 evaṃ tava bhāratottama jambūdvīpa-varṣa-vibhāgo yathopadeśam upavarṇita iti
analyzed: evam tava bhārata uttama jambūdvīpa varṣa vibhāgaḥ yathopadeśam upavarṇitaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.20.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.20.001/1 ataḥ paraṃ plakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇa-saṃsthānato varṣa-vibhāga upavarṇyate
analyzed: atas param plakṣa ādīnām pramāṇa lakṣaṇa saṃsthānataḥ varṣa vibhāgaḥ upavarṇyate

original: BhP_05.20.002 /1 jambūdvīpo 'yaṃ yāvat-pramāṇa-vistāras tāvatā kṣārodadhinā pariveṣṭito
analyzed: jambūdvīpaḥ yam yāvat pramāṇa vistāraḥ tāvatā kṣāra udadhinā

original: yathā merur jambv-ākhyena lavaṇodadhir api tato dvi-guṇa-viśālena plakṣākhyena parikṣipto
analyzed: yathā meruḥ jambu ākhyena lavaṇa udadhiḥ api tatas dviguṇa viśālena plakṣa ākhyena parikṣiptaḥ

original: yathā parikhā bāhyopavanena plakṣo jambū-pramāṇo dvīpākhyākaro hiraṇmaya utthito
analyzed: yathā parikhā bāhya upavanena plakṣaḥ jambū pramāṇaḥ dvīpa ākhyā karaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ utthitaḥ

original: yatrāgnir upāste sapta-jihvas tasyādhipatiḥ priyavratātmaja idhmajihvaḥ svaṃ dvīpaṃ
analyzed: yatra agniḥ upāste saptajihvaḥ tasya adhipatiḥ priyavrata ātmajaḥ idhmajihvaḥ svam dvīpam

original: sapta-varṣāṇi vibhajya sapta-varṣa-nāmabhya ātmajebhya ākalayya svayam ātma-yogenopararāma
analyzed: sapta varṣāṇi vibhajya sapta varṣa nāmabhyaḥ ātmajebhyaḥ ākalayya svayam ātma yogena upararāma

original: BhP_05.20.003/1 śivaṃ yavasaṃ subhadraṃ śāntaṃ kṣemam amṛtam abhayam iti varṣāṇi teṣu girayo nadyaś ca saptaivābhijñātāḥ
analyzed: śivam yavasam subhadram śāntam kṣemam amṛtam abhayam iti varṣāṇi teṣu girayaḥ nadyaḥ ca sapta eva abhijñātāḥ

original: BhP_05.20.004 /1 maṇikūṭo vajrakūṭa indraseno jyotiṣmān suparṇo hiraṇyaṣṭhīvo meghamāla
iti setu-śailāḥ aruṇā nṛmṇāṅgirasī sāvitrī suptabhātā ṛtambharā satyambharā iti mahā-nadyaḥ
analyzed: iti setuśailāḥ aruṇā nṛmṇā āṅgirasī sāvitrī suptabhātā ṛtambharā satyambharā iti mahā nadyaḥ

original: yāsāṃ jalopasparśana-vidhūta-rajas-tamaso haṃsa-pataṅgordhvāyana-satyāṅga-saṃjñāś
analyzed: yāsām jala upasparśana vidhūta rajaḥ tamasaḥ haṃsa pataṅga ūrdhvāyana satyāṅga saṃjñāḥ

original: catvāro varṇāḥ sahasrāyuṣo vibudhopama-sandarśana-prajananāḥ svarga-dvāraṃ trayyā
analyzed: catvāraḥ varṇāḥ sahasra āyuṣaḥ vibudha upama sandarśana prajananāḥ svarga dvāram trayyā

original: vidyayā bhagavantaṃ trayīmayaṃ sūryam ātmānaṃ yajante
analyzed: vidyayā bhagavantam trayī mayam sūryam ātmānam yajante

original: BhP_05.20.005/1 pratnasya viṣṇo rūpaṃ yat satyasyartasya brahmaṇaḥ
analyzed: pratnasya viṣṇoḥ rūpam yat satyasya ṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.005/2 amṛtasya ca mṛtyoś ca sūryam ātmānam īmahīti
analyzed: amṛtasya ca mṛtyoḥ ca sūryam ātmānam īmahi iti

original: BhP_05.20.006/1 plakṣādiṣu pañcasu puruṣāṇām āyur indriyam ojaḥ saho balaṃ buddhir vikrama iti ca sarveṣām autpattikī siddhir aviśeṣeṇa vartate
analyzed: plakṣa ādiṣu pañcasu puruṣāṇām āyuḥ indriyam ojaḥ sahaḥ balam buddhiḥ vikramaḥ iti ca sarveṣām autpattikī siddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa vartate

original: BhP_05.20.007/1 plakṣaḥ sva-samānenekṣu-rasodenāvṛto yathā tathā dvīpo 'pi śālmalo dvi-guṇa-viśālaḥ samānena surodenāvṛtaḥ parivṛṅkte
analyzed: plakṣaḥ sva samānena ikṣu rasa udena āvṛtaḥ yathā tathā śālmalaḥ dviguṇa viśālaḥ samānena surodena āvṛtaḥ parivṛṅkte

original: BhP_05.20.008/1 yatra ha vai śālmalī plakṣāyāmā yasyāṃ vāva kila nilayam āhur bhagavataś chandaḥ-stutaḥ patattri-rājasya sā dvīpa-hūtaye upalakṣyate
analyzed: yatra ha vai śālmalī plakṣa āyāmā yasyām vāva kila nilayam āhuḥ bhagavataḥ chandaḥstutaḥ patattrirājasya sā dvīpa hūtaye upalakṣyate

original: BhP_05.20.009 /1 tad-dvīpādhipatiḥ priyavratātmajo yajñabāhuḥ sva-sutebhyaḥ saptabhyas
analyzed: tad dvīpa adhipatiḥ priyavrata ātmajaḥ yajñabāhuḥ sva sutebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ

original: tan-nāmāni sapta-varṣāṇi vyabhajat surocanaṃ saumanasyaṃ ramaṇakaṃ deva-varṣaṃ pāribhadram
analyzed: tad nāmāni sapta varṣāṇi vyabhajat surocanam saumanasyam ramaṇakam deva varṣam pāribhadram

original: āpyāyanam avijñātam iti
analyzed: āpyāyanam a vijñātam iti

original: BhP_05.20.010 /1 teṣu varṣādrayo nadyaś ca saptaivābhijñātāḥ svarasaḥ śataśṛṅgo vāmadevaḥ
analyzed: teṣu varṣa adrayaḥ nadyaḥ ca sapta eva abhijñātāḥ svarasaḥ śataśṛṅgaḥ vāmadevaḥ

original: kundo mukundaḥ puṣpa-varṣaḥ sahasra-śrutir iti anumatiḥ sinīvālī sarasvatī kuhū rajanī nandā rāketi
analyzed: kundaḥ mukundaḥ puṣpavarṣaḥ sahasraśrutiḥ iti anumatiḥ sinīvālī sarasvatī kuhū rajanī nandā rākā iti

original: BhP_05.20.011/1 tad-varṣa-puruṣāḥ śrutadhara-vīryadhara-vasundhareṣandhara-saṃjñā bhagavantaṃ vedamayaṃ somam ātmānaṃ vedena yajante
analyzed: tad varṣa puruṣāḥ śrutadhara vīryadhara vasundhara iṣandhara saṃjñāḥ bhagavantam veda mayam somam ātmānam vedena yajante

original: BhP_05.20.012/1 sva-gobhiḥ pitṛ-devebhyo vibhajan kṛṣṇa-śuklayoḥ
analyzed: sva gobhiḥ pitṛ devebhyaḥ vibhajan kṛṣṇa śuklayoḥ

original: BhP_05.20.012/2 prajānāṃ sarvāsāṃ rājā- ndhaḥ somo na āstv iti
analyzed: prajānām sarvāsām rājā ndhaḥ somaḥ naḥ āstu iti

original: BhP_05.20.013 /1 evaṃ surodād bahis tad-dvi-guṇaḥ samānenāvṛto ghṛtodena yathā-pūrvaḥ
analyzed: evam surodāt bahis tad dviguṇaḥ samānena āvṛtaḥ ghṛtodena yathāpūrvaḥ

original: kuśa-dvīpo yasmin kuśa-stambo deva-kṛtas tad-dvīpākhyākaro jvalana ivāparaḥ sva-śaṣpa-rociṣā diśo virājayati
analyzed: kuśadvīpaḥ yasmin kuśa stambaḥ deva kṛtaḥ tad dvīpa ākhyā karaḥ jvalanaḥ iva aparaḥ sva śaṣpa rociṣā diśaḥ virājayati

original: BhP_05.20.014 /1 tad-dvīpa-patiḥ praiyavrato rājan hiraṇyaretā nāma svaṃ dvīpaṃ saptabhyaḥ
analyzed: tad dvīpa patiḥ praiyavrataḥ rājan hiraṇyaretāḥ nāma svam dvīpam saptabhyaḥ

original: sva-putrebhyo yathā-bhāgaṃ vibhajya svayaṃ tapa ātiṣṭhata vasu-vasudāna-dṛḍharuci-nābhigupta-stutyavrata-vivikta-vāmadeva-nāmabhyaḥ
analyzed: sva putrebhyaḥ yathābhāgam vibhajya svayam tapaḥ ātiṣṭhata vasu vasudāna dṛḍharuci nābhigupta stutya vrata vivikta vāmadeva nāmabhyaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.015 /1 teṣāṃ varṣeṣu sīmā-girayo nadyaś cābhijñātāḥ sapta saptaiva cakraś
analyzed: teṣām varṣeṣu sīmā girayaḥ nadyaḥ ca abhijñātāḥ sapta sapta eva

original: catuḥśṛṅgaḥ kapilaś citrakūṭo devānīka ūrdhvaromā draviṇa iti rasakulyā madhukulyā
analyzed: catuḥśṛṅgaḥ kapilaḥ citrakūṭaḥ devānīkaḥ ūrdhvaromā draviṇaḥ iti rasakulyāḥ madhukulyā

original: mitravindā śrutavindā devagarbhā ghṛtacyutā mantramāleti
analyzed: mitravindā śrutavindā devagarbhā ghṛta cyutā mantra mālā iti

original: BhP_05.20.016/1 yāsāṃ payobhiḥ kuśadvīpaukasaḥ kuśala-kovidābhiyukta-kulaka-saṃjñā bhagavantaṃ jātaveda-sarūpiṇaṃ karma-kauśalena yajante
analyzed: yāsām payobhiḥ kuśadvīpa okasaḥ kuśala kovida abhiyukta kulaka saṃjñāḥ bhagavantam jātavedasa rūpiṇam karma kauśalena yajante

original: BhP_05.20.017/1 parasya brahmaṇaḥ sākṣāj jāta-vedo 'si havyavāṭ
analyzed: parasya brahmaṇaḥ sākṣāt jātavedaḥ si havyavāṭ

original: BhP_05.20.017/2 devānāṃ puruṣāṅgānāṃ yajñena puruṣaṃ yajeti
analyzed: devānām puruṣa aṅgānām yajñena puruṣam yaja iti

original: BhP_05.20.018 /1 tathā ghṛtodād bahiḥ krauñcadvīpo dvi-guṇaḥ sva-mānena kṣīrodena
analyzed: tathā ghṛtodāt bahis krauñcadvīpaḥ dviguṇaḥ sva mānena kṣīrodena

original: parita upakḷpto vṛto yathā kuśadvīpo ghṛtodena yasmin krauñco nāma parvata-rājo dvīpa-nāma-nirvartaka āste
analyzed: paritas upakḷptaḥ vṛtaḥ yathā kuśadvīpaḥ ghṛtodena yasmin krauñcaḥ nāma parvata rājaḥ dvīpa nāma nirvartakaḥ āste

original: BhP_05.20.019/1 yo 'sau guha-praharaṇonmathita-nitamba-kuñjo 'pi kṣīrodenā-sicyamāno bhagavatā varuṇenābhigupto vibhayo babhūva
analyzed: yaḥ sau guha praharaṇa unmathita nitamba kuñjaḥ kṣīrodena āsicyamānaḥ bhagavatā varuṇena abhiguptaḥ vibhayaḥ babhūva

original: BhP_05.20.020 /1 tasminn api praiyavrato ghṛtapṛṣṭho nāmādhipatiḥ sve dvīpe varṣāṇi
analyzed: tasmin api praiyavrataḥ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ nāma adhipatiḥ sve dvīpe varṣāṇi

original: sapta vibhajya teṣu putra-nāmasu sapta rikthādān varṣapān niveśya svayaṃ bhagavān
analyzed: sapta vibhajya teṣu putra nāmasu sapta riktha ādān varṣapān niveśya svayam bhagavān

original: bhagavataḥ parama-kalyāṇa-yaśasa ātma-bhūtasya hareś caraṇāravindam upajagāma
analyzed: bhagavataḥ parama kalyāṇa yaśasaḥ ātma bhūtasya hareḥ caraṇa aravindam upajagāma

original: BhP_05.20.021 /1 āmo madhuruho meghapṛṣṭhaḥ sudhāmā bhrājiṣṭho lohitārṇo vanaspatir
analyzed: āmaḥ madhuruhaḥ megha pṛṣṭhaḥ sudhāmā bhrājiṣṭhaḥ lohita arṇaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: iti ghṛtapṛṣṭha-sutās teṣāṃ varṣa-girayaḥ sapta saptaiva nadyaś cābhikhyātāḥ śuklo
analyzed: iti ghṛtapṛṣṭhasutāḥ teṣām varṣagirayaḥ sapta sapta eva nadyaḥ ca abhikhyātāḥ

original: vardhamāno bhojana upabarhiṇo nando nandanaḥ sarvatobhadra iti abhayā amṛtaughā āryakā
analyzed: vardhamānaḥ bhojanaḥ upabarhiṇaḥ nandaḥ nandanaḥ sarvatobhadraḥ iti abhayāḥ amṛtaughāḥ āryakāḥ

original: tīrthavatī rūpavatī pavitravatī śukleti
analyzed: tīrthavatī rūpavatī pavitravatī śuklā iti

original: BhP_05.20.022/1 yāsām ambhaḥ pavitram amalam upayuñjānāḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabha-draviṇa-devaka-saṃjñā varṣa-puruṣā āpomayaṃ devam apāṃ pūrṇenāñjalinā
analyzed: yāsām ambhaḥ pavitram amalam upayuñjānāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha draviṇa devaka saṃjñāḥ varṣa puruṣāḥ āpaḥ mayam devam apām pūrṇena añjalinā

original: BhP_05.20.023/1 āpaḥ puruṣa-vīryāḥ stha punantīr bhūr-bhuvaḥ-suvaḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ puruṣa vīryāḥ stha punantīḥ bhūḥ bhuvaḥ suvar

original: BhP_05.20.023/2 tā naḥ punītāmīva-ghnīḥ spṛśatām ātmanā bhuva iti
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ punīta amīva ghnīḥ spṛśatām ātmanā bhuvaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.20.024 /1 evaṃ purastāt kṣīrodāt parita upaveśitaḥ śākadvīpo dvātriṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāyāmaḥ
analyzed: evam purastāt kṣīrodāt paritas upaveśitaḥ śākadvīpaḥ dvātriṃśat lakṣa yojana āyāmaḥ

original: samānena ca dadhi-maṇḍodena parīto yasmin śāko nāma mahīruhaḥ sva-kṣetra-vyapadeśako
analyzed: samānena ca dadhimaṇḍa udena parītaḥ yasmin śākaḥ nāma mahīruhaḥ sva kṣetra vyapadeśakaḥ

original: yasya ha mahā-surabhi-gandhas taṃ dvīpam anuvāsayati
analyzed: yasya ha mahā surabhi gandhaḥ tam dvīpam anuvāsayati

original: BhP_05.20.025 /1 tasyāpi praiyavrata evādhipatir nāmnā medhātithiḥ so 'pi vibhajya
analyzed: tasya api praiyavrataḥ eva adhipatiḥ nāmnā medhātithiḥ vibhajya

original: sapta varṣāṇi putra-nāmāni teṣu svātmajān purojava-manojava-pavamāna-dhūmrānīka-citrarepha-bahurūpa-viśvadhāra-saṃjñān
analyzed: sapta varṣāṇi putra nāmāni teṣu sva ātmajān purojava manojava pavamāna dhūmrānīka citrarepha bahurūpa viśvadhāra saṃjñān

original: nidhāpyādhipatīn svayaṃ bhagavaty ananta ā-veśita-matis tapovanaṃ praviveśa
analyzed: nidhāpya adhipatīn svayam bhagavati anante āveśita matiḥ tapaḥ vanam praviveśa

original: BhP_05.20.026 /1 eteṣāṃ varṣa-maryādā-girayo nadyaś ca sapta saptaiva īśāna uruśṛṅgo
analyzed: eteṣām varṣa maryādā girayaḥ nadyaḥ ca sapta sapta eva īśānaḥ uru śṛṅgaḥ

original: balabhadraḥ śatakesaraḥ sahasrasroto devapālo mahānasa iti anaghāyurdā ubhayaspṛṣṭir
analyzed: balabhadraḥ śatakesaraḥ sahasrasrotaḥ devapālaḥ mahānasaḥ iti anagha āyuḥ dāḥ ubhaya spṛṣṭiḥ

original: aparājitā pañcapadī sahasrasrutir nijadhṛtir iti
analyzed: aparājitā pañcapadī sahasra srutiḥ nijadhṛtiḥ iti

original: BhP_05.20.027/1 tad-varṣa-puruṣā ṛtavrata-satyavrata-dānavratānuvrata-nāmāno bhagavantaṃ vāyv-ātmakaṃ prāṇāyāma-vidhūta-rajas-tamasaḥ parama-samādhinā
analyzed: tad varṣa puruṣāḥ ṛtavrata satyavrata dānavrata anuvrata nāmānaḥ bhagavantam vāyu ātmakam prāṇāyāma vidhūta rajaḥ tamasaḥ parama samādhinā

original: BhP_05.20.028/1 antaḥ-praviśya bhūtāni yo bibharty ātma-ketubhiḥ
analyzed: antar praviśya bhūtāni yaḥ bibharti ātma ketubhiḥ

original: BhP_05.20.028/2 antaryāmīśvaraḥ sākṣāt pātu no yad-vaśe sphuṭam
analyzed: antaryāmī īśvaraḥ sākṣāt pātu naḥ yad vaśe sphuṭam

original: BhP_05.20.029 /1 evam eva dadhi-maṇḍodāt parataḥ puṣkaradvīpas tato dvi-guṇāyāmaḥ
analyzed: evam eva dadhimaṇḍa udāt paratas puṣkaradvīpaḥ tatas dviguṇa āyāmaḥ

original: samantata upakalpitaḥ samānena svādūdakena samudreṇa bahir āvṛto yasmin bṛhat-puṣkaraṃ
analyzed: samantataḥ upakalpitaḥ samānena svādu udakena samudreṇa bahis āvṛtaḥ yasmin bṛhat puṣkaram

original: jvalana-śikhāmala-kanaka-patrāyutāyutaṃ bhagavataḥ kamalāsanasyādhyāsanaṃ parikalpitam
analyzed: jvalana śikhā amala kanaka patra ayuta ayutam bhagavataḥ kamalāsanasya adhyāsanam parikalpitam

original: BhP_05.20.030 /1 tad-dvīpa-madhye mānasottara-nāmaika evārvācīna-parācīna-varṣayor
analyzed: tad dvīpa madhye mānasottara nāmā ekaḥ eva arvācīna parācīna varṣayoḥ

original: maryādācalo 'yuta-yojanocchrāyāyāmo yatra tu catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri purāṇi loka-pālānām
analyzed: maryādācalaḥ yuta yojana ucchrāya āyāmaḥ yatra tu catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri purāṇi lokapālānām

original: indrādīnāṃ yad-upariṣṭāt sūrya-rathasya meruṃ paribhramataḥ saṃvatsarātmakaṃ cakraṃ
analyzed: indra ādīnām yat upariṣṭāt sūrya rathasya merum paribhramataḥ saṃvatsara ātmakam cakram

original: devānām aho-rātrābhyāṃ paribhramati
analyzed: devānām ahar rātrābhyām paribhramati

original: BhP_05.20.031/1 tad-dvīpasyāpy adhipatiḥ praiyavrato vītihotro nāmaitasyātmajau ramaṇaka-dhātaki-nāmānau varṣa-patī niyujya sa svayaṃ pūrvajavad-bhagavat-karma-śīla
analyzed: tad dvīpasya api adhipatiḥ praiyavrataḥ vītihotraḥ nāma etasya ātmajau ramaṇaka dhātaki nāmānau varṣa patī niyujya sa svayam pūrvaja vat bhagavat karma śīla

original: BhP_05.20.032/1 tad-varṣa-puruṣā bhagavantaṃ brahma-rūpiṇaṃ sakarmakeṇa karmaṇārādhayantīdaṃ codāharanti
analyzed: tat varṣa puruṣāḥ bhagavantam brahma rūpiṇam sa karmakeṇa karmaṇā ārādhayanti idam ca udāharanti

original: BhP_05.20.033/1 yat tat karmamayaṃ liṅgaṃ brahma-liṅgaṃ jano 'rcayet
analyzed: yat tat karma mayam liṅgam brahma liṅgam janaḥ arcayet

original: BhP_05.20.033/2 ekāntam advayaṃ śāntaṃ tasmai bhagavate nama iti
analyzed: ekāntam advayam śāntam tasmai bhagavate namaḥ iti

original: BhP_05.20.034/1 tataḥ parastāl lokāloka-nāmācalo lokālokayor antarāle parita upakṣiptaḥ
analyzed: tatas parastāt lokāloka nāma acalaḥ lokālokayoḥ antarāle paritas upakṣiptaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.035 /1 yāvan mānasottara-mervor antaraṃ tāvatī bhūmiḥ kāñcany anyādarśa-talopamā
analyzed: yāvat mānasa uttaram ervoḥ antaram tāvatī bhūmiḥ kāñcanī anya ādarśa tala upamā

original: yasyāṃ prahitaḥ padārtho na kathañcit punaḥ pratyupalabhyate tasmāt sarva-sattva-parihṛtāsīt
analyzed: yasyām prahitaḥ padārthaḥ na kathañcid punar pratyupalabhyate tasmāt sarva sattva parihṛtā āsīt

original: BhP_05.20.036/1 lokāloka iti samākhyā yad anenācalena lokālokasyāntarvar-tināvasthāpyate
analyzed: lokālokaḥ iti samākhyā yat anena acalena lokālokasya antar vartinā avasthāpyate

original: BhP_05.20.037 /1 sa loka-trayānte parita īśvareṇa vihito yasmāt sūryādīnāṃ dhruvāpavargāṇāṃ
analyzed: sa loka traya ante paritas īśvareṇa vihitaḥ yasmāt sūrya ādīnām dhruva apavargāṇām

original: jyotir-gaṇānāṃ gabhastayo 'rvācīnāṃs trīn lokān āvitanvānā na kadācit parācīnā bhavitum
analyzed: jyotiḥ gaṇānām gabhastayoḥ rvācīnān trīn lokān āvitanvānāḥ na kadācid parācīnāḥ bhavitum

original: utsahante tāvad un-nahanāyāmaḥ
analyzed: utsahante tāvat unnahanāyāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.038/1 etāvān loka-vinyāso māna-lakṣaṇa-saṃsthābhir vicintitaḥ kavibhiḥ sa tu pañcāśat-koṭi-gaṇitasya bhū-golasya turīya-bhāgo 'yaṃ
analyzed: etāvān loka vinyāsaḥ māna lakṣaṇa saṃsthābhiḥ vicintitaḥ kavibhiḥ sa tu pañcāśat koṭi gaṇitasya bhū golasya turīya bhāgaḥ yam

original: BhP_05.20.039/1 tad-upariṣṭāc catasṛṣv āśāsvātma-yoninākhila-jagad-guruṇādhiniveśitā ye dvirada-pataya ṛṣabhaḥ puṣkaracūḍo vāmano 'parājita  #
analyzed: tad upariṣṭāt catasṛṣu āśāsu ātmayoninā akhila jagat guruṇā adhiniveśitāḥ ye dvirada patayaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ puṣkaracūḍaḥ vāmano parājita  /

original: iti sakala-loka-sthiti-hetavaḥ
analyzed: iti sakala loka sthiti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.040 /1 teṣāṃ sva-vibhūtīnāṃ loka-pālānāṃ ca vividha-vīryopabṛṃhaṇāya bhagavān
analyzed: teṣām sva vibhūtīnām lokapālānām ca vividha vīrya upabṛṃhaṇāya bhagavān

original: parama-mahā-puruṣo mahā-vibhūti-patir antaryāmy ātmano viśuddha-sattvaṃ dharma-jñāna-vairāgyaiśvaryādy-aṣṭa-mahā-siddhy-upalakṣaṇaṃ
viṣvaksenādibhiḥ sva-pārṣada-pravaraiḥ parivārito nija-varāyudhopaśobhitair nija-bhuja-daṇḍaiḥ
analyzed: viṣvaksena ādibhiḥ sva pārṣada pravaraiḥ parivāritaḥ nija vara āyudha upaśobhitaiḥ nija bhuja daṇḍaiḥ

original: sandhārayamāṇas tasmin giri-vare samantāt sakala-loka-svastaya āste
analyzed: sandhārayamāṇaḥ tasmin giri vare samantāt sakala loka svastaye āste

original: BhP_05.20.041/1 ākalpam evaṃ veṣaṃ gata eṣa bhagavān ātma-yogamāyayā viracita-vividha-loka-yātrā-gopīyāyety arthaḥ
analyzed: ākalpam evam veṣam gataḥ eṣa bhagavān ātma yoga māyayā viracita vividha lokayātrā gopīyāya iti arthaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.042/1 yo 'ntar-vistāra etena hy aloka-parimāṇaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ yad bahir lokālokācalāt tataḥ parastād yogeśvara-gatiṃ viśuddhām udāharanti
analyzed: yaḥ ntar vistāraḥ etena hi aloka parimāṇam ca vyākhyātam yat bahis lokāloka acalāt tatas parastāt yogeśvara gatim viśuddhām udāharanti

original: BhP_05.20.043/1 aṇḍa-madhya-gataḥ sūryo dyāv-ābhūmyor yad antaram
analyzed: aṇḍa madhya gataḥ sūryaḥ dyāvābhūmyoḥ yat antaram

original: BhP_05.20.043/2 sūryāṇḍa-golayor madhye koṭyaḥ syuḥ pañca-viṃśatiḥ
BhP_05.20.044/1 mṛte 'ṇḍa eṣa etasmin yad abhūt tato mārtaṇḍa iti vyapadeśaḥ hiraṇyagarbha iti yad dhiraṇyāṇḍa-samudbhavaḥ
analyzed: mṛte ṇḍe eṣaḥ etasmin yat abhūt tatas mārtaṇḍaḥ iti vyapadeśaḥ hiraṇya garbhaḥ iti yat hiraṇya aṇḍa samudbhavaḥ

original: BhP_05.20.045/1 sūryeṇa hi vibhajyante diśaḥ khaṃ dyaur mahī bhidā
analyzed: sūryeṇa hi vibhajyante diśaḥ kham dyauḥ mahī bhidā

original: BhP_05.20.045/2 svargāpavargau narakā rasaukāṃsi ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: svarga apavargau narakāḥ rasaukāṃsi ca sarvaśas

original: BhP_05.20.046/1 deva-tiryaṅ-manuṣyāṇāṃ sarīsṛpa-savīrudhām
analyzed: deva tiryak manuṣyāṇām sarīsṛpa sa vīrudhām

original: BhP_05.20.046/2 sarva-jīva-nikāyānāṃ sūrya ātmā dṛg-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: sarva jīvanikāyānām sūryaḥ ātmā dṛś īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_05.21.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.21.001/1 etāvān eva bhū-valayasya sanniveśaḥ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇato vyākhyātaḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva bhū valayasya sanniveśaḥ pramāṇa lakṣaṇataḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: BhP_05.21.002/1 etena hi divo maṇḍala-mānaṃ tad-vida upadiśanti yathā dvi-dalayor niṣpāvādīnāṃ te antareṇāntarikṣaṃ tad-ubhaya-sandhitam
analyzed: etena hi divaḥ maṇḍala mānam tad vidaḥ upadiśanti yathā dvi dalayoḥ niṣpāva ādīnām te antareṇa antarikṣam tad ubhaya sandhitam

original: BhP_05.21.003 /1 yan-madhya-gato bhagavāṃs tapatāṃ patis tapana ātapena tri-lokīṃ
analyzed: yad madhya gataḥ bhagavān tapatām patiḥ tapanaḥ ātapena trilokīm

original: pratapaty avabhāsayaty ātma-bhāsā sa eṣa udagayana-dakṣiṇāyana-vaiṣuvata-saṃjñābhir
analyzed: pratapati avabhāsayati ātma bhāsā saḥ eṣaḥ udagayana dakṣiṇāyana vaiṣuvata saṃjñābhiḥ

original: māndya-śaighrya-samānābhir gatibhir ārohaṇāvarohaṇa-samāna-sthāneṣu yathā-savanam
analyzed: māndya śaighrya samānābhiḥ gatibhiḥ ārohaṇa avarohaṇa samāna sthāneṣu yathāsavanam

original: abhipadyamāno makarādiṣu rāśiṣv aho-rātrāṇi dīrgha-hrasva-samānāni vidhatte
analyzed: abhipadyamānaḥ makara ādiṣu rāśiṣu ahar rātrāṇi dīrgha hrasva samānāni vidhatte

original: BhP_05.21.004 /1 yadā meṣa-tulayor vartate tadāho-rātrāṇi samānāni bhavanti yadā
analyzed: yadā meṣa tulayoḥ vartate tadā ahorātrāṇi samānāni bhavanti yadā

original: vṛṣabhādiṣu pañcasu ca rāśiṣu carati tadāhāny eva vardhante hrasati ca māsi māsy
analyzed: vṛṣabha ādiṣu pañcasu ca rāśiṣu carati tad ahāni eva vardhante hrasati ca māsi māsi

original: ekaikā ghaṭikā rātriṣu
analyzed: ekaikā ghaṭikā rātriṣu

original: BhP_05.21.005/1 yadā vṛścikādiṣu pañcasu vartate tadāho-rātrāṇi viparyayāṇi bhavanti
analyzed: yadā vṛścika ādiṣu pañcasu vartate tadā ahar rātrāṇi viparyayāṇi bhavanti

original: BhP_05.21.006/1 yāvad dakṣiṇāyanam ahāni vardhante yāvad udagayanaṃ rātrayaḥ
analyzed: yāvat dakṣiṇāyanam ahāni vardhante yāvat udagayanam rātrayaḥ

original: BhP_05.21.007 /1 evaṃ nava koṭaya eka-pañcāśal-lakṣāṇi yojanānāṃ mānasottara-giri-parivartanasyopadiśanti
analyzed: evam nava koṭayaḥ ekapañcāśat lakṣāṇi yojanānām mānasottara giri parivartanasya upadiśanti

original: tasminn aindrīṃ purīṃ pūrvasmān meror devadhānīṃ nāma dakṣiṇato yāmyāṃ saṃyamanīṃ
analyzed: tasmin aindrīm purīm pūrvasmāt meroḥ devadhānīm nāma dakṣiṇatas yāmyām saṃyamanīm

original: nāma paścād vāruṇīṃ nimlocanīṃ nāma uttarataḥ saumyāṃ vibhāvarīṃ nāma tāsūdaya-madhyāhnāstamaya-niśīthānīti
analyzed: nāma paścāt vāruṇīm nimlocanīm nāma uttaratas saumyām vibhāvarīm nāma tāsu udaya madhyāhna astamaya niśīthāni iti

original: bhūtānāṃ pravṛtti-nivṛtti-nimittāni samaya-viśeṣeṇa meroś catur-diśam
analyzed: bhūtānām pravṛtti nivṛtti nimittāni samaya viśeṣeṇa meroḥ caturdiśam

original: BhP_05.21.008/1 tatratyānāṃ divasa-madhyaṅgata eva sadādityas tapati savyenācalaṃ dakṣiṇena karoti
analyzed: tatratyānām divasa madhyaṅgataḥ eva sadā ādityaḥ tapati savyena acalam dakṣiṇena karoti

original: BhP_05.21.009 /1 yatrodeti tasya ha samāna-sūtra-nipāte nimlocati yatra kvacana syandenābhitapati
analyzed: yatra udeti tasya ha samāna sūtra nipāte nimlocati yatra kvacana syandena abhitapati

original: tasya haiṣa samāna-sūtra-nipāte prasvāpayati tatra gataṃ na paśyanti ye taṃ samanupaśyeran
analyzed: tasya ha eṣa samāna sūtra nipāte prasvāpayati tatra gatam na paśyanti ye tam samanupaśyeran

original: BhP_05.21.010/1 yadā caindryāḥ puryāḥ pracalate pañcadaśa-ghaṭikābhir yāmyāṃ sapāda-koṭi-dvayaṃ yojanānāṃ sārdha-dvādaśa-lakṣāṇi sādhikāni
analyzed: yadā ca aindryāḥ puryāḥ pracalate pañcadaśa ghaṭikābhiḥ yāmyām sa pāda koṭi dvayam yojanānām sārdha dvādaśa lakṣāṇi sādhikāni

original: BhP_05.21.011/1 evaṃ tato vāruṇīṃ saumyām aindrīṃ ca punas tathānye ca grahāḥ somādayo nakṣatraiḥ saha jyotiś-cakre samabhyudyanti saha vā
analyzed: evam tatas vāruṇīm saumyām aindrīm ca punar tathā anye ca grahāḥ soma ādayaḥ nakṣatraiḥ saha jyotiścakre samabhyudyanti saha vā

original: BhP_05.21.012/1 evaṃ muhūrtena catus-triṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāny aṣṭa-śatādhikāni sauro rathas trayīmayo 'sau catasṛṣu parivartate purīṣu
analyzed: evam muhūrtena catustriṃśat lakṣa yojanāni aṣṭaśata adhikāni sauraḥ rathaḥ catasṛṣu parivartate purīṣu

original: BhP_05.21.013 /1 yasyaikaṃ cakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ ṣaṇ-nemi tri-ṇābhi saṃvatsarātmakaṃ
analyzed: yasya ekam cakram dvādaśa aram ṣaṣ nemi triṇābhi saṃvatsara ātmakam

original: samāmananti tasyākṣo meror mūrdhani kṛto mānasottare kṛtetara-bhāgo yatra protaṃ
analyzed: samāmananti tasya akṣaḥ meroḥ mūrdhani kṛtaḥ mānasa uttare kṛta itara bhāgaḥ yatra protam

original: ravi-ratha-cakraṃ taila-yantra-cakravad bhraman mānasottara-girau paribhramati
analyzed: ravi ratha cakram taila yantra cakra vat bhraman mānasottara girau paribhramati

original: BhP_05.21.014/1 tasminn akṣe kṛtamūlo dvitīyo 'kṣas turyamānena sammitas taila-yantrākṣavad dhruve kṛtopari-bhāgaḥ
analyzed: tasmin akṣe kṛta mūlaḥ dvitīyaḥ kṣaḥ turya mānena sammitaḥ taila yantra akṣa vat dhruve kṛta upari bhāgaḥ

original: BhP_05.21.015/1 ratha-nīḍas tu ṣaṭ-triṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāyatas tat-turīya-bhāga-viśālas tāvān ravi-ratha-yugo yatra hayāś chando-nāmānaḥ saptāruṇa-yojitā  #
analyzed: rathanīḍaḥ tu ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣa yojana āyataḥ tad turīya bhāga viśālaḥ tāvān ravi ratha yugaḥ yatra hayāḥ chandaḥ nāmānaḥ sapta aruṇa yojitā

original: vahanti devam ādityam
analyzed: vahanti devam ādityam

original: BhP_05.21.016/1 purastāt savitur aruṇaḥ paścāc ca niyuktaḥ sautye karmaṇi kilāste
analyzed: purastāt savituḥ aruṇaḥ paścāt ca niyuktaḥ sautye karmaṇi kila āste

original: BhP_05.21.017/1 tathā vālikhilyā ṛṣayo 'ṅguṣṭha-parva-mātrāḥ ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi purataḥ sūryaṃ sūkta-vākāya niyuktāḥ saṃstuvanti
analyzed: tathā vālikhilyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ṅguṣṭha parva mātrāḥ ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi puratas sūryam sūktavākāya niyuktāḥ saṃstuvanti

original: BhP_05.21.018 /1 tathānye ca ṛṣayo gandharvāpsaraso nāgā grāmaṇyo yātudhānā devā
analyzed: tathā anye ca ṛṣayaḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ nāgāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ yātudhānāḥ devāḥ

original: ity ekaikaśo gaṇāḥ sapta caturdaśa māsi māsi bhagavantaṃ sūryam ātmānaṃ nānā-nāmānaṃ
analyzed: iti ekaikaśas gaṇāḥ sapta caturdaśa māsi māsi bhagavantam sūryam ātmānam nānā nāmānam

original: pṛthaṅ-nānā-nāmānaḥ pṛthak-karmabhir dvandvaśa upāsate
analyzed: pṛthak nānā nāmānaḥ pṛthak karmabhiḥ dvandvaśas upāsate

original: BhP_05.22.001/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.22.001 /1 yad etad bhagavata ādityasya meruṃ dhruvaṃ ca pradakṣiṇena parikrāmato
analyzed: yat etat bhagavataḥ ādityasya merum dhruvam ca pradakṣiṇena

original: rāśīnām abhimukhaṃ pracalitaṃ cāpradakṣiṇaṃ bhagavatopavarṇitam amuṣya vayaṃ katham anumimīmahīti
analyzed: rāśīnām abhimukham pracalitam ca a pradakṣiṇam bhagavatā upavarṇitam amuṣya vayam katham anumimīmahi iti

original: BhP_05.22.002/0 sa hovāca
analyzed: sa ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.22.002 /1 yathā kulāla-cakreṇa bhramatā saha bhramatāṃ tad-āśrayāṇāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ
analyzed: yathā kulāla cakreṇa bhramatā saha bhramatām tad āśrayāṇām pipīlika ādīnām

original: gatir anyaiva pradeśāntareṣv apy upalabhyamānatvād evaṃ nakṣatra-rāśibhir upalakṣitena
analyzed: gatiḥ anyā eva pradeśa antareṣu api upalabhyamāna tvāt evam nakṣatra rāśibhiḥ upalakṣitena

original: kāla-cakreṇa dhruvaṃ meruṃ ca pradakṣiṇena paridhāvatā saha paridhāvamānānāṃ tad-āśrayāṇāṃ
analyzed: kālacakreṇa dhruvam merum ca pradakṣiṇena paridhāvatā saha paridhāvamānānām tad āśrayāṇām

original: sūryādīnāṃ grahāṇāṃ gatir anyaiva nakṣatrāntare rāśy-antare copalabhyamānatvāt
analyzed: sūrya ādīnām grahāṇām gatiḥ anyā eva nakṣatra antare rāśi antare ca upalabhyamāna tvāt

original: BhP_05.22.003 /1 sa eṣa bhagavān ādi-puruṣa eva sākṣān nārāyaṇo lokānāṃ svastaya
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhagavān ādipuruṣaḥ eva sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ lokānām svastaye

original: ātmānaṃ trayīmayaṃ karma-viśuddhi-nimittaṃ kavibhir api ca vedena vijijñāsyamāno
analyzed: ātmānam trayī mayam karma viśuddhi nimittam kavibhiḥ api ca vedena vijijñāsyamānaḥ

original: dvādaśadhā vibhajya ṣaṭsu vasantādiṣv ṛtuṣu yathopa-joṣam ṛtu-guṇān vidadhāti
analyzed: dvādaśadhā vibhajya ṣaṭsu vasanta ādiṣu ṛtuṣu yathopajoṣam ṛtu guṇān vidadhāti

original: BhP_05.22.004/1 tam etam iha puruṣās trayyā vidyayā varṇāśramācārānupathā uccāvacaiḥ karmabhir āmnātair yoga-vitānaiś ca śraddhayā yajanto  #
analyzed: tam etam iha puruṣāḥ trayyā vidyayā varṇa āśrama ācāra anupathā uccāvacaiḥ karmabhiḥ āmnātaiḥ yoga vitānaiḥ ca śraddhayā yajantaḥ

original: 'ñjasā śreyaḥ samadhigacchanti
analyzed: ñjasā śreyaḥ samadhigacchanti

original: BhP_05.22.005 /1 atha sa eṣa ātmā lokānāṃ dyāv-āpṛthivyor antareṇa nabho-valayasya
analyzed: atha saḥ eṣaḥ ātmā lokānām dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ antareṇa nabhaḥ valayasya

original: kālacakra-gato dvādaśa māsān bhuṅkte rāśi-saṃjñān saṃvatsarāvayavān māsaḥ pakṣa-dvayaṃ
analyzed: kālacakra gataḥ dvādaśa māsān bhuṅkte rāśi saṃjñān saṃvatsara avayavān māsaḥ pakṣa dvayam

original: divā naktaṃ ceti sapādarkṣa-dvayam upadiśanti yāvatā ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ bhuñjīta sa vai
analyzed: divā naktam ca iti sa pāda ṛkṣa dvayam upadiśanti yāvatā ṣaṣṭham aṃśam bhuñjīta sa vai

original: ṛtur ity upadiśyate saṃvatsarāvayavaḥ
analyzed: ṛtuḥ iti upadiśyate saṃvatsara avayavaḥ

original: BhP_05.22.006/1 atha ca yāvatārdhena nabho-vīthyāṃ pracarati taṃ kālam ayanam ācakṣate
analyzed: atha ca yāvatā ardhena nabhaḥ vīthyām pracarati tam kālam ayanam ācakṣate

original: BhP_05.22.007 /1 atha ca yāvan nabho-maṇḍalaṃ saha dyāv-āpṛthivyor maṇḍalābhyāṃ kārtsnyena
analyzed: atha ca yāvat nabhaḥ maṇḍalam saha dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ maṇḍalābhyām kārtsnyena

original: sa ha bhuñjīta taṃ kālaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ parivatsaram iḍāvatsaram anuvatsaraṃ vatsaram
analyzed: sa ha bhuñjīta tam kālam saṃvatsaram parivatsaram iḍā vatsaram anuvatsaram vatsaram

original: iti bhānor māndya-śaighrya-sama-gatibhiḥ samāmananti
analyzed: iti bhānoḥ māndya śaighrya samagatibhiḥ samāmananti

original: BhP_05.22.008 /1 evaṃ candramā arka-gabhastibhya upariṣṭāl lakṣa-yojanata upalabhyamāno
analyzed: evam candramāḥ arka gabhastibhyaḥ upariṣṭāt lakṣa yojanataḥ upalabhyamānaḥ

original: 'rkasya saṃvatsara-bhuktiṃ pakṣābhyāṃ māsa-bhuktiṃ sapādarkṣābhyāṃ dinenaiva pakṣa-bhuktim
analyzed: rkasya saṃvatsara bhuktim pakṣābhyām māsa bhuktim sa pāda ṛkṣābhyām dinena eva pakṣa bhuktim

original: agracārī drutatara-gamano bhuṅkte
analyzed: agra cārī drutatara gamanaḥ bhuṅkte

original: BhP_05.22.009 /1 atha cāpūryamāṇābhiś ca kalābhir amarāṇāṃ kṣīyamāṇābhiś ca kalābhiḥ
analyzed: atha ca āpūryamāṇābhiḥ ca kalābhiḥ amarāṇām kṣīyamāṇābhiḥ ca kalābhiḥ

original: pit-ṇām aho-rātrāṇi pūrva-pakṣāpara-pakṣābhyāṃ vitanvānaḥ sarva-jīva-nivaha-prāṇo
analyzed: pitṇām ahar rātrāṇi pūrvapakṣa aparapakṣābhyām vitanvānaḥ sarva jīva nivaha prāṇaḥ

original: jīvaś caikam ekaṃ nakṣatraṃ triṃśatā muhūrtair bhuṅkte
analyzed: jīvaḥ ca ekam ekam nakṣatram triṃśatā muhūrtaiḥ bhuṅkte

original: BhP_05.22.010/1 ya eṣa ṣoḍaśa-kalaḥ puruṣo bhagavān manomayo 'nnamayo 'mṛtamayo deva-pitṛ-manuṣya-bhūta-paśu-pakṣi-sarīsṛpa-vīrudhāṃ prāṇāpy  #
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa ṣoḍaśa kalaḥ puruṣaḥ bhagavān manaḥ mayaḥ nna mayaḥ mṛta mayaḥ deva pitṛ manuṣya bhūta paśu pakṣi sarīsṛpa vīrudhām prāṇa apī

original: āyana-śīlatvāt sarvamaya iti varṇayanti
analyzed: āyana śīla tvāt sarva mayaḥ iti varṇayanti

original: BhP_05.22.011/1 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato nakṣatrāṇi meruṃ dakṣiṇenaiva kālāyana īśvara-yojitāni sahābhijitāṣṭā-viṃśatiḥ
analyzed: tatas upariṣṭāt dvi lakṣa yojanataḥ nakṣatrāṇi merum dakṣiṇena eva kālāyane īśvara yojitāni saha abhijitā aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ

original: BhP_05.22.012 /1 tata upariṣṭād uśanā dvi-lakṣa-yojanata upalabhyate purataḥ paścāt
analyzed: tatas upariṣṭāt uśanāḥ dvi lakṣa yojanataḥ upalabhyate puratas paścāt

original: sahaiva vārkasya śaighrya-māndya-sāmyābhir gatibhir arkavac carati lokānāṃ nityadānukūla
analyzed: saha eva vā arkasya śaighrya māndya sāmyābhiḥ gatibhiḥ arka vat carati lokānām nityadā anukūla

original: eva prāyeṇa varṣayaṃś cāreṇānumīyate sa vṛṣṭi-viṣṭambha-grahopaśamanaḥ
analyzed: eva prāyeṇa varṣayan cāreṇa anumīyate sa vṛṣṭi viṣṭambha graha upaśamanaḥ

original: BhP_05.22.013 /1 uśanasā budho vyākhyātas tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato budhaḥ
analyzed: uśanasā budhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tatas upariṣṭāt dvi lakṣa yojanataḥ budhaḥ

original: soma-suta upalabhyamānaḥ prāyeṇa śubha-kṛd yadārkād vyatiricyeta tadātivātābhra-prāyānāvṛṣṭy-ādi-bhayam āśaṃsate
analyzed: somasutaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ prāyeṇa śubha kṛt yadā arkāt vyatiricyeta tadā ati vāta abhra prāya anāvṛṣṭi ādi bhayam āśaṃsate

original: BhP_05.22.014 /1 ata ūrdhvam aṅgārako 'pi yojana-lakṣa-dvitaya upalabhyamānas tribhis
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam aṅgārakaḥ yojana lakṣa dvitaye upalabhyamānaḥ tribhiḥ

original: tribhiḥ pakṣair ekaikaśo rāśīn dvādaśānubhuṅkte yadi na vakreṇābhivartate prāyeṇāśubha-graho 'gha-śaṃsaḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ ekaikaśas rāśīn dvādaśa anubhuṅkte yadi na vakreṇa abhivartate prāyeṇa aśubha grahaḥ gha śaṃsaḥ

original: BhP_05.22.015/1 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanāntara-gatā bhagavān bṛhaspatir ekaikasmin rāśau parivatsaraṃ parivatsaraṃ carati yadi na vakraḥ  #
analyzed: tatas upariṣṭāt dvi lakṣa yojana antara gatāḥ bhagavān bṛhaspatiḥ ekaikasmin rāśau parivatsaram parivatsaram carati yadi na vakraḥ

original: syāt prāyeṇānukūlo brāhmaṇa-kulasya
analyzed: syāt prāyeṇa anukūlaḥ brāhmaṇa kulasya

original: BhP_05.22.016 /1 tata upariṣṭād yojana-lakṣa-dvayāt pratīyamānaḥ śanaiścara ekaikasmin
analyzed: tatas upariṣṭāt yojana lakṣa dvayāt pratīyamānaḥ śanaiścaraḥ ekaikasmin

original: rāśau triṃśan māsān vilambamānaḥ sarvān evānuparyeti tāvadbhir anuvatsaraiḥ prāyeṇa
analyzed: rāśau triṃśat māsān vilambamānaḥ sarvān eva anuparyeti tāvadbhiḥ anuvatsaraiḥ prāyeṇa

original: hi sarveṣām aśāntikaraḥ
analyzed: hi sarveṣām a śānti karaḥ

original: BhP_05.22.017/1 tata uttarasmād ṛṣaya ekādaśa-lakṣa-yojanāntara upalabhyante ya eva lokānāṃ śam anubhāvayanto bhagavato viṣṇor yat paramaṃ  #
analyzed: tatas uttarasmāt ṛṣayaḥ ekādaśa lakṣa yojana antare upalabhyante ye eva lokānām śam anubhāvayantaḥ bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ yat paramam

original: padaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ prakramanti
analyzed: padam pradakṣiṇam prakramanti

original: BhP_05.23.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.23.001 /1 atha tasmāt paratas trayodaśa-lakṣa-yojanāntarato yat tad viṣṇoḥ
analyzed: atha tasmāt paratas trayodaśa lakṣa yojana antarataḥ yat tat viṣṇoḥ

original: paramaṃ padam abhivadanti yatra ha mahā-bhāgavato dhruva auttānapādir agninendreṇa
analyzed: paramam padam abhivadanti yatra ha mahā bhāgavataḥ dhruvaḥ auttānapādiḥ agninā indreṇa

original: prajāpatinā kaśyapena dharmeṇa ca samakāla-yugbhiḥ sabahu-mānaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ kriyamāṇa
analyzed: prajāpatinā kaśyapena dharmeṇa ca sama kāla yugbhiḥ sa bahu mānam dakṣiṇatas kriyamāṇa

original: idānīm api kalpa-jīvinām ājīvya upāste tasyehānubhāva upavarṇitaḥ
analyzed: idānīm api kalpa jīvinām ājīvyaḥ upāste tasya iha anubhāvaḥ upavarṇitaḥ

original: BhP_05.23.002/1 sa hi sarveṣāṃ jyotir-gaṇānāṃ graha-nakṣatrādīnām animiṣeṇāvyakta-raṃhasā bhagavatā kālena bhrāmyamāṇānāṃ sthāṇur ivāvaṣṭambha  #
analyzed: sa hi sarveṣām jyotiḥ gaṇānām graha nakṣatra ādīnām animiṣeṇa avyakta raṃhasā bhagavatā kālena bhrāmyamāṇānām sthāṇuḥ iva avaṣṭambha

original: īśvareṇa vihitaḥ śaśvad avabhāsate
analyzed: īśvareṇa vihitaḥ śaśvat avabhāsate

original: BhP_05.23.003 /1 yathā meḍhīstambha ākramaṇa-paśavaḥ saṃyojitās tribhis tribhiḥ savanair
analyzed: yathā meḍhī stambhe ākramaṇa paśavaḥ saṃyojitāḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ savanaiḥ

original: yathā-sthānaṃ maṇḍalāni caranty evaṃ bhagaṇā grahādaya etasminn antar-bahir-yogena
analyzed: yathāsthānam maṇḍalāni caranti evam bhagaṇāḥ graha ādayaḥ etasmin antar bahis yogena

original: kāla-cakra āyojitā dhruvam evāvalambya vāyunodīryamāṇā ākalpāntaṃ paricaṅ kramanti
analyzed: kālacakre āyojitāḥ dhruvam eva avalambya vāyunā udīryamāṇāḥ ā kalpa antam kramanti

original: nabhasi yathā meghāḥ śyenādayo vāyu-vaśāḥ karma-sārathayaḥ parivartante evaṃ jyotirgaṇāḥ
analyzed: nabhasi yathā meghāḥ śyena ādayaḥ vāyu vaśāḥ karma sārathayaḥ parivartante evam jyotiḥ gaṇāḥ

original: prakṛti-puruṣa-saṃyogānugṛhītāḥ karma-nirmita-gatayo bhuvi na patanti
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa saṃyoga anugṛhītāḥ karma nirmita gatayaḥ bhuvi na patanti

original: BhP_05.23.004/1 kecanaitaj jyotir-anīkaṃ śiśumāra-saṃsthānena bhagavato vāsudevasya yoga-dhāraṇāyām anuvarṇayanti
analyzed: kecana etat jyotiḥ anīkam śiśumāra saṃsthānena bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya yoga dhāraṇāyām anuvarṇayanti

original: BhP_05.23.005 /1 yasya pucchāgre 'vākśirasaḥ kuṇḍalī-bhūta-dehasya dhruva upakalpitas
analyzed: yasya puccha agre vākśirasaḥ kuṇḍalībhūta dehasya dhruvaḥ upakalpitaḥ

original: tasya lāṅgūle prajāpatir agnir indro dharma iti puccha-mūle dhātā vidhātā ca kaṭyāṃ
analyzed: tasya lāṅgūle prajāpatiḥ agniḥ indraḥ dharmaḥ iti puccha mūle dhātā vidhātā ca kaṭyām

original: saptarṣayaḥ tasya dakṣiṇāvarta-kuṇḍalī-bhūta-śarīrasya yāny udagayanāni dakṣiṇa-pārśve
analyzed: saptarṣayaḥ tasya dakṣiṇa āvarta kuṇḍalībhūta śarīrasya yāni udagayanāni dakṣiṇa pārśve

original: tu nakṣatrāṇy upakalpayanti dakṣiṇāyanāni tu savye yathā śiśumārasya kuṇḍalā-bhoga-sanniveśasya
analyzed: tu nakṣatrāṇi upakalpayanti dakṣiṇāyanāni tu savye yathā śiśumārasya kuṇḍala ābhoga sanniveśasya

original: pārśvayor ubhayor apy avayavāḥ samasaṅkhyā bhavanti pṛṣṭhe tv ajavīthī ākāśa-gaṅgā codarataḥ
analyzed: pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api avayavāḥ sama saṅkhyāḥ bhavanti pṛṣṭhe tu ajavīthī ākāśagaṅgā ca udarataḥ

original: BhP_05.23.006 /1 punarvasu-puṣyau dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ śroṇyor ārdrāśleṣe ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ
analyzed: punarvasu puṣyau dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ śroṇyoḥ ārdrā āśleṣe ca dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ

original: paścimayoḥ pādayor abhijid-uttarāṣāḍhe dakṣiṇa-vāmayor nāsikayor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ śravaṇa-pūrvāṣāḍhe
analyzed: paścimayoḥ pādayoḥ abhijit uttarāṣāḍhe dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ nāsikayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam śravaṇa pūrvāṣāḍhe

original: dakṣiṇa-vāmayor locanayor dhaniṣṭhā mūlaṃ ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ karṇayor maghādīny aṣṭa
analyzed: dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ locanayoḥ dhaniṣṭhā mūlam ca dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ karṇayoḥ maghā ādīni aṣṭa

original: nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇāyanāni vāma-pārśva-vaṅkriṣu yuñjīta tathaiva mṛga-śīrṣādīny udagayanāni
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇāyanāni vāma pārśva vaṅkriṣu yuñjīta tathā eva mṛgaśīrṣa ādīni udagayanāni

original: dakṣiṇa-pārśva-vaṅkriṣu prātilomyena prayuñjīta śatabhiṣā-jyeṣṭhe skandhayor dakṣiṇa-vāmayor nyaset
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pārśva vaṅkriṣu prātilomyena prayuñjīta śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhe skandhayoḥ dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ nyaset

original: BhP_05.23.007 /1 uttarā-hanāv agastir adharā-hanau yamo mukheṣu cāṅgārakaḥ śanaiścara
analyzed: uttarāhanau agastiḥ adharāhanau yamaḥ mukheṣu ca aṅgārakaḥ śanaiścara

original: upasthe bṛhaspatiḥ kakudi vakṣasy ādityo hṛdaye nārāyaṇo manasi candro nābhyām uśanā
analyzed: upasthe bṛhaspatiḥ kakudi vakṣasi ādityaḥ hṛdaye nārāyaṇaḥ manasi candraḥ nābhyām uśanā

original: stanayor aśvinau budhaḥ prāṇāpānayo rāhur gale ketavaḥ sarvāṅgeṣu romasu sarve tārā-gaṇāḥ
analyzed: stanayoḥ aśvinau budhaḥ prāṇa apānayoḥ rāhuḥ gale ketavaḥ sarva aṅgeṣu romasu sarve tārā gaṇāḥ

original: BhP_05.23.008 /1 etad u haiva bhagavato viṣṇoḥ sarva-devatāmayaṃ rūpam aharahaḥ sandhyāyāṃ
analyzed: etat u ha eva bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ sarva devatā mayam rūpam ahar ahar sandhyāyām

original: prayato vāgyato nirīkṣamāṇa upatiṣṭheta namo jyotir-lokāya kālāyanāyānimiṣāṃ pataye
analyzed: prayataḥ vāgyataḥ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ upatiṣṭheta namaḥ jyotiḥ lokāya kālāyanāya animiṣām pataye

original: mahā-puruṣāyābhidhīmahīti
analyzed: mahāpuruṣāya abhidhīmahi iti

original: BhP_05.23.009/1 graharkṣatārāmayam ādhidaivikaṃ pāpāpahaṃ mantra-kṛtāṃ tri-kālam
analyzed: graha ṛkṣa tārā mayam ādhidaivikam pāpa apaham mantra kṛtām tri kālam

original: BhP_05.23.009/2 namasyataḥ smarato vā tri-kālaṃ naśyeta tat-kālajam āśu pāpam
analyzed: namasyataḥ smarataḥ vā tri kālam naśyeta tad kāla jam āśu pāpam

original: BhP_05.24.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.24.001 /1 adhastāt savitur yojanāyute svarbhānur nakṣatravac caratīty eke
analyzed: adhastāt savituḥ yojana ayute svarbhānuḥ nakṣatra vat carati iti eke

original: yo 'sāv amaratvaṃ grahatvaṃ cālabhata bhagavad-anukampayā svayam asurāpasadaḥ saiṃhikeyo
analyzed: yaḥ sau amara tvam graha tvam ca alabhata bhagavat anukampayā svayam asura apasadaḥ saiṃhikeyaḥ

original: hy atad-arhas tasya tāta janma karmāṇi copariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ
analyzed: hi a tad arhaḥ tasya tāta janma karmāṇi ca upariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.24.002 /1 yad adas taraṇer maṇḍalaṃ pratapatas tad vistarato yojanāyutam ācakṣate
analyzed: yat adaḥ taraṇeḥ maṇḍalam pratapataḥ tat vistarataḥ yojana ayutam ācakṣate

original: dvādaśa-sahasraṃ somasya trayodaśa-sahasraṃ rāhor yaḥ parvaṇi tad-vyavadhāna-kṛd
analyzed: dvādaśa sahasram somasya trayodaśa sahasram rāhoḥ yaḥ parvaṇi tad vyavadhāna kṛt

original: vairānubandhaḥ sūryā-candramasāv abhidhāvati
analyzed: vaira anubandhaḥ sūryācandramasau abhidhāvati

original: BhP_05.24.003 /1 tan niśamyobhayatrāpi bhagavatā rakṣaṇāya prayuktaṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma
analyzed: tat niśamya ubhayatra api bhagavatā rakṣaṇāya prayuktam sudarśanam nāma

original: bhāgavataṃ dayitam astraṃ tat tejasā durviṣahaṃ muhuḥ parivartamānam abhyavasthito
analyzed: bhāgavatam dayitam astram tat tejasā durviṣaham muhur parivartamānam

original: muhūrtam udvijamānaś cakita-hṛdaya ārād eva nivartate tad uparāgam iti vadanti lokāḥ
analyzed: muhūrtam udvijamānaḥ cakita hṛdayaḥ ārāt eva nivartate tat uparāgam iti vadanti lokāḥ

original: BhP_05.24.004/1 tato 'dhastāt siddha-cāraṇa-vidyādharāṇāṃ sadanāni tāvan mātra eva
analyzed: tatas dhastāt siddha cāraṇa vidyādharāṇām sadanāni tāvat mātre eva

original: BhP_05.24.005/1 tato 'dhastād yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-piśāca-preta-bhūta-gaṇānāṃ vihārājiram antarikṣaṃ yāvad vāyuḥ pravāti yāvan meghā upalabhyante
analyzed: tatas dhastāt yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśāca preta bhūta gaṇānām vihāra ajiram antarikṣam yāvat vāyuḥ pravāti yāvat meghāḥ upalabhyante

original: BhP_05.24.006/1 tato 'dhastāc chata-yojanāntara iyaṃ pṛthivī yāvad dhaṃsa-bhāsa-śyena-suparṇādayaḥ patattri-pravarā utpatantīti
analyzed: tatas dhastāt śata yojana antare iyam pṛthivī yāvat dhaṃsa bhāsa śyena suparṇa ādayaḥ patattri pravarāḥ utpatanti iti

original: BhP_05.24.007 /1 upavarṇitaṃ bhūmer yathā-sanniveśāvasthānam avaner apy adhastāt
analyzed: upavarṇitam bhūmeḥ yathā sat niveśa avasthānam avaneḥ api adhastāt

original: sapta bhū-vivarā ekaikaśo yojanāyutāntareṇāyāma-vistāreṇopakḷptā atalaṃ vitalaṃ sutalaṃ
analyzed: sapta bhū vivarāḥ ekaikaśas yojana ayuta antareṇa āyāma vistāreṇa upakḷptāḥ atalam vitalam sutalam

original: talātalaṃ mahātalaṃ rasātalaṃ pātālam iti
analyzed: talātalam mahātalam rasātalam pātālam iti

original: BhP_05.24.008 /1 eteṣu hi bila-svargeṣu svargād apy adhika-kāma-bhogaiśvaryānanda-bhūti-vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: eteṣu hi bila svargeṣu svargāt api adhika kāma bhoga aiśvarya ānanda bhūti vibhūtibhiḥ

original: susamṛddha-bhavanodyānākrīḍa-vihāreṣu daitya-dānava-kādraveyā nitya-pramuditānurakta-kalatrāpatya-bandhu-suhṛd-anucarā
analyzed: su samṛddha bhavana udyāna ākrīḍa vihāreṣu daitya dānava kādraveyā nitya pramudita anurakta kalatra apatya bandhu suhṛd anucarā

original: gṛha-pataya īśvarād apy apratihata-kāmā māyā-vinodā nivasanti
analyzed: gṛhapatayaḥ īśvarāt api a pratihata kāmāḥ māyā vinodāḥ nivasanti

original: BhP_05.24.009 /1 yeṣu mahārāja mayena māyāvinā vinirmitāḥ puro nānā-maṇi-pravara-praveka-viracita-vicitra-bhavana-prākāra-gopura-sabhā-caitya-catvarāyatanādibhir
analyzed: yeṣu mahā rāja mayena māyāvinā vinirmitāḥ puras nānā maṇi pravara praveka viracita vicitra bhavana prākāra gopura sabhā caitya catvara āyatana ādibhiḥ

original: nāgāsura-mithuna-pārāvata-śuka-sārikākīrṇa-kṛtrima-bhūmibhir vivareśvara-gṛhottamaiḥ
analyzed: nāga asura mithuna pārāvata śuka sārikā ākīrṇa kṛtrima bhūmibhiḥ vivara īśvara gṛha uttamaiḥ

original: samalaṅkṛtāś cakāsati
analyzed: samalaṅkṛtāḥ cakāsati

original: BhP_05.24.010 /1 udyānāni cātitarāṃ mana-indriyānandibhiḥ kusuma-phala-stabaka-subhaga-kisalayāvanata-rucira-viṭapa-viṭapināṃ
analyzed: udyānāni ca atitarām manā indriya ānandibhiḥ kusuma phala stabaka subhaga kisalaya avanata rucira viṭapa viṭapinām

original: latāṅgāliṅgitānāṃ śrībhiḥ samithuna-vividha-vihaṅgama-jalāśayānām amala-jala-pūrṇānāṃ
analyzed: latā aṅga āliṅgitānām śrībhiḥ sa mithuna vividha vihaṅgama jalāśayānām amala jala pūrṇānām

original: jhaṣakulollaṅghana-kṣubhita-nīra-nīraja-kumuda-kuva-laya-kahlāra-nīlotpala-lohita-śatapatrādi-vaneṣu
analyzed: jhaṣa kula ullaṅghana kṣubhita nīra nīraja kumuda kuvalaya kahlāra nīlotpala lohita śatapatra ādi vaneṣu

original: kṛta-niketanānām eka-vihārākula-madhura-vividha-svanādibhir indriyotsavair amara-loka-śriyam atiśayitāni
analyzed: kṛta niketanānām eka vihāra ākula madhura vividha svana ādibhiḥ indriya utsavaiḥ amara loka śriyam atiśayitāni

original: BhP_05.24.011/1 yatra ha vāva na bhayam aho-rātrādibhiḥ kāla-vibhāgair upalakṣyate
analyzed: yatra ha vāva na bhayam ahar rātra ādibhiḥ kāla vibhāgaiḥ upalakṣyate

original: BhP_05.24.012/1 yatra hi mahāhi-pravara-śiro-maṇayaḥ sarvaṃ tamaḥ prabādhante
analyzed: yatra hi mahā ahi pravara śiromaṇayaḥ sarvam tamaḥ prabādhante

original: BhP_05.24.013 /1 na vā eteṣu vasatāṃ divyauṣadhi-rasa-rasāyanānna-pāna-snānādibhir
analyzed: na vai eteṣu vasatām divya oṣadhi rasa rasāyana anna pāna snāna ādibhiḥ

original: ādhayo vyādhayo valī-palita-jarādayaś ca deha-vaivarṇya-daurgandhya-sveda-klama-glānir
analyzed: ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ valī palita jarā ādayaḥ ca deha vaivarṇya daurgandhya sveda klama glāniḥ

original: iti vayo 'vasthāś ca bhavanti
analyzed: iti vayaḥ vasthāḥ ca bhavanti

original: BhP_05.24.014/1 na hi teṣāṃ kalyāṇānāṃ prabhavati kutaścana mṛtyur vinā bhagavat-tejasaś cakrāpadeśāt
analyzed: na hi teṣām kalyāṇānām prabhavati kutaścana mṛtyuḥ vinā bhagavat tejasaḥ cakra apadeśāt

original: BhP_05.24.015/1 yasmin praviṣṭe 'sura-vadhūnāṃ prāyaḥ puṃsavanāni bhayād eva sravanti patanti ca
analyzed: yasmin praviṣṭe sura vadhūnām prāyas puṃsavanāni bhayāt eva sravanti patanti ca

original: BhP_05.24.016 /1 athātale maya-putro 'suro balo nivasati yena ha vā iha sṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṇ-ṇavatir
analyzed: atha atale suraḥ balaḥ nivasati yena ha vai iha sṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṇṇavatiḥ

original: māyāḥ kāścanādyāpi māyāvino dhārayanti yasya ca jṛmbhamāṇasya mukhatas trayaḥ strī-gaṇā
analyzed: māyāḥ kāścana adya api māyāvinaḥ dhārayanti yasya ca jṛmbhamāṇasya mukhatas trayaḥ strī gaṇāḥ

original: udapadyanta svairiṇyaḥ kāminyaḥ puṃścalya iti yā vai bilāyanaṃ praviṣṭaṃ puruṣaṃ
analyzed: udapadyanta svairiṇyaḥ kāminyaḥ puṃścalyaḥ iti yāḥ vai bilāyanam praviṣṭam puruṣam

original: rasena hāṭakākhyena sādhayitvā sva-vilāsāvalokanānurāga-smita-saṃlāpopagūhanādibhiḥ
analyzed: rasena hāṭaka ākhyena sādhayitvā sva vilāsa avalokana anurāga smita saṃlāpa upagūhana ādibhiḥ

original: svairaṃ kila ramayanti yasminn upayukte puruṣa īśvaro 'haṃ siddho 'ham ity ayuta-mahā-gaja-balam
analyzed: svairam kila ramayanti yasmin upayukte puruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ ham siddhaḥ ham iti ayuta mahā gaja balam

original: ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ katthate madāndha iva
analyzed: ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ katthate mada andhaḥ iva

original: BhP_05.24.017 /1 tato 'dhastād vitale haro bhagavān hāṭakeśvaraḥ sva-pārṣada-bhūta-gaṇāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas vitale haraḥ bhagavān hāṭakeśvaraḥ sva pārṣada bhūta gaṇa āvṛtaḥ

original: prajāpati-sargopabṛṃhaṇāya bhavo bhavānyā saha mithunī-bhūta āste yataḥ pravṛttā
analyzed: prajāpati sarga upabṛṃhaṇāya bhavaḥ bhavānyā saha mithunībhūtaḥ āste yatas pravṛttā

original: sarit-pravarā hāṭakī nāma bhavayor vīryeṇa yatra citrabhānur mātariśvanā samidhyamāna
analyzed: sarit pravarā hāṭakī nāma bhavayoḥ vīryeṇa yatra citrabhānuḥ mātariśvanā samidhyamāna

original: ojasā pibati tan niṣṭhyūtaṃ hāṭakākhyaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūṣaṇenāsurendrāvarodheṣu puruṣāḥ
analyzed: ojasā pibati tat niṣṭhyūtam hāṭaka ākhyam suvarṇam bhūṣaṇena asura indra avarodheṣu puruṣāḥ

original: saha puruṣībhir dhārayanti
