analyzed: saha puruṣībhiḥ dhārayanti

original: BhP_05.24.018 /1 tato 'dhastāt sutale udāra-śravāḥ puṇya-śloko virocanātmajo balir
analyzed: tatas dhastāt su tale udāra śravāḥ puṇyaślokaḥ virocana ātmajaḥ baliḥ

original: bhagavatā mahendrasya priyaṃ cikīrṣamāṇenāditer labdha-kāyo bhūtvā vaṭu-vāmana-rūpeṇa
analyzed: bhagavatā mahā indrasya priyam cikīrṣamāṇena aditeḥ labdha kāyaḥ bhūtvā vaṭu vāmana rūpeṇa

original: parākṣipta-loka-trayo bhagavad-anukampayaiva punaḥ praveśita indrādiṣv avidyamānayā
analyzed: parākṣipta loka trayaḥ bhagavat anukampayā eva punar praveśitaḥ indra ādiṣu a vidyamānayā

original: susamṛddhayā śriyābhijuṣṭaḥ sva-dharmeṇārādhayaṃs tam eva bhagavantam ārādhanīyam
analyzed: su samṛddhayā śriyā abhijuṣṭaḥ svadharmeṇa ārādhayan tam eva bhagavantam ārādhanīyam

original: apagata-sādhvasa āste 'dhunāpi
analyzed: apagata sādhvasaḥ āste dhunā api

original: BhP_05.24.019 /1 no evaitat sākṣātkāro bhūmi-dānasya yat tad bhagavaty aśeṣa-jīva-nikāyānāṃ
analyzed: no eva etat sākṣātkāraḥ bhūmi dānasya yat tat bhagavati aśeṣa jīvanikāyānām

original: jīva-bhūtātma-bhūte paramātmani vāsudeve tīrthatame pātra upapanne parayā śraddhayā
analyzed: jīva bhūta ātma bhūte paramātmani vāsudeve tīrthatame pātre upapanne parayā śraddhayā

original: paramādara-samāhita-manasā sampratipāditasya sākṣād apavarga-dvārasya yad bila-nilayaiśvaryam
analyzed: parama ādara samāhita manasā sampratipāditasya sākṣāt apavarga dvārasya yat bila nilaya aiśvaryam

original: BhP_05.24.020 /1 yasya ha vāva kṣuta-patana-praskhalanādiṣu vivaśaḥ sakṛn nāmābhigṛṇan
analyzed: yasya ha vāva kṣuta patana praskhalana ādiṣu vivaśaḥ sakṛt nāma abhigṛṇan

original: puruṣaḥ karma-bandhanam añjasā vidhunoti yasya haiva pratibādhanaṃ mumukṣavo 'nyathaivopalabhante
analyzed: puruṣaḥ karma bandhanam añjasā vidhunoti yasya ha eva pratibādhanam mumukṣavaḥ nyathā eva upalabhante

original: BhP_05.24.021/1 tad bhaktānām ātmavatāṃ sarveṣām ātmany ātmada ātmatayaiva
analyzed: tat bhaktānām ātmavatām sarveṣām ātmani ātma daḥ ātmatayā eva

original: BhP_05.24.022/1 na vai bhagavān nūnam amuṣyānujagrāha yad uta punar ātmānusmṛti-moṣaṇaṃ māyāmaya-bhogaiśvaryam evātanuteti
analyzed: na vai bhagavān nūnam amuṣya anujagrāha yat uta punar ātma anusmṛti moṣaṇam māyā maya bhoga aiśvaryam eva atanuta iti

original: BhP_05.24.023/1 yat tad bhagavatānadhigatānyopāyena yācñā-cchalenāpahṛta-sva-śarīrāvaśeṣita-loka-trayo varuṇa-pāśaiś ca sampratimukto giri-daryāṃ  #
analyzed: yat tat bhagavatā anadhigata anya upāyena yācñā chalena apahṛta sva śarīra avaśeṣita lokatrayaḥ varuṇa pāśaiḥ ca sampratimuktaḥ giri daryām

original: cāpaviddha iti hovāca
analyzed: ca apaviddhaḥ iti ha uvāca

original: BhP_05.24.024 /1 nūnaṃ batāyaṃ bhagavān artheṣu na niṣṇāto yo 'sāv indro yasya sacivo
analyzed: nūnam bata ayam bhagavān artheṣu na niṣṇātaḥ saḥ indraḥ yasya

original: mantrāya vṛta ekāntato bṛhaspatis tam atihāya svayam upendreṇātmānam ayācatātmanaś
analyzed: mantrāya vṛtaḥ ekāntataḥ bṛhaspatiḥ tam atihāya svayam upendreṇa ātmānam ayācata ātmanaḥ

original: cāśiṣo no eva tad-dāsyam ati-gambhīra-vayasaḥ kālasya manvantara-parivṛttaṃ kiyal loka-trayam idam
analyzed: ca āśiṣaḥ no eva tat dāsyam ati gambhīra vayasaḥ kālasya manvantara parivṛttam kiyat lokatrayam idam

original: BhP_05.24.025/1 yasyānudāsyam evāsmat-pitāmahaḥ kila vavre na tu sva-pitryaṃ yad utākutobhayaṃ padaṃ dīyamānaṃ bhagavataḥ param iti bhagavatoparate  #
analyzed: yasya anudāsyam eva asmad pitāmahaḥ kila vavre na tu sva pitryam yat uta akutobhayam padam dīyamānam bhagavataḥ param iti bhagavatā uparate  /

original: khalu sva-pitari
analyzed: khalu sva pitari

original: BhP_05.24.026/1 tasya mahānubhāvasyānupatham amṛjita-kaṣāyaḥ ko vāsmad-vidhaḥ parihīṇa-bhagavad-anugraha upajigamiṣatīti
analyzed: tasya mahā anubhāvasya anupatham a mṛjita kaṣāyaḥ kaḥ vā asmadvidhaḥ parihīṇa bhagavat anugrahaḥ upajigamiṣati iti

original: BhP_05.24.027 /1 tasyānucaritam upariṣṭād vistariṣyate yasya bhagavān svayam akhila-jagad-gurur
analyzed: tasya anucaritam upariṣṭāt vistariṣyate yasya bhagavān svayam akhila jagadguruḥ

original: nārāyaṇo dvāri gadā-pāṇir avatiṣṭhate nija-janānukampita-hṛdayo yenāṅguṣṭhena padā
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ dvāri gadā pāṇiḥ avatiṣṭhate nija jana anukampita hṛdayaḥ yena aṅguṣṭhena padā

original: daśa-kandharo yojanāyutāyutaṃ dig-vijaya uccāṭitaḥ
analyzed: daśa kandharaḥ yojana ayuta ayutam digvijayaḥ uccāṭitaḥ

original: BhP_05.24.028 /1 tato 'dhastāt talātale mayo nāma dānavendras tri-purādhipatir bhagavatā
analyzed: tatas dhastāt talātale mayaḥ nāma dānava indraḥ tripura adhipatiḥ bhagavatā

original: purāriṇā tri-lokī-śaṃ cikīrṣuṇā nirdagdha-sva-pura-trayas tat-prasādāl labdha-pado
analyzed: purāriṇā trilokī īśam cikīrṣuṇā nirdagdha sva puratrayaḥ tad prasādāt

original: māyāvinām ācāryo mahādevena parirakṣito vigata-sudarśana-bhayo mahīyate
analyzed: māyāvinām ācāryaḥ mahādevena parirakṣitaḥ vigata sudarśana bhayaḥ mahīyate

original: BhP_05.24.029 /1 tato 'dhastān mahātale kādraveyāṇāṃ sarpāṇāṃ naika-śirasāṃ krodhavaśo
analyzed: tatas dhastāt mahā tale kādraveyāṇām sarpāṇām na eka śirasām

original: nāma gaṇaḥ kuhaka-takṣaka-kāliya-suṣeṇādi-pradhānā mahā-bhogavantaḥ patattri-rājādhipateḥ
analyzed: nāma gaṇaḥ kuhaka takṣaka kāliya suṣeṇa ādi pradhānāḥ mahā bhogavantaḥ patattri rāja adhipateḥ

original: puruṣa-vāhād anavaratam udvijamānāḥ sva-kalatrāpatya-suhṛt-kuṭumba-saṅgena kvacit pramattā viharanti
analyzed: puruṣa vāhāt anavaratam udvijamānāḥ sva kalatra apatya suhṛd kuṭumba saṅgena kvacid pramattāḥ viharanti

original: BhP_05.24.030 /1 tato 'dhastād rasātale daiteyā dānavāḥ paṇayo nāma nivāta-kavacāḥ
analyzed: tatas dhastāt rasātale daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ paṇayaḥ nāma nivāta kavacāḥ

original: kāleyā hiraṇya-puravāsina iti vibudha-pratyanīkā utpattyā mahaujaso mahā-sāhasino
analyzed: kāleyāḥ hiraṇyapura vāsinaḥ iti vibudha pratyanīkāḥ utpattyā mahā ojasaḥ mahā sāhasinaḥ

original: bhagavataḥ sakala-lokānubhāvasya harer eva tejasā pratihata-balāvalepā bileśayā iva
analyzed: bhagavataḥ sakala loka anubhāvasya hareḥ eva tejasā pratihata bala avalepāḥ bileśayāḥ iva

original: vasanti ye vai saramayendra-dūtyā vāgbhir mantra-varṇābhir indrād bibhyati
analyzed: vasanti ye vai saramayā indradūtyā vāgbhiḥ mantra varṇābhiḥ indrāt bibhyati

original: BhP_05.24.031 /1 tato 'dhastāt pātāle nāga-loka-patayo vāsuki-pramukhāḥ śaṅkha-kulika-mahāśaṅkha-śveta-dhanañjaya-dhṛtarāṣṭra-śaṅkhacūḍa-kambalāśvatara-devadattādayo
analyzed: tatas dhastāt pātāle nāga lokapatayaḥ vāsuki pramukhāḥ śaṅkha kulika mahāśaṅkha śveta dhanañjaya dhṛtarāṣṭra śaṅkhacūḍa kambala aśvatara devadatta ādayaḥ

original: mahā-bhogino mahāmarṣā nivasanti yeṣām u ha vai pañca-sapta-daśa-śata-sahasra-śīrṣāṇāṃ
analyzed: mahā bhoginaḥ mahā marṣāḥ nivasanti yeṣām u ha vai pañca saptadaśa śata sahasra śīrṣāṇām

original: phaṇāsu viracitā mahā-maṇayo rociṣṇavaḥ pātāla-vivara-timira-nikaraṃ sva-rociṣā vidhamanti
analyzed: phaṇāsu viracitāḥ mahā maṇayaḥ rociṣṇavaḥ pātāla vivara timira nikaram sva rociṣā vidhamanti

original: BhP_05.25.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.25.001 /1 tasya mūla-deśe triṃśad-yojana-sahasrāntara āste yā vai kalā bhagavatas
analyzed: tasya mūla deśe triṃśat yojana sahasra antare āste yā vai kalā bhagavantaḥ

original: tāmasī samākhyātānanta iti sātvatīyā draṣṭṛ-dṛśyayoḥ saṅkarṣaṇam aham ity abhimāna-lakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: tāmasī samākhyātā anantaḥ iti sātvatīyā draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ saṅkarṣaṇam aham iti abhimāna lakṣaṇam

original: yaṃ saṅkarṣaṇam ity ācakṣate
analyzed: yam saṅkarṣaṇam iti ācakṣate

original: BhP_05.25.002/1 yasyedaṃ kṣiti-maṇḍalaṃ bhagavato 'nanta-mūrteḥ sahasra-śirasa ekasminn eva śīrṣaṇi dhriyamāṇaṃ siddhārtha iva lakṣyate
analyzed: yasya idam kṣiti maṇḍalam bhagavataḥ nanta mūrteḥ sahasra śirasaḥ ekasmin eva śīrṣaṇi dhriyamāṇam siddhārthaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: BhP_05.25.003 /1 yasya ha vā idaṃ kālenopasañjihīrṣato 'marṣa-viracita-rucira-bhramad-bhruvor
analyzed: yasya ha vai idam kālena upasañjihīrṣataḥ marṣa viracita rucira bhramat bhruvoḥ

original: antareṇa sāṅkarṣaṇo nāma rudra ekādaśa-vyūhas try-akṣas tri-śikhaṃ śūlam uttambhayann udatiṣṭhat
analyzed: antareṇa sāṅkarṣaṇaḥ nāma rudraḥ ekādaśa vyūhaḥ tri akṣaḥ tri śikham śūlam uttambhayan udatiṣṭhat

original: BhP_05.25.004 /1 yasyāṅghri-kamala-yugalāruṇa-viśada-nakha-maṇi-ṣaṇḍa-maṇḍaleṣv ahi-patayaḥ
analyzed: yasya aṅghri kamala yugala aruṇa viśada nakha maṇi ṣaṇḍa maṇḍaleṣu ahi patayaḥ

original: saha sātvatarṣabhair ekānta-bhakti-yogenāvanamantaḥ sva-vadanāni parisphurat-kuṇḍala-prabhā-maṇḍita-gaṇḍa-sthalāny
analyzed: saha sātvata ṛṣabhaiḥ ekānta bhakti yogena avanamantaḥ sva vadanāni parisphurat kuṇḍala prabhā maṇḍita gaṇḍa sthalāni

original: ati-manoharāṇi pramudita-manasaḥ khalu vilokayanti
analyzed: ati manoharāṇi pramudita manasaḥ khalu vilokayanti

original: BhP_05.25.005 /1 yasyaiva hi nāga-rāja-kumārya āśiṣa āśāsānāś cārv-aṅga-valaya-vilasita-viśada-vipula-dhavala-subhaga-rucira-bhuja-rajata-stambheṣv
analyzed: yasya eva hi nāga rāja kumāryaḥ āśiṣaḥ āśāsānāḥ cāru aṅga valaya vilasita viśada vipula dhavala subhaga rucira bhuja rajata stambheṣu

original: aguru-candana-kuṅkuma-paṅkānulepenāvalimpamānās tad-abhimarśanonmathita-hṛdaya-makara-dhvajāveśa-rucira-lalita-smitās
analyzed: aguru candana kuṅkuma paṅka anulepena avalimpamānāḥ tad abhimarśana unmathita hṛdaya makaradhvaja āveśa rucira lalita smitāḥ

original: tad-anurāgamada-mudita-mada-vighūrṇitāruṇa-karuṇāvaloka-nayana-vadanāravindaṃ savrīḍaṃ kila vilokayanti
analyzed: tad anurāga mada mudita mada vighūrṇita aruṇa karuṇa avaloka nayana vadana aravindam sa vrīḍam kila vilokayanti

original: BhP_05.25.006/1 sa eva bhagavān ananto 'nanta-guṇārṇava ādi-deva upasaṃhṛtāmarṣa-roṣa-vego lokānāṃ svastaya āste
analyzed: saḥ eva bhagavān anantaḥ nanta guṇa arṇavaḥ ādidevaḥ upasaṃhṛta amarṣa roṣa vegaḥ lokānām svastaye āste

original: BhP_05.25.007 /1 dhyāyamānaḥ surāsuroraga-siddha-gandharva-vidyādhara-muni-gaṇair
analyzed: dhyāyamānaḥ sura asura uraga siddha gandharva vidyādhara muni gaṇaiḥ

original: anavarata-mada-mudita-vikṛta-vihvala-locanaḥ sulalita-mukharikāmṛtenāpyāyamānaḥ sva-pārṣada-vibudha-yūtha-patīn
analyzed: anavarata mada mudita vikṛta vihvala locanaḥ su lalita mukharikā amṛtena āpyāyamānaḥ sva pārṣada vibudha yūtha patīn

original: aparimlāna-rāga-nava-tulasikāmoda-madhv-āsavena mādyan madhukara-vrāta-madhura-gīta-śriyaṃ
analyzed: a parimlāna rāga nava tulasikā āmoda madhu āsavena mādyan madhukara vrāta madhura gīta śriyam

original: vaijayantīṃ svāṃ vanamālāṃ nīla-vāsā eka-kuṇḍalo hala-kakudi kṛta-subhaga-sundara-bhujo
analyzed: vaijayantīm svām vanamālām nīla vāsāḥ eka kuṇḍalaḥ hala kakudi kṛta subhaga sundara bhujaḥ

original: bhagavān mahendro vāraṇendra iva kāñcanīṃ kakṣām udāra-līlo bibharti
analyzed: bhagavān mahā indraḥ vāraṇa indraḥ iva kāñcanīm kakṣām udāra līlaḥ bibharti

original: BhP_05.25.008 /1 ya eṣa evam anuśruto dhyāyamāno mumukṣūṇām anādi-kāla-karma-vāsanā-grathitam
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ evam anuśrutaḥ dhyāyamānaḥ mumukṣūṇām anādi kāla karma vāsanā grathitam

original: avidyāmayaṃ hṛdaya-granthiṃ sattva-rajas-tamomayam antar-hṛdayaṃ gata āśu nirbhinatti
analyzed: avidyā mayam hṛdaya granthim sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ mayam antar hṛdayam gataḥ āśu nirbhinatti

original: tasyānubhāvān bhagavān svāyambhuvo nāradaḥ saha tumburuṇā sabhāyāṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃślokayām āsa
analyzed: tasya anubhāvān bhagavān svāyambhuvaḥ nāradaḥ saha tumburuṇā sabhāyām brahmaṇaḥ saṃślokayām āsa

original: BhP_05.25.009/1 utpatti-sthiti-laya-hetavo 'sya kalpāḥ
analyzed: utpatti sthiti laya hetavaḥ sya kalpāḥ

original: BhP_05.25.009/2 sattvādyāḥ prakṛti-guṇā yad-īkṣayāsan
analyzed: sattva ādyāḥ prakṛti guṇāḥ yat īkṣayā āsan

original: BhP_05.25.009/3 yad-rūpaṃ dhruvam akṛtaṃ yad ekam ātman
analyzed: yad rūpam dhruvam a kṛtam yat ekam ātman

original: BhP_05.25.009/4 nānādhāt katham u ha veda tasya vartma
analyzed: nānādhāt katham u ha veda tasya vartma

original: BhP_05.25.010/1 mūrtiṃ naḥ puru-kṛpayā babhāra sattvaṃ
analyzed: mūrtim naḥ puru kṛpayā babhāra sattvam

original: BhP_05.25.010/2 saṃśuddhaṃ sad-asad idaṃ vibhāti tatra
analyzed: saṃśuddham sat asat idam vibhāti tatra

original: BhP_05.25.010/3 yal-līlāṃ mṛga-patir ādade 'navadyām
analyzed: yat līlām mṛgapatiḥ ādade navadyām

original: BhP_05.25.010/4 ādātuṃ svajana-manāṃsy udāra-vīryaḥ
analyzed: ādātum sva jana manāṃsi udāra vīryaḥ

original: BhP_05.25.011/1 yan-nāma śrutam anukīrtayed akasmād
analyzed: yad nāma śrutam anukīrtayet akasmāt

original: BhP_05.25.011/2 ārto vā yadi patitaḥ pralambhanād vā
analyzed: ārtaḥ vā yadi patitaḥ pralambhanāt vā

original: BhP_05.25.011/3 hanty aṃhaḥ sapadi nṛṇām aśeṣam anyaṃ
analyzed: hanti aṃhaḥ sapadi nṛṇām aśeṣam anyam

original: BhP_05.25.011/4 kaṃ śeṣād bhagavata āśrayen mumukṣuḥ
analyzed: kam śeṣāt bhagavataḥ āśrayet mumukṣuḥ

original: BhP_05.25.012/1 mūrdhany arpitam aṇuvat sahasra-mūrdhno
analyzed: mūrdhani arpitam aṇuvat sahasra mūrdhnaḥ

original: BhP_05.25.012/2 bhū-golaṃ sagiri-sarit-samudra-sattvam
BhP_05.25.012/3 ānantyād animita-vikramasya bhūmnaḥ
analyzed: ānantyāt animita vikramasya bhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_05.25.012/4 ko vīryāṇy adhi gaṇayet sahasra-jihvaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vīryāṇi adhi gaṇayet sahasra jihvaḥ

original: BhP_05.25.013/1 evam-prabhāvo bhagavān ananto
analyzed: evamprabhāvaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ

original: BhP_05.25.013/2 duranta-vīryoru-guṇānubhāvaḥ
BhP_05.25.013/3 mūle rasāyāḥ sthita ātma-tantro
analyzed: mūle rasāyāḥ sthitaḥ

original: BhP_05.25.013/4 yo līlayā kṣmāṃ sthitaye bibharti
analyzed: yaḥ līlayā kṣmām sthitaye bibharti

original: BhP_05.25.014/1 etā hy eveha nṛbhir upagantavyā gatayo yathā-karma-vinirmitā yathopadeśam anuvarṇitāḥ kāmān kāmayamānaiḥ
analyzed: etāḥ hi evā iha nṛbhiḥ upagantavyāḥ gatayaḥ yathā karma vinirmitāḥ yathopadeśam anuvarṇitāḥ kāmān kāmayamānaiḥ

original: BhP_05.25.015/1 etāvatīr hi rājan puṃsaḥ pravṛtti-lakṣaṇasya dharmasya vipāka-gataya uccāvacā visadṛśā yathā-praśnaṃ vyācakhye kim anyat kathayāma
analyzed: etāvatīḥ hi rājan puṃsaḥ pravṛtti lakṣaṇasya dharmasya vipāka gatayaḥ uccāvacāḥ visadṛśāḥ yathāpraśnam vyācakhye kim anyat kathayāma

original: BhP_05.26.001/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.26.001/1 maharṣa etad vaicitryaṃ lokasya katham iti
analyzed: mahā ṛṣe etat vaicitryam lokasya katham iti

original: BhP_05.26.002/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.26.002/1 tri-guṇatvāt kartuḥ śraddhayā karma-gatayaḥ pṛthag-vidhāḥ sarvā eva sarvasya tāratamyena bhavanti
analyzed: triguṇa tvāt kartuḥ śraddhayā karma gatayaḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ sarvāḥ eva sarvasya tāratamyena bhavanti

original: BhP_05.26.002 /1 athedānīṃ pratiṣiddha-lakṣaṇasyādharmasya tathaiva kartuḥ śraddhāyā
analyzed: atha idānīm pratiṣiddha lakṣaṇasya adharmasya tathā eva kartuḥ śraddhāyā

original: vaisādṛśyāt karma-phalaṃ visadṛśaṃ bhavati yā hy anādy-avidyayā kṛta-kāmānāṃ tat-pariṇāma-lakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: vaisādṛśyāt karma phalam visadṛśam bhavati yāḥ hi anādya vidyayā kṛta kāmānām tad pariṇāma lakṣaṇāḥ

original: sṛtayaḥ sahasraśaḥ pravṛttās tāsāṃ prācuryeṇānuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ
analyzed: sṛtayaḥ sahasraśas pravṛttāḥ tāsām prācuryeṇa anuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ

original: BhP_05.26.003/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_05.26.003/1 narakā nāma bhagavan kiṃ deśa-viśeṣā athavā bahis tri-lokyā āhosvid antarāla iti
analyzed: narakāḥ nāma bhagavan kim deśa viśeṣāḥ athavā bahis trilokyāḥ āhosvit antarāle iti

original: BhP_05.26.004/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_05.26.004 /1 antarāla eva tri-jagatyās tu diśi dakṣiṇasyām adhastād bhūmer upariṣṭāc
analyzed: antarāle eva trijagatyāḥ tu diśi dakṣiṇasyām adhastāt bhūmeḥ upariṣṭāt

original: ca jalād yasyām agniṣvāttādayaḥ pitṛ-gaṇā diśi svānāṃ gotrāṇāṃ parameṇa samādhinā
analyzed: ca jalāt yasyām agniṣvātta ādayaḥ pitṛ gaṇāḥ diśi svānām gotrāṇām parameṇa samādhinā

original: satyā evāśiṣa āśāsānā nivasanti
analyzed: satyāḥ eva āśiṣaḥ āśāsānāḥ nivasanti

original: BhP_05.26.005 /1 yatra ha vāva bhagavān pitṛ-rājo vaivasvataḥ sva-viṣayaṃ prāpiteṣu
analyzed: yatra ha vāva bhagavān pitṛrājaḥ vaivasvataḥ sva viṣayam prāpiteṣu

original: sva-puruṣair jantuṣu sampareteṣu yathā-karmāvadyaṃ doṣam evānullaṅghita-bhagavac-chāsanaḥ
analyzed: sva puruṣaiḥ jantuṣu sampareteṣu yathākarma avadyam doṣam eva an ullaṅghita bhagavat śāsanaḥ

original: sagaṇo damaṃ dhārayati
analyzed: sa gaṇaḥ damam dhārayati

original: BhP_05.26.006 /1 tatra haike narakān eka-viṃśatiṃ gaṇayanti atha tāṃs te rājan nāma-rūpa-lakṣaṇato
analyzed: tatra ha eke narakān ekaviṃśatim gaṇayanti atha tān te rājan nāma rūpa lakṣaṇāt

original: 'nukramiṣyāmas tāmisro 'ndhatāmisro rauravo mahārauravaḥ kumbhīpākaḥ kālasūtram asipatravanaṃ
analyzed: nukramiṣyāmaḥ tāmisraḥ ndhatāmisraḥ rauravaḥ mahārauravaḥ kumbhīpākaḥ kālasūtram asipatravanam

original: sūkaramukham andhakūpaḥ kṛmibhojanaḥ sandaṃśas taptasūrmir vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalī vaitaraṇī
analyzed: sūkaramukham andhakūpaḥ kṛmibhojanaḥ sandaṃśaḥ taptasūrmiḥ vajrakaṇṭaka śālmalī vaitaraṇī

original: pūyodaḥ prāṇarodho viśasanaṃ lālābhakṣaḥ sārameyādanam avīcir ayaḥpānam iti kiñca
analyzed: pūya udaḥ prāṇa rodhaḥ viśasanam lālā bhakṣaḥ sārameya adanam avīciḥ ayaḥ pānam iti kiñca

original: kṣārakardamo rakṣogaṇa-bhojanaḥ śūlaproto dandaśūko 'vaṭa-nirodhanaḥ paryāvartanaḥ
analyzed: kṣāra kardamaḥ rakṣaḥ gaṇa bhojanaḥ śūla protaḥ dandaśūkaḥ vaṭa nirodhanaḥ paryāvartanaḥ

original: sūcīmukham ity aṣṭā-viṃśatir narakā vividha-yātanā-bhūmayaḥ
analyzed: sūcīmukham iti aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ narakāḥ vividha yātanā bhūmayaḥ

original: BhP_05.26.007 /1 tatra yas tu para-vittāpatya-kalatrāṇy apaharati sa hi kāla-pāśa-baddho
analyzed: tatra yaḥ tu para vitta apatya kalatrāṇi apaharati sa hi kāla pāśa baddhaḥ

original: yama-puruṣair ati-bhayānakais tāmisre narake balān nipātyate anaśanānudapāna-daṇḍa-tāḍana-santarjanādibhir
analyzed: yama puruṣaiḥ ati bhayānakaiḥ tāmisre narake balāt nipātyate anaśana an udapāna daṇḍa tāḍana santarjana ādibhiḥ

original: yātanābhir yātyamāno jantur yatra kaśmalam āsādita ekadaiva mūrcchām upayāti tāmisra-prāye
analyzed: yātanābhiḥ yātyamānaḥ jantuḥ yatra kaśmalam āsāditaḥ ekadā eva mūrcchām upayāti tāmisra prāye

original: BhP_05.26.008 /1 evam evāndhatāmisre yas tu vañcayitvā puruṣaṃ dārādīn upayuṅkte
analyzed: evam eva andhatāmisre yaḥ tu vañcayitvā puruṣam dāra ādīn upayuṅkte

original: yatra śarīrī nipātyamāno yātanā-stho vedanayā naṣṭa-matir naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiś ca bhavati
analyzed: yatra śarīrī nipātyamānaḥ yātanā sthaḥ vedanayā naṣṭa matiḥ naṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ ca bhavati

original: yathā vanaspatir vṛścyamāna-mūlas tasmād andhatāmisraṃ tam upadiśanti
analyzed: yathā vanaspatiḥ vṛścyamāna mūlaḥ tasmāt andhatāmisram tam upadiśanti

original: BhP_05.26.009/1 yas tv iha vā etad aham iti mamedam iti bhūta-droheṇa kevalaṃ sva-kuṭumbam evānudinaṃ prapuṣṇāti sa tad iha vihāya svayam eva  #
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai etat aham iti mama idam iti bhūta droheṇa kevalam sva kuṭumbam eva anudinam prapuṣṇāti sa tat iha vihāya svayam eva

original: tad-aśubhena raurave nipatati
analyzed: tat aśubhena raurave nipatati

original: BhP_05.26.010 /1 ye tv iha yathaivāmunā vihiṃsitā jantavaḥ paratra yama-yātanām upagataṃ
analyzed: ye tu iha yathā eva amunā vihiṃsitāḥ jantavaḥ paratra yama yātanām upagatam

original: ta eva ruravo bhūtvā tathā tam eva vihiṃsanti tasmād rauravam ity āhū rurur iti sarpād
analyzed: te eva ruravaḥ bhūtvā tathā tam eva vihiṃsanti tasmāt rauravam iti āhuḥ ruruḥ iti sarpāt

original: ati-krūra-sattvasyāpadeśaḥ
analyzed: ati krūra sattvasya apadeśaḥ

original: BhP_05.26.011/1 evam eva mahārauravo yatra nipatitaṃ puruṣaṃ kravyādā nāma ruravas taṃ kravyeṇa ghātayanti yaḥ kevalaṃ dehambharaḥ
analyzed: evam eva mahārauravaḥ yatra nipatitam puruṣam kravyādāḥ nāma ruravaḥ tam kravyeṇa ghātayanti yaḥ kevalam dehambharaḥ

original: BhP_05.26.012/1 yas tv iha vā ugraḥ paśūn pakṣiṇo vā prāṇata uparandhayati tam apakaruṇaṃ puruṣādair api vigarhitam amutra yamānucarāḥ kumbhīpāke  #
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai ugraḥ paśūn pakṣiṇaḥ vā prāṇataḥ uparandhayati tam apakaruṇam puruṣādaiḥ api vigarhitam amutra yama anucarāḥ kumbhīpāke  /

original: tapta-taile uparandhayanti
analyzed: tapta taile uparandhayanti

original: BhP_05.26.013 /1 yas tv iha brahma-dhruk sa kālasūtra-saṃjñake narake ayuta-yojana-parimaṇḍale
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha sa kālasūtra saṃjñake narake ayuta yojana parimaṇḍale

original: tāmramaye tapta-khale upary-adhastād agny-arkābhyām ati-tapyamāne 'bhiniveśitaḥ kṣut-pipāsābhyāṃ
analyzed: tāmra maye tapta khale upari adhastāt agni arkābhyām atitapyamāne bhiniveśitaḥ kṣudh pipāsābhyām

original: ca dahyamānāntar-bahiḥ-śarīra āste śete ceṣṭate 'vatiṣṭhati paridhāvati ca yāvanti
analyzed: ca dahyamāna antar bahis śarīraḥ āste śete ceṣṭate vatiṣṭhati paridhāvati ca yāvanti

original: paśu-romāṇi tāvad varṣa-sahasrāṇi
analyzed: paśu romāṇi tāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi

original: BhP_05.26.014 /1 yas tv iha vai nija-veda-pathād anāpady apagataḥ pākhaṇḍaṃ copagatas
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai nija veda pathāt anāpadi apagataḥ pākhaṇḍam ca upagataḥ

original: tam asi-patravanaṃ praveśya kaśayā praharanti tatra hāsāv itas tato dhāvamāna ubhayato
analyzed: tam asipatravanam praveśya kaśayā praharanti tatra ha asau itas tatas dhāvamānaḥ ubhayatas

original: dhārais tāla-vanāsi-patraiś chidyamāna-sarvāṅgo hā hato 'smīti paramayā vedanayā
analyzed: dhāraiḥ tāla vana asi patraiḥ chidyamāna sarva aṅgaḥ hā hataḥ smi iti paramayā vedanayā

original: mūrcchitaḥ pade pade nipatati sva-dharmahā pākhaṇḍānugataṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte
analyzed: mūrcchitaḥ pade pade nipatati svadharma hā pākhaṇḍa anugatam phalam bhuṅkte

original: BhP_05.26.015 /1 yas tv iha vai rājā rāja-puruṣo vā adaṇḍye daṇḍaṃ praṇayati brāhmaṇe
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai rājā rāja puruṣaḥ vā a daṇḍye daṇḍam praṇayati brāhmaṇe

original: vā śarīra-daṇḍaṃ sa pāpīyān narake 'mutra sūkaramukhe nipatati tatrātibalair viniṣpiṣyamāṇāvayavo
analyzed: vā śarīra daṇḍam sa pāpīyān narake mutra sūkara mukhe nipatati tatra ati balaiḥ viniṣpiṣyamāṇa avayavaḥ

original: yathaivehekṣukhaṇḍa ārta-svareṇa svanayan kvacin mūrcchitaḥ kaśmalam upagato yathaivehā-dṛṣṭa-doṣā uparuddhāḥ
analyzed: yathā eva iha ikṣu khaṇḍaḥ ārta svareṇa svanayan kvacid mūrcchitaḥ kaśmalam upagataḥ yathā eva iha adṛṣṭa doṣāḥ uparuddhāḥ

original: BhP_05.26.016 /1 yas tv iha vai bhūtānām īśvaropakalpita-vṛttīnām avivikta-para-vyathānāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai bhūtānām īśvara upakalpita vṛttīnām a vivikta para vyathānām

original: svayaṃ puruṣopakalpita-vṛttir vivikta-para-vyatho vyathām ācarati sa paratrāndhakūpe
analyzed: svayam puruṣa upakalpita vṛttiḥ vivikta para vyathaḥ vyathām ācarati sa paratra andhakūpe

original: tad-abhidroheṇa nipatati tatra hāsau tair jantubhiḥ paśu-mṛga-pakṣi-sarīsṛpair maśaka-yūkā-matkuṇa-makṣikādibhir
analyzed: tad abhidroheṇa nipatati tatra ha asau taiḥ jantubhiḥ paśu mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpaiḥ maśaka yūkā matkuṇa makṣikā ādibhiḥ

original: ye ke cābhidrugdhās taiḥ sarvato 'bhidruhyamāṇas tamasi vihata-nidrā-nirvṛtir alabdhāvasthānaḥ
analyzed: ye ke ca abhidrugdhāḥ taiḥ sarvatas bhidruhyamāṇaḥ tamasi vihata nidrā nirvṛtiḥ alabdha avasthānaḥ

original: parikrāmati yathā kuśarīre jīvaḥ
analyzed: parikrāmati yathā kuśarīre jīvaḥ

original: BhP_05.26.017 /1 yas tv iha vā asaṃvibhajyāśnāti yat kiñcanopanatam anirmita-pañca-yajño
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai a saṃvibhajya aśnāti yat kiñcana upanatam a nirmita pañcayajñaḥ

original: vāyasa-saṃstutaḥ sa paratra kṛmibhojane narakādhame nipatati tatra śata-sahasra-yojane
analyzed: vāyasa saṃstutaḥ sa paratra kṛmibhojane naraka adhame nipatati tatra śata sahasra yojane

original: kṛmi-kuṇḍe kṛmi-bhūtaḥ svayaṃ kṛmibhir eva bhakṣyamāṇaḥ kṛmi-bhojano yāvat tad aprattāprahūtādo
analyzed: kṛmikuṇḍe kṛmi bhūtaḥ svayam kṛmibhiḥ eva bhakṣyamāṇaḥ kṛmi bhojanaḥ yāvat tat

original: 'nirveśam ātmānaṃ yātayate
analyzed: nirveśam ātmānam yātayate

original: BhP_05.26.018 /1 yas tv iha vai steyena balād vā hiraṇya-ratnādīni brāhmaṇasya vāpaharaty
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai steyena balāt vā hiraṇya ratna ādīni brāhmaṇasya vā apaharati

original: anyasya vānāpadi puruṣas tam amutra rājan yama-puruṣā ayasmayair agni-piṇḍaiḥ sandaṃśais tvaci niṣkuṣanti
analyzed: anyasya vā anāpadi puruṣaḥ tam amutra rājan yama puruṣāḥ ayasmayaiḥ agni piṇḍaiḥ sandaṃśaiḥ tvaci niṣkuṣanti

original: BhP_05.26.019 /1 yas tv iha vā agamyāṃ striyam agamyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ yoṣid abhigacchati
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai agamyām striyam agamyam vā puruṣam yoṣit abhigacchati

original: tāv amutra kaśayā tāḍayantas tigmayā sūrmyā lohamayyā puruṣam āliṅgayanti striyaṃ
analyzed: tau amutra kaśayā tāḍayantaḥ tigmayā sūrmyā loha mayyā puruṣam āliṅgayanti striyam

original: ca puruṣa-rūpayā sūrmyā
analyzed: ca puruṣa rūpayā sūrmyā

original: BhP_05.26.020/1 yas tv iha vai sarvābhigamas tam amutra niraye vartamānaṃ vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalīm āropya niṣkarṣanti
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai sarva abhigamaḥ tam amutra niraye vartamānam vajrakaṇṭaka śālmalīm āropya niṣkarṣanti

original: BhP_05.26.021 /1 ye tv iha vai rājanyā rāja-puruṣā vā apākhaṇḍā dharma-setūn bhindanti
analyzed: ye tu iha vai rājanyāḥ rāja puruṣāḥ vā apākhaṇḍāḥ dharma setūn bhindanti

original: te samparetya vaitaraṇyāṃ nipatanti bhinna-maryādās tasyāṃ niraya-parikhā-bhūtāyāṃ
analyzed: te samparetya vaitaraṇyām nipatanti bhinna maryādāḥ tasyām niraya parikhā bhūtāyām

original: nadyāṃ yādo-gaṇair itas tato bhakṣyamāṇā ātmanā na viyujyamānāś cāsubhir uhyamānāḥ
analyzed: nadyām yādaḥ gaṇaiḥ itas tatas bhakṣyamāṇāḥ ātmanā na viyujyamānāḥ ca asubhiḥ uhyamānāḥ

original: svāghena karma-pākam anusmaranto viṇ-mūtra-pūya-śoṇita-keśa-nakhāsthi-medo-māṃsa-vasā-vāhinyām upatapyante
analyzed: sva aghena karma pākam anusmarantaḥ viṣ mūtra pūya śoṇita keśa nakha asthi medaḥ māṃsa vasā vāhinyām upatapyante

original: BhP_05.26.022 /1 ye tv iha vai vṛṣalī-patayo naṣṭa-śaucācāra-niyamās tyakta-lajjāḥ
analyzed: ye tu iha vai vṛṣalī patayaḥ naṣṭa śauca ācāra niyamāḥ tyakta lajjāḥ

original: paśu-caryāṃ caranti te cāpi pretya pūya-viṇ-mūtra-śleṣma-malā-pūrṇārṇave nipatanti
analyzed: paśu caryām caranti te ca api pretya pūya viṣ mūtra śleṣma mala āpūrṇa arṇave nipatanti

original: tad evātibībhatsitam aśnanti
analyzed: tat eva ati bībhatsitam aśnanti

original: BhP_05.26.023/1 ye tv iha vai śva-gardabha-patayo brāhmaṇādayo mṛgayā vihārā atīrthe ca mṛgān nighnanti tān api samparetān lakṣya-bhūtān yama-puruṣā  #
analyzed: ye tu iha vai śva gardabha patayaḥ brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ mṛgayāḥ vihārāḥ atīrthe ca mṛgān nighnanti tān api samparetān lakṣya bhūtān yama puruṣā

original: iṣubhir vidhyanti
analyzed: iṣubhiḥ vidhyanti

original: BhP_05.26.024/1 ye tv iha vai dāmbhikā dambha-yajñeṣu paśūn viśasanti tān amuṣmin loke vaiśase narake patitān niraya-patayo yātayitvā viśasanti
analyzed: ye tu iha vai dāmbhikāḥ dambha yajñeṣu paśūn viśasanti tān amuṣmin loke vaiśase narake patitān niraya patayaḥ yātayitvā viśasanti

original: BhP_05.26.025/1 yas tv iha vai savarṇāṃ bhāryāṃ dvijo retaḥ pāyayati kāma-mohitas taṃ pāpa-kṛtam amutra retaḥ-kulyāyāṃ pātayitvā retaḥ sampāyayanti
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai savarṇām bhāryām dvijaḥ retaḥ pāyayati kāma mohitaḥ tam pāpa kṛtam amutra retaḥkulyāyām pātayitvā retaḥ sampāyayanti

original: BhP_05.26.026 /1 ye tv iha vai dasyavo 'gnidā garadā grāmān sārthān vā vilumpanti
analyzed: ye tu iha vai dasyavaḥ gni dāḥ gara dāḥ grāmān sārthān vā vilumpanti

original: rājāno rāja-bhaṭā vā tāṃś cāpi hi paretya yamadūtā vajra-daṃṣṭrāḥ śvānaḥ sapta-śatāni
analyzed: rājānaḥ rāja bhaṭāḥ vā tān ca api hi paretya yama dūtāḥ vajra daṃṣṭrāḥ śvānaḥ sapta śatāni

original: viṃśatiś ca sarabhasaṃ khādanti
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ ca sarabhasam khādanti

original: BhP_05.26.027 /1 yas tv iha vā anṛtaṃ vadati sākṣye dravya-vinimaye dāne vā kathañcit
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vā anṛtam vadati sākṣye dravya vinimaye dāne vā kathaṃcid

original: sa vai pretya narake 'vīcimaty adhaḥ-śirā niravakāśe yojana-śatocchrāyād giri-mūrdhnaḥ
analyzed: sa vai pretya narake vīcimati adhaḥśirāḥ niravakāśe yojana śata ucchrāyāt giri mūrdhnaḥ

original: sampātyate yatra jalam iva sthalam aśma-pṛṣṭham avabhāsate tad avīcimat tilaśo viśīryamāṇa-śarīro
analyzed: sampātyate yatra jalam iva sthalam aśma pṛṣṭham avabhāsate tat avīcimat tilaśas viśīryamāṇa śarīraḥ

original: na mriyamāṇaḥ punar āropito nipatati
analyzed: na mriyamāṇaḥ punar āropitaḥ nipatati

original: BhP_05.26.028 /1 yas tv iha vai vipro rājanyo vaiśyo vā soma-pīthas tat-kalatraṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai vipraḥ rājanyaḥ vaiśyaḥ vā soma pīthaḥ tad kalatram

original: vā surāṃ vrata-stho 'pi vā pibati pramādatas teṣāṃ nirayaṃ nītānām urasi padākramyāsye
analyzed: vā surām vrata sthaḥ u pi vā pibati pramādataḥ teṣām nirayam nītānām urasi pada ākramya āsye

original: vahninā dravamāṇaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ niṣiñcanti
analyzed: vahninā dravamāṇam kārṣṇāyasam niṣiñcanti

original: BhP_05.26.029 /1 atha ca yas tv iha vā ātma-sambhāvanena svayam adhamo janma-tapo-vidyācāra-varṇāśramavato
analyzed: atha ca yaḥ tu iha vā ātma sambhāvanena svayam adhamaḥ

original: varīyaso na bahu manyeta sa mṛtaka eva mṛtvā kṣārakardame niraye 'vāk-śirā nipātito
analyzed: varīyasaḥ na bahu manyeta sa mṛtakaḥ eva mṛtvā kṣārakardame niraye vāc śirāḥ

original: durantā yātanā hy aśnute
analyzed: durantāḥ yātanāḥ hi aśnute

original: BhP_05.26.030 /1 ye tv iha vai puruṣāḥ puruṣa-medhena yajante yāś ca striyo nṛ-paśūn
analyzed: ye tu iha vai puruṣāḥ puruṣamedhena yajante yāḥ ca striyaḥ nṛ paśūn

original: khādanti tāṃś ca te paśava iva nihatā yama-sadane yātayanto rakṣo-gaṇāḥ saunikā iva
analyzed: khādanti tān ca te paśavaḥ iva nihatāḥ yama sadane yātayantaḥ rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ saunikāḥ iva

original: svadhitināvadāyāsṛk pibanti nṛtyanti ca gāyanti ca hṛṣyamāṇā yatheha puruṣādāḥ
analyzed: svadhitinā avadāya asṛj pibanti nṛtyanti ca gāyanti ca hṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathā iha puruṣādāḥ

original: BhP_05.26.031 /1 ye tv iha vā anāgaso 'raṇye grāme vā vaiśrambhakair upasṛtān upaviśrambhayya
analyzed: ye tu iha vai anāgasaḥ raṇye grāme vā vaiśrambhakaiḥ upasṛtān upaviśrambhayya

original: jijīviṣūn śūla-sūtrādiṣūpaprotān krīḍanakatayā yātayanti te 'pi ca pretya yama-yātanāsu
analyzed: jijīviṣūn śūla sūtra ādiṣu upaprotān krīḍanaka tayā yātayanti te ca pretya yama yātanāsu

original: śūlādiṣu protātmānaḥ kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ cābhihatāḥ kaṅka-vaṭādibhiś cetas tatas tigma-tuṇḍair
analyzed: śūla ādiṣu prota ātmānaḥ kṣudh tṛḍbhyām ca abhihatāḥ kaṅka vaṭa ādibhiḥ ca itas tatas tigma tuṇḍaiḥ

original: āhanyamānā ātma-śamalaṃ smaranti
analyzed: āhanyamānāḥ ātma śamalam smaranti

original: BhP_05.26.032 /1 ye tv iha vai bhūtāny udvejayanti narā ulbaṇa-svabhāvā yathā dandaśūkās
analyzed: ye tu iha vai bhūtāni udvejayanti narāḥ ulbaṇa svabhāvāḥ yathā dandaśūkāḥ

original: te 'pi pretya narake dandaśūkākhye nipatanti yatra nṛpa dandaśūkāḥ pañca-mukhāḥ sapta-mukhā
analyzed: te pi pretya narake dandaśūka ākhye nipatanti yatra nṛpa dandaśūkāḥ pañca mukhāḥ sapta mukhāḥ

original: upasṛtya grasanti yathā bileśayān
analyzed: upasṛtya grasanti yathā bileśayān

original: BhP_05.26.033/1 ye tv iha vā andhāvaṭa-kusūla-guhādiṣu bhūtāni nirundhanti tathāmutra teṣv evopaveśya sagareṇa vahninā dhūmena nirundhanti
analyzed: ye tu iha vā andha avaṭa kusūla guhā ādiṣu bhūtāni nirundhanti tathā amutra teṣu eva upaveśya sagareṇa vahninā dhūmena nirundhanti

original: BhP_05.26.034 /1 yas tv iha vā atithīn abhyāgatān vā gṛha-patir asakṛd upagata-manyur
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vā atithīn abhyāgatān vā gṛhapatiḥ asakṛt upagata manyuḥ

original: didhakṣur iva pāpena cakṣuṣā nirīkṣate tasya cāpi niraye pāpa-dṛṣṭer akṣiṇī vajra-tuṇḍā
analyzed: didhakṣuḥ iva pāpena cakṣuṣā nirīkṣate tasya ca api niraye pāpa dṛṣṭeḥ akṣiṇī vajra tuṇḍā

original: gṛdhrāḥ kaṅka-kāka-vaṭādayaḥ prasahyoru-balād utpāṭayanti
analyzed: gṛdhrāḥ kaṅka kāka vaṭa ādayaḥ prasahya ūru balāt utpāṭayanti

original: BhP_05.26.035 /1 yas tv iha vā āḍhyābhimatir ahaṅkṛtis tiryak-prekṣaṇaḥ sarvato 'bhiviśaṅkī
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha vai āḍhya abhimatiḥ ahaṅkṛtiḥ tiryak prekṣaṇaḥ sarvatas bhiviśaṅkī

original: artha-vyaya-nāśa-cintayā pariśuṣyamāṇa-hṛdaya-vadano nirvṛtim anavagato graha ivārtham
analyzed: artha vyaya nāśa cintayā pariśuṣyamāṇa hṛdaya vadanaḥ nirvṛtim an avagataḥ grahaḥ iva artham

original: abhirakṣati sa cāpi pretya tad-utpādanotkarṣaṇa-saṃrakṣaṇa-śamala-grahaḥ sūcīmukhe
analyzed: abhirakṣati sa ca api pretya tad utpādana utkarṣaṇa saṃrakṣaṇa śamala grahaḥ sūcī mukhe

original: narake nipatati yatra ha vitta-grahaṃ pāpa-puruṣaṃ dharmarāja-puruṣā vāyakā iva sarvato
analyzed: narake nipatati yatra ha vitta graham pāpa puruṣam dharmarāja puruṣāḥ vāyakāḥ iva

original: 'ṅgeṣu sūtraiḥ parivayanti
analyzed: ṅgeṣu sūtraiḥ parivayanti

original: BhP_05.26.036 /1 evaṃ-vidhā narakā yamālaye santi śataśaḥ sahasraśas teṣu sarveṣu
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ narakāḥ yama ālaye santi śataśas sahasraśas teṣu sarveṣu

original: ca sarva evādharma-vartino ye kecid ihoditā anuditāś cāvani-pate paryāyeṇa viśanti
analyzed: ca sarve eva adharma vartinaḥ ye kecid iha uditāḥ an uditāḥ ca avanipate paryāyeṇa viśanti

original: tathaiva dharmānuvartina itaratra iha tu punar-bhave ta ubhaya-śeṣābhyāṃ niviśanti
analyzed: tathā eva dharma anuvartinaḥ itaratra iha tu punarbhave te ubhaya śeṣābhyām niviśanti

original: BhP_05.26.037 /1 nivṛtti-lakṣaṇa-mārga ādāv eva vyākhyātaḥ etāvān evāṇḍa-kośo yaś
analyzed: nivṛtti lakṣaṇa mārgaḥ ādau eva vyākhyātaḥ etāvān eva aṇḍa kośaḥ yaḥ

original: caturdaśadhā purāṇeṣu vikalpita upagīyate yat tad bhagavato nārāyaṇasya sākṣān mahā-puruṣasya
analyzed: caturdaśadhā purāṇeṣu vikalpitaḥ upagīyate yat tat bhagavataḥ nārāyaṇasya sākṣāt mahāpuruṣasya

original: sthaviṣṭhaṃ rūpam ātmamāyā-guṇamayam anuvarṇitam ādṛtaḥ paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayati
analyzed: sthaviṣṭham rūpam ātma māyā guṇa mayam anuvarṇitam ādṛtaḥ paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayati

original: sa upageyaṃ bhagavataḥ paramātmano 'grāhyam api śraddhā-bhakti-viśuddha-buddhir veda
analyzed: saḥ upageyam bhagavataḥ paramātmanaḥ grāhyam api śraddhā bhakti viśuddha buddhiḥ veda

original: BhP_05.26.038/1 śrutvā sthūlaṃ tathā sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato yatiḥ
analyzed: śrutvā sthūlam tathā sūkṣmam rūpam bhagavataḥ yatiḥ

original: BhP_05.26.038/2 sthūle nirjitam ātmānaṃ śanaiḥ sūkṣmaṃ dhiyā nayed iti
analyzed: sthūle nirjitam ātmānam śanais sūkṣmam dhiyā nayet iti

original: BhP_05.26.039/1 bhū-dvīpa-varṣa-sarid-adri-nabhaḥ-samudra-
analyzed: bhū dvīpa varṣa sarit adri nabhaḥ samudra

original: BhP_05.26.039/2 pātāla-diṅ-naraka-bhāgaṇa-loka-saṃsthā
BhP_05.26.039/3 gītā mayā tava nṛpādbhutam īśvarasya
analyzed: gītāḥ mayā tava nṛpa adbhutam īśvarasya

original: BhP_05.26.039/4 sthūlaṃ vapuḥ sakala-jīva-nikāya-dhāma
analyzed: sthūlam vapuḥ sakala jīvanikāya dhāma
